GE07mbh_07_u:001.000-0001_02: devīṃ sarasvatīṃ caiva tato jayam udīrayet
GE07mbh_07_u:001.002c: kim aceṣṭata viprarṣe hate pitari vīryavān
GE07mbh_07_u:001.003a: tasya putro hi bhagavan bhīṣmadroṇamukhai rathaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:001.004a: tasmin hate tu bhagavan ketau sarvadhanuṣmatām
GE07mbh_07_u:001.004c: yad aceṣṭata kauravyas tan me brūhi dvijottama
GE07mbh_07_u:001.006a: tasya cintayato duḥkham aniśaṃ pārthivasya tat
GE07mbh_07_u:001.006d-0005_01: niḥśvāsaparamo rājā dhyāyann āste hy adhomukhaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:001.006d-0005_02: astaṃ prāpte dinakare niśi gāvalgaṇis tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:001.006d-0006_02: sainikānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ senayor ubhayos tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:001.007a: śibirāt saṃjayaṃ prāptaṃ niśi nāgāhvayaṃ puram
GE07mbh_07_u:001.008d-0007_01: dhārtarāṣṭrān mṛtān sarvān manye saṃjaya saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:001.009c: kim akārṣuḥ paraṃ tāta kuravaḥ kālacoditāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:001.009d-0008_01: hataṃ śrutvā mama sutaḥ kim akārṣīc ca saṃjaya
GE07mbh_07_u:001.010c: kiṃ nu svit kuravo 'kārṣur nimagnāḥ śokasāgare
GE07mbh_07_u:001.011a: tad udīrṇaṃ mahat sainyaṃ trailokyasyāpi saṃjaya
GE07mbh_07_u:001.011d-0011_01: ko hi dauryodhane sainye pumān āsīn mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:001.011d-0011_02: yaṃ prāpya sumahāyuddhe tan naḥ śaṃsa mahābhaye
GE07mbh_07_u:001.012a: devavrate tu nihate kurūṇām ṛṣabhe tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:001.012c: yad akārṣur nṛpatayas tan mamācakṣva saṃjaya
GE07mbh_07_u:001.013a: śṛṇu rājann ekamanā vacanaṃ bruvato mama
GE07mbh_07_u:001.013c: yat te putrās tadākārṣur hate devavrate mṛdhe
GE07mbh_07_u:001.014a: nihate tu tadā bhīṣme rājan satyaparākrame
GE07mbh_07_u:001.014c: tāvakāḥ pāṇḍaveyāś ca prādhyāyanta pṛthak pṛthak
GE07mbh_07_u:001.015a: vismitāś ca prahṛṣṭāś ca kṣatradharmaṃ niśāmya te
GE07mbh_07_u:001.015b-0012_01: jugupsamānāḥ paramaṃ kṣātraṃ karma viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:001.017c: anumānya ca gāṅgeyaṃ kṛtvā cāpi pradakṣiṇam
GE07mbh_07_u:001.019a: tatas tūryaninādaiś ca bherīṇāṃ ca mahāsvanaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:001.022a: mohāt tava saputrasya vadhāc chāṃtanavasya ca
GE07mbh_07_u:001.023b-0013_01: karṇa karṇeti cakranduḥ śeṣā bhārata pārthivāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:001.024c: dyaur ivāpetanakṣatrā hīnaṃ kham iva vāyunā
GE07mbh_07_u:001.025c: āsurīva yathā senā nigṛhīte purā balau
GE07mbh_07_u:001.026b-0014_01: lakṣmīr iva surais tyaktā śrutihīnā yathā dvijāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:001.026c: vṛkair iva vane ruddhā pṛṣatī hatayūthapā
GE07mbh_07_u:001.030a: tasyāṃ trastā nṛpatayaḥ sainikāś ca pṛthagvidhāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:001.030c: pātāla iva majjanto hīnā devavratena te
GE07mbh_07_u:001.030e: karṇaṃ hi kuravo 'smārṣuḥ sa hi devavratopamaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:001.032a: cukruśuḥ karṇa karṇeti tatra bhārata pārthivāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:001.033a: sa hi nāyudhyata tadā daśāhāni mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:001.033c: sāmātyabandhuḥ karṇo vai tam āhvayata māciram
GE07mbh_07_u:001.036a: sa tu tenaiva kopena rājan gāṅgeyam uktavān
GE07mbh_07_u:001.036c: tvayi jīvati kauravya nāhaṃ yotsye kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_07_u:001.038a: pāṇḍavair vā hate bhīṣme tvayi svargam upeyuṣi
GE07mbh_07_u:001.038c: hantāsmy ekarathenaiva kṛtsnān yān manyase rathān
GE07mbh_07_u:001.039c: nāyudhyata tataḥ karṇaḥ putrasya tava saṃmate
GE07mbh_07_u:001.041a: tasmiṃs tu nihate śūre satyasaṃdhe mahaujasi
GE07mbh_07_u:001.041c: tvatsutāḥ karṇam asmārṣus tartukāmā iva plavam
GE07mbh_07_u:001.042a: tāvakās tava putrāś ca sahitāḥ sarvarājabhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:001.042c: hā karṇa iti cākrandan kālo 'yam iti cābruvan
GE07mbh_07_u:001.042d-0015_01: evaṃ te sma hi rādheyaṃ sūtaputraṃ tanutyajam
GE07mbh_07_u:001.042d-0016_01: cukruśuḥ sahitā yodhās tatra tatra mahābalāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:001.043c: agaman no manaḥ karṇaṃ bandhum ātyayikeṣv iva
GE07mbh_07_u:001.044a: sa hi śakto raṇe rājaṃs trātum asmān mahābhayāt
GE07mbh_07_u:001.044d-0017_01: devān iva yathā viṣṇus trāyate mahato bhayāt
GE07mbh_07_u:001.045a: tathā karṇaṃ yudhi varaṃ kīrtayantaṃ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:001.046a: yat tad vaikartanaṃ karṇam agamad vo manas tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:001.047a: api tan na mṛṣākārṣīd yudhi satyaparākramaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:001.048a: api tat pūrayāṃ cakre dhanurdharavaro yudhi
GE07mbh_07_u:001.048c: yat tad vinihate bhīṣme kauravāṇām apāvṛtam
GE07mbh_07_u:001.049a: tat khaṇḍaṃ pūrayām āsa pareṣām ādadhad bhayam
GE07mbh_07_u:001.049b-0019_01: sa hi vai puruṣavyāghro loke saṃjaya kathyate
GE07mbh_07_u:001.049b-0019_02: ārtānāṃ bāndhavānāṃ ca krandatāṃ ca viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:001.049b-0019_03: parityajya raṇe prāṇāṃs tattrāṇārthaṃ ca śarma ca
GE07mbh_07_u:001.049c: kṛtavān mama putrāṇāṃ jayāśāṃ saphalām api
GE07mbh_07_u:002.001a: hataṃ bhīṣmam ādhirathir viditvā; bhinnāṃ nāvam ivātyagādhe kurūṇām
GE07mbh_07_u:002.001c: sodaryavad vyasanāt sūtaputraḥ; saṃtārayiṣyaṃs tava putrasya senām
GE07mbh_07_u:002.002a: śrutvā tu karṇaḥ puruṣendram acyutaṃ; nipātitaṃ śāṃtanavaṃ mahāratham
GE07mbh_07_u:002.002c: athopāyāt tūrṇam amitrakarśano; dhanurdharāṇāṃ pravaras tadā vṛṣaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:002.003a: hate tu bhīṣme rathasattame parair; nimajjatīṃ nāvam ivārṇave kurūn
GE07mbh_07_u:002.003c: piteva putrāṃs tvarito 'bhyayāt tataḥ; saṃtārayiṣyaṃs tava putrasya senām
GE07mbh_07_u:002.004a: yasmin dhṛtir buddhiparākramaujo; damaḥ satyaṃ vīraguṇāś ca sarve
GE07mbh_07_u:002.004c: astrāṇi divyāny atha saṃnatir hrīḥ; priyā ca vāg anapāyīni bhīṣme
GE07mbh_07_u:002.005a: brahmadviṣaghne satataṃ kṛtajñe; sanātanaṃ candramasīva lakṣma
GE07mbh_07_u:002.005c: sa cet praśāntaḥ paravīrahantā; manye hatān eva hi sarvayodhān
GE07mbh_07_u:002.006a: neha dhruvaṃ kiṃ cana jātu vidyate; asmiṃl loke karmaṇo 'nityayogāt
GE07mbh_07_u:002.006c: sūryodaye ko hi vimuktasaṃśayo; bhāvaṃ kurvītādya mahāvrate hate
GE07mbh_07_u:002.007a: vasuprabhāve vasuvīryasaṃbhave; gate vasūn eva vasuṃdharādhipe
GE07mbh_07_u:002.007c: vasūni putrāṃś ca vasuṃdharāṃ tathā; kurūṃś ca śocadhvam imāṃ ca vāhinīm
GE07mbh_07_u:002.008c: parājiteṣu bharateṣu durmanāḥ; karṇo bhṛśaṃ nyaśvasad aśru vartayan
GE07mbh_07_u:002.009a: idaṃ tu rādheyavaco niśamya te; sutāś ca rājaṃs tava sainikāś ca ha
GE07mbh_07_u:002.009c: parasparaṃ cukruśur ārtijaṃ bhṛśaṃ; tadāśru netrair mumucur hi śabdavat
GE07mbh_07_u:002.010a: pravartamāne tu punar mahāhave; vigāhyamānāsu camūṣu pārthivaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:002.010c: athābravīd dharṣakaraṃ vacas tadā; ratharṣabhān sarvamahāratharṣabhaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:002.011a: jagaty anitye satataṃ pradhāvati; pracintayann asthiram adya lakṣaye
GE07mbh_07_u:002.011c: bhavatsu tiṣṭhatsv iha pātito raṇe; giriprakāśaḥ kurupuṃgavaḥ katham
GE07mbh_07_u:002.012a: nipātite śāṃtanave mahārathe; divākare bhūtalam āsthite yathā
GE07mbh_07_u:002.012c: na pārthivāḥ soḍhum alaṃ dhanaṃjayaṃ; giripravoḍhāram ivānilaṃ drumāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:002.013a: hatapradhānaṃ tv idam ārtarūpaṃ; parair hatotsāham anātham adya vai
GE07mbh_07_u:002.013c: mayā kurūṇāṃ paripālyam āhave; balaṃ yathā tena mahātmanā tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:002.014a: samāhitaṃ cātmani bhāram īdṛśaṃ; jagat tathānityam idaṃ ca lakṣaye
GE07mbh_07_u:002.014c: nipātitaṃ cāhavaśauṇḍam āhave; kathaṃ nu kuryām aham āhave bhayam
GE07mbh_07_u:002.015a: ahaṃ tu tān kuruvṛṣabhān ajihmagaiḥ; praverayan yamasadanaṃ raṇe caran
GE07mbh_07_u:002.015c: yaśaḥ paraṃ jagati vibhāvya vartitā; parair hato yudhi śayitātha vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:002.016c: tathārjunas tridaśavarātmajo yato; na tad balaṃ sujayam athāmarair api
GE07mbh_07_u:002.017a: yamau raṇe yatra yamopamau bale; sasātyakir yatra ca devakīsutaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:002.017c: na tad balaṃ kāpuruṣo 'bhyupeyivān; nivartate mṛtyumukhād ivāsakṛt
GE07mbh_07_u:002.018a: tapo 'bhyudīrṇaṃ tapasaiva gamyate; balaṃ balenāpi tathā manasvibhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:002.018c: manaś ca me śatrunivāraṇe dhruvaṃ; svarakṣaṇe cācalavad vyavasthitam
GE07mbh_07_u:002.019a: evaṃ caiṣāṃ budhyamānaḥ prabhāvaṃ; gatvaivāhaṃ tāñ jayāmy adya sūta
GE07mbh_07_u:002.019c: mitradroho marṣaṇīyo na me 'yaṃ; bhagne sainye yaḥ sahāyaḥ sa mitram
GE07mbh_07_u:002.020a: kartāsmy etat satpuruṣāryakarma; tyaktvā prāṇān anuyāsyāmi bhīṣmam
GE07mbh_07_u:002.020c: sarvān saṃkhye śatrusaṃghān haniṣye; hatas tair vā vīralokaṃ gamiṣye
GE07mbh_07_u:002.021c: mayā kṛtyam iti jānāmi sūta; tasmāc chatrūn dhārtarāṣṭrasya jeṣye
GE07mbh_07_u:002.022a: kurūn rakṣan pāṇḍuputrāñ jighāṃsaṃs; tyaktvā prāṇān ghorarūpe raṇe 'smin
GE07mbh_07_u:002.022c: sarvān saṃkhye śatrusaṃghān nihatya; dāsyāmy ahaṃ dhārtarāṣṭrāya rājyam
GE07mbh_07_u:002.023a: nibadhyatāṃ me kavacaṃ vicitraṃ; haimaṃ śubhraṃ maṇiratnāvabhāsi
GE07mbh_07_u:002.023c: śirastrāṇaṃ cārkasamānabhāsaṃ; dhanuḥ śarāṃś cāpi viṣāhikalpān
GE07mbh_07_u:002.024a: upāsaṅgān ṣoḍaśa yojayantu; dhanūṃṣi divyāni tathāharantu
GE07mbh_07_u:002.024c: asīṃś ca śaktīś ca gadāś ca gurvīḥ; śaṅkhaṃ ca jāmbūnadacitrabhāsam
GE07mbh_07_u:002.025a: etāṃ raukmīṃ nāgakakṣyāṃ ca jaitrīṃ; jaitraṃ ca me dhvajam indīvarābham
GE07mbh_07_u:002.025c: ślakṣṇair vastrair vipramṛjyānayasva; citrāṃ mālāṃ cātra baddhvā sajālām
GE07mbh_07_u:002.026a: aśvān agryān pāṇḍurābhraprakāśān; puṣṭān snātān mantrapūtābhir adbhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:002.026c: taptair bhāṇḍaiḥ kāñcanair abhyupetāñ; śīghrāñ śīghraṃ sūtaputrānayasva
GE07mbh_07_u:002.027a: rathaṃ cāgryaṃ hemajālāvanaddhaṃ; ratnaiś citraṃ candrasūryaprakāśaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:002.027c: dravyair yuktaṃ saṃprahāropapannair; vāhair yuktaṃ tūrṇam āvartayasva
GE07mbh_07_u:002.028a: citrāṇi cāpāni ca vegavanti; jyāś cottamāḥ saṃhananopapannāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:002.028c: tūṇāṃś ca pūrṇān mahataḥ śarāṇām; āsajya gātrāvaraṇāni caiva
GE07mbh_07_u:002.029a: prāyātrikaṃ cānayatāśu sarvaṃ; kanyāḥ pūrṇaṃ vīrakāṃsyaṃ ca haimam
GE07mbh_07_u:002.029c: ānīya mālām avabadhya cāṅge; pravādayantv āśu jayāya bherīḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:002.030a: prayāhi sūtāśu yataḥ kirīṭī; vṛkodaro dharmasuto yamau ca
GE07mbh_07_u:002.030c: tān vā haniṣyāmi sametya saṃkhye; bhīṣmāya vaiṣyāmi hato dviṣadbhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:002.031a: yasmin rājā satyadhṛtir yudhiṣṭhiraḥ; samāsthito bhīmasenārjunau ca
GE07mbh_07_u:002.031c: vāsudevaḥ sātyakiḥ sṛñjayāś ca; manye balaṃ tad ajayyaṃ mahīpaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:002.032a: taṃ cen mṛtyuḥ sarvaharo 'bhirakṣet; sadāpramattaḥ samare kirīṭinam
GE07mbh_07_u:002.032c: tathāpi hantāsmi sametya saṃkhye; yāsyāmi vā bhīṣmapathā yamāya
GE07mbh_07_u:002.033a: na tv evāhaṃ na gamiṣyāmi teṣāṃ; madhye śūrāṇāṃ tat tathāhaṃ bravīmi
GE07mbh_07_u:002.033c: mitradruho durbalabhaktayo ye; pāpātmāno na mamaite sahāyāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:002.034a: sa siddhimantaṃ ratham uttamaṃ dṛḍhaṃ; sakūbaraṃ hemapariṣkṛtaṃ
GE07mbh_07_u:002.034c: patākinaṃ vātajavair hayottamair; yuktaṃ samāsthāya yayau jayāya
GE07mbh_07_u:002.037a: hutāśanābhaḥ sa hutāśanaprabhe; śubhaḥ śubhe vai svarathe dhanurdharaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:002.037c: sthito rarājādhirathir mahārathaḥ; svayaṃ vimāne surarāḍ iva sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:003.001d-0022_02: udyamyāpy atha vā meruṃ līlayākṣiptam ambhasi
GE07mbh_07_u:003.002c: jayāśāṃ tava putrāṇāṃ saṃbhagnāṃ śarma varma ca
GE07mbh_07_u:003.003a: apārāṇām iva dvīpam agādhe gādham icchatām
GE07mbh_07_u:003.004a: mahāntam iva mainākam asahyaṃ bhuvi pātitam
GE07mbh_07_u:003.009a: karṇo 'ham asmi bhadraṃ te adya mā vada bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:003.010a: na nūnaṃ sukṛtasyeha phalaṃ kaś cit samaśnute
GE07mbh_07_u:003.010c: yatra dharmaparo vṛddhaḥ śete bhuvi bhavān iha
GE07mbh_07_u:003.011c: nātham anyaṃ na paśyāmi kurūṇāṃ kurusattama
GE07mbh_07_u:003.012a: buddhyā viśuddhayā yukto yaḥ kurūṃs tārayed bhayāt
GE07mbh_07_u:003.012c: yodhāṃs tvam aplave hitvā pitṛlokaṃ gamiṣyasi
GE07mbh_07_u:003.013a: adya prabhṛti saṃkruddhā vyāghrā iva mṛgakṣayam
GE07mbh_07_u:003.015c: trāsayiṣyati saṃgrāme kurūn anyāṃś ca pārthivān
GE07mbh_07_u:003.016a: samiddho 'gnir yathā vīra mahājvālo drumān dahet
GE07mbh_07_u:003.017a: yena yena prasarato vāyvagnī sahitau vane
GE07mbh_07_u:003.017c: tena tena pradahato bhagavantau yad icchataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:003.018a: yādṛśo 'gniḥ samiddho hi tādṛk pārtho na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:003.018b-0025_01: tādṛg eva hi kaunteyo davāgnir iva parvate
GE07mbh_07_u:003.018c: yathā vāyur naravyāghra tathā kṛṣṇo na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:003.019c: śrutvā sarvāṇi sainyāni trāsaṃ yāsyanti bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:003.020c: śabdaṃ soḍhuṃ na śakṣyanti tvām ṛte vīra pārthivāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:003.021a: ko hy arjunaṃ raṇe yoddhuṃ tvad anyaḥ pārthivo 'rhati
GE07mbh_07_u:003.022a: amānuṣaś ca saṃgrāmas tryambakena ca dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:003.022c: tasmāc caiva varaḥ prāpto duṣprāpaś cākṛtātmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:003.022d-0027_01: ko 'nyaḥ śakto raṇe jetuṃ pūrvaṃ yo na jitaḥ suraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:003.022d-0027_02: jito yena raṇe rāmo bhavatā vīryaśālinā
GE07mbh_07_u:003.022d-0029_01: so 'py adya nihataḥ śete śaraiḥ protaḥ śikhaṇḍinā
GE07mbh_07_u:003.023a: tam adyāhaṃ pāṇḍavaṃ yuddhaśauṇḍam; amṛṣyamāṇo bhavatānuśiṣṭaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:003.023c: āśīviṣaṃ dṛṣṭiharaṃ sughoram; iyāṃ puraskṛtya vadhaṃ jayaṃ vā
GE07mbh_07_u:004.001d-001_0001: rahitaṃ dhiṣṇyam ālokya samutsārya ca rakṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:004.001d-001_0003: ehy ehi bho spardhase tvaṃ mayā sārdhaṃ hi sūtaja
GE07mbh_07_u:004.001d-001_0004: yadi māṃ nādhigacchethā na te śreyo bhaved dhruvam
GE07mbh_07_u:004.001d-001_0005: kaunteyas tvaṃ na rādheyo na tavādhirathaḥ pitā
GE07mbh_07_u:004.001d-001_0006: sūryatas tvaṃ mahābāho vidito nāradān mama
GE07mbh_07_u:004.001d-001_0007: kṛṣṇadvaipāyanāc caiva keśavāc ca na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:004.001d-001_0008: mānahā bhava śatrūṇāṃ mitrāṇāṃ śokahā bhava
GE07mbh_07_u:004.001d-001_0009: kṛṣṇadvaipāyanaś caiva tejasā ca na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:004.001d-001_0010: na ca dveṣo 'sti me karṇa tvayi satyaṃ bravīmi te
GE07mbh_07_u:004.001d-001_0012: akasmāt pāṇḍavān hi tvaṃ dviṣasīti matir mama
GE07mbh_07_u:004.001d-001_0015: brahmaṇyatā ca śauryaṃ ca dāne vā paramo nidhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:004.001d-001_0018: sadṛśaḥ phalgunasyāpi kṛṣṇasya ca samo bale
GE07mbh_07_u:004.002a: samudra iva sindhūnāṃ jyotiṣām iva bhāskaraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:004.002c: satyasya ca yathā santo bījānām iva corvarā
GE07mbh_07_u:004.003a: parjanya iva bhūtānāṃ pratiṣṭhā suhṛdāṃ bhava
GE07mbh_07_u:004.003d-0030_02: kauravāṇāṃ bhava gatir yathā viṣṇur divaukasām
GE07mbh_07_u:004.004c: karṇa rājapuraṃ gatvā kāmbojā nihatās tvayā
GE07mbh_07_u:004.005c: ambaṣṭhāś ca videhāś ca gāndhārāś ca jitās tvayā
GE07mbh_07_u:004.006c: duryodhanasya vaśagāḥ kṛtāḥ karṇa tvayā purā
GE07mbh_07_u:004.006d-0032_01: utkalā mekalāḥ pauṇḍrāḥ kaliṅgāndhrāś ca saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:004.006d-0032_02: niṣādāś ca trigartāś ca bāhlīkāś ca jitās tvayā
GE07mbh_07_u:004.007c: bahavaś ca jitā vīrās tvayā karṇa mahaujasā
GE07mbh_07_u:004.007d-002_0001: brahmaṇyaḥ satyavādī ca tejasārko na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:004.007d-002_0003: vyapanīto 'dya me manyur yas tvāṃ prati purā kṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:004.007d-002_0006: gacchaikatvaṃ mahābāho mama ced icchasi priyam
GE07mbh_07_u:004.007d-002_0008: pṛthivyāṃ sarvarājāno bhavantv adya nirāmayāḥ karṇa uvāca
GE07mbh_07_u:004.007d-002_0009: jānāmy etan mahābāho kaunteyo 'smi na sūtajaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:004.007d-002_0010: parityaktas tv ahaṃ kuntyā sūtena ca vivardhitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:004.007d-002_0011: bhuktvā duryodhanaiśvaryaṃ na mithyā kartum utsahe
GE07mbh_07_u:004.007d-002_0012: vasu caiva śarīraṃ ca putradārāṃs tathā yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:004.007d-002_0016: aparāvartino ye 'rthās te na śakyā nivartitum
GE07mbh_07_u:004.007d-002_0019: bhavadbhir hi purā dṛṣṭvā kathitāni ca saṃsadi
GE07mbh_07_u:004.007d-002_0020: ajeyāḥ puruṣair anyair iti tāṃś cotsahāmahe
GE07mbh_07_u:004.007d-002_0022: anujñātas tvayā vīra yudhyeyam iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:004.007d-002_0023: duruktāni ca vākyāni saṃrambhāc cāpalād api
GE07mbh_07_u:004.007d-002_0024: yan mayā te kṛtaṃ kiṃ cit tyaja tad bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_07_u:004.008b-0033_01: kṣemaṃ vindati sarvatra śatruhāniṃ ca vindati
GE07mbh_07_u:004.008c: tathā tvam api sarveṣāṃ kauravāṇāṃ gatir bhava
GE07mbh_07_u:004.009c: anuśādhi kurūn saṃkhye dhatsva duryodhane jayam
GE07mbh_07_u:004.009d-0034_01: tathā kuru manuṣyendra yathā duryodhane jayam
GE07mbh_07_u:004.010c: tavāpi dharmataḥ sarve yathā tasya vayaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:004.011a: yaunāt saṃbandhakāl loke viśiṣṭaṃ saṃgataṃ satām
GE07mbh_07_u:004.012a: sa satyasaṃgaro bhūtvā mamedam iti niścitam
GE07mbh_07_u:004.012c: kurūṇāṃ pālaya balaṃ yathā duryodhanas tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:004.012d-0035_01: tathā hi kauravān yuddhe dhruvaṃ jeṣyanti pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:004.012d-0035_04: dharmo hi yuddhād adhikaḥ kṣatriyasya na vidyate saṃjaya uvāca
GE07mbh_07_u:004.012d-0035_05: evam uktas tu bhīṣmeṇa yuddhāya kṛtaniścayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:004.012d-0036_01: yathā ca kuravo yuddhe yodhayanti sma pāṇḍavān
GE07mbh_07_u:004.013a: iti śrutvā vacaḥ so 'tha caraṇāv abhivādya ca
GE07mbh_07_u:004.013c: yayau vaikartanaḥ karṇas tūrṇam āyodhanaṃ prati
GE07mbh_07_u:004.013d-0037_01: atha tatra maheṣvāso vyādiśad rathino varān
GE07mbh_07_u:004.013d-0037_03: sādinaś ca padātāṃś ca yathāśāstraṃ bṛhaspatiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:004.013d-0037_04: sthāpayām āsa tathā putrāṇāṃ te jayapriyaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:004.013d-0037_05: tataḥ pakṣau prapakṣau ca vidhāya bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_07_u:004.013d-0037_06: pakṣakoṭyāṃ punar dvābhyāṃ pakṣau dvābhyāṃ suhṛdvṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:004.013d-0037_07: evam etan mayā vyūhaṃ karṇena vihitaṃ purā
GE07mbh_07_u:004.013d-0037_09: nṛtyantam iva taṃ vyūhaṃ didhakṣantam ivāhitān
GE07mbh_07_u:005.001c: hṛṣṭo duryodhano rājann idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_07_u:005.002a: sanātham idam atyarthaṃ bhavatā pālitaṃ balam
GE07mbh_07_u:005.002c: manye kiṃ tu samarthaṃ yad dhitaṃ tat saṃpradhāryatām
GE07mbh_07_u:005.003a: brūhi tat puruṣavyāghra tvaṃ hi prājñatamo nṛpa
GE07mbh_07_u:005.003c: yathā cārthapatiḥ kṛtyaṃ paśyate na tathetaraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:005.004a: te sma sarve tava vacaḥ śrotukāmā nareśvara
GE07mbh_07_u:005.004c: nānyāyyaṃ hi bhavān vākyaṃ brūyād iti matir mama
GE07mbh_07_u:005.005c: śrutena ca susaṃpannaḥ sarvair yodhaguṇais tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:005.007a: tasminn asukaraṃ karma kṛtavaty āsthite divam
GE07mbh_07_u:005.008a: na ṛte nāyakaṃ senā muhūrtam api tiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_07_u:005.009a: yathā hy akarṇadhārā nau rathaś cāsārathir yathā
GE07mbh_07_u:005.009c: draved yatheṣṭaṃ tadvat syād ṛte senāpatiṃ balam
GE07mbh_07_u:005.009d-0040_01: adaiśiko yathā sārthaḥ sarvaṃ pāpaṃ samarchati
GE07mbh_07_u:005.009d-0040_02: anāyakā tathā senā sarvān doṣān samarchati
GE07mbh_07_u:005.010a: sa bhavān vīkṣya sarveṣu māmakeṣu mahātmasu
GE07mbh_07_u:005.010c: paśya senāpatiṃ yuktam anu śāṃtanavād iha
GE07mbh_07_u:005.011a: yaṃ hi senāpraṇetāraṃ bhavān vakṣyati saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:005.011c: taṃ vayaṃ sahitāḥ sarve prakariṣyāma māriṣa
GE07mbh_07_u:005.014a: yugapan na tu te śakyāḥ kartuṃ sarve puraḥsarāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:005.014c: eka evātra kartavyo yasmin vaiśeṣikā guṇāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:005.015c: śeṣā vimanaso vyaktaṃ na yotsyante hi bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:005.016a: ayaṃ tu sarvayodhānām ācāryaḥ sthaviro guruḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:005.016c: yuktaḥ senāpatiḥ kartuṃ droṇaḥ śastrabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:005.017a: ko hi tiṣṭhati durdharṣe droṇe brahmaviduttame
GE07mbh_07_u:005.018a: na ca sa hy asti te yodhaḥ sarvarājasu bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:005.018c: yo droṇaṃ samare yāntaṃ nānuyāsyati saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:005.019c: eṣa buddhimatāṃ caiva śreṣṭho rājan guruś ca te
GE07mbh_07_u:005.021a: karṇasya vacanaṃ śrutvā rājā duryodhanas tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:005.022c: vīryād dākṣyād adhṛṣyatvād arthajñānān nayāj jayāt
GE07mbh_07_u:005.023a: tapasā ca kṛtajñatvād vṛddhaḥ sarvaguṇair api
GE07mbh_07_u:005.023c: yukto bhavatsamo goptā rājñām anyo na vidyate
GE07mbh_07_u:005.024a: sa bhavān pātu naḥ sarvān vibudhān iva vāsavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:005.025a: rudrāṇām iva kāpālī vasūnām iva pāvakaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:005.025c: kubera iva yakṣāṇāṃ marutām iva vāsavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:005.026a: vasiṣṭha iva viprāṇāṃ tejasām iva bhāskaraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:005.027b-0041_01: sarveṣām eva lokānāṃ viśvasya ca yathā kṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:005.027c: śreṣṭhaḥ senāpraṇetṝṇāṃ sa naḥ senāpatir bhava
GE07mbh_07_u:005.028a: akṣauhiṇyo daśaikā ca vaśagāḥ santu te 'nagha
GE07mbh_07_u:005.028c: tābhiḥ śatrūn prativyūhya jahīndro dānavān iva
GE07mbh_07_u:005.029a: prayātu no bhavān agre devānām iva pāvakiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:005.030c: agre bhavantaṃ dṛṣṭvā no nārjunaḥ prasahiṣyate
GE07mbh_07_u:005.032a: evam ukte tato droṇe jayety ūcur narādhipāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:005.033a: sainikāś ca mudā yuktā vardhayanti dvijottamam
GE07mbh_07_u:005.033d-0042_01: menire nihitān pārthān ātmanaś cottamaṃ yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:005.033d-0043_01: duryodhanaṃ tadā rājan droṇo vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_07_u:005.034a: vedaṃ ṣaḍaṅgaṃ vedāham arthavidyāṃ ca mānavīm
GE07mbh_07_u:005.035a: ye cāpy uktā mayi guṇā bhavadbhir jayakāṅkṣibhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:005.035c: cikīrṣus tān ahaṃ satyān yodhayiṣyāmi pāṇḍavān
GE07mbh_07_u:005.035d-0044_01: pārṣataṃ tu raṇe rājan na haniṣye kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_07_u:005.035d-0044_02: sa hi sṛṣṭo vadhārthāya mamaiva puruṣarṣabha
GE07mbh_07_u:005.035d-0044_04: na ca māṃ pāṇḍavā yuddhe yodhayiṣyanti harṣitāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:005.036a: sa evam abhyanujñātaś cakre senāpatiṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:005.036c: droṇaṃ tava suto rājan vidhidṛṣṭena karmaṇā
GE07mbh_07_u:005.037c: senāpatye yathā skandaṃ purā śakramukhāḥ surāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:005.038c: prādurāsīt kṛte droṇe harṣaḥ senāpatau tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:005.040c: satkṛtya vidhivad droṇaṃ jitān manyanta pāṇḍavān
GE07mbh_07_u:006.001c: yuyutsur vyūhya sainyāni prāyāt tava sutaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_07_u:006.002a: saindhavaś ca kaliṅgaś ca vikarṇaś ca tavātmajaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:006.004a: kṛpaś ca kṛtavarmā ca citraseno viviṃśatiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:006.005c: yayur aśvair mahāvegaiḥ śakāś ca yavanaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_07_u:006.006c: śibayaḥ śūrasenāś ca śūdrāś ca maladaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_07_u:006.007a: sauvīrāḥ kitavāḥ prācyā dākṣiṇātyāś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:006.009a: tasya dīpto mahākāyaḥ svāny anīkāni harṣayan
GE07mbh_07_u:006.010a: na bhīṣmavyasanaṃ kaś cid dṛṣṭvā karṇam amanyata
GE07mbh_07_u:006.010c: viśokāś cābhavan sarve rājānaḥ kurubhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_07_u:006.011a: hṛṣṭāś ca bahavo yodhās tatrājalpanta saṃgatāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:006.011c: na hi karṇaṃ raṇe dṛṣṭvā yudhi sthāsyanti pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:006.012a: karṇo hi samare śakto jetuṃ devān savāsavān
GE07mbh_07_u:006.013a: bhīṣmeṇa tu raṇe pārthāḥ pālitā bāhuśālinā
GE07mbh_07_u:006.013c: tāṃs tu karṇaḥ śarais tīkṣṇair nāśayiṣyaty asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_07_u:006.014a: evaṃ bruvantas te 'nyonyaṃ hṛṣṭarūpā viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:006.014c: rādheyaṃ pūjayantaś ca praśaṃsantaś ca niryayuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:006.015c: pareṣāṃ krauñca evāsīd vyūho rājan mahātmanām
GE07mbh_07_u:006.018a: dīpayām āsa tat sainyaṃ pāṇḍavasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:006.018c: yathā prajvalitaḥ sūryo yugānte vai vasuṃdharām
GE07mbh_07_u:006.018d-0047_01: arjunena tathā rājan tāpitā bhāratī camūḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:006.018d-0048_01: dīpyan dṛśyeta hi tathā ketuḥ sarvatra dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:006.019a: asyatām arjunaḥ śreṣṭho gāṇḍīvaṃ dhanuṣāṃ varam
GE07mbh_07_u:006.019c: vāsudevaś ca bhūtānāṃ cakrāṇāṃ ca sudarśanam
GE07mbh_07_u:006.020a: catvāry etāni tejāṃsi vahañ śvetahayo rathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:006.021c: tāvakānāṃ mukhaṃ karṇaḥ pareṣāṃ ca dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:006.025c: gṛdhrāḥ śyenā baḍāḥ kaṅkā vāyasāś ca sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:006.025e: upary upari senāṃ te tadā paryapatan nṛpa
GE07mbh_07_u:006.026a: gomāyavaś ca prākrośan bhayadān dāruṇān ravān
GE07mbh_07_u:006.026c: akārṣur apasavyaṃ ca bahuśaḥ pṛtanāṃ tava
GE07mbh_07_u:006.029a: ete cānye ca bahavaḥ prādurāsan sudāruṇāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:006.031a: te tv anyonyaṃ susaṃrabdhāḥ pāṇḍavāḥ kauravaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_07_u:006.033a: droṇam abhyudyataṃ dṛṣṭvā pāṇḍavāḥ saha sṛñjayaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:006.033c: pratyagṛhṇaṃs tadā rājañ śaravarṣaiḥ pṛthak pṛthak
GE07mbh_07_u:006.038c: saṃnivārya tataḥ senāṃ kurūn apy avadhīd balī
GE07mbh_07_u:006.039a: saṃhṛtya tu tato droṇaḥ samavasthāpya cāhave
GE07mbh_07_u:006.040a: sa bāṇavarṣaṃ sumahad asṛjat pārṣataṃ prati
GE07mbh_07_u:006.042a: atha paryapatad droṇaḥ pāṇḍavānāṃ balaṃ balī
GE07mbh_07_u:006.043a: khacaranagarakalpaṃ kalpitaṃ śāstradṛṣṭyā; caladanilapatākaṃ hrādinaṃ valgitāśvam
GE07mbh_07_u:006.043c: sphaṭikavimalaketuṃ tāpanaṃ śātravāṇāṃ; rathavaram adhirūḍhaḥ saṃjahārārisenām
GE07mbh_07_u:007.001c: vyathitāḥ pāṇḍavā dṛṣṭvā na cainaṃ paryavārayan
GE07mbh_07_u:007.003a: tatrainam arjunaś caiva pārṣataś ca sahānugaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:007.005c: cekitānaś ca saṃkruddho yuyutsuś ca mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:007.007a: saṃgṛhyamāṇāṃ tāṃ dṛṣṭvā pāṇḍavair vāhinīṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:007.008a: sa tīvraṃ kopam āsthāya rathe samaradurmadaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:007.009a: rathān aśvān narān nāgān abhidhāvaṃs tatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:007.010c: ājāneyā hayā rājann avibhrāntāḥ śriyaṃ dadhuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:007.011a: tam antakam iva kruddham āpatantaṃ yatavratam
GE07mbh_07_u:007.011c: dṛṣṭvā saṃprādravan yodhāḥ pāṇḍavasya tatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:007.012a: teṣāṃ pradravatāṃ bhīmaḥ punar āvartatām api
GE07mbh_07_u:007.014a: tataḥ punar api droṇo nāma viśrāvayan yudhi
GE07mbh_07_u:007.014c: akarod raudram ātmānaṃ kirañ śaraśataiḥ parān
GE07mbh_07_u:007.015a: sa tathā tāny anīkāni pāṇḍaveyasya dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:007.015c: kālavan nyavadhīd droṇo yuveva sthaviro balī
GE07mbh_07_u:007.016a: utkṛtya ca śirāṃsy ugro bāhūn api sabhūṣaṇān
GE07mbh_07_u:007.017c: prākampanta raṇe yodhā gāvaḥ śītārditā iva
GE07mbh_07_u:007.020c: droṇam āsādayāṃ cakruḥ pāñcālāḥ pāṇḍavaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_07_u:007.023c: tasya vidyud ivābhreṣu caran ketur adṛśyata
GE07mbh_07_u:007.024a: sa kekayānāṃ pravarāṃś ca pañca; pāñcālarājaṃ ca śaraiḥ pramṛdya
GE07mbh_07_u:007.025a: taṃ bhīmasenaś ca dhanaṃjayaś ca; śineś ca naptā drupadātmajaś ca
GE07mbh_07_u:007.025c: śaibyātmajaḥ kāśipatiḥ śibiś ca; hṛṣṭā nadanto vyakirañ śaraughaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:007.026c: bhittvā śarīrāṇi gajāśvayūnāṃ; jagmur mahīṃ śoṇitadigdhavājāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:007.027a: sā yodhasaṃghaiś ca rathaiś ca bhūmiḥ; śarair vibhinnair gajavājibhiś ca
GE07mbh_07_u:007.027c: pracchādyamānā patitair babhūva; samantato dyaur iva kālameghaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:007.028c: anyāṃś ca vīrān samare pramṛdnād; droṇaḥ sutānāṃ tava bhūtikāmaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:007.029a: etāni cānyāni ca kauravendra; karmāṇi kṛtvā samare mahātmā
GE07mbh_07_u:007.029c: pratāpya lokān iva kālasūryo; droṇo gataḥ svargam ito hi rājan
GE07mbh_07_u:007.029d-0051_01: sa tu kṛtvā mahatkarma droṇaḥ parabalārdanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:007.031c: nihatya paścād dhṛtimān agacchat paramāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_07_u:007.032c: hato rukmaratho rājan kṛtvā karma suduṣkaram
GE07mbh_07_u:007.033c: sainyānāṃ ca tato rājann ācārye nihate yudhi
GE07mbh_07_u:007.034a: dyāṃ dharāṃ khaṃ diśo vāri pradiśaś cānunādayan
GE07mbh_07_u:007.034c: aho dhig iti bhūtānāṃ śabdaḥ samabhavan mahān
GE07mbh_07_u:007.035a: devatāḥ pitaraś caiva pūrve ye cāsya bāndhavāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:007.036a: pāṇḍavās tu jayaṃ labdhvā siṃhanādān pracakrire
GE07mbh_07_u:007.036c: tena nādena mahatā samakampata medinī vicitrajāmbūnadabhūṣitadhvajaṃ
GE07mbh_07_u:007.036d-0052_03: niśamya kaś cid dhi na harṣam eyivān
GE07mbh_07_u:008.001a: kiṃ kurvāṇaṃ raṇe droṇaṃ jaghnuḥ pāṇḍavasṛñjayāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:008.002c: pramatto vābhavad droṇas tato mṛtyum upeyivān
GE07mbh_07_u:008.003a: kathaṃ nu pārṣatas tāta śatrubhir duṣpradharṣaṇam
GE07mbh_07_u:008.005a: pāñcālaputro nyavadhīd diṣṭyā sa varam acyutam
GE07mbh_07_u:008.005c: kurvāṇaṃ dāruṇaṃ karma raṇe yattaṃ mahāratham
GE07mbh_07_u:008.006a: vyaktaṃ diṣṭaṃ hi balavat pauruṣād iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:008.006c: yad droṇo nihataḥ śūraḥ pārṣatena mahātmanā
GE07mbh_07_u:008.007a: astraṃ caturvidhaṃ vīre yasminn āsīt pratiṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_07_u:008.007c: tam iṣvastravarācāryaṃ droṇaṃ śaṃsasi me hatam
GE07mbh_07_u:008.009a: na nūnaṃ paraduḥkhena kaś cin mriyati saṃjaya
GE07mbh_07_u:008.009c: yatra droṇam ahaṃ śrutvā hataṃ jīvāmi na mriye
GE07mbh_07_u:008.009d-0053_01: daivam eva paraṃ manye na sunītaṃ na pauruṣam
GE07mbh_07_u:008.009d-0053_02: madīyo nāyako yatra guṇaśreṣṭho hataḥ paraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:008.010c: yac chrutvā nihataṃ droṇaṃ śatadhā na vidīryate
GE07mbh_07_u:008.011a: brāhme vede tatheṣv astre yam upāsan guṇārthinaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:008.011c: brāhmaṇā rājaputrāś ca sa kathaṃ mṛtyunā hataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:008.014a: mandānāṃ mama putrāṇāṃ jayāśā yasya vikrame
GE07mbh_07_u:008.014d-0054_02: yaṃ mṛtyur vaśagas tiṣṭhet sa kathaṃ mṛtyunā hataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:008.015a: te ca śoṇā bṛhanto 'śvāḥ saindhavā hemamālinaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:008.016c: dṛḍhāḥ saṃgrāmamadhyeṣu kaccid āsan na vihvalāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:008.019d-0055_01: taṃ tu rukmarathaṃ dṛṣṭvā vidravanti sma śatravaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:008.019d-0055_02: divyam astraṃ vikurvāṇaṃ saṃgatāḥ sarvataḥ pare
GE07mbh_07_u:008.020c: bhāradvājaḥ kim akaroc chūraḥ saṃkrandano yudhi
GE07mbh_07_u:008.021c: sa satyasaṃdho balavān droṇaḥ kim akarod yudhi
GE07mbh_07_u:008.022a: divi śakram iva śreṣṭhaṃ mahāmātraṃ dhanurbhṛtām
GE07mbh_07_u:008.022c: ke nu taṃ raudrakarmāṇaṃ yuddhe pratyudyayū rathāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:008.023a: nanu rukmarathaṃ dṛṣṭvā pradravanti sma pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:008.023c: divyam astraṃ vikurvāṇaṃ senāṃ kṣiṇvantam avyayam
GE07mbh_07_u:008.026a: na hy anyaṃ paripaśyāmi vadhe kaṃ cana śuṣmiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:008.027a: tair vṛtaḥ sarvataḥ śūraiḥ pāñcālyāpasadas tataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:008.027c: kekayaiś cedikārūṣair matsyair anyaiś ca bhūmipaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:008.028c: karmaṇy asukare saktaṃ jaghāneti matir mama
GE07mbh_07_u:008.029d-0057_01: kṣatraṃ ca brahma caiveha yo 'nvatiṣṭhat paraṃtapaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:008.029d-0058_01: dṛptānāṃ pratiṣeddhā ca cakṣur āsīd acakṣuṣām
GE07mbh_07_u:008.029e: sa kathaṃ brāhmaṇo vṛddhaḥ śastreṇa vadham āptavān
GE07mbh_07_u:008.030c: anarhamāṇaḥ kaunteyaḥ karmaṇas tasya tat phalam
GE07mbh_07_u:008.031c: sa satyasaṃdhaḥ sukṛtī śrīkāmair nihataḥ katham
GE07mbh_07_u:008.032a: divi śakra iva śreṣṭho mahāsattvo mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:008.032c: sa kathaṃ nihataḥ pārthaiḥ kṣudramatsyair yathā timiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:008.033b-0059_01: vā kathaṃ nihataḥ pāpai raṇe brāhmaṇapuṃgavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:008.033c: na yasya jīvitākāṅkṣī viṣayaṃ prāpya jīvati
GE07mbh_07_u:008.034a: yaṃ dvau na jahataḥ śabdau jīvamānaṃ kadā cana
GE07mbh_07_u:008.034c: brāhmaś ca vedakāmānāṃ jyāghoṣaś ca dhanurbhṛtām
GE07mbh_07_u:008.035b-0061_02: ke purastād ayudhyanta rakṣanto droṇam antikāt
GE07mbh_07_u:008.035b-0061_03: ke nu paścād avartanta gacchato durgamāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_07_u:008.035d-0062_02: brahmakṣatre ca yasyāstāṃ vaśe sthāṇor ivākhile
GE07mbh_07_u:008.036a: ke 'rakṣan dakṣiṇaṃ cakraṃ savyaṃ ke ca mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:008.036c: purastāt ke ca vīrasya yudhyamānasya saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:008.037a: ke ca tatra tanuṃ tyaktvā pratīpaṃ mṛtyum āvrajan
GE07mbh_07_u:008.037c: droṇasya samare vīrāḥ ke 'kurvanta parāṃ dhṛtim
GE07mbh_07_u:008.037d-0063_01: kaccin nainaṃ bhayān mandāḥ kṣatriyā vyajahan raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:008.037d-0063_02: rakṣitāras tataḥ śūnye kaccin naiko hataḥ paraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:008.037d-0063_03: na sa pṛṣṭham ares trāsād raṇe śauryāt pradarśayet
GE07mbh_07_u:008.037d-0063_04: parām apy āpadaṃ prāpya sa kathaṃ nihataḥ paraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:008.037d-0064_02: jetum utsahate droṇaḥ sa kathaṃ nihataḥ paraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:008.038a: etad āryeṇa kartavyaṃ kṛcchrāsv āpatsu saṃjaya
GE07mbh_07_u:008.038c: parākramed yathāśaktyā tac ca tasmin pratiṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_07_u:008.038d-0065_01: kaccin nainaṃ bhayāt kṣudrāḥ pārthebhyaḥ pradadū raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:008.038d-0065_02: goptṛbhis taiḥ samutsṛṣṭaḥ kaccin naiṣa parair hataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:008.038d-0065_03: dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ hi paśyāmi nighnantam iva brāhmaṇam
GE07mbh_07_u:008.039a: muhyate me manas tāta kathā tāvan nivartyatām
GE07mbh_07_u:008.039b-0066_01: kṣaṇam ekam ahaṃ sūta na śakṣyāmīti jalpitum
GE07mbh_07_u:008.039c: bhūyas tu labdhasaṃjñas tvā pariprakṣyāmi saṃjaya
GE07mbh_07_u:009.006a: sa labdhvā śanakaiḥ saṃjñāṃ vepamāno mahīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:009.007a: yat tad udyann ivādityo jyotiṣā praṇudaṃs tamaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:009.007c: āyād ajātaśatrur vai kas taṃ droṇād avārayat
GE07mbh_07_u:009.008a: prabhinnam iva mātaṅgaṃ tathā kruddhaṃ tarasvinam
GE07mbh_07_u:009.009a: ati cānyān raṇe yodhān vīraḥ puruṣasattamaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:009.009c: yo hy eko hi mahābāhur nirdahed ghoracakṣuṣā
GE07mbh_07_u:009.010c: dāntaṃ bahumataṃ loke ke śūrāḥ paryavārayan
GE07mbh_07_u:009.012b-0067_01: yaḥ karoti mahatkarma śatrūṇāṃ vai mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:009.012c: taṃ bhīmasenam āyāntaṃ ke śūrāḥ paryavārayan
GE07mbh_07_u:009.013c: parjanya iva bībhatsus tumulām aśaniṃ sṛjan
GE07mbh_07_u:009.017a: saṃplāvayan mahīṃ sarvāṃ mānavair āstaraṃs tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:009.018c: gāṇḍīvaṃ dhārayan dhīmān kīdṛśaṃ vo manas tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:009.018d-0069_01: yadāyāt katham āsīd vas tadā pārthaṃ samīkṣya ha
GE07mbh_07_u:009.019a: kaccid gāṇḍīvaśabdena na praṇaśyata vai balam
GE07mbh_07_u:009.019c: yad vaḥ sa bhairavaṃ kurvann arjuno bhṛśam abhyagāt
GE07mbh_07_u:009.020a: kaccin nāpānudad droṇād iṣubhir vo dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:009.020b-0070_01: vāyur meghān ivādityād reṇūn iva mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:009.020d-0071_01: ko hi śakto raṇe jetuṃ mānavaḥ pārtham īkṣitum
GE07mbh_07_u:009.020e: ko hi gāṇḍīvadhanvānaṃ naraḥ soḍhuṃ raṇe 'rhati
GE07mbh_07_u:009.020f-0072_01: yam upaśrutya senāgre janaḥ sarvo vidīryate
GE07mbh_07_u:009.021a: yat senāḥ samakampanta yad vīrān aspṛśad bhayam
GE07mbh_07_u:009.021c: ke tatra nājahur droṇaṃ ke kṣudrāḥ prādravan bhayāt
GE07mbh_07_u:009.022a: ke vā tatra tanūs tyaktvā pratīpaṃ mṛtyum āvrajan
GE07mbh_07_u:009.023a: na ca vegaṃ sitāśvasya viśakṣyantīha māmakāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:009.024a: viṣvakseno yasya yantā yoddhā caiva dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:009.024c: aśakyaḥ sa ratho jetuṃ manye devāsurair api
GE07mbh_07_u:009.025a: sukumāro yuvā śūro darśanīyaś ca pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:009.026c: yadāyān nakulo dhīmān ke śūrāḥ paryavārayan
GE07mbh_07_u:009.026d-0073_01: taṃ rathānāṃ varaṃ vīraṃ sadā yuddheṣu durmadam
GE07mbh_07_u:009.027c: śatrūṇāṃ kadanaṃ kurvañ jetāsau durjayo yudhi
GE07mbh_07_u:009.028b-0076_01: ārāvaṃ tumulaṃ kurvan vyathayan bhairavaṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:009.029a: yaḥ sa sauvīrarājasya pramathya mahatīṃ camūm
GE07mbh_07_u:009.030a: satyaṃ dhṛtiś ca śauryaṃ ca brahmacaryaṃ ca kevalam
GE07mbh_07_u:009.032c: pārthena samam astreṣu kas taṃ droṇād avārayat
GE07mbh_07_u:009.033c: rāmeṇa samam astreṣu yaśasā vikrameṇa ca
GE07mbh_07_u:009.034a: satyaṃ dhṛtir damaḥ śauryaṃ brahmacaryam anuttamam
GE07mbh_07_u:009.034c: sātvate tāni sarvāṇi trailokyam iva keśave
GE07mbh_07_u:009.034d-0078_01: yasmin nityāni santi sma vīre satyaparākrame
GE07mbh_07_u:009.038c: tyajantaṃ tumule prāṇān ke śūrāḥ paryavārayan
GE07mbh_07_u:009.039c: dhṛṣṭaketuṃ tam āyāntaṃ droṇāt kaḥ samavārayat
GE07mbh_07_u:009.041a: strīpūrvo yo naravyāghro yaḥ sa veda guṇāguṇān
GE07mbh_07_u:009.043a: yasminn abhyadhikā vīre guṇāḥ sarve dhanaṃjayāt
GE07mbh_07_u:009.043c: yasminn astrāṇi satyaṃ ca brahmacaryaṃ ca nityadā
GE07mbh_07_u:009.046c: yadābhyādravata droṇaṃ tadāsīd vo manaḥ katham
GE07mbh_07_u:009.047c: yad droṇam ādravan saṃkhye ke vīrās tān avārayan
GE07mbh_07_u:009.048a: ye te dvādaśa varṣāṇi krīḍām utsṛjya bālakāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:009.048c: astrārtham avasan bhīṣme bibhrato vratam uttamam
GE07mbh_07_u:009.049c: dhṛṣṭadyumnātmajā vīrāḥ ke tān droṇād avārayan
GE07mbh_07_u:009.050a: śatād viśiṣṭaṃ yaṃ yuddhe samapaśyanta vṛṣṇayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:009.050c: cekitānaṃ maheṣvāsaṃ kas taṃ droṇād avārayat
GE07mbh_07_u:009.051a: vārdhakṣemiḥ kaliṅgānāṃ yaḥ kanyām āharad yudhi
GE07mbh_07_u:009.051c: anādhṛṣṭir adīnātmā kas taṃ droṇād avārayat
GE07mbh_07_u:009.053c: tān droṇaṃ hantum āyātān ke vīrāḥ paryavārayan
GE07mbh_07_u:009.054c: ṣaṇ māsān abhisaṃrabdhā jighāṃsanto yudhāṃ patim
GE07mbh_07_u:009.055c: droṇāt kas taṃ naravyāghraṃ yuyutsuṃ pratyavārayat
GE07mbh_07_u:009.058a: nirdahantaṃ raṇe yodhān dārayantaṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:009.059c: śaikhaṇḍinaṃ kṣatradevaṃ ke taṃ droṇād avārayan
GE07mbh_07_u:009.060a: ya imāṃ pṛthivīṃ kṛtsnāṃ carmavat samaveṣṭayat
GE07mbh_07_u:009.063a: na pūrve nāpare cakrur idaṃ ke cana mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:009.063c: iti saṃcukruśur devāḥ kṛte karmaṇi duṣkare
GE07mbh_07_u:009.064a: paśyāmas triṣu lokeṣu na taṃ saṃsthāsnucāriṣu
GE07mbh_07_u:009.064c: jātaṃ vāpi janiṣyaṃ vā dvitīyaṃ vāpi saṃprati
GE07mbh_07_u:009.065a: anyam auśīnarāc chaibyād dhuro voḍhāram ity uta
GE07mbh_07_u:009.065c: gatiṃ yasya na yāsyanti mānuṣā lokavāsinaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:009.066a: tasya naptāram āyāntaṃ śaibyaṃ kaḥ samavārayat
GE07mbh_07_u:009.067c: prepsantaṃ samare droṇaṃ ke vīrāḥ paryavārayan
GE07mbh_07_u:009.068c: māyāvī rākṣaso ghoro yasmān mama mahad bhayam
GE07mbh_07_u:009.069a: pārthānāṃ jayakāmaṃ taṃ putrāṇāṃ mama kaṇṭakam
GE07mbh_07_u:009.069c: ghaṭotkacaṃ mahābāhuṃ kas taṃ droṇād avārayat
GE07mbh_07_u:009.069d-003_0001: pitur yam āhuḥ pitaraṃ vāsudevaṃ dvijātayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:009.069d-003_0002: sa eṣa niyataḥ kṛṣṇa āpadarthaṃ dhanaṃjaye
GE07mbh_07_u:009.069d-003_0006: āśāvahaś ca sāmbaś ca vṛṣṇivīrāḥ prahāriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:009.069d-003_0007: ete vai vihitās tatra pāṇḍavārthe jigīṣavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:009.069d-003_0008: keśavo yatra tatraite yatraite tatra keśavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:009.069d-003_0010: arjune tu jayo nityaṃ kṛṣṇe kīrtiś ca śāśvatī
GE07mbh_07_u:009.069d-003_0011: prādhānyād api bhūyāṃso ameyāḥ keśave guṇāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:009.069d-003_0012: mohāt tu vaśinaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ na sarvo vetti mādhavam
GE07mbh_07_u:009.069d-003_0014: na veda kṛṣṇaṃ dāśārham arjunaṃ jayatāṃ varam
GE07mbh_07_u:009.069d-003_0016: manasāpi hi durdharṣau senām etāṃ tarasvinau
GE07mbh_07_u:009.069d-003_0022: yāṃ tāṃ śriyam asūyāmi purā dṛṣṭvā yudhiṣṭhire
GE07mbh_07_u:009.069d-003_0023: adya tām anujānāmi bhīṣmadroṇau yadā hatau
GE07mbh_07_u:009.069d-003_0024: atha vā matkṛte prāptaḥ kurūṇām eṣa saṃkṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:009.069d-003_0025: pakvānāṃ hi vadhe sūta vajrāyante tṛṇāny api
GE07mbh_07_u:009.070a: ete cānye ca bahavo yeṣām arthāya saṃjaya
GE07mbh_07_u:009.070c: tyaktāraḥ saṃyuge prāṇān kiṃ teṣām ajitaṃ yudhi
GE07mbh_07_u:009.071c: hitārthī cāpi pārthānāṃ kathaṃ teṣāṃ parājayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:009.072c: nārāyaṇo raṇe nātho divyo divyātmavān prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:009.073c: tāny ahaṃ kīrtayiṣyāmi bhaktyā sthairyārtham ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:010.001c: kṛtavān yāni govindo yathā nānyaḥ pumān kva cit
GE07mbh_07_u:010.002b-0081_01: śakaṭaṃ pūtanāṃ hatvā bhagnau ca yamalārjunau
GE07mbh_07_u:010.002c: vikhyāpitaṃ balaṃ bāhvos triṣu lokeṣu saṃjaya
GE07mbh_07_u:010.005a: pralambaṃ narakaṃ jambhaṃ pīṭhaṃ cāpi mahāsuram
GE07mbh_07_u:010.005d-0082_01: pūtanāṃ śakuniṃ hatvā keśinaṃ caiva vājinam
GE07mbh_07_u:010.005d-0082_02: ṛṣabhaṃ dhenukaṃ caiva ariṣṭaṃ ca mahābalam
GE07mbh_07_u:010.005d-0082_03: vṛkaṃ hatvā mahābāhuṃ dhṛtvā govardhanaṃ girim
GE07mbh_07_u:010.005d-0082_04: cāṇūraṃ muṣṭikaṃ caiva raṅgamadhye nihatya ca
GE07mbh_07_u:010.009c: ārādhitaḥ sadāreṇa sa cāsmai pradadau varān
GE07mbh_07_u:010.011a: amṛṣyamāṇā rājāno yasya jātyā hayā iva
GE07mbh_07_u:010.013c: arghe vivadamānaṃ ca jaghāna paśuvat tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:010.015a: aṅgān vaṅgān kaliṅgāṃś ca māgadhān kāśikosalān
GE07mbh_07_u:010.015c: vatsagargakarūṣāṃś ca puṇḍrāṃś cāpy ajayad raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:010.017a: kāmbojān vāṭadhānāṃś ca colān pāṇḍyāṃś ca saṃjaya
GE07mbh_07_u:010.017c: trigartān mālavāṃś caiva daradāṃś ca sudurjayān
GE07mbh_07_u:010.018a: nānādigbhyaś ca saṃprāptān vrātān aśvaśakān prati
GE07mbh_07_u:010.021c: āgneyam astraṃ durdharṣaṃ cakraṃ lebhe mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:010.023a: tac ca marṣitavāñ śakro jānaṃs tasya parākramam
GE07mbh_07_u:010.023c: rājñāṃ cāpy ajitaṃ kaṃ cit kṛṣṇeneha na śuśruma
GE07mbh_07_u:010.024a: yac ca tan mahad āścaryaṃ sabhāyāṃ mama saṃjaya
GE07mbh_07_u:010.025a: yac ca bhaktyā prapanno 'ham adrākṣaṃ kṛṣṇam īśvaram
GE07mbh_07_u:010.025c: tan me suviditaṃ sarvaṃ pratyakṣam iva cāgamat
GE07mbh_07_u:010.026a: nānto vikramayuktasya buddhyā yuktasya vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:010.027a: tathā gadaś ca sāmbaś ca pradyumno 'tha vidūrathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:010.028a: ulmuko niśaṭhaś caiva jhallī babhruś ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_07_u:010.029a: ete vai balavantaś ca vṛṣṇivīrāḥ prahāriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:010.029c: kathaṃ cit pāṇḍavānīkaṃ śrayeyuḥ samare sthitāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:010.030c: tataḥ saṃśayitaṃ sarvaṃ bhaved iti matir mama
GE07mbh_07_u:010.031c: vanamālī halī rāmas tatra yatra janārdanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:010.031d-0084_01: eka eva dvidhā bhūto dṛśyate mānuṣair bhuvi
GE07mbh_07_u:010.032b-0085_01: pitṝṇām api yaḥ pūrvo vedeṣu paripaṭhyate
GE07mbh_07_u:010.032c: api vā hy eṣa pāṇḍūnāṃ yotsyate 'rthāya saṃjaya
GE07mbh_07_u:010.033a: sa yadā tāta saṃnahyet pāṇḍavārthāya keśavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:010.033c: na tadā pratyanīkeṣu bhavitā tasya kaś cana
GE07mbh_07_u:010.034a: yadi sma kuravaḥ sarve jayeyuḥ sarvapāṇḍavān
GE07mbh_07_u:010.034c: vārṣṇeyo 'rthāya teṣāṃ vai gṛhṇīyāc chastram uttamam
GE07mbh_07_u:010.035a: tataḥ sarvān naravyāghro hatvā narapatīn raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:010.035c: kauravāṃś ca mahābāhuḥ kuntyai dadyāt sa medinīm
GE07mbh_07_u:010.036a: yasya yantā hṛṣīkeśo yoddhā yasya dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:010.036c: rathasya tasya kaḥ saṃkhye pratyanīko bhaved rathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:010.037a: na kena cid upāyena kurūṇāṃ dṛśyate jayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:010.037c: tasmān me sarvam ācakṣva yathā yuddham avartata
GE07mbh_07_u:010.038c: arjune vijayo nityaṃ kṛṣṇe kīrtiś ca śāśvatī
GE07mbh_07_u:010.038d-0086_01: sarveṣv api ca lokeṣu bībhatsur aparājitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:010.039a: prādhānyena hi bhūyiṣṭham ameyāḥ keśave guṇāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:010.039c: mohād duryodhanaḥ kṛṣṇaṃ yan na vettīha mādhavam
GE07mbh_07_u:010.040c: na veda kṛṣṇaṃ dāśārham arjunaṃ caiva pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_07_u:010.042a: manasāpi hi durdharṣau senām etāṃ yaśasvinau
GE07mbh_07_u:010.043c: bhīṣmasya ca vadhas tāta droṇasya ca mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:010.044a: na hy eva brahmacaryeṇa na vedādhyayanena ca
GE07mbh_07_u:010.044c: na kriyābhir na śastreṇa mṛtyoḥ kaś cid vimucyate
GE07mbh_07_u:010.045c: bhīṣmadroṇau hatau śrutvā kiṃ nu jīvāmi saṃjaya
GE07mbh_07_u:010.046a: yāṃ tāṃ śriyam asūyāmaḥ purā yātāṃ yudhiṣṭhire
GE07mbh_07_u:010.047a: tathā ca matkṛte prāptaḥ kurūṇām eṣa saṃkṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:010.047c: pakvānāṃ hi vadhe sūta vajrāyante tṛṇāny api
GE07mbh_07_u:010.048a: ananyam idam aiśvaryaṃ loke prāpto yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:010.049a: prāptaḥ prakṛtito dharmo nādharmo mānavān prati
GE07mbh_07_u:010.050a: anyathā cintitā hy arthā narais tāta manasvibhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:010.050c: anyathaiva hi gacchanti daivād iti matir mama
GE07mbh_07_u:010.051c: apāraṇīye duścintye yathābhūtaṃ pracakṣva me saṃjaya uvāca
GE07mbh_07_u:011.001-0087_01: śuśrūṣasva sthiro bhūtvā śaṃsato mama bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:011.001c: yathā sa nyapatad droṇaḥ sāditaḥ pāṇḍusṛñjayaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:011.002c: madhye sarvasya sainyasya putraṃ te vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_07_u:011.003c: senāpatyena māṃ rājann adya satkṛtavān asi
GE07mbh_07_u:011.003d-0088_01: anurūpaṃ phalaṃ tasya karmaṇo labhyatāṃ tvayā
GE07mbh_07_u:011.004a: sadṛśaṃ karmaṇas tasya phalaṃ prāpnuhi pārthiva
GE07mbh_07_u:011.004c: karomi kāmaṃ kaṃ te 'dya pravṛṇīṣva yam icchasi
GE07mbh_07_u:011.005c: tam athovāca durdharṣam ācāryaṃ jayatāṃ varam
GE07mbh_07_u:011.006a: dadāsi ced varaṃ mahyaṃ jīvagrāhaṃ yudhiṣṭhiram
GE07mbh_07_u:011.006d-0089_02: bhrātṝṇāṃ paśyatām eva jīvagrāheṇa me dvija
GE07mbh_07_u:011.007a: tataḥ kurūṇām ācāryaḥ śrutvā putrasya te vacaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:011.007c: senāṃ praharṣayan sarvām idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_07_u:011.008a: dhanyaḥ kuntīsuto rājā yasya grahaṇam icchasi
GE07mbh_07_u:011.008c: na vadhārthaṃ sudurdharṣa varam adya prayācasi
GE07mbh_07_u:011.009a: kimarthaṃ ca naravyāghra na vadhaṃ tasya kāṅkṣasi
GE07mbh_07_u:011.009c: nāśaṃsasi kriyām etāṃ matto duryodhana dhruvam
GE07mbh_07_u:011.010a: āho svid dharmaputrasya dveṣṭā tasya na vidyate
GE07mbh_07_u:011.010c: yad icchasi tvaṃ jīvantaṃ kulaṃ rakṣasi cātmani
GE07mbh_07_u:011.011a: atha vā bharataśreṣṭha nirjitya yudhi pāṇḍavān
GE07mbh_07_u:011.011c: rājyāṃśaṃ pratidattvā ca saubhrātraṃ kartum icchasi
GE07mbh_07_u:011.012a: dhanyaḥ kuntīsuto rājā sujātā cāsya dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:011.012c: ajātaśatrutā satyā tasya yat snihyate bhavān
GE07mbh_07_u:011.013a: droṇena tv evam uktasya tava putrasya bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:011.013c: sahasā niḥsṛto bhāvo yo 'sya nityaṃ pravartate
GE07mbh_07_u:011.014c: tasmāt tava suto rājan prahṛṣṭo vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_07_u:011.015c: hate yudhiṣṭhire pārtho hanyāt sarvān hi no dhruvam
GE07mbh_07_u:011.016a: na ca śakyo raṇe sarvair nihantum amarair api
GE07mbh_07_u:011.016b-0090_01: yadi sarve haniṣyante pāṇḍavāḥ sasutā mṛdhe
GE07mbh_07_u:011.016b-0090_02: tataḥ kṛtsnaṃ vaśe kṛtvā niḥśeṣaṃ nṛpamaṇḍalam
GE07mbh_07_u:011.016b-0090_04: viṣṇur dāsyati kṛṣṇāyai kuntyai vā puruṣottamaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:011.016c: ya eva caiṣāṃ śeṣaḥ syāt sa evāsmān na śeṣayet
GE07mbh_07_u:011.017b-0091_01: tasmiñ jīvati cānīte hy upāyair bahubhiḥ kṛtaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:011.017c: punar yāsyanty araṇyāya kaunteyās tam anuvratāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:011.018a: so 'yaṃ mama jayo vyaktaṃ dīrghakālaṃ bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_07_u:011.018c: ato na vadham icchāmi dharmarājasya karhi cit
GE07mbh_07_u:011.019c: taṃ varaṃ sāntaraṃ tasmai dadau saṃcintya buddhimān
GE07mbh_07_u:011.020a: na ced yudhiṣṭhiraṃ vīra pālayed arjuno yudhi
GE07mbh_07_u:011.020c: manyasva pāṇḍavaṃ jyeṣṭham ānītaṃ vaśam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:011.021a: na hi pārtho raṇe śakyaḥ sendrair devāsurair api
GE07mbh_07_u:011.021b-0092_01: sthite pārthe dharmarājo naiva śakyo mayā raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:011.021c: pratyudyātum atas tāta naitad āmarṣayāmy aham
GE07mbh_07_u:011.022a: asaṃśayaṃ sa śiṣyo me matpūrvaś cāstrakarmaṇi
GE07mbh_07_u:011.022c: taruṇaḥ kīrtiyuktaś ca ekāyanagataś ca saḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:011.023a: astrāṇīndrāc ca rudrāc ca bhūyāṃsi samavāptavān
GE07mbh_07_u:011.023c: amarṣitaś ca te rājaṃs tena nāmarṣayāmy aham
GE07mbh_07_u:011.024c: apanīte tataḥ pārthe dharmarājo jitas tvayā
GE07mbh_07_u:011.025a: grahaṇaṃ cej jayaṃ tasya manyase puruṣarṣabha
GE07mbh_07_u:011.026c: ānayiṣyāmi te rājan vaśam adya na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:011.027a: yadi sthāsyati saṃgrāme muhūrtam api me 'grataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:011.028a: phalgunasya samakṣaṃ tu na hi pārtho yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:011.028c: grahītuṃ samare śakyaḥ sendrair api surāsuraiḥ saṃjaya uvāca
GE07mbh_07_u:011.029-0093_01: evam ukte tadā tasmin yuddhe devāsuropame
GE07mbh_07_u:011.029a: sāntaraṃ tu pratijñāte rājño droṇena nigrahe
GE07mbh_07_u:011.029c: gṛhītaṃ tam amanyanta tava putrāḥ subāliśāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:011.030a: pāṇḍaveṣu hi sāpekṣaṃ droṇaṃ jānāti te sutaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:012.001a: tatas te sainikāḥ śrutvā taṃ yudhiṣṭhiranigraham
GE07mbh_07_u:012.002a: tat tu sarvaṃ yathāvṛttaṃ dharmarājena bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:012.003a: tataḥ sarvān samānāyya bhrātṝn sainyāṃś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:012.003c: abravīd dharmarājas tu dhanaṃjayam idaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:012.004c: yathā tan na bhavet satyaṃ tathā nītir vidhīyatām
GE07mbh_07_u:012.005c: tac cāntaram amogheṣau tvayi tena samāhitam
GE07mbh_07_u:012.006a: sa tvam adya mahābāho yudhyasva madanantaram
GE07mbh_07_u:012.006c: yathā duryodhanaḥ kāmaṃ nemaṃ droṇād avāpnuyāt
GE07mbh_07_u:012.007a: yathā me na vadhaḥ kārya ācāryasya kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_07_u:012.007c: tathā tava parityāgo na me rājaṃś cikīrṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:012.008a: apy evaṃ pāṇḍava prāṇān utsṛjeyam ahaṃ yudhi
GE07mbh_07_u:012.008c: pratīyāṃ nāham ācāryaṃ tvāṃ na jahyāṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_07_u:012.009a: tvāṃ nigṛhyāhave rājan dhārtarāṣṭro yam icchati
GE07mbh_07_u:012.009c: na sa taṃ jīvaloke 'smin kāmaṃ prāptaḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_07_u:012.010c: na tvāṃ droṇo nigṛhṇīyāj jīvamāne mayi dhruvam
GE07mbh_07_u:012.011a: yadi tasya raṇe sāhyaṃ kurute vajrabhṛt svayam
GE07mbh_07_u:012.011c: devair vā sahito daityair na tvāṃ prāpsyaty asau mṛdhe
GE07mbh_07_u:012.012a: mayi jīvati rājendra na bhayaṃ kartum arhasi
GE07mbh_07_u:012.012d-0095_01: anyac ca brūyāṃ rājendra pratijñāṃ mama nityadā
GE07mbh_07_u:012.013a: na smarāmy anṛtāṃ vācaṃ na smarāmi parājayam
GE07mbh_07_u:012.013c: na smarāmi pratiśrutya kiṃ cid apy anapākṛtam
GE07mbh_07_u:012.014a: tataḥ śaṅkhāś ca bheryaś ca mṛdaṅgāś cānakaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_07_u:012.017a: tato vyūḍhāny anīkāni tava teṣāṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:012.019c: na śekuḥ sṛñjayā rājaṃs tad dhi droṇena pālitam
GE07mbh_07_u:012.020c: na śekuḥ pāṇḍavīṃ senāṃ pālyamānāṃ kirīṭinā
GE07mbh_07_u:012.021a: āstāṃ te stimite sene rakṣyamāṇe parasparam
GE07mbh_07_u:012.024a: tena muktāḥ śarā ghorā viceruḥ sarvatodiśam
GE07mbh_07_u:012.026a: na cainaṃ pāṇḍaveyānāṃ kaś cic chaknoti māriṣa
GE07mbh_07_u:012.026c: vīkṣituṃ samare kruddhaṃ mahendram iva dānavāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:012.028a: sa diśaḥ sarvato ruddhvā saṃvṛtya kham ajihmagaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:013.001a: tataḥ sa pāṇḍavānīke janayaṃs tumulaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_07_u:013.001c: vyacarat pāṇḍavān droṇo dahan kakṣam ivānalaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:013.004a: rathinaḥ sādinaś caiva nāgān aśvān padātinaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:013.004c: raudrā hastavatā muktāḥ pramathnanti sma sāyakāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:013.006a: vyacarat sa tadā rājan senāṃ vikṣobhayan prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:013.007c: bhramad rathāmbude tasmin dṛśyate sma punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:013.008a: sa vīraḥ satyavān prājño dharmanityaḥ sudāruṇaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:013.017a: nihatān prāṇinaḥ saṃkhye droṇena balinā śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:013.019a: taṃ jayantam anīkāni tāni tāny eva bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:013.022a: tasya mādrīsutaḥ ketuṃ dhanuḥ sūtaṃ hayān api
GE07mbh_07_u:013.022c: nātikruddhaḥ śaraiś chittvā ṣaṣṭyā vivyādha mātulam
GE07mbh_07_u:013.023a: saubalas tu gadāṃ gṛhya pracaskanda rathottamāt
GE07mbh_07_u:013.023c: sa tasya gadayā rājan rathāt sūtam apātayat
GE07mbh_07_u:013.024a: tatas tau virathau rājan gadāhastau mahābalau
GE07mbh_07_u:013.024c: cikrīḍatū raṇe śūrau saśṛṅgāv iva parvatau
GE07mbh_07_u:013.025c: bahubhis tena cābhyastas taṃ vivyādha śatādhikaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:013.026c: viddhvā nākampayad vīras tad adbhutam ivābhavat
GE07mbh_07_u:013.027c: bhīmaṃ cakre mahārāja tataḥ sainyāny apūjayan
GE07mbh_07_u:013.028a: sa tan na mamṛṣe vīraḥ śatror vijayam āhave
GE07mbh_07_u:013.028c: tato 'sya gadayā dāntān hayān sarvān apātayat
GE07mbh_07_u:013.028d-0103_01: hatāśvāt sa rathād rājan gṛhya carma mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:013.028d-0103_02: abhyayād bhīmasenaṃ tu matto mattam iva dvipam
GE07mbh_07_u:013.029a: śalyas tu nakulaṃ vīraḥ svasrīyaṃ priyam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:013.029c: vivyādha prahasan bāṇair lāḍayan kopayann iva
GE07mbh_07_u:013.030a: tasyāśvān ātapatraṃ ca dhvajaṃ sūtam atho dhanuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:013.030c: nipātya nakulaḥ saṃkhye śaṅkhaṃ dadhmau pratāpavān
GE07mbh_07_u:013.030d-0104_01: ciccheda samare yattaḥ sa ca yuddhād upāramat
GE07mbh_07_u:013.031c: kṛpaṃ vivyādha saptatyā lakṣma cāsyāharat tribhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:013.032c: nivārya ca raṇe vipro dhṛṣṭaketum ayodhayat
GE07mbh_07_u:013.033c: viddhvā vivyādha saptatyā punar anyaiḥ smayann iva
GE07mbh_07_u:013.034a: saptasaptatibhir bhojas taṃ viddhvā niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:013.035c: sa cāpi taṃ tomareṇa jatrudeśe atāḍayat
GE07mbh_07_u:013.036c: saha matsyair mahāvīryais tad adbhutam ivābhavat
GE07mbh_07_u:013.037a: tat pauruṣam abhūt tatra sūtaputrasya dāruṇam
GE07mbh_07_u:013.037c: yat sainyaṃ vārayām āsa śaraiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:013.038a: drupadas tu svayaṃ rājā bhagadattena saṃgataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:013.038d-0105_03: drupadas tu tataḥ kruddho bhagadattaṃ mahāratham
GE07mbh_07_u:013.040a: śikhaṇḍī tu tataḥ kruddhaḥ saumadattiṃ viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:013.040c: navatyā sāyakānāṃ tu kampayām āsa bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:013.040d-0107_01: chādayām āsa nārācais tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābravīt
GE07mbh_07_u:013.040f-0108_06: kālameghāv iva gajau lokānāṃ bhartsya garjanaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:013.043b-0109_03: tau putrau tava durdharṣau yuyudhāte parasparam
GE07mbh_07_u:013.044c: yathā viṣṇuḥ purā rājan hiraṇyākṣeṇa saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:013.046c: tena cakre mahad yuddham abhimanyur ariṃdamaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:013.047a: pauravas tv atha saubhadraṃ śaravrātair avākirat
GE07mbh_07_u:013.047c: tasyārjunir dhvajaṃ chatraṃ dhanuś corvyām apātayat
GE07mbh_07_u:013.048a: saubhadraḥ pauravaṃ tv anyair viddhvā saptabhir āśugaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:013.048c: pañcabhis tasya vivyādha hayān sūtaṃ ca sāyakaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:013.049a: tataḥ saṃharṣayan senāṃ siṃhavad vinadan muhuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:013.050a: dvābhyāṃ śarābhyāṃ hārdikyaś cakarta saśaraṃ dhanuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:013.050c: tad utsṛjya dhanuś chinnaṃ saubhadraḥ paravīrahā
GE07mbh_07_u:013.051c: bhrāntāsir acaran mārgān darśayan vīryam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:013.052a: bhrāmitaṃ punar udbhrāntam ādhūtaṃ punar ucchritam
GE07mbh_07_u:013.054c: vikṣobhyāmbhonidhiṃ tārkṣyas taṃ nāgam iva cākṣipat
GE07mbh_07_u:013.057c: carma cādāya khaḍgaṃ ca nadan paryapatad rathāt
GE07mbh_07_u:013.058a: tataḥ saindhavam ālokya kārṣṇir utsṛjya pauravam
GE07mbh_07_u:013.058c: utpapāta rathāt tūrṇaṃ śyenavan nipapāta ca
GE07mbh_07_u:013.060c: tam udyamya mahākhaḍgaṃ carma cātha punar balī
GE07mbh_07_u:013.060d-0111_01: dudhāva sahasā khaḍgaṃ carma cātirathaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:013.063c: na tayor antaraṃ kaś cid dadarśa narasiṃhayoḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:013.065a: bāhyam ābhyantaraṃ caiva carantau mārgam uttamam
GE07mbh_07_u:013.068a: bhagnam ājñāya nistriṃśam avaplutya padāni ṣaṭ
GE07mbh_07_u:013.069a: taṃ kārṣṇiṃ samarān muktam āsthitaṃ ratham uttamam
GE07mbh_07_u:013.070a: tataś carma ca khaḍgaṃ ca samutkṣipya mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:013.071c: tāpayām āsa tat sainyaṃ bhuvanaṃ bhāskaro yathā
GE07mbh_07_u:013.072c: cikṣepa samare ghorāṃ dīptām agniśikhām iva
GE07mbh_07_u:013.073a: tām avaplutya jagrāha sakośaṃ cākarod asim
GE07mbh_07_u:013.075a: tatas tām eva śalyasya saubhadraḥ paravīrahā
GE07mbh_07_u:013.076c: jaghāna sūtaṃ śalyasya rathāc cainam apātayat
GE07mbh_07_u:013.077e: yamau ca draupadeyāś ca sādhu sādhv iti cukruśuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:013.078a: bāṇaśabdāś ca vividhāḥ siṃhanādāś ca puṣkalāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:013.078d-0112_01: parivavruḥ sma te sarve pāṇḍavānāṃ mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:013.078d-0112_02: harṣayantaś ca saubhadraṃ roṣayantaḥ sutāṃś ca te
GE07mbh_07_u:013.078e: tan nāmṛṣyanta putrās te śatror vijayalakṣaṇam
GE07mbh_07_u:013.079a: athainaṃ sahasā sarve samantān niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:013.080a: teṣāṃ ca priyam anvicchan sūtasya ca parābhavāt
GE07mbh_07_u:014.001d-0113_01: na hi devāsuraṃ yuddham īdṛgrūpaṃ bhaved iti
GE07mbh_07_u:014.001d-0113_02: cintayāmi ca yuddhāni śrutvā ghorāṇi saṃjaya
GE07mbh_07_u:014.003a: na hi me tṛptir astīha śṛṇvato yuddham uttamam
GE07mbh_07_u:014.003c: tasmād ārtāyaner yuddhaṃ saubhadrasya ca śaṃsa me
GE07mbh_07_u:014.004a: sāditaṃ prekṣya yantāraṃ śalyaḥ sarvāyaṣīṃ gadām
GE07mbh_07_u:014.005a: taṃ dīptam iva kālāgniṃ daṇḍahastam ivāntakam
GE07mbh_07_u:014.006c: ehy ehīty abravīc chalyaṃ yatnād bhīmena vāritaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:014.007c: śalyam āsādya samare tasthau girir ivācalaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:014.009a: tatas tūryaninādāś ca śaṅkhānāṃ ca sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:014.009c: siṃhanādāś ca saṃjajñur bherīṇāṃ ca mahāsvanāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:014.010c: pāṇḍavānāṃ kurūṇāṃ ca sādhu sādhv iti nisvanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:014.011a: na hi madrādhipād anyaḥ sarvarājasu bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:014.012c: soḍhum utsahate loke ko 'nyo yudhi vṛkodarāt
GE07mbh_07_u:014.013d-0114_01: sāgnidīptā mahāraudrā gadā sā śuśubhe tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:014.014a: tathaiva carato mārgān maṇḍalāni ca bhāgaśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:014.015a: tau vṛṣāv iva nardantau maṇḍalāni viceratuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:014.019a: gadā kṣiptā tu samare madrarājena bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:014.019c: vyoma saṃdīpayānā sā sasṛje pāvakaṃ bahu
GE07mbh_07_u:014.020c: tāpayām āsa tat sainyaṃ maholkā patatī yathā
GE07mbh_07_u:014.021a: te caivobhe gade śreṣṭhe samāsādya parasparam
GE07mbh_07_u:014.021d-0117_01: punaḥ śalyena bhīmasya gadāgrād gadayā hatāt
GE07mbh_07_u:014.021d-0117_03: punaś ca bhīmasenena śalyasya mahatī gadā
GE07mbh_07_u:014.022a: nakhair iva mahāvyāghrau dantair iva mahāgajau
GE07mbh_07_u:014.022c: tau viceratur āsādya gadābhyāṃ ca parasparam
GE07mbh_07_u:014.026c: dhairyān madrādhipas tasthau vajrair girir ivāhataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:014.028a: athāplutya padāny aṣṭau saṃnipatya gajāv iva
GE07mbh_07_u:014.029a: tau parasparavegāc ca gadābhyāṃ ca bhṛśāhatau
GE07mbh_07_u:014.029c: yugapat petatur vīrau kṣitāv indradhvajāv iva
GE07mbh_07_u:014.030a: tato vihvalamānaṃ taṃ niḥśvasantaṃ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:014.032a: tataḥ sagadam āropya madrāṇām adhipaṃ ratham
GE07mbh_07_u:014.033a: kṣībavad vihvalo vīro nimeṣāt punar utthitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:014.034a: tato madrādhipaṃ dṛṣṭvā tava putrāḥ parāṅmukham
GE07mbh_07_u:014.037a: siṃhanādān bhṛśaṃ cakruḥ śaṅkhān dadhmuś ca harṣitāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:014.037c: bherīś ca vādayām āsur mṛdaṅgāṃś cānakaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_07_u:015.001a: tad balaṃ sumahad dīrṇaṃ tvadīyaṃ prekṣya vīryavān
GE07mbh_07_u:015.002a: śarā daśa diśo muktā vṛṣasenena māriṣa
GE07mbh_07_u:015.004c: nipetur urvyāṃ sahasā vātanunnā iva drumāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:015.005a: hayaughāṃś ca rathaughāṃś ca gajaughāṃś ca samantataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:015.006a: dṛṣṭvā tam evaṃ samare vicarantam abhītavat
GE07mbh_07_u:015.008a: tasya karṇātmajaś cāpaṃ chittvā ketum apātayat
GE07mbh_07_u:015.010c: śarair nānāvidhais tūrṇaṃ parvatāñ jaladā iva
GE07mbh_07_u:015.012a: tad yuddham abhavad ghoraṃ tumulaṃ lomaharṣaṇam
GE07mbh_07_u:015.015d-0119_01: prajānāṃ saṃkṣaye ghore yathā sūryodayo bhavet
GE07mbh_07_u:015.015d-0119_02: śūrāṇām udayas tadvat sa āsīt puruṣarṣabha
GE07mbh_07_u:015.018a: tat prabhagnaṃ balaṃ dṛṣṭvā śatrubhir bhṛśam arditam
GE07mbh_07_u:015.018c: alaṃ drutena vaḥ śūrā iti droṇo 'bhyabhāṣata
GE07mbh_07_u:015.018d-004_0001: bhāradvājam amarṣaś ca vikramaś ca samāviśat
GE07mbh_07_u:015.018d-004_0002: samuddhṛtya niṣaṅgāc ca dhanur jyām avamṛjya ca
GE07mbh_07_u:015.018d-004_0006: tad etad dīryate sainyaṃ dhārtarāṣṭram anekadhā
GE07mbh_07_u:015.018d-004_0008: na hi mām abhivarṣantaṃ saṃyuge tāta pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:015.018d-004_0011: na mām utsahate tāta na bhīmo na ca sātyakiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:015.018d-004_0014: nāyaṃ saṃrakṣituṃ kālaḥ prāṇāṃs tāta jayaiṣiṇā saṃjaya uvāca
GE07mbh_07_u:015.018d-004_0015: yāhi svargaṃ puraskṛtya yaśase ca jayāya ca
GE07mbh_07_u:015.018d-004_0016: evaṃ saṃcodito yantā droṇam abhyavahat tataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:015.018d-004_0019: taṃ karūśāś ca matsyāś ca cedayaś ca sasātvatāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:015.019a: tataḥ śoṇahayaḥ kruddhaś caturdanta iva dvipaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:015.020a: tam avidhyac chitair bāṇaiḥ kaṅkapatrair yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:015.020c: tasya droṇo dhanuś chittvā taṃ drutaṃ samupādravat
GE07mbh_07_u:015.021c: dadhāra droṇam āyāntaṃ veleva saritāṃ patim
GE07mbh_07_u:015.022c: siṃhanādaravo hy āsīt sādhu sādhv iti bhāṣatām
GE07mbh_07_u:015.023a: kumāras tu tato droṇaṃ sāyakena mahāhave
GE07mbh_07_u:015.024a: saṃvārya tu raṇe droṇaḥ kumāraṃ vai mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:015.026a: sa madhyaṃ prāpya senāyāḥ sarvāḥ paricaran diśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:015.027c: nakulaṃ pañcabhir viddhvā sahadevaṃ ca saptabhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:015.028c: sātyakiṃ pañcabhir viddhvā matsyaṃ ca daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:015.031a: yudhiṣṭhiraṃ sa viddhvā tu śaraiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:015.032c: vyāghradattaś ca pāñcālyaḥ siṃhasenaś ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_07_u:015.033a: ete cānye ca bahavaḥ parīpsanto yudhiṣṭhiram
GE07mbh_07_u:015.033c: āvavrus tasya panthānaṃ kirantaḥ sāyakān bahūn
GE07mbh_07_u:015.034a: vyāghradattaś ca pāñcālyo droṇaṃ vivyādha mārgaṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:015.034c: pañcāśadbhiḥ śitai rājaṃs tata uccukruśur janāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:015.035a: tvaritaṃ siṃhasenas tu droṇaṃ viddhvā mahāratham
GE07mbh_07_u:015.035c: prāhasat sahasā hṛṣṭas trāsayan vai yatavratam
GE07mbh_07_u:015.036a: tato visphārya nayane dhanurjyām avamṛjya ca
GE07mbh_07_u:015.036c: talaśabdaṃ mahat kṛtvā droṇas taṃ samupādravat
GE07mbh_07_u:015.037a: tatas tu siṃhasenasya śiraḥ kāyāt sakuṇḍalam
GE07mbh_07_u:015.040a: abruvan sainikās tatra dṛṣṭvā droṇasya vikramam
GE07mbh_07_u:015.040c: adya rājā dhārtarāṣṭraḥ kṛtārtho vai bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_07_u:015.040d-0122_01: asmin muhūrte droṇas tu pāṇḍavaṃ gṛhya harṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:015.041d-0123_01: mā bhaiṣīr iti saṃvārya śarair droṇam avārayat
GE07mbh_07_u:015.043c: nadīm uttīrya vegena kurūn vidrāvya pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:015.045c: nāntaraṃ dadṛśe kaś cit kaunteyasya yaśasvinaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:015.046a: na diśo nāntarikṣaṃ ca na dyaur naiva ca medinī
GE07mbh_07_u:015.047a: nādṛśyata tadā rājaṃs tatra kiṃ cana saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:015.048c: nājñāyata tadā śatrur na suhṛn na ca kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_07_u:015.049c: tān viditvā bhṛśaṃ trastān ayuddhamanasaḥ parān
GE07mbh_07_u:015.050e: pāñcālāś ca manojñābhir vāgbhiḥ sūryam ivarṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:015.051a: evaṃ svaśibiraṃ prāyāj jitvā śatrūn dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:015.052c: citre rathe pāṇḍusuto babhāse; nakṣatracitre viyatīva candraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:016.001a: te sene śibiraṃ gatvā nyaviśetāṃ viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:016.003a: uktam etan mayā pūrvaṃ na tiṣṭhati dhanaṃjaye
GE07mbh_07_u:016.003c: śakyo grahītuṃ saṃgrāme devair api yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:016.004a: iti tad vaḥ prayatatāṃ kṛtaṃ pārthena saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:016.005a: apanīte tu yogena kena cic chvetavāhane
GE07mbh_07_u:016.005c: tata eṣyati te rājan vaśam adya yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:016.006a: kaś cid āhvayatāṃ saṃkhye deśam anyaṃ prakarṣatu
GE07mbh_07_u:016.006c: tam ajitvā tu kaunteyo na nivartet kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_07_u:016.007a: etasminn antare śūnye dharmarājam ahaṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_07_u:016.008a: arjunena vihīnas tu yadi notsṛjate raṇam
GE07mbh_07_u:016.008c: mām upāyāntam ālokya gṛhītam iti viddhi tam
GE07mbh_07_u:016.009a: evaṃ te sahasā rājan dharmaputraṃ yudhiṣṭhiram
GE07mbh_07_u:016.009c: samāneṣyāmi sagaṇaṃ vaśam adya na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:016.010a: yadi tiṣṭhati saṃgrāme muhūrtam api pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:016.011a: droṇasya tu vacaḥ śrutvā trigartādhipatis tataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:016.011c: bhrātṛbhiḥ sahito rājann idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_07_u:016.013a: te vayaṃ smaramāṇās tān vinikārān pṛthagvidhān
GE07mbh_07_u:016.013c: krodhāgninā dahyamānā na śemahi sadā niśāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:016.014c: kartāraḥ sma vayaṃ sarvaṃ yac cikīrṣāma hṛdgatam
GE07mbh_07_u:016.015a: bhavataś ca priyaṃ yat syād asmākaṃ ca yaśaskaram
GE07mbh_07_u:016.016a: adyāstv anarjunā bhūmir atrigartātha vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:016.016c: satyaṃ te pratijānīmo naitan mithyā bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_07_u:016.017a: evaṃ satyarathaś coktvā satyadharmā ca bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:016.017c: satyavarmā ca satyeṣuḥ satyakarmā tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_07_u:016.018a: sahitā bhrātaraḥ pañca rathānām ayutena ca
GE07mbh_07_u:016.019a: mālavās tuṇḍikerāś ca rathānām ayutais tribhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:016.020a: mācellakair lalitthaiś ca sahito madrakair api
GE07mbh_07_u:016.020d-0125_01: maladāś ca karūśāś ca daradāś ca mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:016.020d-0125_02: taṅkaṇāś ca parādāś ca yugapatte samāgatāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:016.022a: tato jvalanam ādāya hutvā sarve pṛthak pṛthak
GE07mbh_07_u:016.025c: prāpya lokān suyuddhena kṣipram eva yiyāsavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:016.026a: brāhmaṇāṃs tarpayitvā ca niṣkān dattvā pṛthak pṛthak
GE07mbh_07_u:016.026c: gāś ca vāsāṃsi ca punaḥ samābhāṣya parasparam
GE07mbh_07_u:016.026d-0126_02: muditāś ca prahṛṣṭāś ca jalaṃ saṃspṛśya nirmalam
GE07mbh_07_u:016.027c: tasminn agnau tadā cakruḥ pratijñāṃ dṛḍhaniścayāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:016.028a: śṛṇvatāṃ sarvabhūtānām uccair vācaḥ sma menire
GE07mbh_07_u:016.029a: ye vai lokāś cānṛtānāṃ ye caiva brahmaghātinām
GE07mbh_07_u:016.029c: pānapasya ca ye lokā gurudāraratasya ca
GE07mbh_07_u:016.030c: śaraṇāgataṃ ca tyajato yācamānaṃ tathā ghnataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:016.031a: agāradāhināṃ ye ca ye ca gāṃ nighnatām api
GE07mbh_07_u:016.031c: apacāriṇāṃ ca ye lokā ye ca brahmadviṣām api
GE07mbh_07_u:016.032a: jāyāṃ ca ṛtukāle vai ye mohād abhigacchatām
GE07mbh_07_u:016.033a: nyāsāpahāriṇāṃ ye ca śrutaṃ nāśayatāṃ ca ye
GE07mbh_07_u:016.034b-0127_01: satyam ākramatāṃ ye ca pratyādityaṃ pramehatām
GE07mbh_07_u:016.034c: tān āpnuyāmahe lokān ye ca pāpakṛtām api
GE07mbh_07_u:016.035a: yady ahatvā vayaṃ yuddhe nivartema dhanaṃjayam
GE07mbh_07_u:016.035c: tena cābhyarditās trāsād bhavema hi parāṅmukhāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:016.036a: yadi tv asukaraṃ loke karma kuryāma saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:016.036c: iṣṭān puṇyakṛtāṃ lokān prāpnuyāma na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:016.037a: evam uktvā tato rājaṃs te 'bhyavartanta saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:016.039a: āhūto na nivarteyam iti me vratam āhitam
GE07mbh_07_u:016.039c: saṃśaptakāś ca māṃ rājann āhvayanti punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:016.040a: eṣa ca bhrātṛbhiḥ sārdhaṃ suśarmāhvayate raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:016.041c: satyaṃ te pratijānāmi hatān viddhi parān yudhi
GE07mbh_07_u:016.041d-0128_01: na hy arjuno raṇe rājan mithyā kiṃ cit pravakṣyati
GE07mbh_07_u:016.041d-0128_02: hatāṃs traigartakān paśya mā sma te kaśmalaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_07_u:016.042a: śrutam etat tvayā tāta yad droṇasya cikīrṣitam
GE07mbh_07_u:016.042c: yathā tad anṛtaṃ tasya bhavet tadvat samācara
GE07mbh_07_u:016.043a: droṇo hi balavāñ śūraḥ kṛtāstraś ca jitaśramaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:016.043c: pratijñātaṃ ca tenaitad grahaṇaṃ me mahāratha arjuna uvāca
GE07mbh_07_u:016.044-0129_02: trigarto bhrātṛbhiḥ sārdhaṃ sa mām āhvayate bhṛśam
GE07mbh_07_u:016.044-0129_03: tavāpi tu raṇe rakṣā vihitā me janādhipa
GE07mbh_07_u:016.044a: ayaṃ vai satyajid rājann adya te rakṣitā yudhi
GE07mbh_07_u:016.044c: dhriyamāṇe hi pāñcālye nācāryaḥ kāmam āpsyati
GE07mbh_07_u:016.045a: hate tu puruṣavyāghre raṇe satyajiti prabho
GE07mbh_07_u:016.045c: sarvair api sametair vā na sthātavyaṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_07_u:016.046a: anujñātas tato rājñā pariṣvaktaś ca phalgunaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:016.046c: premṇā dṛṣṭaś ca bahudhā āśiṣā ca prayojitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:016.047a: vihāyainaṃ tataḥ pārthas trigartān pratyayād balī
GE07mbh_07_u:016.048a: tato dauryodhanaṃ sainyaṃ mudā paramayā yutam
GE07mbh_07_u:017.001a: tataḥ saṃśaptakā rājan same deśe vyavasthitāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:017.002a: te kirīṭinam āyāntaṃ dṛṣṭvā harṣeṇa māriṣa
GE07mbh_07_u:017.002b-0132_01: atīva saṃprahṛṣṭās te hy upalakṣya dhanaṃjayam
GE07mbh_07_u:017.003a: sa śabdaḥ pradiśaḥ sarvā diśaḥ khaṃ ca samāvṛṇot
GE07mbh_07_u:017.003c: āvṛtatvāc ca lokasya nāsīt tatra pratisvanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:017.004c: kiṃ cid abhyutsmayan kṛṣṇam idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_07_u:017.006c: kunarair duravāpān hi lokān prāpsyanty anuttamān
GE07mbh_07_u:017.006d-0133_01: mayā hatā hi saṃgrāme lokān prāpsyanti puṣkalān
GE07mbh_07_u:017.008c: dadhmau vegena mahatā phalgunaḥ pūrayan diśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:017.009d-0134_01: sā senā bharataśreṣṭha niśceṣṭā śuśubhe tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:017.009d-0134_02: citrapaṭṭe yathā nyastā kuśalaiḥ śilpibhir naraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:017.009d-0134_03: svanena tena sainyānāṃ divam āvṛṇvatā tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:017.009d-0134_04: sasvanā pṛthivī sarvā tathaiva ca mahodadhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:017.009d-0134_05: vyūḍhānīkais tu taiḥ sarvaiḥ pṛthivyāṃ samarārṇave
GE07mbh_07_u:017.010d-0135_01: tato vyupāramac chabdaḥ prahṛṣṭās te tato 'bhavan
GE07mbh_07_u:017.011a: upalabhya ca te saṃjñām avasthāpya ca vāhinīm
GE07mbh_07_u:017.012a: tāny arjunaḥ sahasrāṇi daśa pañcaiva cāśugaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:017.013a: tato 'rjunaṃ śitair bāṇair daśabhir daśabhiḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:017.013c: pratyavidhyaṃs tataḥ pārthas tān avidhyat tribhis tribhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:017.014a: ekaikas tu tataḥ pārthaṃ rājan vivyādha pañcabhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:017.014c: sa ca tān prativivyādha dvābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ parākramī
GE07mbh_07_u:017.015a: bhūya eva tu saṃrabdhās te 'rjunaṃ sahakeśavam
GE07mbh_07_u:017.015c: āpūrayañ śarais tīkṣṇais taṭākam iva vṛṣṭibhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:017.019a: hastāvāpaṃ subāhos tu bhallena yudhi pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:017.019c: ciccheda taṃ caiva punaḥ śaravarṣair avākirat
GE07mbh_07_u:017.020a: tataḥ suśarmā daśabhiḥ surathaś ca kirīṭinam
GE07mbh_07_u:017.020c: sudharmā sudhanuś caiva subāhuś ca samarpayan
GE07mbh_07_u:017.021a: tāṃs tu sarvān pṛthag bāṇair vānarapravaradhvajaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:017.021c: pratyavidhyad dhvajāṃś caiṣāṃ bhallaiś ciccheda kāñcanān
GE07mbh_07_u:017.022a: sudhanvano dhanuś chittvā hayān vai nyavadhīc charaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:017.022d-0136_01: jahāra pārthaḥ sainyeṣu sahasre dve ca yodhinām
GE07mbh_07_u:017.023a: tasmiṃs tu patite vīre trastās tasya padānugāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:017.023b-0137_01: bhūyiṣṭhaṃ pratiruddhās te hatair yodhair yaśasvinaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:017.023c: vyadravanta bhayād bhītā yena dauryodhanaṃ balam
GE07mbh_07_u:017.024a: tato jaghāna saṃkruddho vāsavis tāṃ mahācamūm
GE07mbh_07_u:017.025a: tato bhagne bale tasmin viprayāte samantataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:017.026c: amuhyaṃs tatra tatraiva trastā mṛgagaṇā iva
GE07mbh_07_u:017.027a: tatas trigartarāṭ kruddhas tān uvāca mahārathān
GE07mbh_07_u:017.027c: alaṃ drutena vaḥ śūrā na bhayaṃ kartum arhatha
GE07mbh_07_u:017.028a: śaptvā tu śapathān ghorān sarvasainyasya paśyataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:017.028c: gatvā dauryodhanaṃ sainyaṃ kiṃ vai vakṣyatha mukhyagāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:017.030a: evam uktās tu te rājann udakrośan muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:017.030c: śaṅkhāṃś ca dadhmire vīrā harṣayantaḥ parasparam
GE07mbh_07_u:017.031c: nārāyaṇāś ca gopālāḥ kṛtvā mṛtyuṃ nivartanam
GE07mbh_07_u:018.001a: dṛṣṭvā tu saṃnivṛttāṃs tān saṃśaptakagaṇān punaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:018.002c: naite hāsyanti saṃgrāmaṃ jīvanta iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:018.003a: paśya me 'strabalaṃ ghoraṃ bāhvor iṣvasanasya ca
GE07mbh_07_u:018.003c: adyaitān pātayiṣyāmi kruddho rudraḥ paśūn iva
GE07mbh_07_u:018.004a: tataḥ kṛṣṇaḥ smitaṃ kṛtvā pariṇandya śivena tam
GE07mbh_07_u:018.005a: babhrāje sa ratho 'tyartham uhyamāno raṇe tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:018.006c: yathā śakraratho rājan yuddhe devāsure purā
GE07mbh_07_u:018.008a: adṛśyaṃ ca muhūrtena cakrus te bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_07_u:018.010a: baddhvā ca bhṛkuṭīṃ vaktre krodhasya pratilakṣaṇam
GE07mbh_07_u:018.012c: anyonyam arjunaṃ matvā svam ātmānaṃ ca jaghnire
GE07mbh_07_u:018.013c: iti bruvāṇāḥ saṃmūḍhā jaghnur anyonyam āhave
GE07mbh_07_u:018.014c: aśobhanta raṇe yodhāḥ puṣpitā iva kiṃśukāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:018.014d-0141_03: tataḥ prahasya bībhatsur vyākṣipad gāṇḍivaṃ bhṛśam
GE07mbh_07_u:018.014d-0141_04: nyahanat tāñ śarais tīkṣṇais tamaḥ sūrya ivāṃśubhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:018.015c: kṛtvā tad astraṃ tān vīrān anayad yamasādanam
GE07mbh_07_u:018.016a: atha prahasya bībhatsur lalitthān mālavān api
GE07mbh_07_u:018.016c: mācellakāṃs trigartāṃś ca yaudheyāṃś cārdayac charaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:018.018a: tato naivārjunas tatra na ratho na ca keśavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:018.019c: hatau kṛṣṇāv iti prītā vāsāṃsy ādudhuvus tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:018.021a: tataḥ prasiṣvide kṛṣṇaḥ khinnaś cārjunam abravīt
GE07mbh_07_u:018.021c: kvāsi pārtha na paśye tvāṃ kaccij jīvasi śatruhan
GE07mbh_07_u:018.022a: tasya taṃ mānuṣaṃ bhāvaṃ bhāvajño ''jñāya pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:018.024a: uhyamānās tu te rājan bahv aśobhanta vāyunā
GE07mbh_07_u:018.024c: praḍīnāḥ pakṣiṇaḥ kāle vṛkṣebhya iva māriṣa
GE07mbh_07_u:018.025c: jaghāna niśitair bāṇaiḥ sahasrāṇi śatāni ca
GE07mbh_07_u:018.026a: śirāṃsi bhallair aharad bāhūn api ca sāyudhān
GE07mbh_07_u:018.029c: chinnadhvajarathavrātāḥ ke cit ke cit kva cit kva cit
GE07mbh_07_u:018.033a: tair hatair hanyamānaiś ca patadbhiḥ patitair api
GE07mbh_07_u:018.033c: bhramadbhir niṣṭanadbhiś ca ghoram āyodhanaṃ babhau
GE07mbh_07_u:018.034a: rajaś ca mahad udbhūtaṃ śāntaṃ rudhiravṛṣṭibhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:018.035a: tad babhau raudrabībhatsaṃ bībhatsor yānam āhave
GE07mbh_07_u:018.035c: ākrīḍa iva rudrasya ghnataḥ kālātyaye paśūn
GE07mbh_07_u:018.037a: sā bhūmir bharataśreṣṭha nihatais tair mahārathaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:019.001a: pariṇāmya niśāṃ tāṃ tu bhāradvājo mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:019.001c: bahūktvā ca tato rājan rājānaṃ ca suyodhanam
GE07mbh_07_u:019.002c: niṣkrānte ca raṇāt pārthe saṃśaptakavadhaṃ prati
GE07mbh_07_u:019.004a: vyūhaṃ dṛṣṭvā suparṇaṃ tu bhāradvājakṛtaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:019.005c: śiro duryodhano rājā sodaryaiḥ sānugaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_07_u:019.006a: cakṣuṣī kṛtavarmā ca gautamaś cāsyatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:019.007c: śakā yavanakāmbojās tathā haṃsapadāś ca ye
GE07mbh_07_u:019.009a: bhūriśravāḥ śalaḥ śalyaḥ somadattaś ca bāhlikaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:019.009c: akṣauhiṇyā vṛtā vīrā dakṣiṇaṃ pakṣam āśritāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:019.017a: tasya prāgjyotiṣo madhye vidhivat kalpitaṃ gajam
GE07mbh_07_u:019.017c: āsthitaḥ śuśubhe rājann aṃśumān udaye yathā
GE07mbh_07_u:019.019c: abhivṛṣṭo mahāmeghair yathā syāt parvato mahān
GE07mbh_07_u:019.021a: tato yudhiṣṭhiraḥ prekṣya vyūhaṃ tam atimānuṣam
GE07mbh_07_u:019.021c: ajayyam aribhiḥ saṃkhye pārṣataṃ vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_07_u:019.022a: brāhmaṇasya vaśaṃ nāham iyām adya yathā prabho
GE07mbh_07_u:019.024a: mayi jīvati kauravya nodvegaṃ kartum arhasi
GE07mbh_07_u:019.024c: na hi śakto raṇe droṇo vijetuṃ māṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_07_u:019.025a: evam uktvā kiran bāṇān drupadasya suto balī
GE07mbh_07_u:019.026d-0142_01: sa hi jāto mahāraudro droṇasya nidhanaṃ prati
GE07mbh_07_u:019.026d-0142_03: nāśakat taṃ tataḥ kaś cid anīke prativīkṣitum
GE07mbh_07_u:019.026d-0142_04: tataḥ kirann iṣūṃs tīkṣṇān drupadasya varūthinīm
GE07mbh_07_u:019.026d-0142_05: bhāradvājo yayau tūrṇaṃ pārṣataṃ varjayan yudhi
GE07mbh_07_u:019.026d-0142_06: drupadasya mahat sainyaṃ vārayām āsa brāhmaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:019.027a: taṃ tu saṃprekṣya putras te durmukhaḥ śatrukarśanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:019.028c: pārṣatasya ca śūrasya durmukhasya ca bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:019.031c: droṇo yaudhiṣṭhiraṃ sainyaṃ bahudhā vyadhamac charaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:019.032c: tathā pārthasya sainyāni vicchinnāni kva cit kva cit
GE07mbh_07_u:019.033a: muhūrtam iva tad yuddham āsīn madhuradarśanam
GE07mbh_07_u:019.033d-0144_01: naiva khaṃ na diśo bhūmir babhāse na ca bhāskaraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:019.034a: naiva sve na pare rājann ajñāyanta parasparam
GE07mbh_07_u:019.037a: narān eva narā jaghnur udagrāś ca hayā hayān
GE07mbh_07_u:019.037c: rathāṃś ca rathino jaghnur vāraṇā varavāraṇān
GE07mbh_07_u:019.041a: vikṣaradbhir nadadbhiś ca nipatadbhiś ca vāraṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:019.041c: saṃbabhūva mahī kīrṇā meghair dyaur iva śāradī
GE07mbh_07_u:019.042c: vāraṇānāṃ ravo jajñe meghānām iva saṃplave
GE07mbh_07_u:019.043a: tomarābhihatāḥ ke cid bāṇaiś ca paramadvipāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:019.044a: viṣāṇābhihatāś cāpi ke cit tatra gajā gajaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:019.047a: nirmanuṣyāś ca mātaṅgā vinadantas tatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:019.048c: diśo jagmur mahānāgāḥ ke cid ekacarā iva
GE07mbh_07_u:019.049c: petur ārtasvaraṃ kṛtvā tadā viśasane gajāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:019.050c: āhatā sahasā bhūmiś cakampe ca nanāda ca
GE07mbh_07_u:019.051c: mātaṅgaiḥ śuśubhe bhūmir vikīrṇair iva parvataiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:019.052b-0145_01: gajair gātravaraiḥ kṣuṇṇā viṣāṇaś ca nipātitāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:019.053c: parān svāṃś cāpi mṛdnantaḥ paripetur diśo daśa
GE07mbh_07_u:019.055a: pramathya ca viṣāṇāgraiḥ samutkṣipya ca vāraṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:019.055c: sacakrāś ca vicakrāś ca rathair eva mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:019.056a: rathāś ca rathibhir hīnā nirmanuṣyāś ca vājinaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:019.056c: hatārohāś ca mātaṅgā diśo jagmuḥ śarāturāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:019.057a: jaghānātra pitā putraṃ putraś ca pitaraṃ tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:019.057c: ity āsīt tumulaṃ yuddhaṃ na prajñāyata kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_07_u:019.059c: chatrāṇi ca patākāś ca sarvaṃ raktam adṛśyata
GE07mbh_07_u:019.060a: hayaughāś ca rathaughāś ca naraughāś ca nipātitāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:019.063c: na hi svacittatāṃ lebhe kaś cid āhatalakṣaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:020.003a: dṛṣṭvā droṇaṃ tataḥ śūraḥ satyajit satyavikramaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:020.004d-0146_06: daśabhir daśabhiḥ kruddha ubhau ca pārṣṇisārathī
GE07mbh_07_u:020.004d-0146_09: droṇas tu tat samālakṣya caritaṃ tasya saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:020.005c: avidhyac chīghram ācāryaś chittvāsya saśaraṃ dhanuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:020.005d-0147_01: ācāryas tasya vai cāpaṃ ciccheda tribhir āśugaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:020.006a: sa śīghrataram ādāya dhanur anyat pratāpavān
GE07mbh_07_u:020.007c: vṛkaḥ śaraśatais tīkṣṇaiḥ pāñcālyo droṇam ardayat
GE07mbh_07_u:020.008c: cukruśuḥ pāṇḍavā rājan vastrāṇi dudhuvuś ca ha
GE07mbh_07_u:020.009a: vṛkas tu paramakruddho droṇaṃ ṣaṣṭyā stanāntare
GE07mbh_07_u:020.009c: vivyādha balavān rājaṃs tad adbhutam ivābhavat
GE07mbh_07_u:020.010c: vegaṃ cakre mahāvegaḥ krodhād udvṛtya cakṣuṣī
GE07mbh_07_u:020.011a: tataḥ satyajitaś cāpaṃ chittvā droṇo vṛkasya ca
GE07mbh_07_u:020.011c: ṣaḍbhiḥ sasūtaṃ sahayaṃ śarair droṇo 'vadhīd vṛkam
GE07mbh_07_u:020.012c: sāśvaṃ sasūtaṃ viśikhair droṇaṃ vivyādha sadhvajam
GE07mbh_07_u:020.013a: sa tan na mamṛṣe droṇaḥ pāñcālyenārdanaṃ mṛdhe
GE07mbh_07_u:020.013c: tatas tasya vināśāya satvaraṃ vyasṛjac charān
GE07mbh_07_u:020.014a: hayān dhvajaṃ dhanur muṣṭim ubhau ca pārṣṇisārathī
GE07mbh_07_u:020.017c: apāyāj javanair aśvair droṇāt trasto yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:020.020a: nirdahantam anīkāni tāni tāni punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:020.021c: ṣaḍbhiḥ sasūtaṃ sahayaṃ droṇaṃ viddhvānadad bhṛśam
GE07mbh_07_u:020.021d-0150_01: krūrāya karmaṇe yuktaṃ cikīrṣuḥ karma duṣkaram
GE07mbh_07_u:020.022a: tasya nānadato droṇaḥ śiraḥ kāyāt sakuṇḍalam
GE07mbh_07_u:020.023a: matsyāñ jitvājayac cedīn kārūṣān kekayān api
GE07mbh_07_u:020.023c: pāñcālān sṛñjayān pāṇḍūn bhāradvājaḥ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:020.024a: taṃ dahantam anīkāni kruddham agniṃ yathā vanam
GE07mbh_07_u:020.026a: nāgān aśvān padātīṃś ca rathino gajasādinaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:020.026c: raudrā hastavatā muktāḥ pramathnanti sma sāyakāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:020.028a: sarvā diśaḥ samacarat sainyaṃ vikṣobhayann iva
GE07mbh_07_u:020.029d-0151_01: śobhamānāṃ dhvaje cāsya vedīm adrākṣma bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:020.030a: droṇas tu pāṇḍavānīke cakāra kadanaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_07_u:020.031a: sa śūraḥ satyavāk prājño balavān satyavikramaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:020.038d-0152_01: te droṇaṃ sahitāḥ śūrāḥ sarvataḥ paryavārayan
GE07mbh_07_u:020.039d-0153_01: śikhaṇḍī tu tato droṇaṃ pañcabhir nataparvabhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:020.039d-0153_02: kṣatravarmā ca viṃśatyā vasudānaś ca pañcabhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:020.039d-0153_03: uttamaujās tribhir bāṇaiḥ kṣatradevaś ca saptabhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:020.039d-0153_06: dhṛṣṭadyumnaś ca daśabhiś cekitānas tribhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:020.040a: tato droṇaḥ satyasaṃdhaḥ prabhinna iva kuñjaraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:020.041c: avidhyan navabhiḥ kṣemaṃ sa hataḥ prāpatad rathāt
GE07mbh_07_u:020.042a: sa madhyaṃ prāpya sainyānāṃ sarvāḥ pravicaran diśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:020.042c: trātā hy abhavad anyeṣāṃ na trātavyaḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_07_u:020.046c: apāyāj javanair aśvaiḥ pāñcālyo droṇam abhyayāt
GE07mbh_07_u:020.047a: taṃ droṇaḥ sadhanuṣkaṃ tu sāśvayantāram akṣiṇot
GE07mbh_07_u:020.047c: sa hataḥ prāpatad bhūmau rathāj jyotir ivāmbarāt
GE07mbh_07_u:020.047d-0154_01: taṃ hatvā vibabhau droṇaḥ kurubhiḥ parivāritaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:020.048c: hata droṇaṃ hata droṇam ity āsīt tumulaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_07_u:020.049c: sṛñjayān pāṇḍavāṃś caiva droṇo vyakṣobhayad balī
GE07mbh_07_u:020.052a: tāvakās tu mahārāja jayaṃ labdhvā mahāhave
GE07mbh_07_u:020.052d-0155_01: vārdhakṣemis tu vārṣṇeyo droṇaṃ viddhvā śarottamaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:020.052d-0155_03: citrasenas tato droṇaṃ pāñcālas tv ardayac charaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:020.052d-0155_04: punar vivyādha saṃkruddhaḥ senābinduś ca pañcabhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:020.052d-0155_05: suvarmā pañcabhiś caiva dhṛṣṭadyumnaś ca pañcabhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:020.052d-0155_06: śikhaṇḍī navabhir bāṇaiś cekitānaś ca pañcabhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:020.052d-0155_07: sātyakiś ca catuḥṣaṣṭyā rājan vivyādha sāyakaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:020.052d-0155_08: sucitro daśabhir bāṇair droṇaṃ viddhvānadad balī
GE07mbh_07_u:020.052d-0155_09: taṃ droṇaḥ samare rājañ śaravarṣair avākirat
GE07mbh_07_u:020.052d-0155_11: sāśvaś ca samare rājan hato vai prāpatat kṣitau
GE07mbh_07_u:021.001c: pāñcāleṣu ca sarveṣu kaś cid anyo 'bhyavartata
GE07mbh_07_u:021.002a: āryāṃ yuddhe matiṃ kṛtvā kṣatriyāṇāṃ yaśaskarīm
GE07mbh_07_u:021.003a: sa hi vīro naraḥ sūta yo bhagneṣu nivartate
GE07mbh_07_u:021.003c: aho nāsīt pumān kaś cid dṛṣṭvā droṇaṃ vyavasthitam
GE07mbh_07_u:021.004a: jṛmbhamāṇam iva vyāghraṃ prabhinnam iva kuñjaram
GE07mbh_07_u:021.006c: ke vīrāḥ saṃnyavartanta tan mamācakṣva saṃjaya
GE07mbh_07_u:021.007a: tān dṛṣṭvā calitān saṃkhye praṇunnān droṇasāyakaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:021.008c: sindhor iva mahaughena hriyamāṇān yathā plavān
GE07mbh_07_u:021.012a: naite jātu punar yuddham īheyur iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:021.012c: yathā tu bhagnā droṇena vāteneva mahādrumāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:021.013c: pathā naikena gacchanti ghūrṇamānās tatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:021.014a: saṃniruddhāś ca kauravyair droṇena ca mahātmanā
GE07mbh_07_u:021.015a: bhramarair iva cāviṣṭā droṇasya niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:021.016c: madīyair āvṛto yodhaiḥ karṇa tarjayatīva mām
GE07mbh_07_u:021.017a: vyaktaṃ droṇamayaṃ lokam adya paśyati durmatiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:021.017c: nirāśo jīvitān nūnam adya rājyāc ca pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:021.018a: naiṣa jātu mahābāhur jīvann āhavam utsṛjet
GE07mbh_07_u:021.019a: na cāpi pāṇḍavā yuddhe bhajyerann iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:021.019c: śūrāś ca balavantaś ca kṛtāstrā yuddhadurmadāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:021.020c: smaramāṇā na hāsyanti saṃgrāmam iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:021.021c: varān varān hi kaunteyo rathodārān haniṣyati
GE07mbh_07_u:021.022a: asinā dhanuṣā śaktyā hayair nāgair narai rathaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:021.022c: āyasena ca daṇḍena vrātān vrātān haniṣyati
GE07mbh_07_u:021.023c: pāñcālāḥ kekayā matsyāḥ pāṇḍavāś ca viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:021.024a: śūrāś ca balavantaś ca vikrāntāś ca mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:021.024d-0156_01: eṣa cāpi mahābāhur himavān iva susthiraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:021.025d-0158_02: bahavaḥ pārthivā rājaṃs teṣāṃ vaśagatā raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:021.026e: asaṃśayaṃ kṛtāstrāś ca paryāptāś cāpi vāraṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:021.027a: atibhāraṃ tv ahaṃ manye bhāradvāje samāhitam
GE07mbh_07_u:021.027c: te śīghram anugacchāmo yatra droṇo vyavasthitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:021.027e: kākā iva mahānāgaṃ mā vai hanyur yatavratam
