GE07mbh_07_u:021.028a: rādheyasya vacaḥ śrutvā rājā duryodhanas tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:021.028c: bhrātṛbhiḥ sahito rājan prāyād droṇarathaṃ prati
GE07mbh_07_u:021.029a: tatrārāvo mahān āsīd ekaṃ droṇaṃ jighāṃsatām
GE07mbh_07_u:022.001a: sarveṣām eva me brūhi rathacihnāni saṃjaya
GE07mbh_07_u:022.001b-0159_01: tān ahaṃ śrotum icchāmi vistareṇa pṛthak pṛthak
GE07mbh_07_u:022.001b-0159_02: dūyate me manas tāta droṇaṃ prati paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_07_u:022.001b-0159_03: śrutvā bhīṣmasya nidhanaṃ tadvad etad bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_07_u:022.002d-0160_06: siddhiṃ cāsya parāṃ kāṃkṣañ śoṇākṣaḥ saṃnyavartata
GE07mbh_07_u:022.002d-0160_08: śikhaṇḍī kṣatradevaś ca svayaṃ pratvarayan yayau
GE07mbh_07_u:022.006a: rājñas tv anantaraṃ rājā pāñcālyo drupado 'bhavat
GE07mbh_07_u:022.008a: taṃ virāṭo 'nvayāt paścāt saha śūrair mahārathaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:022.008c: kekayāś ca śikhaṇḍī ca dhṛṣṭaketus tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_07_u:022.008e: svaiḥ svaiḥ sainyaiḥ parivṛtā matsyarājānam anvayuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:022.014c: teṣāṃ tu ṣaṭ sahasrāṇi ye śikhaṇḍinam anvayuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:022.020a: śvetās tu prativindhyaṃ taṃ kṛṣṇagrīvā manojavāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:022.020d-0164_01: yuvānam avahan yuddhe yantuḥ preṣyakarāḥ hayāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:022.021a: sutasomaṃ tu yaṃ dhaumyāt pārthaḥ putram ayācata
GE07mbh_07_u:022.022c: tasmiñ jātaḥ somasaṃkrandamadhye; yasmāt tasmāt sutasomo 'bhavat saḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:022.022d-0165_02: vīraṃ tam avahan yuddhe heṣamāṇāḥ samantataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:022.026a: yam āhur adhyardhaguṇaṃ kṛṣṇāt pārthāc ca saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:022.026c: abhimanyuṃ piśaṅgās taṃ kumāram avahan raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:022.027a: ekas tu dhārtarāṣṭrebhyaḥ pāṇḍavān yaḥ samāśritaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:022.027c: taṃ bṛhanto mahākāyā yuyutsum avahan raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:022.028c: ūhuḥ sutumule yuddhe hayā hṛṣṭāḥ svalaṃkṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:022.029c: saucittim avahan yuddhe yantuḥ preṣyakarā hayāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:022.032a: astrāṇāṃ ca dhanurvede brāhme vede ca pāragam
GE07mbh_07_u:022.033a: yaḥ sa pāñcālasenānīr droṇam aṃśam akalpayat
GE07mbh_07_u:022.034c: śreṇimān vasudānaś ca putraḥ kāśyasya cābhibho
GE07mbh_07_u:022.036a: prabhadrakās tu pāñcālāḥ ṣaṭ sahasrāṇy udāyudhāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:022.040c: rājānaṃ rocamānaṃ te hayāḥ saṃkhye samāvahan
GE07mbh_07_u:022.046a: śūrāś ca bhadrakāś caiva śarakāṇḍanibhā hayāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:022.048c: yuddhe satyadhṛtiṃ kṣaimim avahan prāṃśavaḥ śubhāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:022.049c: aśvaiś ca dhanuṣā caiva śuklaiḥ śuklo nyavartata
GE07mbh_07_u:022.053a: yaṃ tu sarvamanuṣyebhyaḥ prāhuḥ śūrataraṃ nṛpam
GE07mbh_07_u:022.058d-0167_01: keśavena hate saṃkhye pitary atha narādhipe
GE07mbh_07_u:022.058d-0167_02: bhinne kapāṭe pāṇḍyānāṃ vidruteṣu ca bandhuṣu
GE07mbh_07_u:022.058d-0167_03: bhīṣmād avāpya cāstrāṇi droṇād rāmāt kṛpāt tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:022.058d-0167_05: iyeṣa dvārakāṃ hantuṃ kṛtsnāṃ jetuṃ ca medinīm
GE07mbh_07_u:022.058d-0167_10: divyaṃ visphārayaṃś cāpaṃ droṇam abhyapatad balī
GE07mbh_07_u:022.060d-0168_02: gato yudhiṣṭhiraṃ bhaktyā tyaktvā sarvasvam īhitam
GE07mbh_07_u:022.063c: sarvāṇy api ca sainyāni bhāradvājo 'tyarocata saṃjaya uvāca
GE07mbh_07_u:022.063d-005_0011: haṃsas tu rājataḥ śrīmān dhvajo ghaṇṭāpatākavān
GE07mbh_07_u:022.063d-005_0018: aśvāś ca kāmagās tasya rāvaṇasya yathā purā
GE07mbh_07_u:022.063d-005_0019: māhendraṃ ca dhanur divyaṃ dharmarāje yudhiṣṭhire
GE07mbh_07_u:022.063d-005_0020: vāyavyaṃ bhīmasenasya dhanur divyam abhūn nṛpa
GE07mbh_07_u:022.063d-005_0022: tad divyam ajaraṃ caiva phalgunārthāya vai dhanuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:022.063d-005_0025: raudram āgneyakauberaṃ yāmyaṃ giriśam eva ca
GE07mbh_07_u:022.063d-005_0027: raudraṃ dhanurvaraṃ śreṣṭhaṃ yaṃ lebhe rohiṇīsutaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:022.063d-005_0028: taṃ tuṣṭaḥ pradadau rāmaḥ saubhadrāya mahātmane
GE07mbh_07_u:022.063d-005_0029: ete cānye ca bahavo dhvajā hemavibhūṣaṇāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:023.001a: vyathayeyur ime senāṃ devānām api saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:023.002c: tasminn eva tu sarvārthā dṛśyante vai pṛthagvidhāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:023.004a: sa eva mahatīṃ senāṃ samāvartayad āhave
GE07mbh_07_u:023.004c: kim anyad daivasaṃyogān mama putrasya cābhavat
GE07mbh_07_u:023.005a: yukta eva hi bhāgyena dhruvam utpadyate naraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:023.005c: sa tathākṛṣyate tena na yathā svayam icchati
GE07mbh_07_u:023.007a: ardhaṃ me kekayā labdhāḥ kāśikāḥ kosalāś ca ye
GE07mbh_07_u:023.007c: cedayaś cāpare vaṅgā mām eva samupāśritāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:023.008a: pṛthivī bhūyasī tāta mama pārthasya no tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:023.008c: iti mām abravīt sūta mando duryodhanas tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:023.011c: bhīṣmadroṇau hatau śrutvā nāhaṃ jīvitum utsahe
GE07mbh_07_u:023.012a: yan mā kṣattābravīt tāta prapaśyan putragṛddhinam
GE07mbh_07_u:023.012c: duryodhanena tat sarvaṃ prāptaṃ sūta mayā saha
GE07mbh_07_u:023.013a: nṛśaṃsaṃ tu paraṃ tat syāt tyaktvā duryodhanaṃ yadi
GE07mbh_07_u:023.013c: putraśeṣaṃ cikīrṣeyaṃ kṛcchraṃ na maraṇaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_07_u:023.014a: yo hi dharmaṃ parityajya bhavaty arthaparo naraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:023.014c: so 'smāc ca hīyate lokāt kṣudrabhāvaṃ ca gacchati
GE07mbh_07_u:023.015a: adya cāpy asya rāṣṭrasya hatotsāhasya saṃjaya
GE07mbh_07_u:023.015c: avaśeṣaṃ na paśyāmi kakude mṛdite sati
GE07mbh_07_u:023.016a: kathaṃ syād avaśeṣaṃ hi dhuryayor abhyatītayoḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:023.016d-0171_01: tau droṇabhīṣmau nihitau kim anyad bhāgadheyataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:023.017a: vyaktam eva ca me śaṃsa yathā yuddham avartata
GE07mbh_07_u:023.017c: ke 'yudhyan ke vyapākarṣan ke kṣudrāḥ prādravan bhayāt
GE07mbh_07_u:023.018a: dhanaṃjayaṃ ca me śaṃsa yad yac cakre ratharṣabhaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:023.018c: tasmād bhayaṃ no bhūyiṣṭhaṃ bhrātṛvyāc ca viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:023.019a: yathāsīc ca nivṛtteṣu pāṇḍaveṣu ca saṃjaya
GE07mbh_07_u:023.019d-0172_01: kathaṃ ca vo manas tāta saṃnivṛtteṣv avartata
GE07mbh_07_u:023.019e: māmakānāṃ ca ye śūrāḥ kāṃs tatra samavārayan
GE07mbh_07_u:024.001a: mahad bhairavam āsīn naḥ saṃnivṛtteṣu pāṇḍuṣu
GE07mbh_07_u:024.001c: dṛṣṭvā droṇaṃ chādyamānaṃ tair bhāskaram ivāmbudaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:024.002a: taiś coddhūtaṃ rajas tīvram avacakre camūṃ tava
GE07mbh_07_u:024.002c: tato hatam amanyāma droṇaṃ dṛṣṭipathe hate
GE07mbh_07_u:024.003a: tāṃs tu śūrān maheṣvāsān krūraṃ karma cikīrṣataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:024.004d-0173_01: evam uktvā svayaṃ bhīmam abhyayāt tanayas tava
GE07mbh_07_u:024.004d-0173_02: krūraṃ dṛṣṭvā tu te putraṃ bhīmaseno 'bhyavartata
GE07mbh_07_u:024.005a: tato durmarṣaṇo bhīmam abhyagacchat sutas tava
GE07mbh_07_u:024.005c: ārād dṛṣṭvā kiran bāṇair icchan droṇasya jīvitam
GE07mbh_07_u:024.006a: taṃ bāṇair avatastāra kruddho mṛtyum ivāhave
GE07mbh_07_u:024.006c: taṃ ca bhīmo 'tudad bāṇais tadāsīt tumulaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_07_u:024.007c: bāhyaṃ mṛtyubhayaṃ kṛtvā pratyatiṣṭhan parān yudhi
GE07mbh_07_u:024.008a: kṛtavarmā śineḥ putraṃ droṇaprepsuṃ viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:024.009a: taṃ śaineyaḥ śaravrātaiḥ kruddhaḥ kruddham avārayat
GE07mbh_07_u:024.009c: kṛtavarmā ca śaineyaṃ matto mattam iva dvipam
GE07mbh_07_u:024.013c: subāhur bhrātaraṃ śūraṃ yatto droṇād avārayat
GE07mbh_07_u:024.014d-0174_01: duḥśāsanas tu saṃyāntaṃ droṇāya nakulaṃ yudhi
GE07mbh_07_u:024.016c: madreśas taṃ catuḥṣaṣṭyā śarair viddhvānadad bhṛśam
GE07mbh_07_u:024.018a: tathaiva rājā bāhlīko rājānaṃ drupadaṃ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:024.019a: tad yuddham abhavad ghoraṃ vṛddhayoḥ sahasenayoḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:024.025b-0175_01: avidhyat saṃgare so 'pi punaḥ punar nanādayat
GE07mbh_07_u:024.026a: atha bhīmarathaḥ śālvam āśugair āyasaiḥ śitaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:024.027d-0177_01: tam ārjuniḥ śaraiś cakre pitṛvyaṃ jarjarac chavim
GE07mbh_07_u:024.029a: tiṣṭhantam agrato dṛṣṭvā prativindhyaṃ tam āhave
GE07mbh_07_u:024.029c: drauṇir mānaṃ pituḥ kurvan mārgaṇaiḥ samavārayat
GE07mbh_07_u:024.030a: taṃ kruddhaḥ prativivyādha prativindhyaḥ śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:024.031d-0179_03: tasya kṛṣṇasamaḥ kārṣṇis tribhir bhallaiḥ susaṃśitaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:024.031d-0179_04: dhanur dhvajaṃ ca sūtaṃ ca chittvā droṇāntikaṃ yayau
GE07mbh_07_u:024.032a: yas tu śūratamo rājan senayor ubhayor mataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:024.033a: sa lakṣmaṇasyeṣvasanaṃ chittvā lakṣma ca bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:024.035c: vidhūya tad bāṇajālaṃ babhau tava suto balī
GE07mbh_07_u:024.037c: sainikānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ tayoś ca prītivardhanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:024.037d-0181_01: aṅgadaṃ pañcabhir bāṇair avidhyat sa paraṃtapaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:024.037d-0181_02: aṅgado daśabhir bāṇaiḥ punar enam avākirat
GE07mbh_07_u:024.038a: durmukhas tu maheṣvāso vīraṃ purujitaṃ balī
GE07mbh_07_u:024.039a: sa durmukhaṃ bhruvor madhye nārācena vyatāḍayat
GE07mbh_07_u:024.039c: tasya tad vibabhau vaktraṃ sanālam iva paṅkajam
GE07mbh_07_u:024.040a: karṇas tu kekayān bhrātṝn pañca lohitakadhvajān
GE07mbh_07_u:024.041c: sa ca tāṃś chādayām āsa śarajālaiḥ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:024.042a: naiva karṇo na te pañca dadṛśur bāṇasaṃvṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:024.043a: putras te durjayaś caiva jayaś ca vijayaś ca ha
GE07mbh_07_u:024.043c: nīlaṃ kāśyaṃ jayaṃ śūrās trayas trīn pratyavārayan
GE07mbh_07_u:024.044d-0182_01: bṛhaddhanur bṛhac caiva jayamitro jayas tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:024.046a: tayos tasya ca tad yuddham atyadbhutam ivābhavat
GE07mbh_07_u:024.047c: cedirājaḥ śarān asyan kruddho droṇād avārayat
GE07mbh_07_u:024.048c: sa tyaktvā saśaraṃ cāpaṃ rathād bhūmim athāpatat
GE07mbh_07_u:024.049a: vārdhakṣemiṃ tu vārṣṇeyaṃ kṛpaḥ śāradvataḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:024.052c: punaḥ patākāṃ sūtaṃ ca chatraṃ cāpātayad rathāt
GE07mbh_07_u:024.054a: rathaṃ ca svaṃ samāsthāya dhanur ādāya cāparam
GE07mbh_07_u:024.054c: svayaṃ yacchan hayān rājan vyadhamat pāṇḍavīṃ camūm
GE07mbh_07_u:024.054d-0183_01: pāṇḍyam indram ivāyāntam asurān prati jaghnuṣam
GE07mbh_07_u:024.054d-0184_01: tasya sindhupater vāhān vyadhamat pāṇḍyarāṭ svayam
GE07mbh_07_u:024.054d-0185_01: pārtham indram ivāyāntaṃ droṇaṃ prati nijaghnuṣam
GE07mbh_07_u:024.054d-0185_05: sa jyāṃ mṛdnatpṛṣatkena spṛṣṭvā vṛkṣam ivāśaniḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:024.056a: ārujan prarujan bhañjan nighnan vidrāvayan kṣipan
GE07mbh_07_u:024.057c: rākṣasaṃ rākṣasaḥ kruddhaḥ samājaghne hy alambusaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:024.058d-0186_02: tam eva rājan saṃpaśyann atikramya tathā bahūn
GE07mbh_07_u:024.058d-0186_07: hayair hayāḥ samājagmuḥ kuñjarair eva kuñjarāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:024.058d-0186_08: padātayaḥ padātaiś ca rathair eva ratharṣabhāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:024.059c: padātīnāṃ ca bhadraṃ te tava teṣāṃ ca saṃkulam
GE07mbh_07_u:024.060a: naitādṛśo dṛṣṭapūrvaḥ saṃgrāmo naiva ca śrutaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:024.061a: idaṃ ghoram idaṃ citram idaṃ raudram iti prabho
GE07mbh_07_u:024.061c: tatra yuddhāny adṛśyanta pratatāni bahūni ca
GE07mbh_07_u:025.001c: kathaṃ yuyudhire pārthā māmakāś ca tarasvinaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:025.002a: kim arjunaś cāpy akarot saṃśaptakabalaṃ prati
GE07mbh_07_u:025.002c: saṃśaptakā vā pārthasya kim akurvata saṃjaya
GE07mbh_07_u:025.003c: svayam abhyadravad bhīmaṃ nāgānīkena te sutaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:025.004a: sa nāga iva nāgena govṛṣeṇeva govṛṣaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:025.005d-0187_01: tatra yuddhāny adṛśyanta pradṛptāni bahūni ca
GE07mbh_07_u:025.006a: te gajā girisaṃkāśāḥ kṣarantaḥ sarvato madam
GE07mbh_07_u:025.008a: sa teṣu visṛjan bāṇān bhīmo nāgeṣv aśobhata
GE07mbh_07_u:025.008c: bhuvaneṣv iva sarveṣu gabhastīn udito raviḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:025.009a: te bhīmabāṇaiḥ śataśaḥ saṃsyūtā vibabhur gajāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:025.011c: kṣayaṃ ninīṣur niśitair bhīmo vivyādha patribhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:025.013a: tasya nāgaṃ maṇimayaṃ ratnacitraṃ dhvaje sthitam
GE07mbh_07_u:025.013c: bhallābhyāṃ kārmukaṃ caiva kṣipraṃ ciccheda pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:025.018a: tasmin nipatite vīre saṃprādravata sā camūḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:025.021a: śravaṇābhyām atho padbhyāṃ saṃhatena kareṇa ca
GE07mbh_07_u:025.021d-0189_02: padbhyāṃ bhīmo 'py atho dhāvaṃs tasya gātreṣv alīyata
GE07mbh_07_u:025.021d-0189_05: lālayām āsa taṃ nāgaṃ vadhākāṅkṣiṇam avyayam
GE07mbh_07_u:025.021d-0189_10: grīvāyāṃ veṣṭayitvainaṃ sa gajo hantum aihata
GE07mbh_07_u:025.022a: tataḥ sarvasya sainyasya nādaḥ samabhavan mahān
GE07mbh_07_u:025.022c: hā hā vinihato bhīmaḥ kuñjareṇeti māriṣa
GE07mbh_07_u:025.024a: tato yudhiṣṭhiro rājā hataṃ matvā vṛkodaram
GE07mbh_07_u:025.025a: taṃ rathai rathināṃ śreṣṭhāḥ parivārya samantataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:025.027c: tathā vṛddhasya caritaṃ kuñjareṇa viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:025.033a: sa kuñjarastho rathibhiḥ śuśubhe sarvato vṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:025.036a: śineḥ pautrasya tu rathaṃ parigṛhya mahādvipaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:025.037a: bṛhataḥ saindhavān aśvān samutthāpya tu sārathiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:025.037c: tasthau sātyakim āsādya saṃplutas taṃ rathaṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:025.038a: sa tu labdhvāntaraṃ nāgas tvarito rathamaṇḍalāt
GE07mbh_07_u:025.039a: te tv āśugatinā tena trāsyamānā nararṣabhāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:025.039c: tam ekaṃ dviradaṃ saṃkhye menire śataśo nṛpāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:025.041a: teṣāṃ pradravatāṃ bhīmaḥ pāñcālānām itas tataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:025.043c: siktvā vyatrāsayan nāgas te pārtham aharaṃs tataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:025.047a: ta enaṃ śaradhārābhir dhārābhir iva toyadāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:025.049a: so 'dhiṣṭhāya padā vāhān yuyutsoḥ sūtam ārujat
GE07mbh_07_u:025.049b-0195_01: rathaṃ babhañja saṃkruddhaś caṇḍavāto yathā drumam
GE07mbh_07_u:025.049b-0196_01: yuyutsus tu rathād rājann apākrāmat tvarānvitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:025.049b-0196_02: tataḥ pāṇḍavayodhās te nāgarājaṃ śarair drutam
GE07mbh_07_u:025.049c: putras tu tava saṃbhrāntaḥ saubhadrasyāpluto ratham
GE07mbh_07_u:025.050a: sa kuñjarastho visṛjann iṣūn ariṣu pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:025.051a: tam ārjunir dvādaśabhir yuyutsur daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:025.051c: tribhis tribhir draupadeyā dhṛṣṭaketuś ca vivyadhuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:025.051d-0198_02: pratyavidhyac charaiḥ sarvān bhagadattas tribhis tribhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:025.052c: saṃsyūta iva sūryasya raśmibhir jalado mahān
GE07mbh_07_u:025.053c: paricikṣepa tān nāgaḥ sa ripūn savyadakṣiṇam
GE07mbh_07_u:025.054a: gopāla iva daṇḍena yathā paśugaṇān vane
GE07mbh_07_u:025.054c: āveṣṭayata tāṃ senāṃ bhagadattas tathā muhuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:025.055b-0199_01: rajaś ca sumahad rājann antarikṣaṃ samācinot
GE07mbh_07_u:025.055b-0200_01: sa reṇumārgo viyati bhāti daṇḍa ivotthitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:025.056a: sa nāgarājaḥ pravarāṅkuśāhataḥ; purā sapakṣo 'drivaro yathā nṛpa
GE07mbh_07_u:025.056c: bhayaṃ tathā ripuṣu samādadhad bhṛśaṃ; vaṇiggaṇānāṃ kṣubhito yathārṇavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:025.057a: tato dhvanir dviradarathāśvapārthivair; bhayād dravadbhir janito 'tibhairavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:025.057c: kṣitiṃ viyad dyāṃ vidiśo diśas tathā; samāvṛṇot pārthiva saṃyuge tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:025.058a: sa tena nāgapravareṇa pārthivo; bhṛśaṃ jagāhe dviṣatām anīkinīm
GE07mbh_07_u:025.058c: purā suguptāṃ vibudhair ivāhave; virocano devavarūthinīm iva
GE07mbh_07_u:025.059a: bhṛśaṃ vavau jvalanasakho viyad rajaḥ; samāvṛṇon muhur api caiva sainikān
GE07mbh_07_u:025.059c: tam ekanāgaṃ gaṇaśo yathā gajāḥ; samantato drutam iva menire janāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:026.001a: yan māṃ pārthasya saṃgrāme karmāṇi paripṛcchasi
GE07mbh_07_u:026.001c: tac chṛṇuṣva mahārāja pārtho yad akaron mṛdhe
GE07mbh_07_u:026.002a: rajo dṛṣṭvā samudbhūtaṃ śrutvā ca gajanisvanam
GE07mbh_07_u:026.004c: prathamo vā dvitīyo vā pṛthivyām iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:026.006d-0203_03: dṛṣṭvā vinadya sahasā mama senāṃ pramṛdnati
GE07mbh_07_u:026.007a: na cāvābhyām ṛte 'nyo 'sti śaktas taṃ pratibādhitum
GE07mbh_07_u:026.009a: vacanād atha kṛṣṇas tu prayayau savyasācinaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:026.010a: taṃ prayāntaṃ tataḥ paścād āhvayanto mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:026.012c: āhūyamānasya ca tair abhavad dhṛdayaṃ dvidhā
GE07mbh_07_u:026.013a: kiṃ nu śreyaskaraṃ karma bhaved iti vicintayan
GE07mbh_07_u:026.013c: ito vā vinivarteyaṃ gaccheyaṃ vā yudhiṣṭhiram
GE07mbh_07_u:026.016a: sā hi duryodhanasyāsīn matiḥ karṇasya cobhayoḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:026.017a: sa tu saṃvartayām āsa dvaidhībhāvena pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:026.017c: rathena tu rathāgryāṇām akarot tāṃ mṛṣā tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:026.019a: naiva kuntīsutaḥ pārtho naiva kṛṣṇo janārdanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:026.019c: na hayā na ratho rājan dṛśyante sma śaraiś citāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:026.020a: yadā moham anuprāptaḥ sasvedaś ca janārdanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:026.020b-0206_01: tato janārdanaḥ pārthaṃ pratyuvāca hasann iva
GE07mbh_07_u:026.020b-0206_02: vajram astraṃ tu saṃdhāya jahi saṃśaptakān iha
GE07mbh_07_u:026.020c: tatas tān prāyaśaḥ pārtho vajrāstreṇa nijaghnivān
GE07mbh_07_u:026.021c: ketavo vājinaḥ sūtā rathinaś cāpatan kṣitau
GE07mbh_07_u:026.024c: saṃchinnā bāhavaḥ petur nṛṇāṃ bhallaiḥ kirīṭinā
GE07mbh_07_u:026.027a: kṣobhayantaṃ tadā senāṃ dviradaṃ nalinīm iva
GE07mbh_07_u:026.027c: dhanaṃjayaṃ bhūtagaṇāḥ sādhu sādhv ity apūjayan
GE07mbh_07_u:026.028a: dṛṣṭvā tat karma pārthasya vāsavasyeva mādhavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:026.028c: vismayaṃ paramaṃ gatvā talam āhatya pūjayat
GE07mbh_07_u:026.028d-0207_01: karmaitat pārtha śakreṇa yamena dhanadena ca
GE07mbh_07_u:026.028d-0207_02: duṣkaraṃ samare yat te kṛtam adyeti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:026.029a: tataḥ saṃśaptakān hatvā bhūyiṣṭhaṃ ye vyavasthitāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:027.002a: taṃ prayāntaṃ kuruśreṣṭhaṃ svāṃs trātuṃ droṇatāpitān
GE07mbh_07_u:027.003a: tataḥ śvetahayaḥ kṛṣṇam abravīd ajitaṃ jayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:027.004c: dvaidhībhūtaṃ mano me 'dya kṛtaṃ saṃśaptakair idam
GE07mbh_07_u:027.005a: kiṃ nu saṃśaptakān hanmi svān rakṣāmy ahitārditān
GE07mbh_07_u:027.005c: iti me tvaṃ mataṃ vettha tatra kiṃ sukṛtaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_07_u:027.006a: evam uktas tu dāśārhaḥ syandanaṃ pratyavartayat
GE07mbh_07_u:027.007c: dhvajaṃ dhanuś cāsya tathā kṣurābhyāṃ samakṛntata
GE07mbh_07_u:027.008c: sāśvaṃ sasūtaṃ tvaritaḥ pārthaḥ praiṣīd yamakṣayam
GE07mbh_07_u:027.010a: śaktiṃ tribhiḥ śaraiś chittvā tomaraṃ tribhir arjunaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:027.011c: rājaṃs tāvakasainyānāṃ nograṃ kaś cid avārayat
GE07mbh_07_u:027.012a: tato dhanaṃjayo bāṇais tata eva mahārathān
GE07mbh_07_u:027.012c: āyād vinighnan kauravyān dahan kakṣam ivānalaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:027.013a: tasya vegam asahyaṃ tu kuntīputrasya dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:027.013c: nāśaknuvaṃs te saṃsoḍhuṃ sparśam agner iva prajāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:027.016a: tad eva tava putrasya rājan durdyūtadevinaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:027.017a: tathā vikṣobhyamāṇā sā pārthena tava vāhinī
GE07mbh_07_u:027.018c: matiṃ kṛtvā raṇe kruddhā vīrā jayaparājaye
GE07mbh_07_u:027.019c: ārchat pārtho guruṃ bhāraṃ sarvabhārasaho yudhi
GE07mbh_07_u:027.020c: mṛdnīyāt tadvad āyastaḥ pārtho 'mṛdnāc camūṃ tava
GE07mbh_07_u:027.023a: kalpitābhyāṃ yathāśāstraṃ rathena ca gajena ca
GE07mbh_07_u:027.025a: sa cāpi śaravarṣaṃ tac charavarṣeṇa vāsaviḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:027.025d-0209_01: vavarṣa śaravarṣaṃ tu punar eva dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:027.026a: tataḥ prāgjyotiṣo rājā śaravarṣaṃ nivārya tat
GE07mbh_07_u:027.026c: śarair jaghne mahābāhuṃ pārthaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:027.028a: tam āpatantaṃ dviradaṃ dṛṣṭvā kruddham ivāntakam
GE07mbh_07_u:027.029c: sārohaṃ mṛtyusāt kartuṃ smaran dharmaṃ dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:027.030a: sa tu nāgo dviparathān hayāṃś cārujya māriṣa
GE07mbh_07_u:028.001a: tathā kruddhaḥ kim akarod bhagadattasya pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:028.001c: prāgjyotiṣo vā pārthasya tan me śaṃsa yathātatham
GE07mbh_07_u:028.003a: tathā hi śaravarṣāṇi pātayaty aniśaṃ prabho
GE07mbh_07_u:028.005c: nirbhidya devakīputraṃ kṣitiṃ jagmuḥ śarās tataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:028.006a: tasya pārtho dhanuś chittvā śarāvāpaṃ nihatya ca
GE07mbh_07_u:028.008a: tato nāgasya tad varma vyadhamat pākaśāsaniḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:028.008c: śarajālena sa babhau vyabhraḥ parvatarāḍ iva
GE07mbh_07_u:028.008c-0210_02: viśīrṇavarmā sa gajaḥ śaraiḥ subhṛśam arditaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:028.010a: tataś chatraṃ dhvajaṃ caiva chittvā rājño 'rjunaḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:028.013a: parivṛttaṃ kirīṭaṃ taṃ yamayann eva phalgunaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:028.013c: sudṛṣṭaḥ kriyatāṃ loka iti rājānam abravīt
GE07mbh_07_u:028.014a: evam uktas tu saṃkruddhaḥ śaravarṣeṇa pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_07_u:028.014d-0211_02: jagmatur naiva saṃmohaṃ cukṣubhāte na cācyutau
GE07mbh_07_u:028.015a: tasya pārtho dhanuś chittvā tūṇīrān saṃnikṛtya ca
GE07mbh_07_u:028.016d-0212_01: tad astram udyataṃ dṛṣṭvā vāsudevaḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_07_u:028.018a: vaijayanty abhavan mālā tad astraṃ keśavorasi
GE07mbh_07_u:028.019c: ity uktvā puṇḍarīkākṣa pratijñāṃ svāṃ na rakṣasi
GE07mbh_07_u:028.019d-0214_01: idam astram avasthāpya prāptaṃ māṃ devakīsuta
GE07mbh_07_u:028.020a: yady ahaṃ vyasanī vā syām aśakto vā nivāraṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:028.020c: tatas tvayaivaṃ kāryaṃ syān na tu kāryaṃ mayi sthite
GE07mbh_07_u:028.021c: śakto lokān imāñ jetuṃ tac cāpi viditaṃ tava
GE07mbh_07_u:028.022c: śṛṇu guhyam idaṃ pārtha yathā vṛttaṃ purānagha
GE07mbh_07_u:028.022d-0215_03: sa saṃgamya tayā sārdhaṃ prītas tasyai varaṃ dadau
GE07mbh_07_u:028.022d-0215_04: sā vavre viṣṇusadṛśaṃ putram astraṃ ca vaiṣṇavam
GE07mbh_07_u:028.022d-0215_05: babhūva ca sutas tasyāṃ narako nāma viśrutaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:028.022d-0215_06: astraṃ ca vaiṣṇavaṃ tasmai dadau nārāyaṇaḥ svayam
GE07mbh_07_u:028.022d-0216_03: nāsyāvadhyo 'sti loke 'smin mad anyaḥ kaś cid arjuna saṃjaya uvāca
GE07mbh_07_u:028.022d-0216_04: tasmān mayā kṛtaṃ hy etan mā te 'bhūd buddhir anyathā
GE07mbh_07_u:028.022d-0216_06: jahi prāgjyotiṣaṃ kṣipraṃ vākyaśeṣaṃ ca me śṛṇu
GE07mbh_07_u:028.024a: ekā mūrtis tapaścaryāṃ kurute me bhuvi sthitā
GE07mbh_07_u:028.025a: aparā kurute karma mānuṣaṃ lokam āśritā
GE07mbh_07_u:028.025c: śete caturthī tv aparā nidrāṃ varṣasahasrikām
GE07mbh_07_u:028.026c: varārhebhyo varāñ śreṣṭhāṃs tasmin kāle dadāti sā
GE07mbh_07_u:028.027a: taṃ tu kālam anuprāptaṃ viditvā pṛthivī tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:028.027c: prāyācata varaṃ yaṃ māṃ narakārthāya taṃ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_07_u:028.028a: devānām asurāṇāṃ ca avadhyas tanayo 'stu me
GE07mbh_07_u:028.028c: upeto vaiṣṇavāstreṇa tan me tvaṃ dātum arhasi
GE07mbh_07_u:028.029a: evaṃ varam ahaṃ śrutvā jagatyās tanaye tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:028.029c: amogham astram adadaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ tad ahaṃ purā
GE07mbh_07_u:028.030a: avocaṃ caitad astraṃ vai hy amoghaṃ bhavatu kṣame
GE07mbh_07_u:028.032a: tathety uktvā gatā devī kṛtakāmā manasvinī
GE07mbh_07_u:028.032c: sa cāpy āsīd durādharṣo narakaḥ śatrutāpanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:028.033a: tasmāt prāgjyotiṣaṃ prāptaṃ tad astraṃ pārtha māmakam
GE07mbh_07_u:028.033b-0218_02: sarvān samāgatān hanyāt kiṃ punas tvāṃ dhanaṃjaya
GE07mbh_07_u:028.033b-0218_03: bhogināṃ caiva durdharṣaṃ mayā dattaṃ surāsuraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:028.033b-0218_04: jahi prāgjyotiṣaṃ pārtha purā sarvān hinasti saḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:028.035c: yathāhaṃ jaghnivān pūrvaṃ hitārthaṃ narakaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:028.036a: evam uktas tataḥ pārthaḥ keśavena mahātmanā
GE07mbh_07_u:028.036d-0220_05: dakṣiṇāpi hatā rājan ghaṇṭā bāṇaiḥ kirīṭinaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:028.036d-0220_06: papāta dūram adhvānaṃ gatvā sūrya iva kṣitau
GE07mbh_07_u:028.037d-0221_02: avidhyad arjuno nāgaṃ kumbhayor antare bhṛśam
GE07mbh_07_u:028.038a: samāsādya tu taṃ nāgaṃ bāṇo vajra ivācalam
GE07mbh_07_u:028.038c: abhyagāt saha puṅkhena valmīkam iva pannagaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:028.038d-0222_01: sa karī bhagadattena preryamāṇaḥ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:028.038d-0222_02: na karoti vacas tasya daridrasyeva kāminī
GE07mbh_07_u:028.038d-0223_01: madhye vidīrṇas tasthau sa prāsyandata punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:028.039a: sa tu viṣṭabhya gātrāṇi dantābhyām avaniṃ yayau
GE07mbh_07_u:028.040b-0227_01: bibheda sakalo deho dvidhābhūto babhūva ha
GE07mbh_07_u:028.040b-0227_02: rājñā balavatā tena jānubhyāṃ dhārito raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:028.040b-0227_03: arjunaṃ prati yuddhe na cirakālaṃ dadhāra saḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:028.040b-0227_04: evaṃ yuddhaṃ tadā tena rājñā tena durātmanā
GE07mbh_07_u:028.041c: śarāsanaṃ śarāṃś caiva gatāsuḥ pramumoca ha
GE07mbh_07_u:028.042a: śirasas tasya vibhraṣṭaḥ papāta ca varāṅkuśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:028.043a: sa hemamālī tapanīyabhāṇḍāt; papāta nāgād girisaṃnikāśāt
GE07mbh_07_u:028.044a: nihatya taṃ narapatim indravikramaṃ; sakhāyam indrasya tathaindrir āhave
GE07mbh_07_u:028.044c: tato 'parāṃs tava jayakāṅkṣiṇo narān; babhañja vāyur balavān drumān iva
GE07mbh_07_u:029.001d-0228_06: trīṇi tejāṃsi tatraiva tretāgnir iva cādhvare
GE07mbh_07_u:029.001d-0228_07: bhagadattaṃ raṇe śūraṃ nihanyāt ko 'rjunaṃ vinā
GE07mbh_07_u:029.001d-0228_09: kṣatradharmaṃ vicintyājau dhig dhig ity eva cābravīt
GE07mbh_07_u:029.001d-0228_10: tam ādityasamaṃ kāntyā bhūmau nipatitaṃ divaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:029.001d-0228_11: prasamīkṣya tadā pārtho reṇunā tv avaguṇṭhitam
GE07mbh_07_u:029.003a: tau sametyārjunaṃ vīrau puraḥ paścāc ca dhanvinau
GE07mbh_07_u:029.004a: vṛṣakasya hayān sūtaṃ dhanuś chatraṃ rathaṃ dhvajam
GE07mbh_07_u:029.004c: tilaśo vyadhamat pārthaḥ saubalasya śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:029.007a: hatāśvāt tu rathāt tūrṇam avatīrya mahābhujaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:029.007c: āruroha rathaṃ bhrātur anyac ca dhanur ādade
GE07mbh_07_u:029.009c: bhṛśaṃ nijaghnatuḥ pārtham indraṃ vṛtrabalāv iva
GE07mbh_07_u:029.010a: labdhalakṣyau tu gāndhārāv ahatāṃ pāṇḍavaṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:029.013a: tayor dehau rathād bhūmiṃ gatau bandhujanapriyau
GE07mbh_07_u:029.013c: yaśo daśa diśaḥ puṇyaṃ gamayitvā vyavasthitau
GE07mbh_07_u:029.014c: bhṛśaṃ mumucur aśrūṇi putrās tava viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:029.015c: kṛṣṇau saṃmohayan māyāṃ vidadhe śakunis tataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:029.018a: cakrāṇi viśikhāḥ prāsā vividhāny āyudhāni ca
GE07mbh_07_u:029.018c: prapetuḥ sarvato digbhyaḥ pradigbhyaś cārjunaṃ prati
GE07mbh_07_u:029.020a: vividhāni ca rakṣāṃsi kṣudhitāny arjunaṃ prati
GE07mbh_07_u:029.022a: te hanyamānāḥ śūreṇa pravaraiḥ sāyakair dṛḍhaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:029.023a: tatas tamaḥ prādurabhūd arjunasya rathaṃ prati
GE07mbh_07_u:029.023c: tasmāc ca tamaso vācaḥ krūrāḥ pārtham abhartsayan

GE07mbh_07_u:029.041a: pitā sutaṃ tyajati suhṛdvaraṃ suhṛt; tathaiva putraḥ pitaraṃ śarāturaḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:030.001c: calitānāṃ drutānāṃ ca katham āsīn mano hi vaḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:030.003a: tathāpi tava putrasya priyakāmā viśāṃ pate

GE07mbh_07_u:030.006a: droṇaṃ droṇam iti krūrāḥ pāñcālāḥ samacodayan

GE07mbh_07_u:030.008c: tatra tatra sma pāñcālyo dhṛṣṭadyumno 'tha dhīyate
GE07mbh_07_u:030.009c: vīrāḥ samāsadan vīrān agacchan bhīravaḥ parān

GE07mbh_07_u:030.015a: ghūrṇato hi balaughasya divaṃ stabdhveva nisvanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:030.016c: droṇena caratā saṃkhye prabhagnāni śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:030.018a: tad adbhutam abhūd yuddhaṃ droṇapāñcālyayos tadā

GE07mbh_07_u:030.021a: nīla kiṃ bahubhir dagdhais tava yodhaiḥ śarārciṣā
GE07mbh_07_u:030.021c: mayaikena hi yudhyasva kruddhaḥ prahara cāśugaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:030.023a: tenātividdhaḥ sahasā drauṇir bhallaiḥ śitais tribhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:030.023c: dhanur dhvajaṃ ca chatraṃ ca dviṣataḥ sa nyakṛntata

GE07mbh_07_u:030.028c: kathaṃ no vāsavis trāyāc chatrubhya iti māriṣa
GE07mbh_07_u:030.029a: dakṣiṇena tu senāyāḥ kurute kadanaṃ balī
GE07mbh_07_u:031.001c: so 'bhinad bāhlikaṃ ṣaṣṭyā karṇaṃ ca daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:031.002a: tasya droṇaḥ śitair bāṇais tīkṣṇadhārair ayasmayaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:031.002c: jīvitāntam abhiprepsur marmaṇy āśu jaghāna ha
GE07mbh_07_u:031.003a: karṇo dvādaśabhir bāṇair aśvatthāmā ca saptabhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:031.003c: ṣaḍbhir duryodhano rājā tata enam avākirat
GE07mbh_07_u:031.004c: droṇaṃ pañcāśateṣūṇāṃ karṇaṃ ca daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:031.010c: bāhyaṃ mṛtyubhayaṃ kṛtvā tāvakāḥ pāṇḍavān yayuḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:031.024c: ity evam uccarantyaḥ sma śrūyante vividhā giraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:031.025c: upāśāmyad rajo bhaumaṃ bhīrūn kaśmalam āviśat
GE07mbh_07_u:031.025d-0236_01: cakreṇa cakram āsādya vīro vīrasya saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:031.026c: nakhair dantaiś ca śūrāṇam advīpe dvīpam icchatām

GE07mbh_07_u:031.029d-0237_01: bhītaś cānya udakrośad anyo bhīta upādravat
GE07mbh_07_u:031.029d-0237_02: asaṃprāptasya taṃ deśam anyo jīvitam ādade
GE07mbh_07_u:031.031a: tathaiva rathinaṃ nāgaḥ kṣaran girir ivārujat

GE07mbh_07_u:031.037a: tato droṇaḥ kṛpaḥ karṇo drauṇī rājā jayadrathaḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:031.041a: etasminn antare jiṣṇur hatvā saṃśaptakān balī
GE07mbh_07_u:031.041c: abyayāt tatra yatra sma droṇaḥ pāṇḍūn pramardati
GE07mbh_07_u:031.047a: ke cid ārtasvaraṃ cakrur vinedur apare punaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:031.048a: teṣām utpatatāṃ kāṃś cit patitāṃś ca parāṅmukhān

GE07mbh_07_u:031.053a: dhṛṣṭadyumnaś ca bhīmaś ca sātyakiś ca mahārathaḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:031.058c: karṇād avarajaṃ bāṇair jaghāna niśitais tribhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:031.059a: tataḥ śatruṃjayaṃ hatvā pārthaḥ ṣaḍbhir ajihmagaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:031.059c: jahāra sadyo bhallena vipāṭasya śiro rathāt

GE07mbh_07_u:031.062a: punaḥ svaratham āsthāya dhanur ādāya cāparam

GE07mbh_07_u:031.064a: tataḥ svaratham āsthāya pāñcālyo 'nyac ca kārmukam
GE07mbh_07_u:031.064c: ādāya karṇaṃ vivyādha trisaptatyā nadan raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:031.066c: punaḥ karṇaṃ tribhir bāṇair bāhvor urasi cārpayat
GE07mbh_07_u:031.067a: tato duryodhano droṇo rājā caiva jayadrathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:031.068a: dhṛṣṭadyumnaś ca bhīmaś ca saubhadro 'rjuna eva ca
GE07mbh_07_u:031.068c: nakulaḥ sahadevaś ca sātyakiṃ jugupū raṇe

GE07mbh_07_u:031.071a: aśvair aśvā gajair nāgā rathino rathibhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_07_u:031.073c: gajair gajā rathibhir udāyudhā rathā; hayair hayāḥ pattigaṇaiś ca pattayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:031.074a: rathair dvipā dviradavarair mahāhayā; hayair narā vararathibhiś ca vājinaḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:031.077a: tato bale bhṛśalulite parasparaṃ; nirīkṣamāṇe rudhiraughasaṃplute
GE07mbh_07_u:031.077c: divākare 'staṃgirim āsthite śanair; ubhe prayāte śibirāya bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:032.001c: droṇe ca moghasaṃkalpe rakṣite ca yudhiṣṭhire
GE07mbh_07_u:032.004f-0243_02: ye pradhānā hatās teṣāṃ vairāgyaṃ samupāśritāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:032.004f-0243_03: nārjunaś ca samo vīrye ślāghyamānāḥ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:032.005c: praṇayād abhimānāc ca dviṣadvṛddhyā ca durmanāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:032.006c: tathā hi nāgrahīḥ prāptaṃ samīpe 'dya yudhiṣṭhiram
GE07mbh_07_u:032.007a: icchatas te na mucyeta cakṣuḥprāpto raṇe ripuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:032.008a: varaṃ dattvā mama prītaḥ paścād vikṛtavān asi
GE07mbh_07_u:032.008c: āśābhaṅgaṃ na kurvanti bhaktasyāryāḥ kathaṃ cana

GE07mbh_07_u:032.014c: tena hy upāttaṃ balavat sarvajñānam itas tataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:032.015a: droṇena vyāhṛte tv evaṃ saṃśaptakagaṇāḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:032.015c: āhvayann arjunaṃ saṃkhye dakṣiṇām abhito diśam
GE07mbh_07_u:032.016c: tādṛśo yādṛśo nānyaḥ śruto dṛṣṭo 'pi vā kva cit

GE07mbh_07_u:032.018a: taṃ cābhimanyur vacanāt pitur jyeṣṭhasya bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:032.019a: sa kṛtvā duṣkaraṃ karma hatvā vīrān sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:032.019b-0247_02: mahārathaṃ śalyaputraṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ ca tava priyam
GE07mbh_07_u:032.021c: raṇe vinihataṃ śrutvā bhṛśaṃ me dīryate manaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:032.022c: yatra rājyepsavaḥ śūrā bāle śastram apātayan
GE07mbh_07_u:032.023c: kṛtāstrā bahavo jaghnur brūhi gāvalgaṇe katham
GE07mbh_07_u:032.024c: vikrīḍitaṃ yathā saṃkhye tan mamācakṣva saṃjaya
GE07mbh_07_u:032.025a: yan māṃ pṛcchasi rājendra saubhadrasya nipātanam
GE07mbh_07_u:032.025c: tat te kārtsnyena vakṣyāmi śṛṇu rājan samāhitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:032.025f-0250_01: ārugṇāś ca yathā vīrā duḥsādhyāś cāpi viplave
GE07mbh_07_u:033.001c: sakṛṣṇāḥ pāṇḍavāḥ pañca devair api durāsadāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:033.002c: naiva bhūto na bhavitā kṛṣṇatulyaguṇaḥ pumān
GE07mbh_07_u:033.003c: sadaiva tridivaṃ prāpto rājā kila yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:033.004a: yugānte cāntako rājañ jāmadagnyaś ca vīryavān

GE07mbh_07_u:033.006c: nakule 'prātirūpyaṃ ca śauryaṃ ca niyatāni ṣaṭ śrutagāmbhīryamādhuryasattvavīryaparākramaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:033.008a: ye ca kṛṣṇe guṇāḥ sphītāḥ pāṇḍaveṣu ca ye guṇāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:033.011c: śrotum icchāmi kārtsnyena katham āyodhane hataḥ vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:033.011d-0251_02: vistareṇa mahārāja paryapṛcchat sa saṃjayam saṃjaya uvāca
GE07mbh_07_u:033.012-0252_01: sthiro bhava mahārāja śokaṃ dhāraya durdharam
GE07mbh_07_u:033.012-0252_02: mahāntaṃ baṃdhunāśaṃ te kathayiṣyāmi tac chṛṇu
GE07mbh_07_u:033.014c: sarve raktapatākāś ca sarve vai hemamālinaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:033.016c: anyonyaṃ spardhamānāś ca anyonyasya hite ratāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:033.020d-0258_02: tāvakānāṃ pareṣāṃ ca mṛtyuṃ kṛtvā nivartanam
GE07mbh_07_u:034.002a: sātyakiś cekitānaś ca dhṛṣṭadyumnaś ca pārṣataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:034.002c: kuntibhojaś ca vikrānto drupadaś ca mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:034.003a: ārjuniḥ kṣatradharmā ca bṛhatkṣatraś ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_07_u:034.004c: uttamaujāś ca durdharṣo virāṭaś ca mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:034.005a: draupadeyāś ca saṃrabdhāḥ śaiśupāliś ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_07_u:034.005c: kekayāś ca mahāvīryāḥ sṛñjayāś ca sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:034.006a: ete cānye ca sagaṇāḥ kṛtāstrā yuddhadurmadāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:034.007a: samavetāṃs tu tān sarvān bhāradvājo 'pi vīryavān
GE07mbh_07_u:034.008c: droṇaṃ te nābhyavartanta velām iva jalāśayāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:034.009c: na śekuḥ pramukhe sthātuṃ bhāradvājasya pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:034.010a: tad adbhutam apaśyāma droṇasya bhujayor balam
GE07mbh_07_u:034.010c: yad enaṃ nābhyavartanta pāñcālāḥ sṛñjayaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_07_u:034.011a: tam āyāntam abhikruddhaṃ droṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:034.012a: aśakyaṃ tu tam anyena droṇaṃ matvā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:034.014a: etya no nārjuno garhed yathā tāta tathā kuru
GE07mbh_07_u:034.014c: cakravyūhasya na vayaṃ vidma bhedaṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_07_u:034.015a: tvaṃ vārjuno vā kṛṣṇo vā bhindyāt pradyumna eva vā
GE07mbh_07_u:034.016a: abhimanyo varaṃ tāta yācatāṃ dātum arhasi
GE07mbh_07_u:034.016c: pitṝṇāṃ mātulānāṃ ca sainyānāṃ caiva sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:034.017a: dhanaṃjayo hi nas tāta garhayed etya saṃyugāt
GE07mbh_07_u:034.017c: kṣipram astraṃ samādāya droṇānīkaṃ viśātaya abhimanyur uvāca
GE07mbh_07_u:034.018-0259_01: śṛṇu rājan mahābāho vacanaṃ mama suvrata
GE07mbh_07_u:034.018-0259_03: mukhāt kṛṣṇasya rājendra śrutam asmi mayā prabho
GE07mbh_07_u:034.018c: pitṝṇāṃ jayam ākāṅkṣann avagāhe bhinadmi ca
GE07mbh_07_u:034.019a: upadiṣṭo hi me pitrā yogo 'nīkasya bhedane
GE07mbh_07_u:034.019c: notsahe tu vinirgantum ahaṃ kasyāṃ cid āpadi
GE07mbh_07_u:034.020a: bhindhy anīkaṃ yudhā śreṣṭha dvāraṃ saṃjanayasva
GE07mbh_07_u:034.020c: vayaṃ tvānugamiṣyāmo yena tvaṃ tāta yāsyasi
GE07mbh_07_u:034.021a: dhanaṃjayasamaṃ yuddhe tvāṃ vayaṃ tāta saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:034.022c: pāñcālāḥ kekayā matsyās tathā sarve prabhadrakāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:034.023a: sakṛd bhinnaṃ tvayā vyūhaṃ tatra tatra punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:034.023c: vayaṃ pradhvaṃsayiṣyāmo nighnamānā varān varān abhimanyur uvāca
GE07mbh_07_u:034.024-0260_01: yāto 'ham arjunād rājan subhadrāyāṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_07_u:034.024-0260_04: yaiḥ kṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ karma pāṇḍavānāṃ mahātmanām
GE07mbh_07_u:034.024-0260_05: jyeṣṭhā mātā madīyā yat sabhāṃ nītā durāsadaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:034.024-0260_07: pāñcālāṃ prati rājendra yat kṛtaṃ duṣṭakāribhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:034.024-0260_08: tat sarvaṃ cādya tadvyūhe darśayiṣyāmi lāghavāt
GE07mbh_07_u:034.025a: tat karmādya kariṣyāmi hitaṃ yad vaṃśayor dvayoḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:034.025c: mātulasya ca yā prītir bhaviṣyati pituś ca me
GE07mbh_07_u:034.026c: adya drakṣyanti bhūtāni dviṣatsainyāni vai mayā
GE07mbh_07_u:034.026d-0262_01: nāhaṃ pārthena jātaḥ syāṃ na ca jātaḥ subhadrayā
GE07mbh_07_u:034.026d-0262_02: yadi me saṃyuge kaś cij jīvito nādya mucyate
GE07mbh_07_u:034.026d-0262_04: na karomy aṣṭadhā yuddhe na bhavāmy arjunātmajaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:034.027a: evaṃ te bhāṣamāṇasya balaṃ saubhadra vardhatām
GE07mbh_07_u:034.027c: yas tvam utsahase bhettuṃ droṇānīkaṃ sudurbhidam
GE07mbh_07_u:034.029a: tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā sa yantāram acodayat
GE07mbh_07_u:035.001a: saubhadras tu vacaḥ śrutvā dharmarājasya dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:035.002a: tena saṃcodyamānas tu yāhi yāhīti sārathiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:035.002c: pratyuvāca tato rājann abhimanyum idaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:035.003c: saṃpradhārya kṣamaṃ buddhyā tatas tvaṃ yoddhum arhasi
GE07mbh_07_u:035.004a: ācāryo hi kṛtī droṇaḥ paramāstre kṛtaśramaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:035.004d-0263_02: tvaṃ tu bālaḥ sa balavān saṃgrāmāṇām akovidaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:035.005c: sārathe ko nv ayaṃ droṇaḥ samagraṃ kṣatram eva vā
GE07mbh_07_u:035.006c: yodhayeyaṃ raṇamukhe na me kṣatre 'dya vismayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:035.006e: na mamaitad dviṣatsainyaṃ kalām arhati ṣoḍaśīm
GE07mbh_07_u:035.007-0267_01: evam apy ucyamānaḥ sa sārathis taṃ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:035.007-0267_02: vīra te tena mā yuddham iti saubhadram abravīt
GE07mbh_07_u:035.007a: api viśvajitaṃ viṣṇuṃ mātulaṃ prāpya sūtaja
GE07mbh_07_u:035.007c: pitaraṃ cārjunaṃ saṃkhye na bhīr mām upayāsyati
GE07mbh_07_u:035.009a: tataḥ saṃcodayām āsa hayān asya trihāyanān
GE07mbh_07_u:035.011c: abhyavartanta kauravyāḥ pāṇḍavāś ca tam anvayuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:035.012c: yuyutsayā droṇamukhān mahārathān; samāsadat siṃhaśiśur yathā gajān
GE07mbh_07_u:035.013c: āsīd gāṅga ivāvarto muhūrtam udadher iva
GE07mbh_07_u:035.015c: droṇasya miṣato vyūhaṃ bhittvā prāviśad ārjuniḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:035.016a: taṃ praviṣṭaṃ parān ghnantaṃ śatrumadhye mahābalam
GE07mbh_07_u:035.017c: huṃkāraiḥ siṃhanādaiś ca tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti nisvanaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:035.018a: ghorair halahalāśabdair mā gās tiṣṭhaihi mām iti
GE07mbh_07_u:035.018c: asāv aham amutreti pravadanto muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:035.020a: teṣām āpatatāṃ vīraḥ pūrvaṃ śīghram atho dṛḍham
GE07mbh_07_u:035.021a: te hanyamānāś ca tathā nānāliṅgaiḥ śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:035.021c: abhipetus tam evājau śalabhā iva pāvakam
GE07mbh_07_u:035.022a: tatas teṣāṃ śarīraiś ca śarīrāvayavaiś ca saḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:035.022c: saṃtastāra kṣitiṃ kṣipraṃ kuśair vedim ivādhvare
GE07mbh_07_u:035.034c: tūṇān varmāṇy atho kakṣyā graiveyān atha kambalān
GE07mbh_07_u:035.040a: eko viṣṇur ivācintyaḥ kṛtvā prāk karma duṣkaram
GE07mbh_07_u:035.040c: tathā vimathitaṃ tena tryaṅgaṃ tava balaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_07_u:035.040d-0270_02: kṛtvā karma raṇe 'sahyaṃ parair ārjunir āhave
GE07mbh_07_u:035.040e: vyahanat sa padātyoghāṃs tvadīyān eva bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:035.041a: evam ekena tāṃ senāṃ saubhadreṇa śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:035.042a: tvadīyās tava putrāś ca vīkṣamāṇā diśo daśa
GE07mbh_07_u:036.001c: duryodhano bhṛśaṃ kruddhaḥ svayaṃ saubhadram abhyayāt
GE07mbh_07_u:036.002a: tato rājānam āvṛttaṃ saubhadraṃ prati saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:036.003a: purābhimanyur lakṣyaṃ naḥ paśyatāṃ hanti vīryavān
GE07mbh_07_u:036.003c: tam ādravata mā bhaiṣṭa kṣipraṃ rakṣata kauravam
GE07mbh_07_u:036.003d-0271_02: saubhadro ayam āyāto asmāñ jetuṃ mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:036.005a: droṇo drauṇiḥ kṛpaḥ karṇaḥ kṛtavarmā ca saubalaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:036.006a: pauravo vṛṣasenaś ca visṛjantaḥ śitāñ śarān
GE07mbh_07_u:036.011a: tāny antarikṣe ciccheda pautras tava śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:036.011c: tāṃś caiva prativivyādha tad adbhutam ivābhavat
GE07mbh_07_u:036.011d-0272_01: tato rathāḥ padātyoghāḥ kuñjarāḥ sādinaś ca ha
GE07mbh_07_u:036.012a: tatas te kopitās tena śarair āśīviṣopamaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:036.013a: samudram iva paryastaṃ tvadīyaṃ tad balārṇavam
GE07mbh_07_u:036.014c: abhimanyoḥ pareṣāṃ ca nāsīt kaś cit parāṅmukhaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:036.015a: tasmiṃs tu ghore saṃgrāme vartamāne bhayaṃkare
GE07mbh_07_u:036.017a: viviṃśatis tu viṃśatyā kṛtavarmā ca saptabhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:036.018a: bhūriśravās tribhir bāṇair madreśaḥ ṣaḍbhir āśugaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:036.018c: dvābhyāṃ śarābhyāṃ śakunis tribhir duryodhano nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:036.019a: sa tu tān prativivyādha tribhis tribhir ajihmagaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:036.021e: vivyādha cainaṃ daśabhir bāṇais tiṣṭheti cābravīt
GE07mbh_07_u:036.022a: tasyābhimanyur daśabhir bāṇaiḥ sūtaṃ hayān dhvajam
GE07mbh_07_u:036.024a: tataḥ karṇaḥ kṛpo droṇo drauṇir gāndhārarāṭ śalaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:036.027a: tasya bhittvā tanutrāṇaṃ dehaṃ nirbhidya cāśugaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:036.027c: prāviśad dharaṇīṃ rājan valmīkam iva pannagaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:036.029c: kuṇḍabhediṃ ca saṃkruddhas tribhis trīn avadhīd balī
GE07mbh_07_u:036.030c: aśvatthāmā ca viṃśatyā kṛtavarmā ca saptabhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:036.033c: śalyo rājan rathopasthe niṣasāda mumoha ca
GE07mbh_07_u:036.034a: taṃ hi viddhaṃ tathā dṛṣṭvā saubhadreṇa yaśasvinā
GE07mbh_07_u:036.035c: tvadīyāś ca palāyante mṛgāḥ siṃhārditā iva
GE07mbh_07_u:036.035d-0274_07: yuddhe ca tasmin sa mahābalo ripūṃś
GE07mbh_07_u:036.035d-0275_02: evaṃ śalyo vimṛditas tava pautreṇa bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:036.036c: avanitalagataiś ca bhūtasaṃghair; ativibabhau hutabhug yathājyasiktaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:037.001c: ārjuniṃ māmakāḥ sarve ke tv enaṃ samavākiran
GE07mbh_07_u:037.002a: śṛṇu rājan kumārasya raṇe vikrīḍitaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_07_u:037.003c: śalyād avarajaḥ kruddhaḥ kiran bāṇān samabhyayāt
GE07mbh_07_u:037.004a: sa viddhvā daśabhir bāṇaiḥ sāśvayantāram ārjunim
GE07mbh_07_u:037.006a: cakre yugeṣāṃ tūṇīrān anukarṣaṃ ca sāyakaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:037.006e: vyadhamal lāghavāt tac ca dadṛśe nāsya kaś cana
GE07mbh_07_u:037.008a: ārjuneḥ karma tad dṛṣṭva praṇeduś ca samantataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:037.008c: nādena sarvabhūtāni sādhu sādhv iti bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:037.010c: rathair aśvair gajaiś cānye pādātaiś ca balotkaṭāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:037.012c: bruvantaś ca na no jīvan mokṣyase jīvatām iti
GE07mbh_07_u:037.013a: tāṃs tathā bruvato dṛṣṭvā saubhadraḥ prahasann iva
GE07mbh_07_u:037.013c: yo yaḥ sma prāharat pūrvaṃ taṃ taṃ vivyādha patribhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:037.014a: saṃdarśayiṣyann astrāṇi citrāṇi ca laghūni ca
GE07mbh_07_u:037.015a: vāsudevād upāttaṃ yad yad astraṃ ca dhanaṃjayāt
GE07mbh_07_u:037.016a: dūram asyan guruṃ bhāraṃ sādhayaṃś ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:037.017c: tamo ghnataḥ sudīptasya savitur maṇḍalaṃ yathā
GE07mbh_07_u:037.018a: jyāśabdaḥ śuśruve tasya talaśabdaś ca dāruṇaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:037.021c: mumoca śataśaḥ kruddho gabhastīn iva bhāskaraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:037.022a: kṣuraprair vatsadantaiś ca vipāṭhaiś ca mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:037.022d-0276_01: tāṃs tathā dravato dṛṣṭvā saubhadraḥ prahasann iva
GE07mbh_07_u:037.023c: tatas tat sainyam abhavad vimukhaṃ śarapīḍitam
GE07mbh_07_u:038.001a: dvaidhībhavati me cittaṃ hriyā tuṣṭyā ca saṃjaya
GE07mbh_07_u:038.001c: mama putrasya yat sainyaṃ saubhadraḥ samavārayat
GE07mbh_07_u:038.001d-0278_01: yat sainyaṃ mama putrasya mama pautraḥ prabādhate
GE07mbh_07_u:038.002a: vistareṇaiva me śaṃsa sarvaṃ gāvalgaṇe punaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:038.003c: ekasya ca bahūnāṃ ca yathāsīt tumulo raṇaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:038.004c: rathastho rathinaḥ sarvāṃs tāvakān apy aharṣayat
GE07mbh_07_u:038.005a: droṇaṃ karṇaṃ kṛpaṃ śalyaṃ drauṇiṃ bhojaṃ bṛhadbalam
GE07mbh_07_u:038.010a: ghaṭṭayann iva marmāṇi tava putrasya māriṣa
GE07mbh_07_u:038.011a: eṣa gacchati saubhadraḥ pārthānām agrato yuvā
GE07mbh_07_u:038.011c: nandayan suhṛdaḥ sarvān rājānaṃ ca yudhiṣṭhiram
GE07mbh_07_u:038.012a: nakulaṃ sahadevaṃ ca bhīmasenaṃ ca pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_07_u:038.012c: bandhūn saṃbandhinaś cānyān madhyasthān suhṛdas tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:038.013a: nāsya yuddhe samaṃ manye kaṃ cid anyaṃ dhanurdharam
GE07mbh_07_u:038.013c: icchan hanyād imāṃ senāṃ kimartham api necchati
GE07mbh_07_u:038.014c: ārjuniṃ prati saṃkruddho droṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā smayann iva
GE07mbh_07_u:038.015a: atha duryodhanaḥ karṇam abravīd bāhlikaṃ kṛpam
GE07mbh_07_u:038.015c: duḥsāsanaṃ madrarājaṃ tāṃs tāṃś cānyān mahārathān
GE07mbh_07_u:038.017a: na hy asya samare mucyed antako 'py ātatāyinaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:038.017c: kim aṅga punar evānyo martyaḥ satyaṃ bravīmi vaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:038.018a: arjunasya sutaṃ tv eṣa śiṣyatvād abhirakṣati
GE07mbh_07_u:038.018c: putrāḥ śiṣyāś ca dayitās tad apatyaṃ ca dharmiṇām
GE07mbh_07_u:038.020a: evam uktās tu te rājñā sātvatīputram abhyayuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:038.021a: duḥśāsanas tu tac chrutvā duryodhanavacas tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:038.021d-0280_01: duḥśāsanas tu saṃrabdhaṃ jñātvā bhrātaram agrajam
GE07mbh_07_u:038.021d-0280_02: tān nivartya rathodārān atha bhrātaram abravīt
GE07mbh_07_u:038.022a: aham enaṃ haniṣyāmi mahārāja bravīmi te
GE07mbh_07_u:038.022e: grasiṣyāmy adya saubhadraṃ yathā rāhur divākaram
GE07mbh_07_u:038.023a: utkruśya cābravīd vākyaṃ kururājam idaṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:038.023c: śrutvā kṛṣṇau mayā grastaṃ saubhadram atimāninau
GE07mbh_07_u:038.024a: tau ca śrutvā mṛtau vyaktaṃ pāṇḍoḥ kṣetrodbhavāḥ sutāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:038.025a: tasmād asmin hate śatrau hatāḥ sarve 'hitās tava
GE07mbh_07_u:038.025c: śivena dhyāhi mā rājann eṣa hanmi ripuṃ tava
GE07mbh_07_u:038.026a: evam uktvā nadan rājan putro duḥśāsanas tava
GE07mbh_07_u:038.026b-0281_01: duḥśāsanas tathety ukto bhrātrā tava sutas tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:038.027a: tam abhikruddham āyāntaṃ tava putram ariṃdamaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:038.028a: duḥśāsanas tu saṃkruddhaḥ prabhinna iva kuñjaraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:038.028c: ayodhayata saubhadram abhimanyuś ca taṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:038.030c: ninadam atibhṛśaṃ narāḥ pracakrur; lavaṇajalodbhavasiṃhanādamiśram saṃjaya uvāca
GE07mbh_07_u:039.002a: diṣṭyā paśyāmi saṃgrāme māninaṃ śatrum āgatam
GE07mbh_07_u:039.003a: yat sabhāyāṃ tvayā rājño dhṛtarāṣṭrasya śṛṇvataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:039.003b-0283_02: śṛṇu me vacanaṃ tāta pitṛvyo 'si mahāmate
GE07mbh_07_u:039.003b-0283_03: sauhṛdaṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ kṛtvā sarvair eva durātmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:039.003b-0283_05: suhṛdbhir bhujyate rājyaṃ suhṛdbhir bhujyate sukham
GE07mbh_07_u:039.003b-0283_06: vinā suhṛdbhir bhogāś ca aihikāmutrikaṃ ca yat
GE07mbh_07_u:039.003b-0283_07: mithyābhūtaṃ ca tat sarvaṃ suhṛdbhir varjitaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:039.003b-0283_09: teṣāṃ tvam agraṇīḥ pāpa yena sā drupadātmajā
GE07mbh_07_u:039.003b-0283_10: ānītā ca sabhāṃ sādhvī tasyedaṃ karmaṇaḥ phalam
GE07mbh_07_u:039.003f-0285_01: tat tvayedam anuprāptaṃ tasya kopān mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:039.005c: tat tvām idam anuprāptaṃ tat kopād vai mahātmanām
GE07mbh_07_u:039.006a: sadyaś cogram adharmasya phalaṃ prāpnuhi durmate
GE07mbh_07_u:039.006c: śāsitāsmy adya te bāṇaiḥ sarvasainyasya paśyataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:039.007a: adyāham anṛṇas tasya kopasya bhavitā raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:039.007c: amarṣitāyāḥ kṛṣṇāyāḥ kāṅkṣitasya ca me pituḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:039.008a: adya kauravya bhīmasya bhavitāsmy anṛṇo yudhi
GE07mbh_07_u:039.008c: na hi me mokṣyase jīvan yadi notsṛjase raṇam
GE07mbh_07_u:039.010a: tasyoras tūrṇam āsādya jatrudeśe vibhidya tam
GE07mbh_07_u:039.010b-0286_01: tena taṃ jatrudeśe vai viddhvā parapuraṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:039.010b-0287_01: jagāma saha puṅkhena valmīkam iva pannagaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:039.013a: pāṇḍavā draupadeyāś ca virāṭaś ca samīkṣya tam
GE07mbh_07_u:039.019a: tato 'bhavan mahad yuddhaṃ tvadīyānāṃ paraiḥ saha
GE07mbh_07_u:039.021b-0290_01: atha caite susaṃrabdhāḥ siṃhā iva balotkaṭāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:039.021d-0291_03: enaṃ vadhiṣyāmi ripuṃ yathā vṛtraṃ śacīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:039.021d-0291_04: evam uktvā tu rādheyo rathārūḍho mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:039.021d-0291_05: yayau yoddhuṃ mahāvīraḥ kurūṇāṃ tatra paśyatām
GE07mbh_07_u:039.022a: tataḥ karṇaḥ śarais tīkṣṇair abhimanyuṃ durāsadam
GE07mbh_07_u:039.024c: avidhyat tvarito rājan droṇaṃ prepsur mahāmanāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:039.025a: taṃ tadā nāśakat kaś cid droṇād vārayituṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:039.029c: chittvā dhanūṃṣi śūrāṇām ārjuniḥ karṇam ārdayat
GE07mbh_07_u:039.029d-0292_04: asaṃbhrāntaś ca tān sarvān agṛhṇāt phalgunātmajaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:039.029e: sa dhvajaṃ kārmukaṃ cāsya chittvā bhūmau nyapātayat
GE07mbh_07_u:039.030a: tataḥ kṛcchragataṃ karṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā karṇād anantaraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:039.030c: saubhadram abhyayāt tūrṇaṃ dṛḍham udyamya kārmukam
GE07mbh_07_u:039.031a: tata uccukruśuḥ pārthās teṣāṃ cānucarā janāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:039.031c: vāditrāṇi ca saṃjaghnuḥ saubhadraṃ cāpi tuṣṭuvuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:040.001a: so 'bhigarjan dhanuṣpāṇir jyāṃ vikarṣan punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:040.004c: śiraḥ pracyāvayām āsa sa rathāt prāpatad bhuvi
GE07mbh_07_u:040.005c: bhrātaraṃ nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā rājan karṇo vyathāṃ yayau
GE07mbh_07_u:040.005d-006_0003: aprāptān eva tān sarvāṃś ciccheda laghuhastavat
GE07mbh_07_u:040.005d-006_0005: hayāṃś ca jaghne tvarito dhvajaṃ sārathinā saha
GE07mbh_07_u:040.005d-006_0006: rādheyaṃ virathaṃ kṛtvā saubhadro vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_07_u:040.005d-006_0008: anyaṃ rathaṃ samāruhya yudhyasva ca mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:040.005d-006_0010: pāṇḍavaiḥ saha paiśunyaṃ nitya tvaṃ kṛtavān asi
GE07mbh_07_u:040.005d-006_0011: sabhāṃ nītvā ca pāñcālī vivastrā kāritā tvayā
GE07mbh_07_u:040.005d-006_0013: dṛṣṭāni tatra yuṣmābhiḥ kurubhiś ca durātmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:040.005d-006_0016: kulīnā ye ca rājāno dharmiṣṭhāḥ satyasaṃgarāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:040.005d-006_0017: cakrākhyaṃ ca na kurvanti vyūhaṃ pāpiṣṭhakāritam
GE07mbh_07_u:040.005d-006_0018: krauñcāḥ suparṇā haṃsāhvā muśalā gāruḍās tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:040.005d-006_0019: ete vyūhāś ca śūrāṇāṃ dharmiṣṭhānāṃ mahātmanām
GE07mbh_07_u:040.005d-006_0020: yūyaṃ daityāṃśasaṃbhūtāḥ sarve tatra na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:040.005d-006_0021: ity evam uktvā sa tadā mahātmā
GE07mbh_07_u:040.008d-0295_01: tiṣṭha karṇa maheṣvāsa kṛpa duryodhaneti ca
GE07mbh_07_u:040.008d-0295_02: droṇasya krośato rājaṃs tad anīkam abhajyata
GE07mbh_07_u:040.009a: śalabhair iva cākāśe dhārābhir iva cāvṛte
GE07mbh_07_u:040.009c: abhimanyoḥ śarai rājan na prājñāyata kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_07_u:040.010a: tāvakānāṃ tu yodhānāṃ vadhyatāṃ niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:040.010c: anyatra saindhavād rājan na sma kaś cid atiṣṭhata
GE07mbh_07_u:040.011a: saubhadras tu tataḥ śaṅkhaṃ pradhmāpya puruṣarṣabhaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:040.012a: sa kakṣe 'gnir ivotsṛṣṭo nirdahaṃs tarasā ripūn
GE07mbh_07_u:040.015a: te ghorā raudrakarmāṇo vipāṭhāḥ pṛthavaḥ śitāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:040.017a: śarāś cāpāni khaḍgāś ca śarīrāṇi śirāṃsi ca
GE07mbh_07_u:040.018c: akṣair vimathitaiś cakrair bhagnaiś ca bahudhā rathaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:040.019a: nihataiḥ kṣatriyair aśvair vāraṇaiś ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:040.020e: sa śabdo bharataśreṣṭha diśaḥ sarvā vyanādayat
GE07mbh_07_u:040.021c: vyacarat sa diśaḥ sarvāḥ pradiśaś cāhitān rujan
GE07mbh_07_u:041.002c: api yaudhiṣṭhirāt sainyāt kaś cid anvapatad rathī
GE07mbh_07_u:041.003c: dhṛṣṭadyumno virāṭaś ca drupadaś ca sakekayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:041.003e: dhṛṣṭaketuś ca saṃrabdho matsyāś cānvapatan raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:041.003f-0298_01: tenaiva tu pathā yātāḥ pitaro mātulaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_07_u:041.004c: tān dṛṣṭvā dravataḥ śūrāṃs tvadīyā vimukhābhavan
GE07mbh_07_u:041.005a: tatas tad vimukhaṃ dṛṣṭvā tava sūnor mahad balam
GE07mbh_07_u:041.008c: yad ekaḥ pāṇḍavān kruddhān putragṛddhīn avārayat
GE07mbh_07_u:041.009a: atyadbhutam idaṃ manye balaṃ śauryaṃ ca saindhave
GE07mbh_07_u:041.009c: tad asya brūhi me vīryaṃ karma cāgryaṃ mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:041.010a: kiṃ dattaṃ hutam iṣṭaṃ vā sutaptam atha vā tapaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:041.010b-0299_01: damo vā brahmacaryaṃ vā sūta yac cāsya sattama
GE07mbh_07_u:041.010b-0299_02: devaṃ katamam ārādhya viṣṇum īśānam agnijam
GE07mbh_07_u:041.010d-0300_02: sindhurāṭtanayas tv eko yathā pārthān avārayat
GE07mbh_07_u:041.011c: mānāt sa taptavān rājā varārthī sumahat tapaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:041.012e: devam ārādhayac charvaṃ gṛṇan brahma sanātanam
GE07mbh_07_u:041.013a: bhaktānukampī bhagavāṃs tasya cakre tato dayām
GE07mbh_07_u:041.013c: svapnānte 'py atha caivāha haraḥ sindhupateḥ sutam
GE07mbh_07_u:041.013e: varaṃ vṛṇīṣva prīto 'smi jayadratha kim icchasi
GE07mbh_07_u:041.014a: evam uktas tu śarveṇa sindhurājo jayadrathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:041.015c: eko raṇe dhārayeyaṃ samastān iti bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:041.015d-0301_02: prīto maheśvaras tasmai varaṃ caivaṃ dadau tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:041.015d-0301_03: sa tu vavre varaṃ tatra pāṇḍaveyān ahaṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:041.016a: evam uktas tu deveśo jayadratham athābravīt
GE07mbh_07_u:041.016c: dadāmi te varaṃ saumya vinā pārthaṃ dhanaṃjayam
GE07mbh_07_u:041.017c: evam astv iti deveśam uktvābudhyata pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:041.017d-0303_01: tenoktas tam ṛte pārthaṃ śarvas tasmai varaṃ dadau
GE07mbh_07_u:041.019c: parāṃs tu tava sainyasya harṣaḥ paramako 'bhavat
GE07mbh_07_u:041.020a: dṛṣṭvā tu kṣatriyā bhāraṃ saindhave sarvam arpitam
GE07mbh_07_u:042.001a: yan mā pṛcchasi rājendra sindhurājasya vikramam
GE07mbh_07_u:042.001c: śṛṇu tat sarvam ākhyāsye yathā pāṇḍūn ayodhayat
GE07mbh_07_u:042.002a: tam ūhuḥ sārather vaśyāḥ saindhavāḥ sādhuvāhinaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:042.004c: sa babhau rājaliṅgais tais tārāpatir ivāmbare
GE07mbh_07_u:042.005c: varūthaṃ vibabhau tasya jyotirbhiḥ kham ivāvṛtam
GE07mbh_07_u:042.006a: sa visphārya mahac cāpaṃ kirann iṣugaṇān bahūn
GE07mbh_07_u:042.006c: tat khaṇḍaṃ pūrayām āsa yad vyadārayad ārjuniḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:042.007a: sa sātyakiṃ tribhir bāṇair aṣṭabhiś ca vṛkodaram
GE07mbh_07_u:042.007c: dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ tathā ṣaṣṭyā virāṭaṃ daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:042.008a: drupadaṃ pañcabhis tīkṣṇair daśabhiś ca śikhaṇḍinam
GE07mbh_07_u:042.009a: yudhiṣṭhiraṃ ca saptatyā tataḥ śeṣān apānudat
GE07mbh_07_u:042.011c: vivyādha daśabhiḥ pārtha tāṃś caivānyāṃs tribhis tribhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:042.012a: tasya tal lāghavaṃ jñātvā bhīmo bhallais tribhiḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:042.012c: dhanur dhvajaṃ ca chatraṃ ca kṣitau kṣipram apātayat
GE07mbh_07_u:042.013a: so 'nyad ādāya balavān sajyaṃ kṛtvā ca kārmukam
GE07mbh_07_u:042.013c: bhīmasyāpothayat ketuṃ dhanur aśvāṃś ca māriṣa
GE07mbh_07_u:042.014c: sātyaker āpluto yānaṃ giryagram iva kesarī
GE07mbh_07_u:042.015a: tatas tvadīyāḥ saṃhṛṣṭāḥ sādhu sādhv iti cukruśuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:042.015d-0304_03: na vivyathe mahārāja divyam astram upāśritaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:042.015d-0304_04: chittvā ca tāñ śarān rājañ śaravarṣaiḥ pṛthagvidhaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:042.015d-0304_05: chādayām āsa tān sarvāṃs tad abhūd romaharṣaṇam
GE07mbh_07_u:042.016c: tat tasya karma bhūtāni sarvāṇy evābhyapūjayan
GE07mbh_07_u:042.019a: yo yo hi yatate bhettuṃ droṇānīkaṃ tavāhitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:043.001c: sughoram abhavad yuddhaṃ tvadīyānāṃ paraiḥ saha
GE07mbh_07_u:043.002a: praviśya tv ārjuniḥ senāṃ satyasaṃdho durāsadām
GE07mbh_07_u:043.004a: teṣāṃ tasya ca saṃmardo dāruṇaḥ samapadyata
GE07mbh_07_u:043.006a: tasya vivyādha balavāñ śarair aśvān ajihmagaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:043.006c: vātāyamānair atha tair aśvair apahṛto raṇāt
GE07mbh_07_u:043.007c: rathavrajās tato hṛṣṭāḥ sādhu sādhv iti cukruśuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:043.008a: taṃ siṃham iva saṃkruddhaṃ pramathnantaṃ śarair arīn
GE07mbh_07_u:043.009c: abravīc ca na me jīvañ jīvato yudhi mokṣyase
GE07mbh_07_u:043.010c: vivyādha hṛdi saubhadraḥ sa papāta vyasuḥ kṣitau
GE07mbh_07_u:043.011c: parivavrus tadā rājaṃs tava pautraṃ jighāṃsavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:043.012c: tad yuddham abhavad raudraṃ saubhadrasyāribhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_07_u:043.013a: teṣāṃ śarān seṣvasanāñ śarīrāṇi śirāṃsi ca
GE07mbh_07_u:043.015a: sragbhir ābharaṇair vastraiḥ patitaiś ca mahādhvajaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:043.016c: akṣair vimathitaiś cakrair bhagnaiś ca bahudhā yugaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:043.017c: rathaiś ca bhagnair nāgaiś ca hataiḥ kīrṇābhavan mahī
GE07mbh_07_u:043.019a: diśo vicaratas tasya sarvāś ca pradiśas tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:043.020a: kāñcanaṃ yad yad asyāsīd varma cābharaṇāni ca
GE07mbh_07_u:043.020c: dhanuṣaś ca śarāṇāṃ ca tad apaśyāma kevalam
GE07mbh_07_u:043.021a: taṃ tadā nāśakat kaś cic cakṣurbhyām abhivīkṣitum
GE07mbh_07_u:043.021c: ādadānaṃ śarair yodhān madhye sūryam iva sthitam
GE07mbh_07_u:044.001a: ādadānas tu śūrāṇām āyūṃṣy abhavad ārjuniḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:044.002a: sa śakra iva vikrāntaḥ śakrasūnoḥ suto balī
GE07mbh_07_u:044.005a: ahaṃ pūrvam ahaṃ pūrvam iti kṣatriyapuṃgavāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:044.007a: ye ke cana gatās tasya samīpam apalāyinaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:044.007c: na te pratinyavartanta samudrād iva sindhavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:044.008c: samakampata sā senā vibhraṣṭā naur ivārṇave
GE07mbh_07_u:044.008d-0305_01: saṃtrastā vāhinī tubhyaṃ naur ivāsīn mahārṇave
GE07mbh_07_u:044.009c: trastām āśvāsayan senām atrasto vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_07_u:044.010a: alaṃ trāsena vaḥ śūrā naiṣa kaś cin mayi sthite
GE07mbh_07_u:044.010c: aham enaṃ grahīṣyāmi jīvagrāhaṃ na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:044.011a: evam uktvā tu saubhadram abhidudrāva vīryavān
GE07mbh_07_u:044.012a: so 'bhimanyuṃ tribhir bāṇair viddhvā vakṣasy athānadat
GE07mbh_07_u:044.012c: tribhiś ca dakṣiṇe bāhau savye ca niśitais tribhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:044.012d-0306_01: so 'bhimanyus tatas tasya chittvā praṇadato balī
GE07mbh_07_u:044.013c: bhujau śiraś ca svakṣibhru kṣitau kṣipram apātayat
GE07mbh_07_u:044.014a: dṛṣṭvā rukmarathaṃ rugṇaṃ putraṃ śalyasya māninam
GE07mbh_07_u:044.019c: adṛśyam ārjuniṃ cakrur nimeṣāt te nṛpātmajāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:044.020a: sasūtāśvadhvajaṃ tasya syandanaṃ taṃ ca māriṣa
GE07mbh_07_u:044.021a: sa gāḍhaviddhaḥ kruddhaś ca tottrair gaja ivārditaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:044.021c: gāndharvam astram āyacchad rathamāyāṃ ca yojayat
GE07mbh_07_u:044.022a: arjunena tapas taptvā gandharvebhyo yad āhṛtam
GE07mbh_07_u:044.023a: ekaḥ sa śatadhā rājan dṛśyate sma sahasradhā
GE07mbh_07_u:044.025a: prāṇāḥ prāṇabhṛtāṃ saṃkhye preṣitā niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:044.025c: rājan prāpur amuṃ lokaṃ śarīrāṇy avaniṃ yayuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:044.026a: dhanūṃṣy aśvān niyantṝṃś ca dhvajān bāhūṃś ca sāṅgadān
GE07mbh_07_u:044.026c: śirāṃsi ca śitair bhallais teṣāṃ ciccheda phālguniḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:044.029c: dṛṣṭvā duryodhanaḥ kṣipram upāyāt tam amarṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:045.001a: yathā vadasi me sūta ekasya bahubhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_07_u:045.001c: saṃgrāmaṃ tumulaṃ ghoraṃ jayaṃ caiva mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:045.002c: kiṃ tu nātyadbhutaṃ teṣāṃ yeṣāṃ dharmo vyapāśrayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:045.003d-0308_02: sa kṛṣṇo daivataṃ yeṣāṃ kiṃ teṣāṃ duḥkhasaṃbhavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:045.003d-0308_04: kā cintā mahatī bhūpa cintayā bādhyate jaḍaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:045.003d-0308_06: tyāgaṃ vinā mahārāja samādhānaṃ na vidyate
GE07mbh_07_u:045.003d-0308_07: bhavāṃs tadrahito rājañ śṛṇuṣvācarite phalam saṃjaya uvāca
GE07mbh_07_u:045.004-0309_01: tāvakās tava putrāś ca vīkṣamāṇāḥ parasparam
GE07mbh_07_u:045.006a: tān prabhagnāṃs tathā dṛṣṭvā droṇo drauṇir bṛhadbalaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:045.006d-0311_01: tathā sarve samabhyetya saubhadraṃ drutam arpayan
GE07mbh_07_u:045.006d-0311_02: tathā vinihatāṃ dṛṣṭvā tava senām anāthavat
GE07mbh_07_u:045.007c: te 'pi pautreṇa te rājan prāyaśo vimukhīkṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:045.008a: ekas tu sukhasaṃvṛddho bālyād darpāc ca nirbhayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:045.009a: tam anvag evāsya pitā putragṛddhī nyavartata
GE07mbh_07_u:045.010a: taṃ te 'bhiṣiṣicur bāṇair meghā girim ivāmbubhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:045.010c: sa ca tān pramamāthaiko viṣvag vāto yathāmbudān
GE07mbh_07_u:045.011a: pautraṃ tu tava durdharṣaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ priyadarśanam
GE07mbh_07_u:045.012c: āsasāda raṇe kārṣṇir matto mattam iva dvipam
GE07mbh_07_u:045.012d-0313_01: abravīl lakṣmaṇaḥ kruddham ārjuniṃ paramām āstravit
GE07mbh_07_u:045.012d-0313_03: gaccha tvaṃ pāṇḍavāñ śīghraṃ mā yuddhaṃ kuru suvrata
GE07mbh_07_u:045.012d-0313_04: tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā abhimanyuḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_07_u:045.012d-0313_05: uvāca lakṣmaṇaṃ kruddhaḥ prahasann iva bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:045.012d-0313_06: gamiṣyāmi ciraṃ bhrātaḥ sarvān etān nihatya vai
GE07mbh_07_u:045.012d-0313_07: pāṇḍavān prati cādyaiva iti satyaṃ vadāmi te
GE07mbh_07_u:045.013c: śaraiḥ suniśitais tīkṣṇair bāhvor urasi cārpitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:045.014c: pautras tava mahārāja tava pautram abhāṣata
GE07mbh_07_u:045.015a: sudṛṣṭaḥ kriyatāṃ loko amuṃ lokaṃ gamiṣyasi
GE07mbh_07_u:045.015d-0315_02: yuddhaṃ cakre tadā tena śastrāstrair matimān nṛpa
GE07mbh_07_u:045.015d-0315_06: lakṣmaṇo niśitair bāṇair daśabhiś ca stanāntare
GE07mbh_07_u:045.015d-0315_10: tribhir bāṇair dhanuś chittvā ārjuniḥ sumahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:045.016a: evam uktvā tato bhallaṃ saubhadraḥ paravīrahā
GE07mbh_07_u:045.017e: lakṣmaṇaṃ nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā hā hety uccukruśur janāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:045.018a: tato duryodhanaḥ kruddhaḥ priye putre nipātite

GE07mbh_07_u:045.019c: kṛtavarmā ca hārdikyaḥ ṣaḍ rathāḥ paryavārayan
GE07mbh_07_u:045.020a: sa tān viddhvā śitair bāṇair vimukhīkṛtya cārjuniḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:045.021c: kaliṅgāś ca niṣādāś ca krāthaputraś ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_07_u:045.021e: tat prasaktam ivātyarthaṃ yuddham āsīd viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:045.022a: tatas tat kuñjarānīkaṃ vyadhamad dhṛṣṭam ārjuniḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:045.025c: chatraṃ dhvajaṃ niyantāram aśvāṃś cāsya nyapātayat
GE07mbh_07_u:045.026c: yukte tasmin hate vīrāḥ prāyaśo vimukhābhavan
GE07mbh_07_u:046.004a: taṃ tu droṇaḥ kṛpaḥ karṇo drauṇiś ca sabṛhadbalaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:046.004c: kṛtavarmā ca hārdikyaḥ ṣaḍ rathāḥ paryavārayan
GE07mbh_07_u:046.005a: dṛṣṭvā tu saindhave bhāram atimātraṃ samāhitam
GE07mbh_07_u:046.007a: tāṃs tu sarvān maheṣvāsān sarvavidyāsu niṣṭhitān
GE07mbh_07_u:046.008a: droṇaṃ pañcāśatā viddhvā viṃśatyā ca bṛhadbalam
GE07mbh_07_u:046.010a: sa karṇaṃ karṇinā karṇe pītena niśitena ca
GE07mbh_07_u:046.012c: putrāṇāṃ tava vīrāṇāṃ paśyatām avadhīd balī
GE07mbh_07_u:046.014a: sa tu bāṇaiḥ śitais tūrṇaṃ pratyavidhyata māriṣa
GE07mbh_07_u:046.015a: ṣaṣṭyā śarāṇāṃ taṃ drauṇis tigmadhāraiḥ sutejanaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:046.015c: ugrair nākampayad viddhvā mainākam iva parvatam
GE07mbh_07_u:046.016a: sa tu drauṇiṃ trisaptatyā hemapuṅkhair ajihmagaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:046.017c: aśvatthāmā tathāṣṭau ca parīpsan pitaraṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:046.018c: bṛhadbalas tu pañcāśat kṛpaḥ śāradvato daśa
GE07mbh_07_u:046.019a: tāṃs tu pratyavadhīt sarvān daśabhir daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:046.019c: tair ardyamānaḥ saubhadraḥ sarvato niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:046.020c: sa tasyāśvān dhvajaṃ cāpaṃ sūtaṃ cāpātayat kṣitau
GE07mbh_07_u:046.021c: iyeṣa phālguneḥ kāyāc chiro hartuṃ sakuṇḍalam
GE07mbh_07_u:046.023a: babhañja ca sahasrāṇi daśa rājan mahātmanām
GE07mbh_07_u:046.024a: tathā bṛhadbalaṃ hatvā saubhadro vyacarad raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:047.001a: sa karṇaṃ karṇinā karṇe punar vivyādha phālguniḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:047.001c: śaraiḥ pañcāśatā cainam avidhyat kopayan bhṛśam
GE07mbh_07_u:047.002a: prativivyādha rādheyas tāvadbhir atha taṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:047.002c: sa tair ācitasarvāṅgo bahv aśobhata bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:047.005a: atha karṇasya sacivān ṣaṭ śūrāṃś citrayodhinaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:047.007a: māgadhasya punaḥ putraṃ hatvā ṣaḍbhir ajihmagaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:047.009a: tasya dauḥśāsanir viddhvā caturbhiś caturo hayān
GE07mbh_07_u:047.010a: tato dauḥśāsaniṃ kārṣṇir viddhvā saptabhir āśugaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:047.011a: pitā tavāhavaṃ tyaktvā gataḥ kāpuruṣo yathā
GE07mbh_07_u:047.011c: diṣṭyā tvam api jānīṣe yoddhuṃ na tv adya mokṣyase
GE07mbh_07_u:047.012c: nārācaṃ visasarjāsmai taṃ drauṇis tribhir ācchinat
GE07mbh_07_u:047.013a: tasyārjunir dhvajaṃ chittvā śalyaṃ tribhir atāḍayat
GE07mbh_07_u:047.013c: taṃ śalyo navabhir bāṇair gārdhrapatrair atāḍayat
GE07mbh_07_u:047.014a: tasyārjunir dhvajaṃ chittvā ubhau ca pārṣṇisārathī
GE07mbh_07_u:047.015c: sūryabhāsaṃ ca pañcaitān hatvā vivyādha saubalam
GE07mbh_07_u:047.016a: taṃ saubalas tribhir viddhvā duryodhanam athābravīt

GE07mbh_07_u:047.017a: athābravīt tadā droṇaṃ karṇo vaikartano vṛṣā
GE07mbh_07_u:047.017c: purā sarvān pramathnāti brūhy asya vadham āśu naḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:047.018a: tato droṇo maheṣvāsaḥ sarvāṃs tān pratyabhāṣata
GE07mbh_07_u:047.018c: asti vo 'syāntaraṃ kaś cit kumārasya prapaśyati
GE07mbh_07_u:047.019a: anv asya pitaraṃ hy adya carataḥ sarvatodiśam

GE07mbh_07_u:047.020d-0321_01: vikarṣato dhanuḥ śreṣṭhaṃ nāntaraṃ dṛśyate hi vai
GE07mbh_07_u:047.021a: ārujann iva me prāṇān mohayann api sāyakaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:047.022a: ati mā nandayaty eṣa saubhadro vicaran raṇe

GE07mbh_07_u:047.025d-0322_01: hrīmattvāt kṣitipālānāṃ paśyatām adya ca dvija
GE07mbh_07_u:047.025d-0322_02: na me 'ṅga hīyate kiṃ cin na vai vāg eti māṃ tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:047.025d-0322_05: vicinvadbhir ivāsūn me śarīraṃ na vibhāvyate
GE07mbh_07_u:047.025d-0322_06: kaḥ kiṃ kiṃ sa dhanurvedo yenaikena vayaṃ jitāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:047.026a: tam ācāryo 'bravīt karṇaṃ śanakaiḥ prahasann iva
GE07mbh_07_u:047.027c: tām eṣa nikhilāṃ vetti dhruvaṃ parapuraṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:047.027d-0323_01: jyālakṣaṇaṃ mayā ceha nopadiṣṭaṃ tu phalgune
GE07mbh_07_u:047.028a: śakyaṃ tv asya dhanuś chettuṃ jyāṃ ca bāṇaiḥ samāhitaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:047.029a: etat kuru maheṣvāsa rādheya yadi śakyate
GE07mbh_07_u:047.030a: sadhanuṣko na śakyo 'yam api jetuṃ surāsuraiḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:047.030d-0325_01: puraḥ sthitena kenāpi duḥśakyo jetum ārjuniḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:047.031a: tad ācāryavacaḥ śrutvā karṇo vaikartanas tvaran
GE07mbh_07_u:047.031b-0326_01: dṛṣṭvā saubhadram asyantam uccaiḥ śabdam akurvata
GE07mbh_07_u:047.035a: mārgaiḥ sa kaiśikādyaiś ca lāghavena balena ca
GE07mbh_07_u:047.035c: ārjunir vyacarad vyomni bhṛśaṃ vai pakṣirāḍ iva
GE07mbh_07_u:047.036a: mayy eva nipataty eṣa sāsir ity ūrdhvadṛṣṭayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:047.037c: rādheyo niśitair bāṇair vyadhamac carma cottamam

GE07mbh_07_u:048.002c: vapuḥ samīkṣya pṛthvīśā duḥsamīkṣyaṃ surair api
GE07mbh_07_u:048.002d-0329_01: yadi pāṇitalād etac cakraṃ mucyeta phālguneḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:048.003a: tac cakraṃ bhṛśam udvignāḥ saṃcicchidur anekadhā
GE07mbh_07_u:048.005a: sa gadām udyatāṃ dṛṣṭvā jvalantīm aśanīm iva
GE07mbh_07_u:048.008c: kekayānāṃ rathān sapta hatvā ca daśa kuñjarān
GE07mbh_07_u:048.009a: tato dauḥśāsaniḥ kruddho gadām udyamya māriṣa
GE07mbh_07_u:048.011a: tāv anyonyaṃ gadāgrābhyāṃ saṃhatya patitau kṣitau
GE07mbh_07_u:048.011b-0330_01: tato mahītalāt kārṣṇir viṣapīta iva skhalan
GE07mbh_07_u:048.011b-0330_03: so 'pi vegavatīṃ gṛhya gadām udyamya cārjunim
GE07mbh_07_u:048.011b-0330_05: tāv ubhau bhrātarāv evaṃ gatau vaivasvatakṣayam
GE07mbh_07_u:048.013b-007_0001: pauruṣaṃ ca samālambya kiṃ cin mūrchām avāpa saḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:048.013b-007_0006: kṣaṇopaviṣṭo 'tha tadā vākyaṃ cedam uvāca ha
GE07mbh_07_u:048.013b-007_0009: kṛṣṇasya cāhaṃ durmedhā yathā kāpuruṣas tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:048.013b-007_0010: subhadrānandano bhūtvā kiṃ cāpi na kṛtaṃ mayā
GE07mbh_07_u:048.013b-007_0016: diśo vilokayan sarvāḥ kopena sa mahābalaḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:048.013b-007_0018: hatvā tān subahūn vīrāṃl lakṣmaṇādīn mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:048.013b-007_0019: koṭiṃ hatvā rathānāṃ ca gajānāṃ ca tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_07_u:048.013b-007_0020: hayānām arbudaṃ pūrṇaṃ kharvam ekaṃ padātinām
GE07mbh_07_u:048.013b-007_0021: etān yudhi vimardyaivam abhimanyur divaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:048.013b-007_0022: tathāstaṃ gata āditye dvāv etau yugapad gatau
GE07mbh_07_u:048.013e: evaṃ vinihato rājann eko bahubhir āhave
GE07mbh_07_u:048.014a: kṣobhayitvā camūṃ sarvāṃ nalinīm iva kuñjaraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:048.014c: aśobhata hato vīro vyādhair vanagajo yathā
GE07mbh_07_u:048.015a: taṃ tathā patitaṃ śūraṃ tāvakāḥ paryavārayan
GE07mbh_07_u:048.015c: dāvaṃ dagdhvā yathā śāntaṃ pāvakaṃ śiśirātyaye
GE07mbh_07_u:048.017a: upaplutaṃ yathā somaṃ saṃśuṣkam iva sāgaram
GE07mbh_07_u:048.018a: taṃ bhūmau patitaṃ dṛṣṭvā tāvakās te mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:048.018c: mudā paramayā yuktāś cukruśuḥ siṃhavan muhuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:048.019a: āsīt paramako harṣas tāvakānāṃ viśāṃ pate

GE07mbh_07_u:048.020c: dṛṣṭvā nipatitaṃ vīraṃ cyutaṃ candram ivāmbarāt

GE07mbh_07_u:048.022a: tasmiṃs tu nihate vīre bahv aśobhata medinī
GE07mbh_07_u:048.024a: vicitraiś ca paristomaiḥ patākābhiś ca saṃvṛtā

GE07mbh_07_u:048.025c: khaḍgaiś ca niśitaiḥ pītair nirmuktair bhujagair iva
GE07mbh_07_u:048.026c: vividhair āyudhaiś cānyaiḥ saṃvṛtā bhūr aśobhata
GE07mbh_07_u:048.026d-0333_02: naraiḥ patadbhiḥ patitair avanis tv adhikaṃ babhau
GE07mbh_07_u:048.031c: tāvakānāṃ parā prītiḥ pāṇḍūnāṃ cābhavad vyathā
GE07mbh_07_u:048.033c: ajātaśatruḥ svān vīrān idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_07_u:048.033d-0334_02: saubhadraḥ śatrudamanaḥ kiṃ jātaṃ na vidma vai
GE07mbh_07_u:048.033d-0334_03: evaṃ bruvāṇo nṛpatiḥ sainyena mahatā vṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:048.033d-0334_05: tac chrutvā ca hataṃ putraṃ kauravair jihmakāribhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:048.033d-0334_07: śrutvā ca tair hataṃ vīraṃ dhairyam ālambya satvaram
GE07mbh_07_u:048.033d-0334_08: paramaṃ sattvam ālambya pratyuvāca yudhāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:048.034a: svargam eṣa gataḥ śūro yo hato naparāṅmukhaḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:048.036a: yuddhe hy āśīviṣākārān rājaputrān raṇe bahūn
GE07mbh_07_u:048.036c: pūrvaṃ nihatya saṃgrāme paścād ārjunir anvagāt
GE07mbh_07_u:048.038d-0336_01: putraśokāt paraṃ nāsti duḥkham anyan mahattaram
GE07mbh_07_u:048.038d-0336_03: sa putro nihato me 'dya nāhaṃ jīvitum utsahe

GE07mbh_07_u:048.042c: divaṃ ca bhūmiṃ ca samānayann iva; priyāṃ tanuṃ bhānur upaiti pāvakam
GE07mbh_07_u:048.044c: mahārathair bhūḥ śuśubhe vicūrṇitaiḥ; purair ivāmitrahatair narādhipa
GE07mbh_07_u:048.046c: mahārhaśayyāstaraṇocitāḥ sadā; kṣitāv anāthā iva śerate hatāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:048.047a: atīva hṛṣṭāḥ śvasṛgālavāyasā; baḍāḥ suparṇāś ca vṛkās tarakṣavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:048.047c: vayāṃsy asṛkpāny atha rakṣasāṃ gaṇāḥ; piśācasaṃghāś ca sudāruṇā raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:048.048a: tvaco vinirbhidya piban vasām asṛk; tathaiva majjāṃ piśitāni cāśnuvan
GE07mbh_07_u:048.048c: vapāṃ vilumpanti hasanti gānti ca; prakarṣamāṇāḥ kuṇapāny anekaśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:048.050a: mahābhayā vaitaraṇīva dustarā; pravartitā yodhavarais tadā nadī
GE07mbh_07_u:048.050c: uvāha madhyena raṇājiraṃ bhṛśaṃ; bhayāvahā jīvamṛtapravāhinī

GE07mbh_07_u:049.015a: alubdho matimān hrīmān kṣamāvān rūpavān balī
