GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0016: uvāca bhagavān vyāso yudhiṣṭhiram idaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0019: svargam eṣa gataḥ śūraḥ śatrūn hatvā bahūn raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0022: devadānavagandharvān mṛtyur harati bhārata yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0026: naiṣāṃ paśyāmi hantāraṃ prāṇināṃ saṃyuge kva cit
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0028: atha ceme hatāḥ prājñāḥ śerate vigatāyuṣaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0029: mṛtā iti ca śabdo 'yaṃ vartate ca gatārthavat
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0032: atra me saṃśayaḥ prāptaḥ kutaḥ saṃjñā mṛtā iti
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0033: kasya mṛtyuḥ kuto mṛtyuḥ kena mṛtyur imāḥ prajāḥ saṃjaya uvāca
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0034: haraty amarasaṃkāśa tan me brūhi pitāmaha
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0036: āśvāsanam idaṃ vākyam uvāca bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0039: sa cāpi rājā rājendra putravyasanam uttamam
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0040: aprasahyatamaṃ loke prāptavān iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0041: tad ahaṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi mṛtyoḥ prabhavam uttamam
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0043: purā vṛttam idaṃ tāta śṛṇu kīrtayato mama
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0045: purā kṛtayuge tāta āsīd rājā hy akampanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0048: śrīmān kṛtāstro medhāvī yudhi śakrasamo balī
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0050: vyasyan bāṇasahasrāṇi yodheṣu ca gajeṣu ca
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0051: sa karma duṣkaraṃ kṛtvā saṃgrāme śatrutāpanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0053: sa rājā pretakṛtyāni tasya kṛtvā śucānvitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0054: śocann ahani rātrau ca nālabhat sukham ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0057: sa tu rājā mahābhāgo dṛṣṭvā devarṣisattamam
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0059: tasya sarvaṃ samācaṣṭa yathā vṛttaṃ nareśvara
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0060: śatrubhir vijayaṃ saṃkhye putrasya ca vadhaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0062: śatrubhir bahubhiḥ saṃkhye parākramya hato balī
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0064: etad icchāmi tattvena śrotuṃ matimatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0065: tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā nārado varadaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0066: ākhyānam idam ācaṣṭa putraśokāpahaṃ mahat nārada uvāca
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0068: yathā vṛttaṃ śrutaṃ caiva mayāpi vasudhādhipa
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0069: prajāḥ sṛṣṭvā tadā brahmā ādisarge pitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0070: asaṃhṛtaṃ mahātejā dṛṣṭvā jagad idaṃ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0071: tasya cintā samutpannā saṃhāraṃ prati pārthiva
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0072: cintayan na hy asau veda saṃhāraṃ vasudhādhipa
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0074: tena sarvā diśo vyāptāḥ sāntardeśā didhakṣatā
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0075: tato divaṃ bhuvaṃ khaṃ ca jvālāmālāsamāvṛtam
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0076: carācaraṃ jagat sarvaṃ dadāha bhagavān prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0077: tato hatāni bhūtāni carāṇi sthāvarāṇi ca
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0079: tato haro jaṭī sthāṇur niśācarapatiḥ śivaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0082: abravīt paramo devo jvalann iva mahāmuniḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0083: kiṃ kurma kāmaṃ kāmārha kāmāj jāto 'si putraka sthāṇur uvāca
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0084: kariṣyāmi priyaṃ sarvaṃ brūhi sthāṇo yad icchasi
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0085: prajāsarganimittaṃ hi kṛto yatnas tvayā vibho
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0086: tvayā sṛṣṭāś ca vṛddhāś ca bhūtagrāmāḥ pṛthagvidhāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0087: tās taveha punaḥ krodhāt prajā dahyanti sarvaśaḥ brahmovāca
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0088: tā dṛṣṭvā mama kāruṇyaṃ prasīda bhagavan prabho
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0089: na krudhye na ca me kāma etad evaṃ bhaved iti
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0090: pṛthivyā hitakāmāt tu tato māṃ manyur āviśat
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0091: iyaṃ hi māṃ sadā devī bhārārtā samacūcudat
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0093: tato 'haṃ nādhigacchāmi tapye bahuvidhaṃ tadā sthāṇur uvāca
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0096: mā prajāḥ sthāvarāś caiva jaṅgamāś ca vyanīnaśan
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0097: tava prasādād bhagavann idaṃ vartet tridhā jagat
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0098: anāgatam atītaṃ ca yac ca saṃprati vartate
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0100: sa dahaty aśmakūṭāni drumāṃś ca saritas tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0101: palvalāni ca sarvāṇi sarve caiva tṛṇolapāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0102: sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ caiva niḥśeṣaṃ kurute jagat
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0103: tad etad bhasmasād bhūtaṃ sarvaṃ jagad anāvilam
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0104: prasīda bhagavan sa tvaṃ roṣo na syād varo mama
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0105: sarve hi naṣṭā neṣyanti tava deva kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0106: tasmān nivartatāṃ tejas tvayy eveha pralīyatām
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0108: yatheme prāṇinaḥ sarve nivarteraṃs tathā kuru
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0111: mā vinaśyej jagannātha jagat sthāvarajaṅgamam nārada uvāca
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0112: prasādābhimukhaṃ devaṃ tasmād evaṃ bravīmy aham
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0113: śrutvā hi vacanaṃ devaḥ sthāṇor nihatapāpmanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0116: pravṛttiṃ ca nivṛttiṃ ca kalpayām āsa vai prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0117: upasaṃharatas tasya tam agniṃ roṣajaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0121: sā viniḥsṛtya vai khebhyo dakṣiṇāṃ diśam āśritā
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0124: mṛtyo iti mahīpāla jahi cemāḥ prajā iti
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0125: tvaṃ hi saṃhārabuddhyātha prādurbhūtā ruṣo mama
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0126: tasmāt saṃhara sarvās tvaṃ prajāḥ sajaḍapaṇḍitāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0127: mama tvaṃ hi niyogena tataḥ śreyo hy avāpsyasi
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0128: evam uktā tu sā tena mṛtyuḥ kamalalocanā
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0129: dadhyau cātyartham abalā praruroda ca susvaram
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0130: pāṇibhyāṃ pratijagrāha tāny aśrūṇi pitāmahaḥ nārada uvāca
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0132: vinīya duḥkham abalā ātmany eva prajāpatim
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0134: tvayā sṛṣṭā kathaṃ nārī īdṛśī vadatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0135: krūraṃ karmāhitaṃ kuryāṃ mūḍheva kim u jānatī
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0136: bibhemy aham adharmād dhi prasīda bhagavan prabho
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0137: priyān putrān vayasyāṃś ca bhrātṝn mātṝḥ pitṝn patīn
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0138: anudhyāsyanti ye deva mṛtāṃs teṣāṃ bibhemy aham
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0139: kṛpaṇānāṃ hi rudatāṃ ye patanty aśrubindavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0140: tebhyo hi balavad bhītā śaraṇaṃ tvāham āgatā
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0141: yamasya bhavanaṃ deva na gaccheyaṃ surottama
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0143: etad icchāmy ahaṃ kāmaṃ tvatto lokapitāmaha
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0144: iccheyaṃ tvatprasādād vai tapas taptuṃ prajeśvara
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0145: pradiśemaṃ varaṃ deva tvaṃ mahyaṃ bhagavan prabho
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0146: tvayā hy uktā gamiṣyāmi dhenukāśramam uttamam
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0147: tatra tapsye tapas tīvraṃ tavaivārādhane ratā
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0148: na hi śakṣyāmi deveśa prāṇān prāṇabhṛtāṃ priyān brahmovāca
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0151: gaccha saṃhara sarvās tvaṃ prajā mā te vicāraṇā
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0152: bhavitā tv etad evaṃ hi naitaj jātv anyathā bhavet nārada uvāca
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0156: tūṣṇīm āsīt tadā devaḥ prajānām īśvareśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0157: prasādaṃ cāgamat kṣipram ātmany eva pitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0158: smayamānaś ca lokeśo lokān sarvān avaikṣata
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0161: sā kanyāpi jagāmātha samīpāt tasya dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0163: tvaramāṇā ca rājendra mṛtyur dhenukam abhyayāt
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0164: sā tatra paramaṃ tīvraṃ cacāra vratam uttamam
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0168: tatas tv ekena pādena punar anyāni sapta vai
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0169: tasthau padmāni ṣaṭ caiva sapta caikaṃ ca pārthiva
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0170: tataḥ padmāyutaṃ tāta mṛgaiḥ saha cacāra sā
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0171: punar gatvā tato nandāṃ puṇyāṃ śītāmalodakām
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0172: apsu varṣasahasrāṇi sapta caikaṃ ca sānayat
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0174: sā pūrvaṃ kauśikīṃ puṇyāṃ jagāma niyame dhṛtā
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0176: pañcagaṅge ca sā puṇye kanyā vetasakeṣu ca
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0178: tato gatvā mahāgaṅgāṃ mahāmeruṃ ca kevalam
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0180: punar himavato mūrdhni yatra devā purāyajan
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0181: tatrāṅguṣṭena sā tasthau nikharvaṃ paramā śubhā
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0182: puṣkareṣv atha gokarṇe naimiṣe malaye tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0183: akarśayat svakaṃ dehaṃ niyamair manasaḥ priyaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0185: tasthau pitāmahaṃ caiva toṣayām āsa dharmataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0186: tatas tām abravīt prīto lokānāṃ prabhavo 'vyayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0187: mṛtyo kim idam atyarthaṃ tapāṃsi carasīti ha
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0189: nāhaṃ hanyāṃ prajā deva svasthāś cākrośatīs tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0190: etad icchāmi sarveśa tvatto varam ahaṃ prabho
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0193: ārtā cānāgasī nārī yācāmi bhava me gatiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0195: adharmo nāsti te mṛtyo saṃharantyā imāḥ prajāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0196: mayā coktaṃ mṛṣā bhadre bhavitā na kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0197: tasmāt saṃhara kalyāṇi prajāḥ sarvāś caturvidhāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0199: lokapālo yamaś caiva sahāyā vyādhayas tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0200: ahaṃ ca vibudhāś caiva punar dāsyāma te varam
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0201: yathā tvam enasā muktā virajāḥ khyātim eṣyasi
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0202: saivam uktā mahārāja kṛtāñjalir idaṃ vibhum
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0203: punar evābravīd vākyaṃ prasādya śirasā tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0204: yady evam etat kartavyaṃ mayā na syād vinā prabho
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0205: tavājñā mūrdhni me nyastā yat te vakṣyāmi tac chṛṇu
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0206: lobhaḥ krodho 'bhyasūyerṣyā droho mohaś ca dehinām brahmovāca
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0208: tathā bhaviṣyate mṛtyo sādhu saṃhara vai prajāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0209: adharmas te na bhavitā nāpadhyāsyāmy ahaṃ śubhe
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0213: nādharmas te bhavitā mā sma bhaiṣīḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0215: tvaṃ vai dharmas tvaṃ hi dharmasya ceśā
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0224: tasmāt kāmaṃ roṣam apy āgataṃ tvaṃ nārada uvāca
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0227: chāpād bhītā bāḍham ity abravīt tam
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0248: tasmān mṛtān nānuśocanti dhīrās vyāsa uvāca
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0256: puṇyaṃ yaśasyaṃ svargyaṃ ca dhanyam āyuṣyam eva ca
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0258: etad arthapadaṃ śrutvā vijñāya tvaṃ ca pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0259: kṣatradharmaṃ ca vijñāya śūrāṇāṃ ca parāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0263: asinā gadayā śaktyā dhanuṣā ca mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0264: tasmāt parāṃ dhṛtiṃ kṛtvā bhrātṛbhiḥ saha pāṇḍava saṃjaya uvāca
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0270: bhūya eva tu māṃ tathyair vacobhir abhibṛṃhaya
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0272: kiyatyo dakṣiṇā dattāḥ kaiś ca dattā mahātmabhiḥ vyāsa uvāca
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0273: rājarṣibhiḥ puṇyakṛdbhis tad bhavān prabravītu me
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0274: śvityasya nṛpateḥ putraḥ sṛñjayo nāma bhūmipaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0276: tau kadā cid gṛhaṃ tasya praviṣṭau taddidṛkṣayā
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0277: vidhivac cārcitau tena prītau tatroṣatuḥ sukham
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0278: taṃ kadā cit sukhāsīnaṃ tābhyāṃ saha śucismitā nārada uvāca
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0281: utāho bhāsvid arkasya jvalanasya śikhā tv iyam vyāsa uvāca
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0282: hrīḥ śrīḥ kīrtir dhṛtiḥ puṣṭiḥ siddhiś candramasaḥ prabhā
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0284: mameyaṃ bhagavan kanyā matto varam abhīpsati
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0285: nāradas tv abravīd enaṃ dehi mahyam imāṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0286: bhāryārthaṃ sumahac chreyaḥ prāptuṃ ced icchase 'nagha
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0287: dadānīty eva saṃhṛṣṭaḥ sṛñjayaḥ prāha nāradam
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0288: parvatas tu susaṃkruddho nāradaṃ vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0289: hṛdayena mayā pūrvaṃ vṛtāṃ vai vṛtavān asi
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0290: yasmād vṛtā tvayā vipra mā gāḥ svargaṃ yathecchayā
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0291: evam ukto nāradas taṃ pratyuvācottaraṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0294: na tv eṣā niścitā niṣṭhā niṣṭhā saptapadī smṛtā
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0295: anutpanne ca kāryārthe māṃ tvaṃ vyāhṛtavān asi
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0296: tasmāt tvam api na svargaṃ gamiṣyasi mayā vinā
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0297: anyonyam evaṃ śaptvā vai tasthatus tatra tau tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0298: sṛñjayo hy api vai viprān pānācchādanabhojanaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0300: tasya prasannā viprendrāḥ kadā cit putram īpsavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0302: sahitā nāradaṃ prāhur dehy asmai putram īpsitam
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0303: tathety uktvā dvijair uktaḥ sṛñjayaṃ nārado 'bravīt
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0304: varaṃ vṛṇīṣva bhadraṃ te yādṛśaṃ putram īpsitam
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0305: tathoktaḥ prāñjalī rājā putraṃ vavre guṇānvitam
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0307: yasya mūtraṃ purīṣaṃ ca kledaḥ svedaś ca kāñcanam
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0308: suvarṇaṣṭhīvir ity eva tasya nāmābhavat kṛtam
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0310: kārayām āsa nṛpatiḥ sauvarṇaṃ sarvam īpsitam
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0313: tasya sma rājño yad veśma bāhyāś copaskarāś ca ye
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0315: atha dasyugaṇāḥ śrutvā dṛṣṭvā cainaṃ tathāvidham
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0317: ke cit tatrābruvan rājñaḥ putraṃ gṛhṇīma vai svayam
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0319: tatas te dasyavo lubdhāḥ praviśya nṛpater gṛham
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0322: hatvā viśasya nāpaśyan sulubdhā vasu kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0323: tasya prāṇair vimuktasya naṣṭaṃ tad varadaṃ vasu
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0324: dasyavaś ca tadānyonyaṃ jaghnur mūrkhā vicetasaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0325: hatvā parasparaṃ naṣṭāḥ kumāraṃ cādbhutaṃ bhuvi
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0327: taṃ dṛṣṭvā nihataṃ putraṃ varadattaṃ mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0334: yasya caite vayaṃ gehe uṣitā brahmavādinaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0335: āvikṣitaṃ maruttaṃ ca mṛtaṃ sṛñjaya śuśruma
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0336: saṃvarto yājayām āsa spardhayā yaṃ bṛhaspateḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0337: yasmai rājarṣaye prādād varaṃ sa bhagavān prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0338: haimaṃ himavataḥ pādaṃ yiyakṣor vividhaiḥ savaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0340: devā viśvasṛjaḥ sarve yajñān ūhur mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0342: yasya sarvaṃ tadā hy annaṃ mano 'bhiprāyagaṃ śuci
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0343: kāmato bubhujur viprāḥ sarve cānnārthino janāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0344: payo dadhi ghṛtaṃ kṣaudraṃ bhakṣyaṃ bhojyaṃ ca śobhanam
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0345: yasya yajñeṣu sarveṣu vāsāṃsy ābharaṇāni ca
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0350: havirbhis tarpitā yena samyak kḷptair divaukasaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0351: ṛṣīṇāṃ ca pitṝṇāṃ ca devānāṃ sukhajīvinām
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0354: tat sarvam amitaṃ vittaṃ dattvā viprebhya icchayā
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0355: so 'nudhyātas tu śakreṇa prajāḥ kṛtvā nirāmayāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0357: sa cen mamāra sṛñjaya caturbhadrataras tvayā
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0358: putrāt puṇyataras tubhyaṃ mā putram anutapyathāḥ nārada uvāca
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0360: suhotraṃ nāma rājānaṃ mṛtaṃ sṛñjaya śuśruma
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0363: apṛcchad ātmanaḥ śreyaḥ pṛṣṭvā teṣāṃ mate sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0364: prajānāṃ pālanaṃ dharmo dānam ijyā dviṣajjayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0366: dharmeṇārādhayad devān bāṇaiḥ śatrūñ jayaṃs tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0367: sarvāṇy api ca bhūtāni svaguṇair apy arañjayat
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0371: yasmin kūrmān karkaṭakān matsyāṃś ca vividhān bahūn
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0372: kāmān varṣati parjanyo rūpāṇi vividhāni ca
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0377: ījāno vitate yajñe brāhmaṇebhyo hy amanyata
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0381: sa cen mamāra sṛñjaya caturbhadrataras tvayā
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0382: putrāt puṇyataras tubhyaṃ mā putram anutapyathāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0383: ayajvānam adākṣiṇyam adhi śvaityety udāharat nārada uvāca
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0384: rājānaṃ pauravaṃ vīraṃ mṛtaṃ sṛñjaya śuśruma
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0385: yaḥ sahasraṃ sahasrāṇāṃ śvetān aśvān avāsṛjat
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0391: niyodhakaiś ca krīḍadbhis tatra sma pariharṣitāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0394: sadhvajāḥ sapatākāś ca rathā hemamayās tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0402: tat sarvaṃ vitate yajñe dakṣiṇā atyakālayat
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0403: tatrāsya gāthā gāyanti ye purāṇavido janāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0406: sa cen mamāra sṛñjaya caturbhadrataras tvayā
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0407: putrāt puṇyataras tubhyaṃ mā putram anutapyathāḥ nārada uvāca
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0409: śibim auśīnaraṃ cāpi mṛtaṃ sṛñjaya śuśruma
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0410: ya imāṃ pṛthivīṃ sarvāṃ carmavat paryaveṣṭayat
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0412: sa śibir vai ripūn nityaṃ mukhyān nighnan sapatnajit
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0414: sa rājā vīryavān dhīmān avāpya vasu puṣkalam
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0416: ayajac cāśvamedhair yo vijitya pṛthivīm imām
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0419: vividhaiḥ pṛthivīṃ pūrṇāṃ śibir brāhmaṇasāt karot
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0420: yāvatyo varṣato dhārā yāvatyo divi tārakāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0421: tāvatīr adadad gā vai śibir auśīnaro 'dhvare
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0422: no yantāraṃ dhuras tasya kaṃ cid anyaṃ prajāpatiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0423: bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ bhaviṣyaṃ vā nādhyagacchan narottamam
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0429: pibata snāta khādadhvam iti yatrocyate janaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0430: yasmai prādād varaṃ rudras tuṣṭaḥ puṇyena karmaṇā
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0431: akṣayaṃ dadato vittaṃ śraddhā kīrtis tathā kriyāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0432: yathoktam eva bhūtānāṃ priyatvaṃ svargam uttamam
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0433: etāṃl labdhvā varān iṣṭāñ śibiḥ kāle divaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0434: sa cen mamāra sṛñjaya caturbhadrataras tvayā
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0435: putrāt puṇyataras tubhyaṃ mā putram anutapyathāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0436: ayajvānam adākṣiṇyam adhi śvaityety udāharat nārada uvāca
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0437: rāmaṃ dāśarathiṃ caiva mṛtaṃ sṛñjaya śuśruma
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0438: yaṃ prajā anvamodanta pitā putrān ivaurasān
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0444: tatraiva vasatas tasya rāvaṇo nāma rākṣasaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0448: jaghāna sa mahābāhuḥ paulastyaṃ sagaṇaṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0453: anyaiś ca vividhair yajñair īje bahuguṇair nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0456: ati sarvāṇi bhūtāni rāmo dāśarathir babhau
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0457: ṛṣīṇāṃ devatānāṃ ca mānuṣāṇāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0459: nāhīyata tadā prāṇaḥ prāṇināṃ na tad anyathā
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0461: dīrghāyuṣaḥ prajāḥ sarvā yuvā na mriyate tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0463: havyaṃ kavyaṃ ca vividhaṃ niṣpūrtaṃ hutam eva ca
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0466: adharmarucayo lubdhā mūrkhā vā nābhavaṃs tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0468: svadhām ūrjaṃ ca rakṣobhir janasthāne praṇāśite
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0471: na ca jyeṣṭāḥ kaniṣṭebhyas tadā śrāddhān akārayan
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0476: rāmo rāmo rāma iti prajānām abhavat kathā
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0477: rāmād rāmaṃ jagad abhūd rāme rājyaṃ praśāsati
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0478: caturvidhāḥ prajā rāmaḥ svargaṃ nītvā divaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0480: sa cen mamāra sṛñjaya caturbhadrataras tvayā
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0481: putrāt puṇyataras tubhyaṃ mā putram anutapyathāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0482: ayajvānam adākṣiṇyam adhi śvaityety udāharat nārada uvāca
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0483: bhagīrathaṃ ca rājānaṃ mṛtaṃ sṛñjaya śuśruma
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0484: yena bhāgīrathī gaṅgā cayanaiḥ kāñcanaiś citā
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0486: rājñaś ca rājaputrāṃś ca brāhmaṇebhyo hy amanyata
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0487: sarvā rathagatāḥ kanyā rathāḥ sarve caturyujaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0488: rathe rathe śataṃ nāgāḥ padmino hemamālinaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0490: aśve aśve śataṃ gāvo gavāṃ paścād ajāvikam
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0493: tathā bhāgīrathī gaṅgā urvaśī cābhavat purā
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0494: duhitṛtvaṃ gatā rājñaḥ putratvam agamat tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0495: tatra gāthāṃ jaguḥ prītā gandharvāḥ sūryavarcasaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0498: gaṅgā samudragā devī vavre pitaram īśvaram
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0499: tasya sendraiḥ savaruṇair devair yajñaḥ svalaṃkṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0501: yo ya iccheta vipro vai yatra yatrātmanaḥ priyam
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0502: bhagīrathas tadā prītas tatra tatrādadad vaśī
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0503: nādeyaṃ brāhmaṇeṣv āsīd asya kiṃ cit priyaṃ dhanam
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0505: yena yātā makhamukhe diśāśāv iha pādapāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0506: tenāvasthātum icchanti taṃ gatvā rājam īśvaram
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0507: sa cen mamāra sṛñjaya caturbhadrataras tvayā
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0508: putrāt puṇyataras tubhyaṃ mā putram anutapyathāḥ nārada uvāca
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0510: dilīpaṃ ced ailavilaṃ mṛtaṃ sṛñjaya śuśruma
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0514: ījāno vitate yajñe brāhmaṇebhyo hy amanyata
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0515: dilīpasya ca yajñeṣu kṛtaḥ panthā hiraṇmayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0516: taṃ dharma iva kurvāṇāḥ sendradevāḥ samāgaman
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0517: caṣālaṃ pracaṣālaṃ ca yasya yūpe hiraṇmaye
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0518: yad yoṣā hemasaṃchannā mattāḥ pathiṣu śerate
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0519: tad etad adbhutaṃ manye anyair na sadṛśaṃ nṛpaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0520: yad apsu yudhyamānasya cakre na paripetatuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0523: trayaḥ śabdā na jīryante khaṭvāṅgasya niveśane
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0525: sa cen mamāra sṛñjaya caturbhadrataras tvayā
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0526: putrāt puṇyataras tubhyaṃ mā putram anutapyathāḥ nārada uvāca
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0529: yaṃ devāv aśvinau garbhāt pituḥ pūrvaṃ cakarṣatuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0531: dhūmaṃ dṛṣṭvāgamat satraṃ pṛṣadājyam avāpa saḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0532: taṃ dṛṣṭvā yuvanāśvasya jaṭhare sūnutāṃ gatam
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0533: garbhād dhi jahratur devāv aśvinau bhiṣajāṃ varau
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0534: taṃ dṛṣṭvā pitur utsaṅge śayānaṃ devavarcasam
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0535: mām evāyaṃ dhayatv agre iti ha smāha vāsavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0537: māṃ dhāsyatīti kāruṇyād yad indro hy anvakampayat
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0538: tasmāt sa māndhātety evaṃ nāma tasyādbhutaṃ kṛtam
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0539: tatas tu dhārāḥ payaso ghṛtasya ca mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0541: apibat pāṇim indrasya sa cāpy ahnābhyavardhata
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0543: imāṃ ca pṛthivīṃ kṛtsnām ekāhnā sa vyajījayat
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0546: asitaṃ caiva rāmaṃ ca māndhātā manujo 'jayat
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0547: udeti ca yataḥ sūryo yatra ca pratitiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0548: tat sarvaṃ yauvanāśvasya māndhātuḥ kṣetram ucyate
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0550: adadad rohitān aśvān brāhmaṇebhyo viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0561: sa tāṃ brāhmaṇasāt kṛtvā jagāmāstaṃ tadā nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0562: gataḥ puṇyakṛtāṃ lokān vyāpya svayaśasā diśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0563: sa cen mamāra sṛñjaya caturbhadrataras tvayā
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0564: putrāt puṇyataras tubhyaṃ mā putram anutapyathāḥ nārada uvāca
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0566: yayātiṃ nāhuṣaṃ caiva mṛtaṃ sṛñjaya śuśruma
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0570: agniṣṭomaiś ca vividhaiḥ satraiś ca prājyadakṣiṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0571: abrāhmaṇānāṃ yad vittaṃ pṛthivyām asti kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0572: tat sarvaṃ parisaṃkhyāya tato brāhmaṇasāt karot
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0574: caturdhā vyabhajat sarvāṃ caturbhyaḥ pṛthivīm imām
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0575: yajñair nānāvidhair iṣṭvā prajām utpādya cottamām
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0580: tato gāthām imāṃ gītvā sadāraḥ prāviśad vanam
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0581: yat pṛthivyāṃ vrīhiyavaṃ hiraṇyaṃ paśavaḥ striyaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0582: nālam ekasya tat sarvam iti matvā śamaṃ vrajet
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0583: evaṃ kāmān parityajya yayātir dhṛtim etya ca
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0584: pūruṃ rājye pratiṣṭhāpya prayāto vanam īśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0585: sa cen mamāra sṛñjaya caturbhadrataras tvayā
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0586: putrāt puṇyataras tubhyaṃ mā putram anutapyathāḥ nārada uvāca
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0588: nābhāgam ambarīṣaṃ ca mṛtaṃ sṛñjaya śuśruma
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0589: yaḥ sahasraṃ sahasrāṇāṃ rājñāṃ caikas tv ayodhayat
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0595: śaraṇyam īyuḥ śaraṇaṃ tavāsma iti vādinaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0596: sa tu tān vaśagān kṛtvā jitvā cemāṃ vasuṃdharām
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0597: īje yajñaśatair iṣṭair yathā śakras tathānagha
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0598: bubhujuḥ sarvasaṃpannam annam anye janās tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0601: karambhān pṛthukān manthān anyāni sukṛtāni ca
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0604: ghṛtaṃ madhu payas toyaṃ dadhīni rasavanti ca
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0605: phalaṃ mūlaṃ ca susvādu dvijās tatropabhujyate
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0608: tatra sma gāthā gāyanti kṣībā hṛṣṭāḥ paṭhanti ca
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0617: naiva pūrve janāś cakrur na kariṣyanti cāpare
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0619: ity evam anvamodanta prītā yasya maharṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0620: sa cen mamāra sṛñjaya caturbhadrataras tvayā
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0621: putrāt puṇyataras tubhyaṃ mā putram anutapyathāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0622: nārada uvaāca ayajvānam adākṣiṇyam adhi śvaityety udāharat
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0623: śaśabinduṃ ca rājānaṃ mṛtaṃ sṛñjaya śuśruma
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0624: īje sa vividhair yajñaiḥ śrīmān satyaparākramaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0634: kanyāṃ kanyāṃ śataṃ nāgā nāge nāge śataṃ rathāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0635: rathe rathe śataṃ cāśvā balino hemamālinaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0636: aśve aśve sahasraṃ gā gavāṃ paścād ajāvikam
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0639: vārkṣāś ca yūpā yāvanto aśvamedhe mahāmakhe
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0640: te tathaiva punaś cānye tāvantaḥ kāñcanābhavan
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0644: śaśabindur imāṃ bhūmiṃ ciraṃ bhuktvā divaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0645: sa cen mamāra sṛñjaya caturbhadrataras tvayā
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0646: putrāt puṇyataras tubhyaṃ mā putram anutapyathāḥ nārada uvāca
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0650: tasmai hy agnir varaṃ prādāt tato vavre varaṃ gayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0652: gurūṇāṃ ca prasādena vedān icchāmi veditum
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0654: vipreṣu dadataś caiva śraddhā bhavatu nityaśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0655: ananyāsu savarṇāsu putrajanma ca me bhavet
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0656: annaṃ me dadataḥ śraddhā dharme me ramatāṃ manaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0657: avighnaṃ cāstu me nityaṃ dharmakāryeṣu pāvaka
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0659: gayo 'py avāpya tat sarvaṃ dharmeṇārīn ajījayat
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0664: śataṃ niṣkasahasrāṇi gavāṃ cāpy ayutāni ṣaṭ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0667: īje ca vividhair yajñair yathā somo 'ṅgirā yathā
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0668: sauvarṇāṃ pṛthivīṃ kṛtvā ya imāṃ maṇiśarkarām
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0672: sarvakāmasamṛddhāṃś ca prādāt tāṃś ca gayas tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0675: nagareṣu ca rāṣṭreṣu divi vyomni ca ye 'vasan
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0677: gayasya sadṛśo yajño nāsty anya iti te 'bruvan
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0679: paścāt puraś caturviṃśad vedī hy āsīd dhiraṇmayī
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0686: yasya prabhāvāc ca gayas triṣu lokeṣu viśrutaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0687: vaṭaś cākṣayyakaraṇaḥ puṇyaṃ brahmasaraś ca tat
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0688: sa cen mamāra sṛñjaya caturbhadrataras tvayā
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0689: putrāt puṇyataras tubhyaṃ mā putram anutapyathāḥ nārada uvāca
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0691: sāṃkṛtiṃ rantidevaṃ ca mṛtaṃ sṛñjaya śuśruma
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0696: vedān adhītya dharmeṇa yaś cakre dviṣato vaśe
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0697: upasthitāś ca paśavaḥ svayaṃ yaṃ saṃśitavratam
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0701: brāhmaṇebhyo dadau niṣkān sauvarṇān sa prabhāvataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0702: tubhyaṃ niṣkaṃ tubhyaṃ niṣkam iti ha sma prabhāṣate
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0703: tubhyaṃ tubhyam iti prādān niṣkān niṣkān sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0704: tataḥ punaḥ samāśvāsya niṣkān eva prayacchati
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0705: alpaṃ dattaṃ mayādyeti niṣkakoṭiṃ pradāya saḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0706: ekāhnā dāsyati punaḥ ko 'nyas tat saṃpradāsyati
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0710: ṛṣibhyaḥ karakān kumbhān sthālīpiṭharam eva ca
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0712: vṛkṣāṃś ca vividhān dadyād annāni ca dhanāni ca
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0714: tatrāsya gāthā gāyanti ye purāṇavido janāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0717: dhanaṃ ca pūryamāṇaṃ naḥ kiṃ punar manujeṣv iti
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0718: vyaktaṃ vasvokasāreyam ity ūcus tatra vismitāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0719: sāṃkṛte rantidevasya yāṃ rātrim atithiṃ vaset
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0723: rantidevasya yat kiṃ cit sauvarṇam abhavat tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0724: tat sarvaṃ vitate yajñe brāhmaṇebhyo hy amanyata
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0727: sa cen mamāra sṛñjaya caturbhadrataras tvayā
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0728: putrāt puṇyataras tubhyaṃ mā putram anutapyathāḥ nārada uvāca
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0730: dauṣyantiṃ bharataṃ cāpi mṛtaṃ sṛñjaya śuśruma
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0731: karmāṇy asukarāṇy anyaiḥ kṛtavān yaḥ śiśur vane
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0733: nirvīryāṃs tarasā kṛtvā vicakarṣa babandha ca
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0734: krūrāṃś cograbalān vyāghrān damitvā cākarod vaśe
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0738: mahiṣān apy atibalān balena vicakarṣa ha
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0739: balinaḥ sṛmarān khaḍgān nānāsattvāni cāpy uta
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0741: taṃ sarvadamanety āhus tadvidas tena karmaṇā
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0742: taṃ pratyaṣedhaj jananī mā sattvāni vijījahi
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0749: iṣṭvā śākuntalo rājā tarpayitvā dvijān dhanaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0750: sahasraṃ yatra padmānāṃ kaṇvāya bharato dadau
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0753: samāgamya dvijaiḥ sārdhaṃ sendrair devaiḥ samucchritāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0755: hiraṇyam aśvān dviradān rathān uṣṭrān ajāvikān
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0756: dāsīdāsaṃ dhanaṃ dhānyaṃ gāḥ savatsāḥ payasvinīḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0757: grāmān gṛhāṇi kṣetrāṇi vividhāṃś ca paricchadān
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0759: cakravartī hy adīnātmā jetāris tv ajitaḥ paraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0760: sa cen mamāra sṛñjaya caturbhadrataras tvayā
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0761: putrāt puṇyataras tubhyaṃ mā putram anutapyathāḥ nārada uvāca
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0763: pṛthuṃ vainyaṃ ca rājānaṃ mṛtaṃ sṛñjaya śuśruma
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0765: ayaṃ naḥ prathayiṣyeta sarvān ity abhavat pṛthuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0766: kṣatān nas trāsyate sarvān ity evaṃ kṣatriyo 'bhavat
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0767: pṛthuṃ vainyaṃ prajā dṛṣṭvā raktāḥ smeti yad abruvan
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0770: sarvāḥ kumbhaduho gāvaḥ puṭake puṭake madhu
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0772: teṣāṃ cīrāṇi saṃvītāḥ prajās teṣv eva śerate
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0773: phalāny amṛtakalpāni mūlāni ca madhūni ca
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0774: teṣām āsīt tadāhāro nirāhārāś ca nābhavan
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0776: nyavasanta yathākāmaṃ vṛkṣeṣu ca guhāsu ca
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0777: pravibhāgo na rāṣṭrāṇāṃ purāṇāṃ cābhavat tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0780: parvatāś ca dadur mārgaṃ dhvajabhaṅgaś ca nābhavat
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0784: samrāḍ asi kṣatriyo 'si rājā goptā pitāsi naḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0785: dehy asmabhyaṃ mahārāja prabhuḥ sann īpsitān varān
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0786: yair vayaṃ śāśvatīs tṛptīr vartayiṣyāmahe sukham
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0787: tathety uktvā pṛthur vainyo gṛhītvājagavaṃ dhanuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0789: ehy ehi vasudhe kṣipraṃ kṣaraibhyaḥ kāṅkṣitaṃ payaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0790: tato dāsyāmi bhadraṃ te annaṃ yasya yathepsitam vasudhovāca nārada uvāca
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0792: tathety uktvā pṛthuḥ sarvaṃ vidhānam akarod vaśī
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0793: tato bhūtanikāyās te vasudhāṃ duduhus tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0795: sātiṣṭhad vatsalā vatsaṃ dogdhṝn pātrāṇi cecchatī
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0796: vatso 'bhūt puṣpitaḥ śālaḥ plakṣo dogdhābhavat tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0798: udayaḥ parvato vatso merur dogdhā mahāgiriḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0799: ratnāny oṣadhayo dugdhaṃ pātram aśmamayaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0800: dogdhā cāsīt tadā devo dugdham ūrjaskaraṃ priyam
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0801: asurā duduhur māyām āmapātre tu te tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0802: dogdhā dvimūrdhā tatrāsīd vatsaś cāsīd virocanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0803: kṛṣiṃ ca sasyaṃ ca narā duduhuḥ pṛthivītale
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0804: svāyaṃbhuvo manur vatsas teṣāṃ dogdhābhavat pṛthuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0805: alābupātre ca tathā viṣaṃ dugdhā vasuṃdharā
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0806: dhṛtarāṣṭro 'bhavad dogdhā teṣāṃ vatsas tu takṣakaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0808: dogdhā bṛhaspatiḥ pātraṃ chando vatsas tu somarāṭ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0810: dogdhā vaiśravaṇas teṣāṃ vatsa āsīt kuberakaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0812: vatsaś citrarathas teṣāṃ dogdhā viśvaruciḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0813: svadhāṃ rajatapātre tu duduhuḥ pitaraś ca tām
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0814: vatso 'tra vatsaras teṣāṃ yamo dogdhā tathāntakaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0815: evaṃ nikāyais tair dugdhā payo 'bhīṣṭaṃ hi sā virāṭ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0816: yair vartayanti te hy adya pātrair vatsaiś ca nityaśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0817: sa yajñair vividhair iṣṭvā pṛthur vainyaḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0819: hairaṇyān akarod rājā ye ke cit pārthivā bhuvi
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0822: sauvarṇān akarod rājā brāhmaṇebhyaś ca tāṃ dadau
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0824: sauvarṇīm akarod rājā brāhmaṇebhyaś ca tān dadau
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0825: sa cen mamāra sṛñjaya caturbhadrataras tvayā
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0826: putrāt puṇyataras tubhyaṃ mā putram anutapyathāḥ nārada uvāca
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0831: na cāsīd vikriyā yasya prāpya śriyam anuttamām
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0832: yaḥ kṣatriyaiḥ parāmṛṣṭe vatse pitari cukrudhe
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0837: punar anyāni jagrāha dantakrūre jaghāna ha
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0839: udbandhanāt sahasraṃ ca haihayāḥ samare hatāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0843: na hy amṛśyata tā vāco yās tair bhṛśam udīritāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0848: śibīn anyāṃś ca rājanyān deśe deśe sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0853: sarvān aṣṭādaśa dvīpān vaśam ānīya bhārgavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0857: grāmyāraṇyaiḥ paśugaṇaiḥ saṃpūrṇāṃ ca mahīm imām
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0863: iṣṭvā kratuśatair vīro brāhmaṇebhyo hy amanyata
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0864: sa kaśyapasya vacanāt protsārya saritāṃ patim
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0871: ete caturbhadratarās tvayā bhadraśatādhikāḥ vyāsa uvāca
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0874: avyāharan narapatis tūṣṇīm āsīt sa sṛñjayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0875: tam abravīt tathāsīnaṃ nārado bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0876: śrutaṃ kīrtayato mahyaṃ gṛhītaṃ te mahādyute
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0877: āho svid antato naṣṭaṃ śrāddhaṃ śūdrāpatāv iva
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0878: sa evam uktaḥ pratyāha prāñjaliḥ sṛñjayas tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0881: vismayena hate śoke tamasīvārkatejasā nārada uvāca
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0882: vipāpmāsmy avyathopeto brūhi kiṃ karavāṇy aham
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0883: diṣṭyāpahataśokas tvaṃ vṛṇīṣveha yad icchasi sṛñjaya uvāca
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0884: tat tat prapatsyase sarvaṃ na mṛṣāvādino vayam
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0885: etenaiva pratīto 'haṃ prasanno yad bhavān mama nārada uvāca
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0887: punar dadāmi te putraṃ dasyubhir nihataṃ vṛthā vyāsa uvāca
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0891: tataḥ saṃgamya putreṇa prītimān abhavan nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0893: akṛtāstraś ca bhītaś ca na ca sāṃnāhiko hataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0894: ayajvā cānapatyaś ca tato 'sau jīvitaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0895: śūro vīraḥ kṛtāstraś ca pramathyārīn sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0897: brahmacaryeṇa yān kāṃś cit prajñayā ca śrutena ca
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0898: iṣṭaiś ca kratubhir yānti tāṃs te putro 'kṣayān gataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0899: vidvāṃsaḥ karmabhiḥ puṇyaiḥ svargam īhanti nityaśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0900: na tu svargād ayaṃ lokaḥ kāmyate svargavāsibhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0901: tasmāt svargagataṃ putram arjunasya hataṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0902: nehānayituṃ śakyaṃ hi kiṃ cid aprāpyam īśitum
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0903: evaṃ jñātvā sthiro bhūtvā mā śuco dhairyam āpnuhi
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0904: jīvanta eva naḥ śocyā na tu svargagatānagha
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0906: tasmāc chokaṃ parityajya śreyase prayated budhaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0907: praharṣam abhimānaṃ ca sukhaprāptiṃ ca cintayan
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0908: etad āhur budhāḥ śreyo na śokaḥ śoka ucyate
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0909: evaṃ vidvan samuttiṣṭha prayato bhava mā śucaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0910: śrutas te saṃbhavo mṛtyos tapāṃsy anupamāni ca
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0912: sṛñjayasya tu taṃ putraṃ mṛtaṃ saṃjīvitaṃ punaḥ saṃjaya uvāca
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0913: evaṃ vidvan mahārāja mā śucaḥ sādhayāmy
GE07mbh_07_u:049.021d-008_0920: punaś cācintayad dīnaḥ kiṃ svid vakṣye dhanaṃjayam dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
GE07mbh_07_u:050.000-0343_02: abhimanyau hate cāpi bāle balavatāṃ vare
GE07mbh_07_u:050.000-0343_03: maharṣisattame yāte vyāse sa tu yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:050.000-0343_06: kena vā kathitas tasya praśāntaḥ sutapāvakaḥ saṃjaya uvāca
GE07mbh_07_u:050.000-0343_07: etan me śaṃsa tattvena sarvam eveha
GE07mbh_07_u:050.000-0343_08: śṛṇu rājan yathā tebhyo nivṛttaḥ kṛṣṇasārathiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:050.000-0343_09: tataḥ sarvāṇi sainyāni dahan kṛṣṇagatir yathā
GE07mbh_07_u:050.000-0343_12: yac cāsīn mānasaṃ tasya yac ca kṛṣṇena bhāṣitam
GE07mbh_07_u:050.000-0343_13: yathā ca kathitas tasya nihataḥ sutapāvakaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:050.000-0343_14: vistareṇaiva me sarvaṃ bruvataḥ śṛṇu māriṣa
GE07mbh_07_u:050.001a: tasminn ahani nirvṛtte ghore prāṇabhṛtāṃ kṣaye
GE07mbh_07_u:050.003a: prāyāt svaśibiraṃ jiṣṇur jaitram āsthāya taṃ ratham
GE07mbh_07_u:050.004a: kiṃ nu me hṛdayaṃ trastaṃ vākyaṃ sajjati keśava
GE07mbh_07_u:050.004c: spandanti cāpy aniṣṭāni gātraṃ sīdati cācyuta
GE07mbh_07_u:050.005a: aniṣṭaṃ caiva me śliṣṭaṃ hṛdayān nāpasarpati
GE07mbh_07_u:050.005c: bhuvi yad dikṣu cāpy ugrā utpātās trāsayanti mām
GE07mbh_07_u:050.006c: api svasti bhaved rājñaḥ sāmātyasya guror mama
GE07mbh_07_u:050.007a: vyaktaṃ śivaṃ tava bhrātuḥ sāmātyasya bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_07_u:050.007c: mā śucaḥ kiṃ cid evānyat tatrāniṣṭaṃ bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_07_u:050.008c: kathayantau raṇe vṛttaṃ prayātau ratham āsthitau
GE07mbh_07_u:050.011e: vīṇā vā nādya vādyante śamyātālasvanaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_07_u:050.012a: maṅgalyāni ca gītāni na gāyanti paṭhanti ca
GE07mbh_07_u:050.013a: yodhāś cāpi hi māṃ dṛṣṭvā nivartante hy adhomukhāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:050.013c: karmāṇi ca yathāpūrvaṃ kṛtvā nābhivadanti mām
GE07mbh_07_u:050.014a: api svasti bhaved adya bhrātṛbhyo mama mādhava
GE07mbh_07_u:050.014c: na hi śudhyati me bhāvo dṛṣṭvā svajanam ākulam
GE07mbh_07_u:050.015c: sarveṣāṃ caiva yodhānāṃ sāmagryaṃ syān mamācyuta
GE07mbh_07_u:050.016a: na ca mām adya saubhadraḥ prahṛṣṭo bhrātṛbhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_07_u:050.016c: raṇād āyāntam ucitaṃ pratyudyāti hasann iva
GE07mbh_07_u:050.017a: evaṃ saṃkathayantau tau praviṣṭau śibiraṃ svakam
GE07mbh_07_u:050.018a: dṛṣṭvā bhrātṝṃś ca putrāṃś ca vimanā vānaradhvajaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:050.018c: apaśyaṃś caiva saubhadram idaṃ vacanam abravīt

GE07mbh_07_u:052.012a: tasmān mām anujānīta bhadraṃ vo 'stu nararṣabhāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:052.012c: adarśanaṃ gamiṣyāmi na māṃ drakṣyanti pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:052.012d-0376_01: vṛttam āsthāya tanyūjyaṃ (sic) sopanīto bhavāmy aham
GE07mbh_07_u:052.012d-0376_02: duḥśalā bhrātṛsauhārdān māṃ rakṣasyatha vā dhruvam
GE07mbh_07_u:052.014a: na bhetavyaṃ naravyāghra ko hi tvā puruṣarṣabha
GE07mbh_07_u:052.016a: purumitro jayo bhojaḥ kāmbojaś ca sudakṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:052.017a: duḥśāsanaḥ subāhuś ca kaliṅgaś cāpy udāyudhaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:052.017d-0378_02: sasainyās tvābhiyāsyanti vyetu te mānaso jvaraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:052.017d-0379_01: māyāvī balavāñ śūro rākṣasaś cāpy alambusaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:052.017d-0379_02: ime ca tvābhigopsyanti sainyena mahatā vṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:052.018a: tvaṃ cāpi rathināṃ śreṣṭhaḥ svayaṃ śūro 'mitadyutiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:052.018c: sa kathaṃ pāṇḍaveyebhyo bhayaṃ paśyasi saindhava
GE07mbh_07_u:052.019a: akṣauhiṇyo daśaikā ca madīyās tava rakṣaṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:052.019c: yattā yotsyanti mā bhais tvaṃ saindhava vyetu te bhayam
GE07mbh_07_u:052.020a: evam āśvāsito rājan putreṇa tava saindhavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:052.021a: upasaṃgrahaṇaṃ kṛtvā droṇāya sa viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:052.022c: mama bravītu bhagavān viśeṣaṃ phalgunasya ca
GE07mbh_07_u:052.023c: mamārjunasya ca vibho yathātattvaṃ pracakṣva me
GE07mbh_07_u:052.024a: samam ācāryakaṃ tāta tava caivārjunasya ca
GE07mbh_07_u:052.025a: na tu te yudhi saṃtrāsaḥ kāryaḥ pārthāt kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_07_u:052.025c: ahaṃ hi rakṣitā tāta bhayāt tvāṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:052.026a: na hi madbāhuguptasya prabhavanty amarā api
GE07mbh_07_u:052.026c: vyūhiṣyāmi ca taṃ vyūhaṃ yaṃ pārtho na tariṣyati
GE07mbh_07_u:052.027a: tasmād yudhyasva mā bhais tvaṃ svadharmam anupālaya
GE07mbh_07_u:052.028a: adhītya vidhivad vedān agnayaḥ suhutās tvayā
GE07mbh_07_u:052.028c: iṣṭaṃ ca bahubhir yajñair na te mṛtyubhayād bhayam
GE07mbh_07_u:052.029a: durlabhaṃ mānuṣair mandair mahābhāgyam avāpya tu
GE07mbh_07_u:052.030a: kuravaḥ pāṇḍavāś caiva vṛṣṇayo 'nye ca mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:052.030c: ahaṃ ca saha putreṇa adhruvā iti cintyatām
GE07mbh_07_u:052.031a: paryāyeṇa vayaṃ sarve kālena balinā hatāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:052.031c: paralokaṃ gamiṣyāmaḥ svaiḥ svaiḥ karmabhir anvitāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:052.032a: tapas taptvā tu yāṃl lokān prāpnuvanti tapasvinaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:052.033c: apānudad bhayaṃ pārthād yuddhāya ca mano dadhe
GE07mbh_07_u:052.033d-0381_01: tataḥ praharṣaḥ sainyānāṃ tavāpy āsīd viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:053.002a: bhrātṝṇāṃ matam ājñāya tvayā vācā pratiśrutam
GE07mbh_07_u:053.002c: saindhavaṃ śvo 'smi hanteti tat sāhasatamaṃ kṛtam
GE07mbh_07_u:053.004c: ta ime śīghram āgamya pravṛttiṃ vedayanti naḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:053.005c: siṃhanādaḥ savāditraḥ sumahān iha taiḥ śrutaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:053.008c: rātrau niryāsyati krodhād iti matvā vyavasthitāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:053.009a: tair yatadbhir iyaṃ satyā śrutā satyavatas tava
GE07mbh_07_u:053.010a: tato vimanasaḥ sarve trastāḥ kṣudramṛgā iva
GE07mbh_07_u:053.010c: āsan suyodhanāmātyāḥ sa ca rājā jayadrathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:053.011b-0383_01: bhṛśaṃ vimanaso bhūtvā śibirāṇi svakāni te
GE07mbh_07_u:053.012a: sa mantrakāle saṃmantrya sarvā naiḥśreyasīḥ kriyāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:053.013c: pratijñāto hi senāyā madhye tena vadho mama
GE07mbh_07_u:053.013d-0384_02: iti vāco bahuvidhā[ḥ] pārthena pratijñā kṛtā
GE07mbh_07_u:053.014a: tāṃ na devā na gandharvā nāsuroragarākṣasāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:053.015a: te māṃ rakṣata saṃgrāme mā vo mūrdhni dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:053.015c: padaṃ kṛtvāpnuyāl lakṣyaṃ tasmād atra vidhīyatām
GE07mbh_07_u:053.016a: atha rakṣā na me saṃkhye kriyate kurunandana
GE07mbh_07_u:053.016c: anujānīhi māṃ rājan gamiṣyāmi gṛhān prati
GE07mbh_07_u:053.017a: evam uktas tv avākśīrṣo vimanāḥ sa suyodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:053.018a: tam ārtam abhisaṃprekṣya rājā kila sa saindhavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:053.018c: mṛdu cātmahitaṃ caiva sāpekṣam idam uktavān
GE07mbh_07_u:053.023c: sāmarān api lokāṃs trīn nihanyād iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:053.023d-0386_01: yathā dāśarathiṃ rāmaṃ sahāyaṃ prāpya durdharam
GE07mbh_07_u:053.023d-0386_02: vālinaṃ ghātayām āsa sugrīvo 'sau tathātra mām
GE07mbh_07_u:053.024a: so 'ham icchāmy anujñātuṃ rakṣituṃ vā mahātmanā
GE07mbh_07_u:053.025a: sa rājñā svayam ācāryo bhṛśam ākrandito 'rjuna
GE07mbh_07_u:053.025c: saṃvidhānaṃ ca vihitaṃ rathāś ca kila sajjitāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:053.026a: karṇo bhūriśravā drauṇir vṛṣasenaś ca durjayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:053.026c: kṛpaś ca madrarājaś ca ṣaḍ ete 'sya purogamāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:053.027a: śakaṭaḥ padmapaś cārdho vyūho droṇena kalpitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:053.028a: dhanuṣy astre ca vīrye ca prāṇe caiva tathorasi
GE07mbh_07_u:053.028c: aviṣahyatamā hy ete niścitāḥ pārtha ṣaḍ rathāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:053.028e: etān ajitvā sagaṇān naiva prāpyo jayadrathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:053.029a: teṣām ekaikaśo vīryaṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ tvam anucintaya
GE07mbh_07_u:053.029c: sahitā hi naravyāghrā na śakyā jetum añjasā
GE07mbh_07_u:053.030a: bhūyaś ca cintayiṣyāmi nītim ātmahitāya vai
GE07mbh_07_u:053.031a: ṣaḍ rathān dhārtarāṣṭrasya manyase yān balādhikān
GE07mbh_07_u:053.031c: teṣāṃ vīryaṃ mamārdhena na tulyam iti lakṣaye
GE07mbh_07_u:053.032d-0387_01: paśyatas te nihantāsmi yadi te vajradhāriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:053.034a: yadi sādhyāś ca rudrāś ca vasavaś ca sahāśvinaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:053.035c: dyaur viyat pṛthivī ceyaṃ diśaś ca sadigīśvarāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:053.037a: tathāpi bāṇair nihataṃ śvo draṣṭāsi raṇe mayā
GE07mbh_07_u:053.037c: satyena te śape kṛṣṇa tathaivāyudham ālabhe
GE07mbh_07_u:053.038a: yaś ca goptā maheṣvāsas tasya pāpasya durmateḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:053.038c: tam eva prathamaṃ droṇam abhiyāsyāmi keśava
GE07mbh_07_u:053.039a: tasmin dyūtam idaṃ baddhaṃ manyate sma suyodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:053.039c: tasmāt tasyaiva senāgraṃ bhittvā yāsyāmi saindhavam
GE07mbh_07_u:053.040c: śṛṅgāṇīva girer vajrair dāryamāṇān mayā yudhi
GE07mbh_07_u:053.040d-0388_01: mayā nipātitān saṃkhye vajrair iva girivrajān
GE07mbh_07_u:053.041c: patadbhyaḥ patitebhyaś ca vibhinnebhyaḥ śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:053.043a: yamāt kuberād varuṇād rudrād indrāc ca yan mayā
GE07mbh_07_u:053.043c: upāttam astraṃ ghoraṃ vai tad draṣṭāro narā yudhi
GE07mbh_07_u:053.045c: āstīryamāṇāṃ pṛthivīṃ draṣṭāsi śvo mayā yudhi
GE07mbh_07_u:053.045d-0389_01: mayā draṣṭāsi vistīrṇāṃ kīryamāṇāṃ ca medinīm
GE07mbh_07_u:053.047c: mayā saindhavako rājā hataḥ svāñ śocayiṣyati
GE07mbh_07_u:053.048c: mayā sarājakā bāṇair nunnā naṃkṣyanti saindhavāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:053.049a: tathā prabhāte kartāsmi yathā kṛṣṇa suyodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:053.049c: nānyaṃ dhanurdharaṃ loke maṃsyate matsamaṃ yudhi
GE07mbh_07_u:053.050a: gāṇḍīvaṃ ca dhanur divyaṃ yoddhā cāhaṃ nararṣabha
GE07mbh_07_u:053.050c: tvaṃ ca yantā hṛṣīkeśa kiṃ nu syād ajitaṃ mayā
GE07mbh_07_u:053.050d-0390_01: tava prasādād bhagavan kim ivāsti raṇe mama
GE07mbh_07_u:053.050d-0390_02: aviṣahyaṃ hṛṣīkeśa kiṃ jānan māṃ vigarhase
GE07mbh_07_u:053.051a: yathā hi lakṣma candre vai samudre ca yathā jalam
GE07mbh_07_u:053.051c: evam etāṃ pratijñāṃ me satyāṃ viddhi janārdana
GE07mbh_07_u:053.051d-0391_02: vibhunā sādhayiṣyāmi tathā taṃ saindhavaṃ ripum
GE07mbh_07_u:053.053a: yathā hi yātvā saṃgrāme na jīye vijayāmi ca
GE07mbh_07_u:053.053c: tena satyena saṃgrāme hataṃ viddhi jayadratham
GE07mbh_07_u:053.054a: dhruvaṃ vai brāhmaṇe satyaṃ dhruvā sādhuṣu saṃnatiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:053.054c: śrīr dhruvā cāpi dakṣeṣu dhruvo nārāyaṇe jayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:053.054d-0392_01: tvaṃ ca mādhava sarvaṃ tat tathā pratividhāsyasi
GE07mbh_07_u:053.055a: evam uktvā hṛṣīkeśaṃ svayam ātmānam ātmanā
GE07mbh_07_u:053.056a: yathā prabhātāṃ rajanīṃ kalpitaḥ syād ratho mama
GE07mbh_07_u:053.056c: tathā kāryaṃ tvayā kṛṣṇa kāryaṃ hi mahad udyatam
GE07mbh_07_u:054.001a: tāṃ niśāṃ duḥkhaśokārtau śvasantāv iva coragau
GE07mbh_07_u:054.002c: vyathitāś cintayām āsuḥ kiṃ svid etad bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_07_u:054.003a: vavuś ca dāruṇā vātā rūkṣā gorābhiśaṃsinaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:054.005c: pratisrotaḥ pravṛttāś ca tathā gantuṃ samudragāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:054.007a: vāhanāni śakṛnmūtre mumucū ruruduś ca ha
GE07mbh_07_u:054.007c: tān dṛṣṭvā dāruṇān sarvān utpātāṃl lomaharṣaṇān
GE07mbh_07_u:054.007d-0394_01: dīnāś ca pārthivāḥ sarve nāśaṃsur jayam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:054.008a: sarve te vyathitāḥ sainyās tvadīyā bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_07_u:054.009c: āśvāsaya subhadrāṃ tvaṃ bhaginīṃ snuṣayā saha
GE07mbh_07_u:054.012a: mā śokaṃ kuru vārṣṇeyi kumāraṃ prati sasnuṣā
GE07mbh_07_u:054.013c: sadṛśaṃ maraṇaṃ hy etat tava putrasya mā śucaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:054.015a: jitvā subahuśaḥ śatrūn preṣayitvā ca mṛtyave
GE07mbh_07_u:054.016c: santo yāṃ gatim icchanti prāptas tāṃ tava putrakaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:054.017c: mā śucas tanayaṃ bhadre gataḥ sa paramāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_07_u:054.018a: prāpsyate cāpy asau kṣudraḥ saindhavo bālaghātakaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:054.019c: na hi mokṣyati pārthāt sa praviṣṭo 'py amarāvatīm
GE07mbh_07_u:054.020a: śvaḥ śiraḥ śroṣyase tasya saindhavasya raṇe hṛtam
GE07mbh_07_u:054.020c: samantapañcakād bāhyaṃ viśokā bhava mā rudaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:054.021a: kṣatradharmaṃ puraskṛtya gataḥ śūraḥ satāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_07_u:054.021c: yāṃ vayaṃ prāpnuyāmeha ye cānye śastrajīvinaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:054.022c: gatas tava varārohe putraḥ svargaṃ jvaraṃ jahi
GE07mbh_07_u:054.023a: anu jātaś ca pitaraṃ mātṛpakṣaṃ ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_07_u:054.023c: sahasraśo ripūn hatvā hataḥ śūro mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:054.024a: āśvāsaya snuṣāṃ rājñi mā śucaḥ kṣatriye bhṛṣam
GE07mbh_07_u:054.024c: śvaḥ priyaṃ sumahac chrutvā viśokā bhava nandini
GE07mbh_07_u:054.025a: yat pārthena pratijñātaṃ tat tathā na tad anyathā
GE07mbh_07_u:054.025c: cikīrṣitaṃ hi te bhartur na bhavej jātu niṣphalam
GE07mbh_07_u:054.026a: yadi ca manujapannagāḥ piśācā; rajanicarāḥ patagāḥ surāsurāś ca
GE07mbh_07_u:054.026c: raṇagatam abhiyānti sindhurājaṃ; na sa bhavitā saha tair api prabhāte
GE07mbh_07_u:055.001a: etac chrutvā vacas tasya keśavasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:055.002a: hā putra mama mandāyāḥ kathaṃ saṃyugam etya ha
GE07mbh_07_u:055.003c: mukhaṃ te dṛśyate vatsa guṇṭhitaṃ raṇareṇunā
GE07mbh_07_u:055.004a: nūnaṃ śūraṃ nipatitaṃ tvāṃ paśyanty anivartinam
GE07mbh_07_u:055.005c: bhūtāni tvā nirīkṣante nūnaṃ candram ivoditam
GE07mbh_07_u:055.006c: bhūmāv adya kathaṃ śeṣe vipraviddhaḥ sukhocitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:055.007c: katham anvāsyate so 'dya śivābhiḥ patito mṛdhe
GE07mbh_07_u:055.009c: pāñcāleṣu ca vīreṣu hataḥ kenāsy anāthavat
GE07mbh_07_u:055.009d-0396_01: yatra tvaṃ keśave nāthe satyanātho yathā hataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:055.011c: tava putra kadā bhūyo mukhaṃ drakṣyāmi nirvraṇam
GE07mbh_07_u:055.011d-0397_01: ehy ehi tṛṣito vatsa stanau pūrṇau pibāśu me
GE07mbh_07_u:055.011d-0397_02: aṅkam āruhya mandāyā hy atṛptāyāś ca darśane
GE07mbh_07_u:055.012a: dhig balaṃ bhīmasenasya dhik pārthasya dhanuṣmatām
GE07mbh_07_u:055.012c: dhig vīryaṃ vṛṣṇivīrāṇāṃ pāñcālānāṃ ca dhig balam
GE07mbh_07_u:055.013a: dhik kekayāṃs tathā cedīn matsyāṃś caivātha sṛñjayān
GE07mbh_07_u:055.013c: ye tvā raṇe gataṃ vīraṃ na jānanti nipātitam
GE07mbh_07_u:055.014a: adya paśyāmi pṛthivīṃ śūnyām iva hatatviṣam
GE07mbh_07_u:055.015c: kathaṃ tvā virathaṃ vīraṃ drakṣyāmy anyair nipātitam
GE07mbh_07_u:055.016a: hā vīra dṛṣṭo naṣṭaś ca dhanaṃ svapna ivāsi me
GE07mbh_07_u:055.017a: imāṃ te taruṇīṃ bhāryāṃ tvadādhibhir abhiplutām
GE07mbh_07_u:055.017b-0399_06: tvayā vinā kathaṃ putra jīrṇāṃ patitamānasām
GE07mbh_07_u:055.018a: aho hy akāle prasthānaṃ kṛtavān asi putraka
GE07mbh_07_u:055.018c: vihāya phalakāle māṃ sugṛddhāṃ tava darśane
GE07mbh_07_u:055.019a: nūnaṃ gatiḥ kṛtāntasya prājñair api sudurvidā
GE07mbh_07_u:055.019c: yatra tvaṃ keśave nāthe saṃgrāme 'nāthavad dhataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:055.021c: sahasradakṣiṇānāṃ ca yā gatis tām avāpnuhi
GE07mbh_07_u:055.022c: hatvārīn nihatānāṃ ca saṃgrāme tāṃ gatiṃ vraja
GE07mbh_07_u:055.023c: naiveśikaṃ cābhimataṃ dadatāṃ yā gatiḥ śubhā
GE07mbh_07_u:055.023d-0400_01: brāhmaṇebhyaḥ śaraṇyebhyo nidhiṃ nidadhatāṃ ca yā
GE07mbh_07_u:055.023d-0400_02: yā cāpi nyastadaṇḍānāṃ tāṃ gatiṃ vraja putraka
GE07mbh_07_u:055.024c: ekapatnyaś ca yāṃ yānti tāṃ gatiṃ vraja putraka
GE07mbh_07_u:055.025a: rājñāṃ sucaritair yā ca gatir bhavati śāśvatī
GE07mbh_07_u:055.026c: paiśunyāc ca nivṛttānāṃ tāṃ gatiṃ vraja putraka
GE07mbh_07_u:055.027c: amoghātithināṃ yā ca tāṃ gatiṃ vraja putraka
GE07mbh_07_u:055.027d-0401_01: kṛcchreṣu yā dhārayatām ātmānaṃ vyasaneṣu ca
GE07mbh_07_u:055.027d-0401_02: gatiḥ śokāgnidagdhānāṃ tāṃ gatiṃ vraja putraka
GE07mbh_07_u:055.027d-0401_03: pitur mātuś ca śuśrūṣāṃ kalpayantīha ye sadā
GE07mbh_07_u:055.027d-0401_04: svadāraniratānāṃ ca yā gatis tām avāpnuhi
GE07mbh_07_u:055.028a: ṛtukāle svakāṃ patnīṃ gacchatāṃ yā manasvinām
GE07mbh_07_u:055.028c: na cānyadārasevīnāṃ tāṃ gatiṃ vraja putraka
GE07mbh_07_u:055.029c: nāruṃtudānāṃ kṣamiṇāṃ yā gatis tām avāpnuhi
GE07mbh_07_u:055.031c: yāṃ gatiṃ sādhavo yānti tāṃ gatiṃ vraja putraka
GE07mbh_07_u:055.033a: tāḥ prakāmaṃ ruditvā ca vilapya ca suduḥkhitāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:055.033b-0402_01: draupadī śokasaṃtaptā ruditvā ca vilapya ca

GE07mbh_07_u:059.008a: ekaṃ tvāṃ vayam āśritya sahasrākṣam ivāmarāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:059.008c: prārthayāmo jayaṃ yuddhe śāśvatāni sukhāni ca
GE07mbh_07_u:059.009a: tvaṃ hi rājyavināśaṃ ca dviṣadbhiś ca nirākriyām
GE07mbh_07_u:059.009c: kleśāṃś ca vividhān kṛṣṇa sarvāṃs tān api vettha naḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:059.010c: sukham āyattam atyarthaṃ yātrā ca madhusūdana
GE07mbh_07_u:059.011a: sa tathā kuru vārṣṇeya yathā tvayi mano mama
GE07mbh_07_u:059.011c: arjunasya yathā satyā pratijñā syāc cikīrṣitā
GE07mbh_07_u:059.012c: pāraṃ titīrṣatām adya plavo no bhava mādhava
GE07mbh_07_u:059.013a: na hi tat kurute saṃkhye kārtavīryasamas tv api
GE07mbh_07_u:059.013c: rathī yat kurute kṛṣṇa sārathir yatnam āsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:059.013d-0440_01: yathaiva sarvāsv āpatsu pāsi vṛṣṇīñ janārdana
GE07mbh_07_u:059.013d-0440_08: varadaṃ śārṅgiṇaṃ devaṃ tat satyaṃ kuru mādhava
GE07mbh_07_u:059.014a: sāmareṣv api lokeṣu sarveṣu na tathāvidhaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:059.014c: śarāsanadharaḥ kaś cid yathā pārtho dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:059.017a: ahaṃ ca tat kariṣyāmi yathā kuntīsuto 'rjunaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:059.019a: tasyādya gṛdhrāḥ śyenāś ca vaḍagomāyavas tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:059.020a: yady asya devā goptāraḥ sendrāḥ sarve tathāpy asau
GE07mbh_07_u:059.021a: nihatya saindhavaṃ jiṣṇur adya tvām upayāsyati
GE07mbh_07_u:060.002a: taṃ praviṣṭaṃ śubhāṃ kakṣyām abhivādyāgrataḥ sthitam
GE07mbh_07_u:060.003a: mūrdhni cainam upāghrāya pariṣvajya ca bāhunā
GE07mbh_07_u:060.004a: vyaktam arjuna saṃgrāme dhruvas te vijayo mahān
GE07mbh_07_u:060.004c: yādṛg rūpā hi te chāyā prasannaś ca janārdanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:060.005a: tam abravīt tato jiṣṇur mahad āścaryam uttamam
GE07mbh_07_u:060.005c: dṛṣṭavān asmi bhadraṃ te keśavasya prasādajam
GE07mbh_07_u:060.006a: tatas tat kathayām āsa yathādṛṣṭaṃ dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:060.007a: tataḥ śirobhir avaniṃ spṛṣṭvā sarve ca vismitāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:060.007c: namaskṛtya vṛṣāṅkāya sādhu sādhv ity athābruvan
GE07mbh_07_u:060.011a: tatra gatvā hṛṣīkeśaḥ kalpayām āsa sūtavat
GE07mbh_07_u:060.012c: babhau rathavaraḥ kḷptaḥ śiśur divasakṛd yathā
GE07mbh_07_u:060.014a: taṃ tu loke varaḥ puṃsāṃ kirīṭī hemavarmabhṛt
GE07mbh_07_u:060.016a: jaitraiḥ sāṃgrāmikair mantraiḥ pūrvam eva rathottamam
GE07mbh_07_u:060.017a: sa rathe rathināṃ śreṣṭhaḥ kāñcane kāñcanāvṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:060.018c: śaryāter yajñam āyāntaṃ yathendraṃ devam aśvinau
GE07mbh_07_u:060.019a: atha jagrāha govindo raśmīn raśmivatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:060.020a: sa tābhyāṃ sahitaḥ pārtho rathapravaram āsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:060.020c: sahito budhaśukrābhyāṃ tamo nighnan yathā śaśī
GE07mbh_07_u:060.021d-0442_01: dhanur jaitraṃ tathā bāṇān dadhāno nirgato 'rjunaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:060.021d-0442_02: hantuṃ laṃkāpatiṃ devo bhagavān iva rāghavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:060.022a: tato vāditranirghoṣair maṅgalyaiś ca stavaiḥ śubhaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:060.022c: prayāntam arjunaṃ sūtā māgadhāś caiva tuṣṭuvuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:060.024c: vavau saṃharṣayan pārthaṃ dviṣataś cāpi śoṣayan
GE07mbh_07_u:060.024d-0443_01: tatas tasmin kṣaṇe rājan vividhāni śubhāni ca
GE07mbh_07_u:060.027a: yuyudhānādya yuddhe me dṛśyate vijayo dhruvaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:060.028a: so 'haṃ tatra gamiṣyāmi yatra saindhavako nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:060.028d-0444_01: gaccha tvaṃ rakṣa rājānaṃ tvaṃ hi tulyo mayā raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:060.029a: yathā paramakaṃ kṛtyaṃ saindhavasya vadhe mama
GE07mbh_07_u:060.030a: sa tvam adya mahābāho rājānaṃ paripālaya
GE07mbh_07_u:060.030c: yathaiva hi mayā guptas tvayā gupto bhavet tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:060.030d-0445_01: na hi paśyāmi taṃ loke yas tvāṃ yuddhe parājayet
GE07mbh_07_u:060.031a: tvayi cāhaṃ parāśvasya pradyumne vā mahārathe
GE07mbh_07_u:060.032a: mayy apekṣā na kartavyā kathaṃ cid api sātvata
GE07mbh_07_u:060.032c: rājany eva parā guptiḥ kāryā sarvātmanā tvayā
GE07mbh_07_u:060.033a: na hi yatra mahābāhur vāsudevo vyavasthitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:060.033c: kiṃ cid vyāpadyate tatra yatrāham api ca dhruvam
GE07mbh_07_u:060.034a: evam uktas tu pārthena sātyakiḥ paravīrahā
GE07mbh_07_u:060.034c: tathety uktvāgamat tatra yatra rājā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:061.001c: abhimanyau hate tatra ke vāyudhyanta māmakāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:061.002c: kathaṃ tat kilbiṣaṃ kṛtvā nirbhayā brūhi māmakāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:061.005a: kiṃ nu saṃjaya saṃgrāme vṛttaṃ duryodhanaṃ prati
GE07mbh_07_u:061.005c: paridevo mahān atra śruto me nābhinandanam
GE07mbh_07_u:061.006c: na śrūyante 'dya te sarve saindhavasya niveśane
GE07mbh_07_u:061.007a: stuvatāṃ nādya śrūyante putrāṇāṃ śibire mama
GE07mbh_07_u:061.008a: śabdena nāditābhīkṣṇam abhavad yatra me śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:061.008c: dīnānām adya taṃ śabdaṃ na śṛṇomi samīritam
GE07mbh_07_u:061.009c: āsīno 'haṃ purā tāta śabdam aśrauṣam uttamam
GE07mbh_07_u:061.011c: anyeṣāṃ ca sutānāṃ me na tathā śrūyate dhvaniḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:061.012a: brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyā yaṃ śiṣyāḥ paryupāsate
GE07mbh_07_u:061.013c: gītaiś ca vividhair iṣṭai ramate yo divāniśam
GE07mbh_07_u:061.014c: sūta tasya gṛhe śabdho nādya drauṇer yathā purā
GE07mbh_07_u:061.015a: droṇaputraṃ maheṣvāsaṃ gāyanā nartakāś ca ye
GE07mbh_07_u:061.015c: atyartham upatiṣṭhanti teṣāṃ na śrūyate dhvaniḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:061.016c: śrūyate so 'dya na tathā kekayānāṃ ca veśmasu
GE07mbh_07_u:061.017c: nṛtyatāṃ śrūyate tāta gaṇānāṃ so 'dya na dhvaniḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:061.018c: saumadattiṃ śrutanidhiṃ teṣāṃ na śrūyate dhvaniḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:061.019c: droṇasyāsīd avirato gṛhe tan na śṛṇomy aham
GE07mbh_07_u:061.020c: vāditranāditānāṃ ca so 'dya na śrūyate mahān
GE07mbh_07_u:061.021a: yadā prabhṛty upaplavyāc chāntim icchañ janārdanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:061.022a: tato 'ham abruvaṃ sūta mandaṃ duryodhanaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:061.023a: kālaprāptam ahaṃ manye mā tvaṃ duryodhanātigāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:061.023b-0447_01: saṃśāmya bhrātṛbhis tais tu kṣatriyān abhipālaya
GE07mbh_07_u:061.023c: śame ced yācamānaṃ tvaṃ pratyākhyāsyasi keśavam
GE07mbh_07_u:061.025a: tato duḥśāsanasyaiva karṇasya ca mataṃ dvayoḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:061.025c: anvavartata hitvā māṃ kṛṣṭaḥ kālena durmatiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:061.026a: na hy ahaṃ dyūtam icchāmi viduro na praśaṃsati
GE07mbh_07_u:061.026c: saindhavo necchate dyūtaṃ bhīṣmo na dyūtam icchati
GE07mbh_07_u:061.026c-0449_02: bāhlikaḥ somadatto vā bhīṣmo droṇāyanis tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:061.027a: śalyo bhūriśravāś caiva purumitro jayas tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:061.027c: aśvatthāmā kṛpo droṇo dyūtaṃ necchanti saṃjaya
GE07mbh_07_u:061.027d-0450_01: jayaḥ kṛpo vā dharmātmā ye cānye mama bāndhavāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:061.028a: eteṣāṃ matam ājñāya yadi varteta putrakaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:061.028d-0451_01: etebhyaś ca madūrdhvaṃ ca abhokṣyad vasudhām imām
GE07mbh_07_u:061.029c: kulīnāḥ saṃmatāḥ prājñāḥ sukhaṃ prāpsyanti pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:061.030a: dharmāpekṣo naro nityaṃ sarvatra labhate sukham
GE07mbh_07_u:061.031a: arhanty ardhaṃ pṛthivyās te bhoktuṃ sāmarthyasādhanāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:061.031d-0452_01: na ca tvābhibhaviṣyanti hitvā dharmaṃ pṛthātmajāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:061.032c: santi no jñātayas tāta yeṣāṃ śroṣyanti pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:061.034c: tvadarthaṃ bruvatāṃ tāta kariṣyanti vaco hitam
GE07mbh_07_u:061.035a: kaṃ vā tvaṃ manyase teṣāṃ yas tvā brūyād ato 'nyathā
GE07mbh_07_u:061.035c: kṛṣṇo na dharmaṃ saṃjahyāt sarve te ca tvadanvayāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:061.036a: mayāpi coktās te vīrā vacanaṃ dharmasaṃhitam
GE07mbh_07_u:061.037a: ity ahaṃ vilapan sūta bahuśaḥ putram uktavān
GE07mbh_07_u:061.037c: na ca me śrutavān mūḍho manye kālasya paryayam
GE07mbh_07_u:061.038c: uttamaujāś ca pāñcālyo yudhāmanyuś ca durjayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:061.039c: aśmakāḥ kekayāś caiva kṣatradharmā ca saumakiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:061.040a: caidyaś ca cekitānaś ca putraḥ kāśyasya cābhibhuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:061.040c: draupadeyā virāṭaś ca drupadaś ca mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:061.040e: yamau ca puruṣavyāghrau mantrī ca madhusūdanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:061.041a: ka etāñ jātu yudhyeta loke 'smin vai jijīviṣuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:061.042a: anyo duryodhanāt karṇāc chakuneś cāpi saubalāt
GE07mbh_07_u:061.043a: yeṣām abhīśuhastaḥ syād viṣvakseno rathe sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:061.043c: saṃnaddhaś cārjuno yoddhā teṣāṃ nāsti parājayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:061.044a: teṣāṃ mama vilāpānāṃ na hi duryodhanaḥ smaret
GE07mbh_07_u:061.044c: hatau hi puruṣavyāghrau bhīṣmadroṇau tvam āttha me
GE07mbh_07_u:061.045d-0453_02: śūnyān dṛṣṭvā rathopasthān manye śocanti putrakāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:061.046a: himātyaye yathā kakṣaṃ śuṣkaṃ vāterito mahān
GE07mbh_07_u:061.046c: agnir dahet tathā senāṃ māmikāṃ sa dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:061.047a: ācakṣva tad dhi naḥ sarvaṃ kuśalo hy asi saṃjaya
GE07mbh_07_u:061.047c: yad upāyāt tu sāyāhne kṛtvā pārthasya kilbiṣam
GE07mbh_07_u:061.047e: abhimanyau hate tāta katham āsīn mano hi vaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:061.048a: na jātu tasya karmāṇi yudhi gāṇḍīvadhanvanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:061.048c: apakṛtvā mahat tāta soḍhuṃ śakṣyanti māmakāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:061.049a: kiṃ nu duryodhanaḥ kṛtyaṃ karṇaḥ kṛtyaṃ kim abravīt
GE07mbh_07_u:061.049c: duḥśāsanaḥ saubalaś ca teṣām evaṃ gate api
GE07mbh_07_u:061.050a: yad vṛttaṃ tāta saṃgrāme mandasyāpanayair bhṛśam
GE07mbh_07_u:061.051c: durnītaṃ vā sunītaṃ vā tan mamācakṣva saṃjaya
GE07mbh_07_u:062.001c: śuśrūṣasva sthiro bhūtvā tava hy apanayo mahān
GE07mbh_07_u:062.002a: gatodake setubandho yādṛk tādṛg ayaṃ tava
GE07mbh_07_u:062.002c: vilāpo niṣphalo rājan mā śuco bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_07_u:062.002d-0454_02: kiṃ karoṣi ca tvaṃ rājan kālo hi duratikramaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:062.003c: mā śuco bharataśreṣṭha diṣṭam etat purātanam
GE07mbh_07_u:062.004a: yadi hi tvaṃ purā dyūtāt kuntīputraṃ yudhiṣṭhiram
GE07mbh_07_u:062.004c: nivartayethāḥ putrāṃś ca na tvāṃ vyasanam āvrajet
GE07mbh_07_u:062.005a: yuddhakāle punaḥ prāpte tadaiva bhavatā yadi
GE07mbh_07_u:062.005c: nivartitāḥ syuḥ saṃrabdhā na tvāṃ vyasanam āvrajet
GE07mbh_07_u:062.006c: kurūn acodayiṣyas tvaṃ na tvāṃ vyasanam āvrajet
GE07mbh_07_u:062.007c: pāñcālā vṛṣṇayaḥ sarve ye cānye 'pi mahājanāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:062.008a: sa kṛtvā pitṛkarma tvaṃ putraṃ saṃsthāpya satpathe
GE07mbh_07_u:062.008b-0455_01: aprāptaḥ sa mahad dharmaṃ kāmam arthaṃ yaśas tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:062.008c: vartethā yadi dharmeṇa na tvāṃ vyasanam āvrajet
GE07mbh_07_u:062.009a: tvaṃ tu prājñatamo loke hitvā dharmaṃ sanātanam
GE07mbh_07_u:062.010a: tat te vilapitaṃ sarvaṃ mayā rājan niśāmitam
GE07mbh_07_u:062.011a: na tathā manyate kṛṣṇo rājānaṃ pāṇḍavaṃ purā
GE07mbh_07_u:062.011c: na bhīṣmaṃ naiva ca droṇaṃ yathā tvāṃ manyate nṛpa
GE07mbh_07_u:062.012a: vyajānata yadā tu tvāṃ rājadharmād adhaś cyutam
GE07mbh_07_u:062.012c: tadā prabhṛti kṛṣṇas tvāṃ na tathā bahu manyate
GE07mbh_07_u:062.013a: paruṣāṇy ucyamānāṃś ca yathā pārthān upekṣase
GE07mbh_07_u:062.014c: atha pārthair jitāṃ kṛtsnāṃ pṛthivīṃ pratyapadyathāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:062.016a: teṣāṃ tat tādṛśaṃ karma tvām āsādya suniṣphalam
GE07mbh_07_u:062.017a: yat punar yuddhakāle tvaṃ putrān garhayase nṛpa
GE07mbh_07_u:062.017c: bahudhā vyāharan doṣān na tad adyopapadyate
GE07mbh_07_u:062.018a: na hi rakṣanti rājāno yudhyanto jīvitaṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:062.019a: yāṃ tu kṛṣṇārjunau senāṃ yāṃ sātyakivṛkodarau
GE07mbh_07_u:062.019c: rakṣeran ko nu tāṃ yudhyec camūm anyatra kauravaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:062.020a: yeṣāṃ yoddhā guḍākeśo yeṣāṃ mantrī janārdanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:062.020c: yeṣāṃ ca sātyakir goptā yeṣāṃ goptā vṛkodaraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:062.021a: ko hi tān viṣahed yoddhuṃ martyadharmā dhanurdharaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:062.021c: anyatra kauraveyebhyo ye vā teṣāṃ padānugāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:062.022a: yāvat tu śakyate kartum anuraktair janādhipaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:062.023c: kurūṇāṃ pāṇḍavaiḥ sārdhaṃ tat sarvaṃ śṛṇu tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:063.001a: tasyāṃ niśāyāṃ vyuṣṭāyāṃ droṇaḥ śastrabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:063.001c: svāny anīkāni sarvāṇi prākrāmad vyūhituṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:063.003a: visphārya ca dhanūṃṣy ājau jyāḥ karaiḥ parimṛjya ca
GE07mbh_07_u:063.004c: pītān ākāśasaṃkāśān asīn ke cic ca cikṣipuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:063.005a: carantas tv asimārgāṃś ca dhanurmārgāṃś ca śikṣayā
GE07mbh_07_u:063.005d-0457_01: dṛśyante kuñjaraiś cānyair vājibhiś ca yuyutsavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:063.009a: kvārjunaḥ kva ca govindaḥ kva ca mānī vṛkodaraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:063.009c: kva ca te suhṛdas teṣām āhvayanto raṇe tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:063.010a: tataḥ śaṅkham upādhmāya tvarayan vājinaḥ svayam
GE07mbh_07_u:063.010c: itas tatas tān racayan droṇaś carati vegitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:063.012a: tvaṃ caiva saumadattiś ca karṇaś caiva mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:063.012c: aśvatthāmā ca śalyaś ca vṛṣasenaḥ kṛpas tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:063.015a: tatrasthaṃ tvāṃ na saṃsoḍhuṃ śaktā devāḥ savāsavāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:063.015c: kiṃ punaḥ pāṇḍavāḥ sarve samāśvasihi saindhava
GE07mbh_07_u:063.016c: saṃprāyāt saha gāndhārair vṛtas taiś ca mahārathaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:063.017e: te caiva saptasāhasrā dvisāhasrāś ca saindhavāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:063.020a: tato duḥśāsanaś caiva vikarṇaś ca tavātmajau
GE07mbh_07_u:063.023a: paścārdhe tasya padmas tu garbhavyūhaḥ sudurbhidaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:063.023c: sūcī padmasya madhyastho gūḍho vyūhaḥ punaḥ kṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:063.024a: evam etaṃ mahāvyūhaṃ vyūhya droṇo vyavasthitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:063.025a: anantaraṃ ca kāmbojo jalasaṃdhaś ca māriṣa
GE07mbh_07_u:063.027a: teṣāṃ ca pṛṣṭhato rāja balena mahatā vṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:063.028a: śakaṭasya tu rājendra bhāradvājo mukhe sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:063.028c: anu tasyābhavad bhojo jugopainaṃ tataḥ svayam
GE07mbh_07_u:063.029c: dhanur visphārayan droṇas tasthau kruddha ivāntakaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:063.029d-0458_01: tasya sarvasya sainyasya netā goptā ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_07_u:063.032c: grased vyūhaḥ kṣitiṃ sarvām iti bhūtāni menire

GE07mbh_07_u:064.012d-0461_02: yudhyāmi saṃhatān etān yaśo mānaṃ ca vardhayan
GE07mbh_07_u:064.013a: evaṃ bruvan mahārāja mahātmā sa mahāmatiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:064.014a: tato 'ntaka iva kruddhaḥ savajra iva vāsavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:064.015c: yugāntāgnir ivārciṣmān pradhakṣyan vai punaḥ prajāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:064.016c: jayo jetā sthitaḥ satye pārayiṣyan mahāvratam
GE07mbh_07_u:064.018c: vidhunvan gāṇḍivaṃ saṃkhye babhau sūrya ivoditaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:064.019c: vyavasthāpya rathaṃ sajjaṃ śaṅkhaṃ dadhmau pratāpavān
GE07mbh_07_u:064.020a: atha kṛṣṇo 'py asaṃbhrāntaḥ pārthena saha māriṣa

GE07mbh_07_u:064.025c: akarod vyāditāsyaś ca bhīṣayaṃs tava sainikān
