GE07mbh_07_u:064.030c: acodayad dhayāṃs tatra yatra durmarṣaṇaḥ sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:064.032c: parān avākirat pārthaḥ parvatān iva nīradaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:064.033a: te cāpi rathinaḥ sarve tvaritāḥ kṛtahastavat
GE07mbh_07_u:064.034a: tataḥ kruddho mahābāhur vāryamāṇaḥ parair yudhi
GE07mbh_07_u:064.039a: tataḥ kabandhaḥ kaś cit tu dhanur ālambya tiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_07_u:064.039c: kaś cit khaḍgaṃ viniṣkṛṣya bhujenodyamya tiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_07_u:064.041a: hayānām uttamāṅgaiś ca hastihastaiś ca medinī
GE07mbh_07_u:064.041c: bāhubhiś ca śirobhiś ca vīrāṇāṃ samakīryata
GE07mbh_07_u:064.042a: ayaṃ pārthaḥ kutaḥ pārtha eṣa pārtha iti prabho
GE07mbh_07_u:064.042b-0466_01: tiṣṭha pārthair hi māṃ pārtha kva yāsīti ca jalpatām
GE07mbh_07_u:064.043a: anyonyam api cājaghnur ātmānam api cāpare
GE07mbh_07_u:064.048a: yo yaḥ sma samare pārthaṃ pratisaṃrabhate naraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:064.049c: na kaś cit tatra pārthasya dadarśāntaram aṇv api
GE07mbh_07_u:064.050a: yat tasya ghaṭamānasya kṣipraṃ vikṣipataḥ śarān
GE07mbh_07_u:064.051a: hastinaṃ hastiyantāram aśvam āśvikam eva ca
GE07mbh_07_u:064.051c: abhinat phalguno bāṇai rathinaṃ ca sasārathim
GE07mbh_07_u:064.052c: pramukhe tiṣṭhamānaṃ ca na kaṃ cin na nihanti saḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:064.053a: yathodayan vai gagane sūryo hanti mahat tamaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:064.054a: hastibhiḥ patitair bhinnais tava sainyam adṛśyata
GE07mbh_07_u:064.055a: yathā madhyaṃdine sūryo duṣprekṣyaḥ prāṇibhiḥ sadā
GE07mbh_07_u:064.055c: tathā dhanaṃjayaḥ kruddho duṣprekṣyo yudhi śatrubhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:064.056a: tat tathā tava putrasya sainyaṃ yudhi paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_07_u:064.058c: kaśāpārṣṇyabhighātaiś ca vāgbhir ugrābhir eva ca
GE07mbh_07_u:064.059a: codayanto hayāṃs tūrṇaṃ palāyante sma tāvakāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:064.060c: śaraiḥ saṃmohitāś cānye tam evābhimukhā yayau
GE07mbh_07_u:065.001c: ke nu tatra raṇe vīrāḥ pratyudīyur dhanaṃjayam
GE07mbh_07_u:065.003a: tathārjunena saṃbhagne tasmiṃs tava bale tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:065.004c: na tatra kaś cit saṃgrāme śaśākārjunam īkṣitum
GE07mbh_07_u:065.005a: tatas tava suto rājan dṛṣṭvā sainyaṃ tathāgatam
GE07mbh_07_u:065.007a: nāgānīkena mahatā grasann iva mahīm imām
GE07mbh_07_u:065.009a: bhūr diśaś cāntarikṣaṃ ca śabdenāsīt samāvṛtam
GE07mbh_07_u:065.010a: tān dṛṣṭvā patatas tūrṇam aṅkuśair abhicoditān
GE07mbh_07_u:065.012c: kirīṭī tad gajānīkaṃ prāviśan makaro yathā
GE07mbh_07_u:065.016a: te gajā viśikhais tīkṣṇair yudhi gāṇḍīvacoditaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:065.018a: apare dantaveṣṭeṣu kumbheṣu ca kaṭeṣu ca
GE07mbh_07_u:065.018c: śaraiḥ samarpitā nāgāḥ krauñcavad vyanadan muhuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:065.020c: padmānām iva saṃghātaiḥ pārthaś cakre nivedanam
GE07mbh_07_u:065.022a: ke cid ekena bāṇena sumuktena patatriṇā
GE07mbh_07_u:065.022c: dvau trayaś ca vinirbhinnā nipetur dharaṇītale
GE07mbh_07_u:065.022d-0474_01: atividdhāś ca nārācair vamanto rudhiraṃ mukhaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:065.022d-0475_01: tato 'rjuno bhṛśaṃ kruddhaḥ pradahann iva tejasā
GE07mbh_07_u:065.023a: maurvīṃ dhanur dhvajaṃ caiva yugānīṣās tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_07_u:065.024a: na saṃdadhan na cāpy asyan na vimuñcan na coddharan
GE07mbh_07_u:065.024c: maṇḍalenaiva dhanuṣā nṛtyan pārthaḥ sma dṛśyate
GE07mbh_07_u:065.025a: atividdhāś ca nārācair vamanto rudhiraṃ mukhaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:065.028c: cakrair vimathitair akṣai bhagnaiś ca bahudhā yugaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:065.029c: sragbhir ābharaṇair vastraiḥ patitaiś ca mahādhvajaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:065.030a: nihatair vāraṇair aśvaiḥ kṣatriyaiś ca nipātitaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:065.031d-0476_01: evaṃ bale drute yāte rājaputraṃ mahāratham
GE07mbh_07_u:065.031d-0476_02: vivyādha daśabhir bāṇais tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābravīt
GE07mbh_07_u:065.031d-0476_03: jīvitena kathaṃ gantā duruktaṃ yāvad adya te
GE07mbh_07_u:065.031d-0476_04: tad vākyasadṛśaṃ karma kuru tvaṃ yadi manyase
GE07mbh_07_u:065.031d-0476_05: evam uktvā tato rājan pārthaḥ pārthivamardanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:065.031d-0476_06: bhṛśaṃ kruddho mahārāja avidhyat tanayaṃ tava
GE07mbh_07_u:066.002a: sa tu droṇaṃ samāsādya vyūhasya pramukhe sthitam
GE07mbh_07_u:066.003a: śivena dhyāhi māṃ brahman svasti caiva vadasva me
GE07mbh_07_u:066.004c: tathā kṛṣṇasamaś caiva satyam etad bravīmi te
GE07mbh_07_u:066.005c: tathāham api te rakṣyaḥ sadaiva dvijasattama
GE07mbh_07_u:066.006c: nihantuṃ dvipadāṃ śreṣṭha pratijñāṃ rakṣa me vibho
GE07mbh_07_u:066.007a: evam uktas tadācāryaḥ pratyuvāca smayann iva
GE07mbh_07_u:066.007b-0477_01: yathā tvaṃ bhāṣase pārtha mamāpy evaṃ mataṃ vibho
GE07mbh_07_u:066.007b-0477_02: kiṃ tu svāmyarthayuktais tu kāryaṃ yuddhaṃ manīṣibhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:066.007c: mām ajitvā na bībhatso śakyo jetuṃ jayadrathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:066.008a: etāvad uktvā taṃ droṇaḥ śaravrātair avākirat
GE07mbh_07_u:066.010a: vivyādha ca raṇe droṇam anumānya viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:066.011a: tasyeṣūn iṣubhiś chittvā droṇo vivyādha tāv ubhau
GE07mbh_07_u:066.012a: iyeṣa pāṇḍavas tasya bāṇaiś chettuṃ śarāsanam
GE07mbh_07_u:066.012c: tasya cintayatas tv evaṃ phalgunasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:066.012e: droṇaḥ śarair asaṃbhrānto jyāṃ cicchedāśu vīryavān
GE07mbh_07_u:066.013a: vivyādha ca hayān asya dhvajaṃ sārathim eva ca
GE07mbh_07_u:066.014a: etasminn antare pārthaḥ sajjaṃ kṛtvā mahad dhanuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:066.014e: mumoca ṣaṭśatān bāṇān gṛhītvaikam iva drutam
GE07mbh_07_u:066.015a: punaḥ sapta śatān anyān sahasraṃ cānivartinām
GE07mbh_07_u:066.015c: cikṣepāyutaśaś cānyāṃs te 'ghnan droṇasya tāṃ camūm
GE07mbh_07_u:066.016a: taiḥ samyag astair balinā kṛtinā citrayodhinā
GE07mbh_07_u:066.021c: sa droṇameghaḥ śaravarṣavegaiḥ; prācchādayan megha ivārkaraśmīn
GE07mbh_07_u:066.023c: dhairyam ālambya bībhatsur droṇaṃ vivyādha patribhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:066.024a: droṇas tu pañcabhir bāṇair vāsudevam atāḍayat
GE07mbh_07_u:066.024c: arjunaṃ ca trisaptatyā dhvajaṃ cāsya tribhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:066.025a: viśeṣayiṣyañ śiṣyaṃ ca droṇo rājan parākramī
GE07mbh_07_u:066.027d-0478_02: yad droṇaṃ tarasā pārtho vṛddhaṃ bālo 'pi nātarat
GE07mbh_07_u:066.027d-0478_03: cintayām āsa vārṣṇeyo dṛṣṭvā droṇasya vikramam
GE07mbh_07_u:066.027d-0478_04: nātivartiṣyate hy enaṃ velām iva mahārṇavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:066.028a: tad dṛṣṭvā tādṛśaṃ yuddhaṃ droṇapāṇḍavayos tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:066.029c: pārtha pārtha mahābāho na naḥ kālātyayo bhavet
GE07mbh_07_u:066.030a: droṇam utsṛjya gacchāmaḥ kṛtyam etan mahattaram
GE07mbh_07_u:066.030c: pārthaś cāpy abravīt kṛṣṇaṃ yatheṣṭam iti keśava
GE07mbh_07_u:066.031a: tataḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā droṇaṃ prāyān mahābhujaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:066.031c: parivṛttaś ca bībhatsur agacchad visṛjañ śarān
GE07mbh_07_u:066.032a: tato 'bravīt smayan droṇaḥ kvedaṃ pāṇḍava gamyate
GE07mbh_07_u:066.032c: nanu nāma raṇe śatrum ajitvā na nivartase
GE07mbh_07_u:066.033a: gurur bhavān na me śatruḥ śiṣyaḥ putrasamo 'smi te
GE07mbh_07_u:066.033c: na cāsti sa pumāṃl loke yas tvāṃ yudhi parājayet
GE07mbh_07_u:066.036a: tato jayo mahārāja kṛtavarmā ca sāttvataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:066.036c: kāmbojaś ca śrutāyuś ca dhanaṃjayam avārayan
GE07mbh_07_u:066.038a: mācellakā lalitthāś ca kekayā madrakās tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:066.038c: nārāyaṇāś ca gopālāḥ kāmbojānāṃ ca ye gaṇāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:066.042c: anyonyaṃ vai prārthayatāṃ yodhānām arjunasya ca
GE07mbh_07_u:067.001c: drutaṃ samanuyātaś ca droṇena rathināṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:067.002a: kirann iṣugaṇāṃs tikṣṇān svaraśmīn iva bhāskaraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:067.002c: tāpayām āsa tat sainyaṃ dehaṃ vyādhigaṇo yathā
GE07mbh_07_u:067.003a: aśvo viddho dhvajaś chinnaḥ sārohaḥ patito gajaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:067.003c: chatrāṇi cāpaviddhāni rathāś cakrair vinā kṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:067.004c: ity āsīt tumulaṃ yuddhaṃ na prājñāyata kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_07_u:067.008a: taṃ tūrṇam iva bībhatsuḥ sarvaśastrabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:067.010c: yatamāno yuvā nainaṃ pratyavidhyad yad arjunaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:067.012d-0480_02: avārayad asaṃbhrānto na tv ācāryam apīḍayat
GE07mbh_07_u:067.013c: vāsudevaṃ ca saptatyā bāhvor urasi cāśugaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:067.014a: pārthas tu prahasan dhīmān ācāryaṃ sa śaraughiṇam
GE07mbh_07_u:067.014c: visṛjantaṃ śitān bāṇān avārayata taṃ yudhi
GE07mbh_07_u:067.015a: atha tau vadhyamānau tu droṇena rathasattamau
GE07mbh_07_u:067.017c: abhyayād varjayan droṇaṃ mainākam iva parvatam
GE07mbh_07_u:067.019a: tam arjunaḥ śitenājau rājan vivyādha patriṇā
GE07mbh_07_u:067.019c: punaś cānyais tribhir bāṇair mohayann iva sātvatam
GE07mbh_07_u:067.020a: bhojas tu prahasan pārthaṃ vāsudevaṃ ca mādhavam
GE07mbh_07_u:067.023a: punaś ca niśitair bāṇaiḥ pārthaṃ vivyādha pañcabhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:067.023c: taṃ pārtho navabhir bāṇair ājaghāna stanāntare
GE07mbh_07_u:067.024c: cintayām āsa vārṣṇeyo na naḥ kālātyayo bhavet
GE07mbh_07_u:067.025a: tataḥ kṛṣṇo 'bravīt pārthaṃ kṛtavarmaṇi mā dayām
GE07mbh_07_u:067.029a: tāv avidhyat tato bhojaḥ sarvapāraśavaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:067.030a: tāv apy enaṃ vivyadhatur daśabhir daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:067.030c: saṃcicchidatur apy asya dhvajaṃ kārmukam eva ca
GE07mbh_07_u:067.032a: tāv anye dhanuṣī sajye kṛtvā bhojaṃ vijaghnatuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:067.033a: na lebhāte tu tau dvāraṃ vāritau kṛtavarmaṇā
GE07mbh_07_u:067.035a: taṃ dṛṣṭvā tu tathāyāntaṃ śūro rājā śrutāyudhaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:067.036a: sa pārthaṃ tribhir ānarchat saptatyā ca janārdanam
GE07mbh_07_u:067.037a: tam arjuno navatyā tu śarāṇāṃ nataparvaṇām
GE07mbh_07_u:067.037c: ājaghāna bhṛśaṃ kruddhas tottrair iva mahādvipam
GE07mbh_07_u:067.038a: sa tan na mamṛṣe rājan pāṇḍaveyasya vikramam
GE07mbh_07_u:067.039a: tasyārjuno dhanuś chittvā śarāvāpaṃ nikṛtya ca
GE07mbh_07_u:067.040a: athānyad dhanur ādāya sa rājā krodhamūrchitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:067.040c: vāsaviṃ navabhir bāṇair bāhvor urasi cārpayat
GE07mbh_07_u:067.042a: aśvāṃś cāsyāvadhīt tūrṇaṃ sārathiṃ ca mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:067.043a: hatāśvaṃ ratham utsṛjya sa tu rājā śrutāyudhaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:067.043c: abhyadravad raṇe pārthaṃ gadām udyamya vīryavān
GE07mbh_07_u:067.044a: varuṇasyātmajo vīraḥ sa tu rājā śrutāyudhaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:067.046a: varuṇas tv abravīt prīto dadāmy asmai varaṃ hitam
GE07mbh_07_u:067.046c: divyam astraṃ sutas te 'yaṃ yanāvadhyo bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_07_u:067.047a: nāsti cāpy amaratvaṃ vai manuṣyasya kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_07_u:067.048a: durdharṣas tv eṣa śatrūṇāṃ raṇeṣu bhavitā sadā
GE07mbh_07_u:067.048c: astrasyāsya prabhāvād vai vyetu te mānaso jvaraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:067.049a: ity uktvā varuṇaḥ prādād gadāṃ mantrapuraskṛtām
GE07mbh_07_u:067.050a: uvāca cainaṃ bhagavān punar eva jaleśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:067.050c: ayudhyati na moktavyā sā tvayy eva pated iti
GE07mbh_07_u:067.050d-0482_01: hanyād eṣā pratīpaṃ hi prayoktāram iti prabho
GE07mbh_07_u:067.050d-0482_02: na cākarot sa tadvākyaṃ prāpte kāle śrutāyudhaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:067.052a: nākampayata śauriṃ sā vindhyaṃ girim ivānilaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:067.053b-0484_01: sa papāta hato bhūmau viśirā vibhujo balī
GE07mbh_07_u:067.053b-0484_02: sa bhagna iva vātena bahuśākho vanaspatiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:067.053d-0485_01: gadāṃ nivartitāṃ dṛṣṭvā nihataṃ ca śrutāyudham
GE07mbh_07_u:067.055c: kṣiptā śrutāyudhenātha tasmāt tam avadhīd gadā
GE07mbh_07_u:067.056a: yathoktaṃ varuṇenājau tathā sa nidhanaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:067.056c: vyasuś cāpy apatad bhūmau prekṣatāṃ sarvadhanvinām
GE07mbh_07_u:067.057a: patamānas tu sa babhau parṇāśāyāḥ priyaḥ sutaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:067.058a: tataḥ sarvāṇi sainyāni senāmukhyāś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:067.060a: tasya pārthaḥ śarān sapta preṣayām āsa bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:067.060c: te taṃ śūraṃ vinirbhidya prāviśan dharaṇītalam
GE07mbh_07_u:067.062a: vāsudevaṃ tribhir viddhvā punaḥ pārthaṃ ca pañcabhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:067.062c: tasya pārtho dhanuś chittvā ketuṃ ciccheda māriṣa
GE07mbh_07_u:067.063a: bhallābhyāṃ bhṛśatīkṣṇābhyāṃ taṃ ca vivyādha pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:067.063c: sa tu pārthaṃ tribhir viddhvā siṃhanādam athānadat
GE07mbh_07_u:067.065a: sā jvalantī maholkeva tam āsādya mahāratham
GE07mbh_07_u:067.066e: rathaṃ cānyaiḥ subahubhiś cakre viśakalaṃ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:067.069d-0487_01: vikīrṇaḥ patito rājā prasārya vipulau bhujau
GE07mbh_07_u:067.071a: tataḥ sarvāṇi sainyāni vyadravanta sutasya te
GE07mbh_07_u:067.071c: hataṃ śrutāyudhaṃ dṛṣṭvā kāmbojaṃ ca sudakṣiṇam
GE07mbh_07_u:068.001a: hate sudakṣiṇe rājan vīre caiva śrutāyudhe
GE07mbh_07_u:068.003c: te sma bhītāḥ palāyanta vyāghrāt kṣudramṛgā iva
GE07mbh_07_u:068.004a: te nivṛtya punaḥ pārthaṃ sarvataḥ paryavārayan
GE07mbh_07_u:068.004c: raṇe sapatnān nighnantaṃ jigīṣantan parān yudhi
GE07mbh_07_u:068.005c: śirāṃsi pātayām āsa bāhūṃś caiva dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:068.005d-0492_01: uccakarta śirāṃsy ugro nāḷebhya iva paṅkajān
GE07mbh_07_u:068.006a: śirobhiḥ patitais tatra bhūmir āsīn nirantarā
GE07mbh_07_u:068.010c: pūrayām āsatuḥ kruddhau taḍāgaṃ jaladau yathā
GE07mbh_07_u:068.011a: śrutāyuś ca tataḥ kruddhas tomareṇa dhanaṃjayam
GE07mbh_07_u:068.012c: ājagāma paraṃ mohaṃ mohayan keśavaṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:068.013a: etasminn eva kāle tu so 'cyutāyur mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:068.014a: kṣate kṣāraṃ sa hi dadau pāṇḍavasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:068.015a: tataḥ sarvasya sainyasya tāvakasya viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:068.015c: siṃhanādo mahān āsīd dhataṃ matvā dhanaṃjayam
GE07mbh_07_u:068.016a: kṛṣṇaś ca bhṛśasaṃtapto dṛṣṭvā pārthaṃ vicetasam
GE07mbh_07_u:068.017a: tatas tau rathināṃ śreṣṭhau labdhalakṣau dhanaṃjayam
GE07mbh_07_u:068.018c: adṛśyaṃ cakratur yuddhe tad adbhutam ivābhavat
GE07mbh_07_u:068.019a: pratyāśvastas tu bībhatsuḥ śanakair iva bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:068.021a: prāduścakre tataḥ pārthaḥ śākram astraṃ mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:068.022a: te jaghnus tau maheṣvāsau tābhyāṃ sṛṣṭāṃś ca sāyakān
GE07mbh_07_u:068.023c: pratasthe tatra tatraiva yodhayan vai mahārathān
GE07mbh_07_u:068.026a: tayoḥ padānugān hatvā punaḥ pañcaśatān rathān
GE07mbh_07_u:068.026c: abhyagād bhāratīṃ senāṃ nighnan pārtho varān varān
GE07mbh_07_u:068.027c: ayutāyuś ca saṃkruddho dīrghāyuś caiva bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:068.032c: prācyāś ca dākṣiṇātyāś ca kaliṅgapramukhā nṛpāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:068.033c: nicakarta śirāṃsy ugrau bāhūn api subhūṣaṇān
GE07mbh_07_u:068.034a: taiḥ śirobhir mahī kīrṇā bāhubhiś ca sahāṅgadaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:068.035a: bāhavo viśikhaiś chinnāḥ śirāṃsy unmathitāni ca
GE07mbh_07_u:068.037a: nihatāḥ śerate smānye bībhatsor niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:068.040a: cukruśuś ca nipetuś ca babhramuś cāpare diśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:068.040c: bhṛśaṃ trastāś ca bahudhā svānena mamṛdur gajāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:068.041c: yavanāḥ pāradāś caiva śakāś ca sunikaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_07_u:068.042c: dārvābhisārā daradāḥ puṇḍrāś ca saha bāhlikaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:068.043a: na te sma śakyāḥ saṃkhyātuṃ vrātāḥ śatasahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:068.043b-0494_01: abhyavarṣanta te sarve pāṇḍavaṃ niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:068.043c: vṛṣṭis tathāvidhā hy āsīc chalabhānām ivāyatiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:068.044a: abhracchāyām iva śaraiḥ sainye kṛtvā dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:068.045a: śaraiś ca śataśo viddhās te saṃghāḥ saṃghacāriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:068.046c: vaḍāḥ kaṅkā vṛkā bhūmāv apiban rudhiraṃ mudā
GE07mbh_07_u:068.049a: yathā sthalaṃ ca nimnaṃ ca na syād varṣati vāsave
GE07mbh_07_u:068.049d-0495_01: tathāsīd āplutā dhātrī rudhireṇa viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:068.050a: ṣaṭsahasrān varān vīrān punar daśaśatān varān
GE07mbh_07_u:068.051a: śaraiḥ sahasraśo viddhā vidhivat kalpitā dvipāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:068.051c: śerate bhūmim āsādya śailā vajrahatā iva
GE07mbh_07_u:068.052c: prabhinna iva mātaṅgo mṛdnan naḍavanaṃ yathā
GE07mbh_07_u:068.055a: śūnyān kurvan rathopasthān mānavaiḥ saṃstaran mahīm
GE07mbh_07_u:068.056c: prāviśad bhāratīṃ senāṃ saṃkruddho vai dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:068.057e: dhanuś cāsyāparaiś chittvā śaraiḥ pārtho vicakrame
GE07mbh_07_u:068.058b-0497_01: gadāpāṇir drutaṃ yātvā pragṛhya mahatīṃ gadām
GE07mbh_07_u:068.058c: āsasāda raṇe pārthaṃ keśavaṃ ca mahāratham
GE07mbh_07_u:068.059a: tataḥ sa prahasan vīro gadām udyamya bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:068.061a: tataḥ śarair hemapuṅkhaiḥ sagadaṃ rathināṃ varam
GE07mbh_07_u:068.061c: chādayām āsa samare meghaḥ sūryam ivoditam
GE07mbh_07_u:068.062a: tato 'paraiḥ śaraiś cāpi gadāṃ tasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:068.062c: acūrṇayat tadā pārthas tad adbhutam ivābhavat
GE07mbh_07_u:068.063a: atha tāṃ patitāṃ dṛṣṭvā gṛhyānyāṃ mahatīṃ gadām
GE07mbh_07_u:068.063c: arjunaṃ vāsudevaṃ ca punaḥ punar atāḍayat
GE07mbh_07_u:068.065a: sa papāta hato rājan vasudhām anunādayan
GE07mbh_07_u:068.065d-0498_01: ambaṣṭhe tu tadā bhagne tava sainyam abhajyata
GE07mbh_07_u:068.066c: so 'dṛśyata tadā pārtho ghanaiḥ sūrya ivāvṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:069.002a: kāmbojasya ca dāyāde hate rājan sudakṣiṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:069.003c: prabhagnaṃ svabalaṃ dṛṣṭvā putras te droṇam abhyayāt
GE07mbh_07_u:069.005a: atra buddhyā samīkṣasva kiṃ nu kāryam anantaram
GE07mbh_07_u:069.006a: yathā sa puruṣavyāghro na hanyeta jayadrathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:069.006c: tathā vidhatsva bhadraṃ te tvaṃ hi naḥ paramā gatiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:069.007c: senākakṣaṃ dahati me vahniḥ kakṣam ivotthitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:069.008a: atikrānte hi kaunteye bhittvā sainyaṃ paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_07_u:069.009a: sthirā buddhir narendrāṇām āsīd brahmavidāṃ vara
GE07mbh_07_u:069.010a: so 'sau pārtho vyatikrānto miṣatas te mahādyute
GE07mbh_07_u:069.010c: sarvaṃ hy adyāturaṃ manye naitad asti balaṃ mama
GE07mbh_07_u:069.011a: jānāmi tvāṃ mahābhāga pāṇḍavānāṃ hite ratam
GE07mbh_07_u:069.011c: tathā muhyāmi ca brahman kāryavattāṃ vicintayan
GE07mbh_07_u:069.012a: yathāśakti ca te brahman vartaye vṛttim uttamām
GE07mbh_07_u:069.012c: prīṇāmi ca yathāśakti tac ca tvaṃ nāvabudhyase
GE07mbh_07_u:069.013a: asmān na tvaṃ sadā bhaktān icchasy amitavikrama
GE07mbh_07_u:069.013c: pāṇḍavān satataṃ prīṇāsy asmākaṃ vipriye ratān
GE07mbh_07_u:069.014a: asmān evopajīvaṃs tvam asmākaṃ vipriye rataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:069.014c: na hy ahaṃ tvāṃ vijānāmi madhudigdham iva kṣuram
GE07mbh_07_u:069.015a: nādāsyac ced varaṃ mahyaṃ bhavān pāṇḍavanigrahe
GE07mbh_07_u:069.016a: mayā tv āśaṃsamānena tvattas trāṇam abuddhinā
GE07mbh_07_u:069.016c: āśvāsitaḥ sindhupatir mohād dattaś ca mṛtyave
GE07mbh_07_u:069.018a: sa tathā kuru śoṇāśva yathā rakṣyeta saindhavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:069.018c: mama cārtapralāpānāṃ mā krudhaḥ pāhi saindhavam
GE07mbh_07_u:069.019a: nābhyasūyāmi te vācam aśvatthāmnāsi me samaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:069.019c: satyaṃ tu te pravakṣyāmi taj juṣasva viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:069.020a: sārathiḥ pravaraḥ kṛṣṇaḥ śīghrāś cāsya hayottamāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:069.020c: alpaṃ ca vivaraṃ kṛtvā tūrṇaṃ yāti dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:069.021a: kiṃ nu paśyasi bāṇaughān krośamātre kirīṭinaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:069.021c: paścād rathasya patitān kṣiptāñ śīghraṃ hi gacchataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:069.022c: senāmukhe ca pārthānām etad balam upasthitam
GE07mbh_07_u:069.023a: yudhiṣṭhiraś ca me grāhyo miṣatāṃ sarvadhanvinām
GE07mbh_07_u:069.024c: tasmād vyūhamukhaṃ hitvā nāhaṃ yāsyāmi phalgunam
GE07mbh_07_u:069.025c: gatvā yodhaya mā bhais tvaṃ tvaṃ hy asya jagataḥ patiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:069.026a: rājā śūraḥ kṛtī dakṣo vairam utpādya pāṇḍavaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:069.026c: vīra svayaṃ prayāhy āśu yatra yāto dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:069.027a: kathaṃ tvām apy atikrāntaḥ sarvaśastrabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:069.028a: api śakyo raṇe jetuṃ vajrahastaḥ puraṃdaraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:069.029a: yena bhojaś ca hārdikyo bhavāṃś ca tridaśopamaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:069.030a: sudakṣiṇaś ca nihataḥ sa ca rājā śrutāyudhaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:069.030c: śrutāyuś cācyutāyuś ca mlecchāś ca śataśo hatāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:069.031a: taṃ kathaṃ pāṇḍavaṃ yuddhe dahantam ahitān bahūn
GE07mbh_07_u:069.032a: kṣamaṃ cen manyase yuddhaṃ mama tenādya śādhi mām
GE07mbh_07_u:069.032c: paravān asmi bhavati preṣyakṛd rakṣa me yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:069.033c: ahaṃ tu tat kariṣyāmi yathainaṃ prasahiṣyasi
GE07mbh_07_u:069.035a: eṣa te kavacaṃ rājaṃs tathā badhnāmi kāñcanam
GE07mbh_07_u:069.035c: yathā na bāṇā nāstrāṇi viṣahiṣyanti te raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:069.036c: yodhayanti trayo lokāḥ sanarā nāsti te bhayam
GE07mbh_07_u:069.037a: na kṛṣṇo na ca kaunteyo na cānyaḥ śastrabhṛd raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:069.037c: śarān arpayituṃ kaś cit kavace tava śakṣyati
GE07mbh_07_u:069.038a: sa tvaṃ kavacam āsthāya kruddham adya raṇe 'rjunam
GE07mbh_07_u:069.038c: tvaramāṇaḥ svayaṃ yāhi na cāsau tvāṃ sahiṣyate
GE07mbh_07_u:069.039a: evam uktvā tvaran droṇaḥ spṛṣṭvāmbho varma bhāsvaram
GE07mbh_07_u:069.040a: raṇe tasmin sumahati vijayāya sutasya te
GE07mbh_07_u:069.041a: karotu svasti te brahmā svasti cāpi dvijātayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:069.041c: sarīsṛpāś ca ye śreṣṭhās tebhyas te svasti bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:069.042c: tubhyaṃ rājarṣayaḥ sarve svasti kurvantu sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:069.043a: svasti te 'stv ekapādebhyo bahupādebhya eva ca
GE07mbh_07_u:069.043c: svasty astv apādakebhyaś ca nityaṃ tava mahāraṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:069.044a: svāhā svadhā śacī caiva svasti kurvantu te sadā
GE07mbh_07_u:069.044c: lakṣmīr arundhatī caiva kurutāṃ svasti te 'nagha
GE07mbh_07_u:069.045c: vasiṣṭhaḥ kaśyapaś caiva svasti kurvantu te nṛpa
GE07mbh_07_u:069.046a: dhātā vidhātā lokeśo diśaś ca sadigīśvarāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:069.046c: svasti te 'dya prayacchantu kārttikeyaś ca ṣaṇmukhaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:069.046d-0502_02: dhṛtāḥ sa cāhataḥ śūro hy avadhyo devatāgaṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:069.047a: vivasvān bhagavān svasti karotu tava sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:069.047b-0503_01: pārṣadā vaśagā yasya svasti tubhyaṃ prayacchatu
GE07mbh_07_u:069.047c: diggajāś caiva catvāraḥ kṣitiḥ khaṃ gaganaṃ grahāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:069.047d-0504_01: diśaś ca vidiśaś caiva svasti tubhyaṃ prakurvatām
GE07mbh_07_u:069.047d-0504_02: prajānāṃ patayaś caiva siddhā lokahite ratāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:069.047d-0504_03: svasti kurvantu te nityaṃ mantreṇānena saṃstutāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:069.048a: adhastād dharaṇīṃ yo 'sau sadā dhārayate nṛpa
GE07mbh_07_u:069.048c: sa śeṣaḥ pannagaśreṣṭhaḥ svasti tubhyaṃ prayacchatu
GE07mbh_07_u:069.050b-0505_01: vihvalā hṛtavīryāś ca sahendrā vibudhā drutāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:069.050c: brahmāṇaṃ śaraṇaṃ jagmur vṛtrād bhītā mahāsurāt
GE07mbh_07_u:069.051c: gatir bhava suraśreṣṭha trāhi no mahato bhayāt
GE07mbh_07_u:069.052a: atha pārśve sthitaṃ viṣṇuṃ śakrādīṃś ca surottamān
GE07mbh_07_u:069.052c: prāha tathyam idaṃ vākyaṃ viṣaṇṇān surasattamān
GE07mbh_07_u:069.053a: rakṣyā me satataṃ devāḥ sahendrāḥ sadvijātayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:069.053c: tvaṣṭuḥ sudurdharaṃ tejo yena vṛtro vinirmitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:069.054a: tvaṣṭrā purā tapas taptvā varṣāyutaśataṃ tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:069.055a: sa tasyaiva prasādād vai hanyād eva ripur balī
GE07mbh_07_u:069.056a: dṛṣṭvā haniṣyatha ripuṃ kṣipraṃ gacchata mandaram
GE07mbh_07_u:069.057a: te gatvā sahitā devā brahmaṇā saha mandaram
GE07mbh_07_u:069.058a: so 'bravīt svāgataṃ devā brūta kiṃ karavāṇy aham
GE07mbh_07_u:069.058c: amoghaṃ darśanaṃ mahyaṃ kāmaprāptir ato 'stu vaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:069.059a: evam uktās tu te sarve pratyūcus taṃ divaukasaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:069.059c: tejo hṛtaṃ no vṛtreṇa gatir bhava divaukasām
GE07mbh_07_u:069.060a: mūrtīr īkṣaṣva no deva prahārair jarjarīkṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:069.060c: śaraṇaṃ tvāṃ prapannāḥ sma gatir bhava maheśvara
GE07mbh_07_u:069.061a: viditaṃ me yathā devāḥ kṛtyeyaṃ sumahābalā
GE07mbh_07_u:069.062a: avaśyaṃ tu mayā kāryaṃ sāhyaṃ sarvadivaukasām
GE07mbh_07_u:069.062c: mamedaṃ gātrajaṃ śakra kavacaṃ gṛhya bhāsvaram
GE07mbh_07_u:069.063a: ity uktvā varadaḥ prādād varma tan mantram eva ca
GE07mbh_07_u:069.063c: sa tena varmaṇā guptaḥ prāyād vṛtracamūṃ prati
GE07mbh_07_u:069.064c: na saṃdhiḥ śakyate bhettuṃ varmabandhasya tasya tu
GE07mbh_07_u:069.064d-0507_01: sa tena varmaṇā gupto vṛtraṃ devaripuṃ tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:069.065a: tato jaghāna samare vṛtraṃ devapatiḥ svayam
GE07mbh_07_u:069.065c: taṃ ca matramayaṃ bandhaṃ varma cāṅgirase dadau
GE07mbh_07_u:069.067a: agniveśyo mama prādāt tena badhnāmi varma te
GE07mbh_07_u:069.068a: evam uktvā tato droṇas tava putraṃ mahādyutiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:069.068c: punar eva vacaḥ prāha śanair ācāryapuṃgavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:069.068d-0509_02: uvāca cainam ācāryas tava putram idaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:069.069b-0510_01: brahmaṇaś ca svasūktena badhnāmi kavacaṃ tava
GE07mbh_07_u:069.069c: hiraṇyagarbheṇa yathā baddhaṃ viṣṇoḥ purā raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:069.070a: yathā ca brahmaṇā baddhaṃ saṃgrāme tārakāmaye
GE07mbh_07_u:069.070c: śakrasya kavacaṃ divyaṃ tathā badhnāmy ahaṃ tava
GE07mbh_07_u:069.071a: baddhvā tu kavacaṃ tasya mantreṇa vidhipūrvakam
GE07mbh_07_u:069.071c: preṣayām āsa rājānaṃ yuddhāya mahate dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:069.072b-0511_01: prasthitaḥ sahasā rājan yatra yāto dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:069.074a: vṛtaḥ prāyān mahābāhur arjunasya rathaṃ prati
GE07mbh_07_u:069.075a: tataḥ śabdo mahān āsīt sainyānāṃ tava bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:069.075c: agādhaṃ prasthitaṃ dṛṣṭvā samudram iva kauravam
GE07mbh_07_u:070.002c: pāṇḍavāḥ somakaiḥ sārdhaṃ tato yuddham avartata
GE07mbh_07_u:070.003a: tad yuddham abhavad ghoraṃ tumulaṃ lomaharṣaṇam
GE07mbh_07_u:070.004a: rājan kadā cin nāsmābhir dṛṣṭaṃ tādṛṅ na ca śrutam
GE07mbh_07_u:070.004b-0513_01: rājan na tādṛśaṃ yuddhaṃ dṛṣṭapūrvaṃ na ca śrutam
GE07mbh_07_u:070.004c: yādṛṅ madhyagate sūrye yuddham āsīd viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:070.005c: droṇasya sainyaṃ te sarve śaravarṣair avākiran
GE07mbh_07_u:070.008a: sametya tu mahāsene cakratur vegam uttamam
GE07mbh_07_u:070.011a: samudram iva gharmānte vivān ghoro mahānilaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:070.013a: vārayām āsa tān droṇo jalaughān acalo yathā
GE07mbh_07_u:070.013c: pāṇḍavān samare kruddhān pāñcālāṃś ca sakekayān
GE07mbh_07_u:070.015a: tato raṇe naravyāghraḥ pārṣataḥ pāṇḍavaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_07_u:070.019a: yaṃ yam ārchac charair droṇaḥ pāṇḍavānāṃ rathavrajam
GE07mbh_07_u:070.019c: tatas tataḥ śarair droṇam apākarṣata pārṣataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:070.020a: tathā tu yatamānasya droṇasya yudhi bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:070.022a: sainyāny aghaṭayad yāni droṇas tu rathināṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:070.022c: vyadhamac cāpi tāny asya dhṛṣṭadyumno mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:070.024c: saṃgrāme tumule tasminn iti saṃmenire janāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:070.025c: drāvyate tadvad āpannā pāṇḍavais tava vāhinī
GE07mbh_07_u:070.027c: amarṣitas tato droṇaḥ pāñcālān vyadhamac charaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:070.028a: mṛdnatas tāny anīkāni nighnataś cāpi sāyakaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:070.028c: babhūva rūpaṃ droṇasya kālāgner iva dīpyataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:070.029a: rathaṃ nāgaṃ hayaṃ cāpi pattinaś ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:070.030a: pāṇḍavānāṃ tu sainyeṣu nāsti kaś cit sa bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:070.030c: dadhāra yo raṇe bāṇān droṇacāpacyutāñ śitān
GE07mbh_07_u:070.031c: babhrāma pārṣataṃ sainyaṃ tatra tatraiva bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:070.031d-0514_01: hanyamānaṃ tu tat sainyaṃ bhāradvājena sarvataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:070.032c: abhavat sarvato dīptaṃ śuṣkaṃ vanam ivāgninā
GE07mbh_07_u:070.033c: tyaktvā prāṇān paraṃ śaktyā prāyudhyanta sma sainikāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:070.034c: nāsīt kaś cin mahārāja yo 'tyākṣīt saṃyugaṃ bhayāt
GE07mbh_07_u:070.039c: madrāṇām īśvaraḥ śalyo rājā rājānam āvṛṇot
GE07mbh_07_u:070.040a: duḥśāsanas tv avasthāpya svam anīkam amarṣaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:070.040c: sātyakiṃ prayayau kruddhaḥ śūro rathavaraṃ yudhi
GE07mbh_07_u:070.045a: dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ ca pāñcālyaṃ krūraiḥ sārdhaṃ prabhadrakaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:070.047d-0515_01: evaṃ dvaṃdvaśatāny āsaṃs tava teṣāṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:070.048a: saindhavaḥ pṛṣṭhatas tv āsīt sarvasainyasya bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:070.049c: drauṇir dakṣiṇato rājan sūtaputraś ca vāmataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:070.050c: kṛpaś ca vṛṣasenaś ca śalaḥ śalyaś ca durjayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:071.001a: rājan saṃgrāmam āścaryaṃ śṛṇu kīrtayato mama
GE07mbh_07_u:071.001c: kurūṇāṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ ca yathā yuddham avartata
GE07mbh_07_u:071.003a: rakṣamāṇāḥ svakaṃ vyūhaṃ droṇasyāpi ca sainikāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:071.003c: ayodhayan raṇe pārthān prārthayanto mahad yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:071.005a: virāṭaś ca mahārāja tāv ubhau samare sthitau
GE07mbh_07_u:071.009d-0516_02: sālvako bilvakaś cobhau yathā viṣṇuṃ kṛte yuge
GE07mbh_07_u:071.010a: tābhyāṃ tatra śarair muktair antarikṣaṃ diśas tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:071.010c: abhavat saṃvṛtaṃ sarvaṃ na prājñāyata kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_07_u:071.010d-0517_01: na sma vijñāyate rājan nāpy anyo bubudhe kriyām
GE07mbh_07_u:071.011c: sasainyo yodhayām āsa gajaḥ pratigajaṃ yathā
GE07mbh_07_u:071.013a: ayodhayaṃs te ca bhṛśaṃ taṃ śaraughaiḥ samantataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:071.013c: indriyārthā yathā dehaṃ śaśvad dehabhṛtāṃ vara
GE07mbh_07_u:071.014a: vārṣṇeyaṃ sātyakiṃ yuddhe putro duḥśāsanas tava
GE07mbh_07_u:071.016a: samāśvastas tu vārṣṇeyas tava putraṃ mahāratham
GE07mbh_07_u:071.017c: rejatuḥ samare rājan puṣpitāv iva kiṃśukau
GE07mbh_07_u:071.018c: aśobhata paraṃ lakṣmyā puṣpāḍhya iva kiṃśukaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:071.019a: kuntibhojaṃ tato rakṣo viddhvā bahubhir āyasaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:071.019c: anadad bhairavaṃ nādaṃ vāhinyāḥ pramukhe tava
GE07mbh_07_u:071.020a: tatas tau samare śūrau yodhayantau parasparam
GE07mbh_07_u:071.021a: śakuniṃ rabhasaṃ yuddhe kṛtavairaṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:071.021c: mādrīputrau ca saṃrabdhau śarair ardayatāṃ mṛdhe
GE07mbh_07_u:071.022a: tan mūlaḥ sa mahārāja prāvartata janakṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:071.023c: ya imāṃ pṛthivīṃ rājan dagdhuṃ sarvāṃ samudyataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:071.024a: śakuniḥ pāṇḍuputrābhyāṃ kṛtaḥ sa vimukhaḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:071.024c: nābhyajānata kartavyaṃ yudhi kiṃ cit parākramam
GE07mbh_07_u:071.025c: vavarṣatuḥ punar bāṇair yathā meghau mahāgirim
GE07mbh_07_u:071.027a: ghaṭotkacas tathā śūraṃ rākṣasaṃ tam alāyudham
GE07mbh_07_u:071.027c: abhyayād rabhasaṃ yuddhe vegam āsthāya madhyamam
GE07mbh_07_u:071.028c: yādṛśaṃ hi purā vṛttaṃ rāmarāvaṇayor mṛdhe
GE07mbh_07_u:071.029c: viddhvā pañcāśatā bāṇaiḥ punar vivyādha saptabhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:071.030a: tataḥ pravavṛte yuddhaṃ tayor atyadbhutaṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_07_u:072.001a: tathā tasmin pravṛtte tu saṃgrāme lomaharṣaṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:072.005a: saṃkṣaye tu tathā bhūte vartamāne mahābhaye
GE07mbh_07_u:072.009d-0518_01: tāvakāḥ samare yodhāḥ pāṇḍaveyāś ca vikṣatāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:072.013a: gṛdhrāḥ kaṅkā vaḍāḥ śyenā vāyasā jambukās tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:072.014a: bhakṣayantaḥ sma māṃsāni pibantaś cāpi śoṇitam
GE07mbh_07_u:072.014c: vilumpantaḥ sma keśāṃś ca majjāś ca bahudhā nṛpa
GE07mbh_07_u:072.016c: raṇe jayaṃ prārthayanto bhṛśaṃ yuyudhire tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:072.018a: gadābhiḥ parighaiś cānye vyāyudhāś ca bhujair api
GE07mbh_07_u:072.019a: rathino rathibhiḥ sārdham aśvārohāś ca sādibhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:072.020a: kṣībā ivānye conmattā raṅgeṣv iva ca cāraṇāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:072.021a: vartamāne tathā yuddhe nirmaryāde viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:072.022a: te hayā sādhv aśobhanta vimiśrā vātaraṃhasaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:072.022e: hayāḥ śuśubhire rājan meghā iva savidyutaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:072.023a: dhṛṣṭadyumnaś ca saṃprekṣya droṇam abhyāśam āgatam
GE07mbh_07_u:072.026c: na dadarśāntaraṃ droṇas tad adbhutam ivābhavat
GE07mbh_07_u:072.028c: droṇo drupadaputrasya khaḍgaṃ ca daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:072.029a: hayāṃś caiva catuḥṣaṣṭyā śarāṇāṃ jaghnivān balī
GE07mbh_07_u:072.029c: dhvajaṃ chatraṃ ca bhallābhyāṃ tathobhau pārṣṇisārathī
GE07mbh_07_u:072.031a: taṃ caturdaśabhir bāṇair bāṇaṃ ciccheda sātyakiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:072.034a: tato droṇaṃ śineḥ pautro grasantam iva sṛñjayān
GE07mbh_07_u:072.035a: tataḥ sarve rathās tūrṇaṃ pāñcālā jayagṛddhinaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:073.001a: bāṇe tasmin nikṛtte tu dhṛṣṭadyumne ca mokṣite
GE07mbh_07_u:073.002c: naravyāghraḥ śineḥ pautre droṇaḥ kim akarod yudhi
GE07mbh_07_u:073.009a: etaṃ vai brāhmaṇaṃ krūraṃ svakarmaṇy anavasthitam
GE07mbh_07_u:073.010d-0520_01: evam uktas tataḥ sūtaḥ satyakasyāvahad ratham
GE07mbh_07_u:073.011d-0521_04: pūrayām āsatur vīrāv ubhau daśa diśaḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:073.011d-0521_06: na sma sūryas tadā bhāti na vavau ca samīraṇaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:073.017a: ubhayos tau rathau rājaṃs te cāśvāstau ca sārathī
GE07mbh_07_u:073.017c: rukmapuṅkhaiḥ śaraiś channāś citrarūpā babhus tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:073.019a: ubhayoḥ patite chatre tathaiva patitau dhvajau
GE07mbh_07_u:073.020a: sravadbhiḥ śoṇitaṃ gātraiḥ prasrutāv iva vāraṇau
GE07mbh_07_u:073.021c: upāraman mahārāja vyājahāra na kaś cana
GE07mbh_07_u:073.025c: dhvajair ābharaṇaiś citraiḥ kavacaiś ca hiraṇmayaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:073.026c: vimalair niśitaiḥ śastrair hayānāṃ ca prakīrṇakaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:073.029a: apaśyann asmadīyāś ca te ca yaudhiṣṭhirāḥ sthitāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:073.029c: tad yuddhaṃ yuyudhānasya droṇasya ca mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:073.033a: tato droṇasya dāśārhaḥ śarāṃś ciccheda saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:073.033c: patribhiḥ sudṛḍhair āśu dhanuś caiva mahādyute
GE07mbh_07_u:073.034c: sajyaṃ cakāra tac cāśu cicchedāsya sa sātyakiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:073.035a: tatas tvaran punar droṇo dhanurhasto vyatiṣṭhata
GE07mbh_07_u:073.035c: sajyaṃ sajyaṃ punaś cāsya ciccheda niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:073.035d-0526_01: cakāra tatra panthānaṃ yayau yena janārdanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:073.035d-0527_02: na cāntaraṃ tayor dṛṣṭaṃ saṃdhāne chedane 'pi ca
GE07mbh_07_u:073.037c: bhīṣme ca puruṣavyāghre yad idaṃ sātvatāṃ vare
GE07mbh_07_u:073.038a: taṃ cāsya manasā droṇaḥ pūjayām āsa vikramam
GE07mbh_07_u:073.039b-0529_01: siddhacāraṇasaṃghāś ca sādhu sādhv iti cukruśuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:073.039c: na tām ālakṣayām āsur laghutāṃ śīghrakāriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:073.040a: devāś ca yuyudhānasya gandharvāś ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:073.040c: siddhacāraṇasaṃghāś ca vidur droṇasya karma tat
GE07mbh_07_u:073.041c: astrair astravidāṃ śreṣṭho yodhayām āsa bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:073.042c: jaghāna niśitair bāṇais tad adbhutam ivābhavat
GE07mbh_07_u:073.044a: yad astram asyati droṇas tad evāsyati sātyakiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:073.044d-0530_01: ity āsīt tumulaḥ śabdo durdharṣasya rathaṃ prati
GE07mbh_07_u:073.046a: tad āgneyaṃ mahāghoraṃ ripughnam upalakṣya saḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:073.047c: na vicerus tadākāśe bhūtāny ākāśagāny api
GE07mbh_07_u:073.048c: na tāvad abhiṣajyete vyāvartad atha bhāskaraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:073.049a: tato yudhiṣṭhiro rājā bhīmasenaś ca pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:073.050c: matsyāḥ śālveyasenāś ca droṇam ājagmur añjasā
GE07mbh_07_u:073.052a: tato yuddham abhūd rājaṃs tava teṣāṃ ca dhanvinām
GE07mbh_07_u:073.053a: sarvam āvignam abhavan na prājñāyata kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_07_u:073.053d-0531_01: tenāntareṇa pārthas tu raṇe jitvā mahārathān
GE07mbh_07_u:073.053d-0531_02: atikrāntas tadā yuddhaṃ kṛtvā paryavatasthivān saṃjaya uvāca
GE07mbh_07_u:074.001-0532_01: vartamāne tathā yuddhe droṇasya saha pāṇḍubhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:074.001a: parivartamāne tv āditye tatra sūryasya raśmibhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:074.001c: rajasā kīryamāṇāś ca mandībhūtāś ca sainikāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:074.002c: bhajyatāṃ jayatāṃ caiva jagāma tad ahaḥ śanaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:074.004c: cakāra tatra panthānaṃ yayau yena janārdanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:074.005a: yatra yatra ratho yāti pāṇḍavasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:074.005c: tatra tatraiva dīryante senās tava viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:074.006a: rathaśikṣāṃ tu dāśārho darśayām āsa vīryavān
GE07mbh_07_u:074.008c: rudhiraṃ patagaiḥ sārdhaṃ prāṇināṃ papur āhave
GE07mbh_07_u:074.009a: rathasthitaḥ krośamātre yān asyaty arjunaḥ śarān
GE07mbh_07_u:074.009c: rathe krośam atikrānte tasya te ghnanti śātravān
GE07mbh_07_u:074.011a: na tathā gacchati rathas tapanasya viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:074.011c: nendrasya na ca rudrasya nāpi vaiśravaṇasya ca
GE07mbh_07_u:074.012a: nānyasya samare rājan gatapūrvas tathā rathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:074.013a: praviśya tu raṇe rājan keśavaḥ paravīrahā
GE07mbh_07_u:074.013c: senāmadhye hayāṃs tūrṇaṃ codayām āsa bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:074.014a: tatas tasya rathaughasya madhyaṃ prāpya hayottamāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:074.015a: kṣatāś ca bahubhiḥ śastrair yuddhaśauṇḍair anekaśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:074.015c: maṇḍalāni vicitrāṇi vicerus te muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:074.016a: hatānāṃ vājināgānāṃ rathānāṃ ca naraiḥ saha
GE07mbh_07_u:074.016d-0533_01: śrameṇa mahatā yuktās te hayā vātaraṃhasaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:074.017a: etasminn antare vīrāv āvantyau bhrātarau nṛpa
GE07mbh_07_u:074.018a: tāv arjunaṃ catuḥṣaṣṭyā saptatyā ca janārdanam
GE07mbh_07_u:074.020a: tatas tau tu śaraugheṇa bībhatsuṃ sahakeśavam
GE07mbh_07_u:074.021a: tayos tu dhanuṣī citre bhallābhyāṃ śvetavāhanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:074.021c: ciccheda samare tūrṇaṃ dhvajau ca kanakojjvalau
GE07mbh_07_u:074.022a: athānye dhanuṣī rājan pragṛhya samare tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:074.023b-0534_01: tau tu śastrabhṛtāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ śaraiḥ saṃtoṣya bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:074.023c: ciccheda dhanuṣī tūrṇaṃ bhūya eva dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:074.025a: jyeṣṭhasya ca śiraḥ kāyāt kṣurapreṇa nyakṛntata
GE07mbh_07_u:074.025c: sa papāta hataḥ pṛthvyāṃ vātarugṇa iva drumaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:074.026a: vindaṃ tu nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā anuvindaḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_07_u:074.026c: hatāśvaṃ ratham utsṛjya gadāṃ gṛhya mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:074.027c: gadayā gadināṃ śreṣṭho nṛtyann iva mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:074.028c: spṛṣṭvā nākampayat kruddho mainākam iva parvatam
GE07mbh_07_u:074.029a: tasyārjunaḥ śaraiḥ ṣaḍbhir grīvāṃ pādau bhujau śiraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:074.030a: tatas tau nihatau dṛṣṭvā tayo rājan padānugāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:074.031a: tān arjunaḥ śarais tūrṇaṃ nihatya bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_07_u:074.031c: vyarocata yathā vahnir dāvaṃ dagdhvā himātyaye
GE07mbh_07_u:074.032a: tayoḥ senām atikramya kṛcchrān niryād dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:074.033a: taṃ dṛṣṭvā kuravas trastāḥ prahṛṣṭāś cābhavan punaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:074.034a: śrāntaṃ cainaṃ samālakṣya jñātvā dūre ca saindhavam
GE07mbh_07_u:074.035a: tāṃs tu dṛṣṭvā susaṃrabdhān utsmayan puruṣarṣabhaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:074.035c: śanakair iva dāśārham arjuno vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_07_u:074.036a: śarārditāś ca glānāś ca hayā dūre ca saindhavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:074.036c: kim ihānantaraṃ kāryaṃ jyāyiṣṭhaṃ tava rocate
GE07mbh_07_u:074.037a: brūhi kṛṣṇa yathātattvaṃ tvaṃ hi prājñatamaḥ sadā
GE07mbh_07_u:074.038a: mama tv anantaraṃ kṛtyaṃ yad vai tat saṃnibodha me
GE07mbh_07_u:074.038c: hayān vimucya hi sukhaṃ viśalyān kuru mādhava
GE07mbh_07_u:074.039a: evam uktas tu pārthena keśavaḥ pratyuvāca tam
GE07mbh_07_u:074.039c: mamāpy etan mataṃ pārtha yad idaṃ te prabhāṣitam
GE07mbh_07_u:074.040c: tvam apy atra yathānyāyaṃ kuru kāryam anantaram
GE07mbh_07_u:074.041c: gāṇḍīvaṃ dhanur ādāya tasthau girir ivācalaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:074.042c: idaṃ chidram iti jñātvā dharaṇīsthaṃ dhanaṃjayam
GE07mbh_07_u:074.043c: vikarṣantaś ca cāpāni visṛjantaś ca sāyakān
GE07mbh_07_u:074.044a: astrāṇi ca vicitrāṇi kruddhās tatra vyadarśayan
GE07mbh_07_u:074.044c: chādayantaḥ śaraiḥ pārthaṃ meghā iva divākaram
GE07mbh_07_u:074.045c: rathasiṃhaṃ rathodārāḥ siṃhaṃ mattā iva dvipāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:074.046a: tatra pārthasya bhujayor mahad balam adṛśyata
GE07mbh_07_u:074.046c: yat kruddho bahulāḥ senāḥ sarvataḥ samavārayat
GE07mbh_07_u:074.047a: astrair astrāṇi saṃvārya dviṣatāṃ sarvato vibhuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:074.047c: iṣubhir bahubhis tūrṇaṃ sarvān eva samāvṛṇot
GE07mbh_07_u:074.049c: hayair nāgaiś ca saṃbhinnair nadadbhiś cārikarśanaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:074.050a: saṃrabdhaiś cāribhir vīraiḥ prārthayadbhir jayaṃ mṛdhe

GE07mbh_07_u:076.012a: āśā balavatī rājan putrāṇām abhavat tava
GE07mbh_07_u:076.012c: droṇahārdikyayoḥ kṛṣṇau na mokṣyete iti prabho

GE07mbh_07_u:076.014a: atha dṛṣṭvā vyatikrāntau jvalitāv iva pāvakau
GE07mbh_07_u:076.016a: asau madhye kṛtaḥ ṣaḍbhir dhārtarāṣṭrair mahārathaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:076.017a: yady asya samare goptā śakro devagaṇaiḥ saha

GE07mbh_07_u:076.022c: anyebhyaḥ pārthivebhyaś ca bhāsvantāv iva bhāskarau

GE07mbh_07_u:076.035a: tau tu saindhavam ālokya vartamānam ivāntike
GE07mbh_07_u:076.035c: sahasā petatuḥ kruddhau kṣipraṃ śyenāv ivāmiṣe

GE07mbh_07_u:076.042a: dṛṣṭvā duryodhanaṃ kṛṣṇas tv atikrāntaṃ sahānugam

GE07mbh_07_u:077.010a: sa diṣṭyā samanuprāptas tava pārtha rathāntikam
GE07mbh_07_u:077.010c: jahy enaṃ vai mahābāho yathā vṛtraṃ puraṃdaraḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:077.020a: yenaitad dīrghakālaṃ no bhuktaṃ rājyam akaṇṭakam

GE07mbh_07_u:077.021d-0548_02: duryodhanaṃ raṇe hatvā pratimokṣye kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_07_u:077.022a: ity evaṃ vādinau hṛṣṭau kṛṣṇau śvetān hayottamān

GE07mbh_07_u:077.025a: tataḥ sarvasya sainyasya tāvakasya viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:077.025c: mahān nādo hy abhūt tatra dṛṣṭvā rājānam āhave
GE07mbh_07_u:077.027a: āvāritas tu kaunteyas tava putreṇa dhanvinā

GE07mbh_07_u:077.029a: dṛṣṭvā tu pārthaṃ saṃrabdhaṃ vāsudevaṃ ca māriṣa
GE07mbh_07_u:077.029c: prahasann iva putras te yoddhukāmaḥ samāhvayat

GE07mbh_07_u:077.032a: śokam īyuḥ paraṃ caiva kuravaḥ sarva eva te

GE07mbh_07_u:077.033c: hato rājā hato rājety ūcur evaṃ bhayārditāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:077.034c: vyetu vo bhīr ahaṃ kṛṣṇau preṣayiṣyāmi mṛtyave
GE07mbh_07_u:077.035a: ity uktvā sainikān sarvāñ jayāpekṣī narādhipaḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:077.036c: tad darśaya mayi kṣipraṃ yadi jāto 'si pāṇḍunā
GE07mbh_07_u:077.037a: yad balaṃ tava vīryaṃ ca keśavasya tathaiva ca

GE07mbh_07_u:078.005a: aṣṭāviṃśat tu tān bāṇān astān viprekṣya niṣphalān
GE07mbh_07_u:078.006c: tvayā saṃpreṣitāḥ pārtha nārthaṃ kurvanti patriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:078.007c: muṣṭiś ca te yathāpūrvaṃ bhujayoś ca balaṃ tava
GE07mbh_07_u:078.008a: na ced vidher ayaṃ kālaḥ prāptaḥ syād adya paścimaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:078.008c: tava caivāsya śatroś ca tan mamācakṣva pṛcchataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:078.009a: vismayo me mahān pārtha tava dṛṣṭvā śarān imān
GE07mbh_07_u:078.010c: śarāḥ kurvanti te nārthaṃ pārtha kādya viḍambanā
GE07mbh_07_u:078.012a: asminn antarhitaṃ kṛṣṇa trailokyam api varmaṇi
GE07mbh_07_u:078.012c: eko droṇo hi vedaitad ahaṃ tasmāc ca sattamāt
GE07mbh_07_u:078.013a: na śakyam etat kavacaṃ bāṇair bhettuṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_07_u:078.013c: api vajreṇa govinda svayaṃ maghavatā yudhi
GE07mbh_07_u:078.014a: jānaṃs tvam api vai kṛṣṇa māṃ vimohayase katham
GE07mbh_07_u:078.014c: yadvṛttaṃ triṣu lokeṣu yac ca keśava vartate
GE07mbh_07_u:078.015a: tathā bhaviṣyad yac caiva tat sarvaṃ viditaṃ tava
GE07mbh_07_u:078.015c: na tv evaṃ veda vai kaś cid yathā tvaṃ madhusūdana
GE07mbh_07_u:078.016a: eṣa duryodhanaḥ kṛṣṇa droṇena vihitām imām
GE07mbh_07_u:078.017a: yat tv atra vihitaṃ kāryaṃ naiṣa tad vetti mādhava
GE07mbh_07_u:078.017c: strīvad eṣa bibharty etāṃ yuktāṃ kavacadhāraṇām
GE07mbh_07_u:078.018a: paśya bāhvoś ca me vīryaṃ dhanuṣaś ca janārdana
GE07mbh_07_u:078.019a: idam aṅgirase prādād deveśo varma bhāsvaram
GE07mbh_07_u:078.019b-0550_01: tasmād bṛhaspatiḥ prāpa tataḥ prāpa puraṃdaraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:078.019c: punar dadau surapatir mahyaṃ varma sasaṃgraham
GE07mbh_07_u:078.020a: daivaṃ yady asya varmaitad brahmaṇā vā svayaṃ kṛtam
GE07mbh_07_u:078.020c: naitad gopsyati durbuddhim adya bāṇahataṃ mayā
GE07mbh_07_u:078.022a: tān nikṛttān iṣūn dṛṣṭvā dūrato brahmavādinā
GE07mbh_07_u:078.023a: naitad astraṃ mayā śakyaṃ dviḥ prayoktuṃ janārdana
GE07mbh_07_u:078.023c: astraṃ mām eva hanyād dhi paśya tv adya balaṃ mama
GE07mbh_07_u:078.026a: tataḥ kruddho raṇe pārthaḥ sṛkkaṇī parisaṃlihan
GE07mbh_07_u:078.026c: nāpaśyata tato 'syāṅgaṃ yan na syād varmarakṣitam
GE07mbh_07_u:078.027c: hayāṃś cakāra nirdehān ubhau ca pārṣṇisārathī
GE07mbh_07_u:078.028a: dhanur asyācchinac citraṃ hastāvāpaṃ ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_07_u:078.030a: taṃ kṛcchrām āpadaṃ prāptaṃ dṛṣṭvā paramadhanvinaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:078.031a: te rathair bahusāhasraiḥ kalpitaiḥ kuñjarair hayaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:078.034a: te hatā hanyamānāś ca nyagṛhṇaṃs taṃ rathottamam
GE07mbh_07_u:078.036a: tato visphārya balavad gāṇḍīvaṃ jaghnivān ripūn
GE07mbh_07_u:078.037a: pāñcajanyaṃ ca balavad dadhmau tāreṇa keśavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:078.038a: tasya śaṅkhasya nādena dhanuṣo nisvanena ca
GE07mbh_07_u:078.038c: niḥsattvāś ca sasattvāś ca kṣitau petus tadā janāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:078.039a: tair vimukto ratho reje vāyvīrita ivāmbudaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:078.040a: te dṛṣṭvā sahasā pārthaṃ goptāraḥ saindhavasya tu
GE07mbh_07_u:078.042a: taṃ śrutvā ninadaṃ ghoraṃ tāvakānāṃ samutthitam
GE07mbh_07_u:078.044a: sa śabdo bharataśreṣṭha vyāpya sarvā diśo daśa
GE07mbh_07_u:078.046a: atha kṛṣṇau mahābhāgau tāvakā dṛśya daṃśitau

GE07mbh_07_u:079.003c: kūjadbhir atulān nādān roṣitair uragair iva

GE07mbh_07_u:079.008c: pārvatīyair nadījaiś ca saindhavaiś ca hayottamaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:079.010c: pūrayanto divaṃ rājan pṛthivīṃ ca sasāgarām

GE07mbh_07_u:079.021a: tato duryodhano 'ṣṭau ca rājānas te mahārathāḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:079.025a: gṛhītvā dhanur anyat tu śalyo vivyādha pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_07_u:079.026a: karṇo dvātriṃśatā caiva vṛṣasenaś ca pañcabhiḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:080.001c: pārthānāṃ māmakānāṃ ca tān mamācakṣva saṃjaya

GE07mbh_07_u:080.012c: āhave khaṃ mahārāja dadṛśe pūrayann iva
GE07mbh_07_u:080.015a: sa tena bhrājate rājan govṛṣeṇa mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:080.017a: tena tasya ratho bhāti mayūreṇa mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:080.019a: sā sītā bhrājate tasya ratham āsthāya māriṣa
GE07mbh_07_u:080.021c: yathā devāsure yuddhe purā pūṣā sma śobhate
GE07mbh_07_u:080.022c: dhvajaḥ sūrya ivābhāti somaś cātra pradṛśyate
GE07mbh_07_u:080.023a: sa yūpaḥ kāñcano rājan saumadatter virājate
GE07mbh_07_u:080.024a: śalasya tu mahārāja rājato dvirado mahān
GE07mbh_07_u:080.025a: sa ketuḥ śobhayām āsa sainyaṃ te bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_07_u:080.027a: vyabhrājata bhṛśaṃ rājan putras tava viśāṃ pate

GE07mbh_07_u:081.001c: pāñcālāḥ kurubhiḥ sārdhaṃ kim akurvata saṃjaya
GE07mbh_07_u:081.002c: pāñcālānāṃ kurūṇāṃ ca droṇe dyūtam avartata
GE07mbh_07_u:081.005a: sarve droṇarathaṃ prāpya pāñcālāḥ paṇḍavaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_07_u:081.008a: taṃ tu pratyudiyāc chīghraṃ kṣemadhūrtir mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:081.012c: abhyagacchat samāyāntaṃ vikarṇas te sutaḥ prabho
GE07mbh_07_u:081.014a: sātyakiṃ tu naravyāghraṃ vyāghradattas tv avārayat
GE07mbh_07_u:081.014c: śaraiḥ suniśitais tīkṣṇaiḥ kampayan vai muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:081.017c: yādṛg eva purā vṛttaṃ rāmarāvaṇayor nṛpa
GE07mbh_07_u:081.020a: bhūya eva tu viṃśatyā sāyakānāṃ samācinot
GE07mbh_07_u:081.021a: tāñ śarān droṇamuktāṃs tu śaravarṣeṇa pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:081.022a: tato droṇo bhṛśaṃ kruddho dharmarājasya saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:081.022c: ciccheda sahasā dhanvī dhanus tasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:081.025a: ke cic cainam amanyanta tathā vai vimukhīkṛtam
GE07mbh_07_u:081.026a: sa kṛcchraṃ paramaṃ prāpto dharmarājo yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:081.026c: tyaktvā tat kārmukaṃ chinnaṃ bhāradvājena saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:081.027a: tatas tān sāyakān sarvān droṇamuktān sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:081.027c: ciccheda samare vīras tad adbhutam ivābhavat
GE07mbh_07_u:081.028a: chittvā ca tāñ śarān rājā krodhasaṃraktalocanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:081.028c: śaktiṃ jagrāha samare girīṇām api dāraṇīm
GE07mbh_07_u:081.029a: samutkṣipya ca tāṃ hṛṣṭo nanāda balavad balī
GE07mbh_07_u:081.031c: prajvālayantī gaganaṃ diśaś ca vidiśas tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:081.032a: tām āpatantīṃ sahasā prekṣya droṇo viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:081.032c: prāduścakre tato brāhmam astram astravidāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:081.033a: tad astraṃ bhasmasāt kṛtvā tāṃ śaktiṃ ghoradarśanām
GE07mbh_07_u:081.034a: tato yudhiṣṭhiro rājā droṇāstraṃ tat samudyatam
GE07mbh_07_u:081.035a: vivyādha ca raṇe droṇaṃ pañcabhir nataparvabhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:081.035c: kṣurapreṇa ca tīkṣṇena cicchedāsya mahad dhanuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:081.036a: tad apāsya dhanuś chinnaṃ droṇaḥ kṣatriyamardanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:081.037a: tām āpatantīṃ sahasā gadāṃ dṛṣṭvā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:081.037c: gadām evāgrahīt kruddhaś cikṣepa ca paraṃtapaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:081.038a: te gade sahasā mukte samāsādya parasparam
GE07mbh_07_u:081.039a: tato droṇo bhṛśaṃ kruddho dharmarājasya māriṣa
GE07mbh_07_u:081.039c: caturbhir niśitais tīkṣṇair hayāñ jaghne śarottamaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:081.040c: ketum ekena ciccheda pāṇḍavaṃ cārdayat tribhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:081.041a: hatāśvāt tu rathāt tūrṇam avaplutya yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:081.042a: virathaṃ taṃ samālokya vyāyudhaṃ ca viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:081.044c: hā heti sahasā śabdaḥ pāṇḍūnāṃ samajāyata
GE07mbh_07_u:081.045a: hṛto rājā hṛto rājā bhāradvājena māriṣa
GE07mbh_07_u:081.045c: ity āsīt sumahāñ śabdaḥ pāṇḍusainyasya sarvataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:082.002a: bṛhatkṣatras tu taṃ rājā navatyā nataparvaṇām
GE07mbh_07_u:082.003c: dhanuś ciccheda bhallena pītena niśitena ca
GE07mbh_07_u:082.005a: athānyad dhanur ādāya bṛhatkṣatro hasann iva
GE07mbh_07_u:082.007a: tac chinnaṃ sahasā tasya śiraḥ kuñcitamūrdhajam
GE07mbh_07_u:082.007c: sakirīṭaṃ mahīṃ prāpya babhau jyotir ivāmbarāt
GE07mbh_07_u:082.008a: taṃ nihatya raṇe hṛṣṭo bṛhatkṣatro mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:082.013a: tad yuddham āsīt tumulaṃ prekṣaṇīyaṃ viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:082.014c: dvidhā ciccheda bhallena prahasann iva bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:082.015a: tad utsṛjya dhanuś chinnaṃ cedirājo mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:082.016a: tāṃ tu śaktiṃ mahāvīryāṃ dorbhyām āyamya bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:082.017a: sa tayā vīraghātinyā śaktyā tv abhihato bhṛśam
GE07mbh_07_u:082.019c: nanāda ca mahānādaṃ tarjayan pāṇḍavaṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:082.020a: madreyas tu tataḥ kruddho durmukhaṃ daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:082.020c: bhrātā bhrātaram āyāntaṃ vivyādha prahasann iva
GE07mbh_07_u:082.021a: taṃ raṇe rabhasaṃ dṛṣṭvā sahadevaṃ mahābalam
GE07mbh_07_u:082.021c: durmukho navabhir bāṇais tāḍayām āsa bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:082.022a: durmukhasya tu bhallena chittvā ketuṃ mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:082.022c: jaghāna caturo vāhāṃś caturbhir niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:082.024a: kṣurapreṇa ca tīkṣṇena kauravyasya mahad dhanuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:082.024c: sahadevo raṇe chittvā taṃ ca vivyādha pañcabhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:082.025a: hatāśvaṃ tu rathaṃ tyaktvā durmukho vimanās tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:082.028a: taṃ tu hatvā mahābāhuḥ sahadevo vyarocata
GE07mbh_07_u:082.028c: yathā dāśarathī rāmaḥ kharaṃ hatvā mahābalam
GE07mbh_07_u:082.030a: nakulas te sutaṃ rājan vikarṇaṃ pṛthulocanam
GE07mbh_07_u:082.030c: muhūrtāj jitavān saṃkhye tad adbhutam ivābhavat
GE07mbh_07_u:082.032a: tān nivārya śarāñ śūraḥ śaineyaḥ kṛtahastavat
GE07mbh_07_u:082.033a: kumāre nihate tasmin magadhasya sute prabho
GE07mbh_07_u:082.034a: visṛjantaḥ śarāṃś caiva tomarāṃś ca sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:082.034c: bhiṇḍipālāṃs tathā prāsān mudgarān musalān api
GE07mbh_07_u:082.035c: tāṃs tu sarvān sa balavān sātyaktir yuddhadurmadaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:082.037d-0560_01: yathā daityacamūṃ hatvā śakro rājan vyarocata
GE07mbh_07_u:082.039a: tato droṇo bhṛśaṃ kruddhaḥ sahasodvṛtya cakṣuṣī
GE07mbh_07_u:083.001c: ekaikaṃ pañcabhir viddhvā punar vivyādha saptabhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:083.002a: te pīḍitā bhṛśaṃ tena raudreṇa sahasā vibho
GE07mbh_07_u:083.002c: pramūḍhā naiva vividur mṛdhe kṛtyaṃ sma kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_07_u:083.004a: tathetare raṇe yattās tribhis tribhir ajihmagaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:083.005a: sa tān prati mahārāja cikṣipe pañca sāyakān
GE07mbh_07_u:083.006a: tatas te bhrātaraḥ pañca śarair viddhā mahātmanā
GE07mbh_07_u:083.006c: parivārya rathair vīraṃ vivyadhuḥ sāyakair bhṛśam
GE07mbh_07_u:083.007a: ārjunis tu hayāṃs tasya caturbhir niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:083.007c: preṣayām āsa saṃkruddho yamasya sadanaṃ prati
GE07mbh_07_u:083.008c: nanāda balavan nādaṃ vivyādha ca śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:083.009a: yaudhiṣṭhiro dhvajaṃ tasya chittvā bhūmāv apātayat
GE07mbh_07_u:083.010a: sāhadevis tu taṃ jñātvā bhrātṛbhir vimukhīkṛtam
GE07mbh_07_u:083.012a: saumadatteḥ śiro dṛṣṭvā nipatat tan mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:083.013c: yodhayām āsa saṃkruddho lakṣmaṇaṃ rāvaṇir yathā
GE07mbh_07_u:083.014a: saṃprayuddhau raṇe dṛṣṭvā tāv ubhau nararākṣasau
GE07mbh_07_u:083.015a: ārṣyaśṛṅgiṃ tato bhīmo navabhir niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:083.016a: tad rakṣaḥ samare viddhaṃ kṛtvā nādaṃ bhayāvaham
GE07mbh_07_u:083.016c: abhyadravat tato bhīmaṃ ye ca tasya padānugāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:083.017a: sa bhīmaṃ pañcabhir viddhvā śaraiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:083.017e: punaś catuḥśatān hatvā bhīmaṃ vivyādha patriṇā
GE07mbh_07_u:083.019e: alambusaṃ śarais tīkṣṇair ardayām āsa sarvataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:083.020c: śuśubhe sarvato rājan pradīpta iva kiṃśukaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:083.022a: ghoraṃ rūpam atho kṛtvā bhīmasenam abhāṣata
GE07mbh_07_u:083.022c: tiṣṭhedānīṃ raṇe pārtha paśya me 'dya parākramam
GE07mbh_07_u:083.023c: parokṣaṃ mama tadvṛttaṃ yad bhrātā me hatas tvayā
GE07mbh_07_u:083.024a: evam uktvā tato bhīmam antardhānagatas tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:083.025a: bhīmas tu samare rājann adṛśye rākṣase tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:083.026a: sa vadhyamāno bhīmena nimeṣād ratham āsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:083.026c: jagāma dharaṇīṃ kṣudraḥ khaṃ caiva sahasāgamat
GE07mbh_07_u:083.027b-0561_01: aṇur bṛhat punaḥ sthūlo nādān muñcann ivāmbudaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:083.027d-0562_04: śilāḥ khaḍgā guḍāś caiva ṛṣṭir vajrāṇi caiva ha
GE07mbh_07_u:083.028c: hayāś ca bahavo rājan pattayaś ca tathā punaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:083.028e: rathebhyo rathinaḥ petus tasya nunnāḥ sma sāyakaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:083.029b-0564_01: sa hatvā rathabhūyiṣṭhāṃ nadīṃ prāvartayat tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:083.030d-0565_01: vahantīṃ sṛñjayāṃś caiva pāñcālān atha bāhlikān
GE07mbh_07_u:083.031a: taṃ tathā samare rājan vicarantam abhītavat
GE07mbh_07_u:083.032d-0566_01: praharṣayad raṇe rakṣaḥ pāṇḍavāṃś ca vyamohayat
GE07mbh_07_u:083.033a: taṃ śrutvā ninadaṃ ghoraṃ tava sainyasya pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:083.034c: saṃdadhe tvāṣṭram astraṃ sa svayaṃ tvaṣṭeva māriṣa
GE07mbh_07_u:083.035c: taiḥ śarais tava sainyasya vidrāvaḥ sumahān abhūt
GE07mbh_07_u:083.036a: tad astraṃ preṣitaṃ tena bhīmasenena saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:083.038a: tasmiṃs tu nirjite rājan rākṣasendre mahātmanā
GE07mbh_07_u:083.039a: apūjayan mārutiṃ ca saṃhṛṣṭās te mahābalam
GE07mbh_07_u:083.039c: prahrādaṃ samare jitvā yathā śakraṃ marudgaṇāḥ saṃjaya uvāca
GE07mbh_07_u:084.001-009_0003: dṛṣṭvā tato maheṣvāso nighnantaṃ ca rathān bhṛśam
GE07mbh_07_u:084.001-009_0008: bhūṣaṇair ācitāṅgaś ca nadann iva ca toyadaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:084.001-009_0012: raktoṣṭhaḥ sadhanuḥ prāṃśuḥ kalpavṛkṣa iva sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:084.001-009_0014: musaṇṭhīr bahulāś caiva triśūlān api paṭṭasān
GE07mbh_07_u:084.001-009_0015: karpaṇāñ śatadhārāṃś ca pinākān vividhāṃs tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:084.001-009_0016: cakrāṇi ca kṣuraprāṇi kṣepaṇīś ca kaṭaṃkaṭān
GE07mbh_07_u:084.001-009_0018: cikṣepa dhanur ādāya ninadan bhairavān ravān
GE07mbh_07_u:084.001-009_0019: taṃ raudraṃ krūram āyāntaṃ dṛṣṭvā kālam ivāgatam
GE07mbh_07_u:084.001-009_0021: satyakas tu naravyāghro dṛṣṭvā taṃ rākṣasaṃ yudhi
GE07mbh_07_u:084.001-009_0023: abhyadravac ca tad rakṣas tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābravīt
GE07mbh_07_u:084.001-009_0027: cikṣepa ca gadāśaktīs tomarān atha paṭṭasān
GE07mbh_07_u:084.001-009_0029: anyonyam ārād ālokya rākṣasau tau mahābalau
GE07mbh_07_u:084.001-009_0030: bhairavaṃ nadatur nādān satoyāv iva toyadau
GE07mbh_07_u:084.001-009_0032: yādṛg eva purā vṛttaṃ rāmarāvaṇayor mṛdhe
GE07mbh_07_u:084.001-009_0033: tau śaktīś ca pinākāṃś ca vajrān khaḍgān paraṣvadhān
GE07mbh_07_u:084.001-009_0036: yantreṇeva tadā rājan bhṛśaṃ nādān pracakratuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:084.001-009_0039: tad bhaimaseniḥ saṃprekṣya cakraṃ vegavad antare
GE07mbh_07_u:084.001-009_0040: gadayā tāḍayām āsa tad dīrṇaṃ śatadhābhavat
GE07mbh_07_u:084.001-009_0042: daṃśakair iva sā senā patadbhir bhṛśasaṃkulā
GE07mbh_07_u:084.001-009_0043: tataḥ pratihate cakre sa vīro roṣasaṃkulaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:084.001-009_0044: prāhiṇot tarasā śūlaṃ śaktīr daśaśatās tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:084.001c: haiḍimbaḥ prayayau tūrṇaṃ vivyādha ca śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:084.003b-0567_02: yādṛg eva purā vṛttaṃ rāmarāvaṇayoḥ prabho
GE07mbh_07_u:084.003e: alambusam atho viddhvā siṃhavad vyanadan muhuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:084.004c: viddhvā viddhvānadad dhṛṣṭaḥ pūrayan khaṃ samantataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:084.007a: yāṃ yāṃ ghaṭotkaco yuddhe māyāṃ darśayate nṛpa
GE07mbh_07_u:084.007c: tāṃ tām alambuso rājan māyayaiva nijaghnivān
GE07mbh_07_u:084.009a: ta enaṃ bhṛśasaṃkruddhāḥ sarvataḥ pravarā rathaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:084.010c: sarvato vyakiran bāṇair ulkābhir iva kuñjaram
GE07mbh_07_u:084.011c: tasmād rathavrajān mukto vanadāhād iva dvipaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:084.012e: yudhiṣṭhiraṃ tribhir viddhvā sahadevaṃ ca saptabhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:084.013a: nakulaṃ ca trisaptatyā drupadeyāṃś ca māriṣa
GE07mbh_07_u:084.013c: pañcabhiḥ pañcabhir viddhvā ghoraṃ nādaṃ nanāda ha
GE07mbh_07_u:084.014a: taṃ bhīmaseno navabhiḥ sahadevaś ca pañcabhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:084.014e: nakulaś ca catuḥṣaṣṭyā draupadeyās tribhis tribhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:084.015a: haiḍimbo rākṣasaṃ viddhvā yuddhe pañcāśatā śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:084.015c: punar vivyādha saptatyā nanāda ca mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:084.016c: prativivyādha tān sarvān pañcabhiḥ pañcabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:084.017a: taṃ kruddhaṃ rākṣasaṃ yuddhe pratikruddhas tu rākṣasaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:084.019a: te śarā nataparvāṇo viviśū rākṣasaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:084.019c: ruṣitāḥ pannagā yadvad girim ugrā mahābalāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:084.020a: tatas te pāṇḍavā rājan samantān niśitāñ śarān
GE07mbh_07_u:084.020c: preṣayām āsur udvignā haiḍimbaś ca ghaṭotkacaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:084.021b-0570_03: samīkṣya tadavasthaṃ taṃ vadhāyāsya mano dadhe
GE07mbh_07_u:084.021b-0570_04: vegaṃ cakre mahāntaṃ ca rākṣasendrarathaṃ prati
GE07mbh_07_u:084.021b-010_0004: śarāḥ prādurbhavanti sma dvirephā iva khād diśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:084.021b-010_0006: na sma vijñāyate kiṃ cid andhakāre kṛte śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:084.021b-010_0010: akṣamīṣāṃ yugaṃ caiva ciccheda yudhi tāḍayan
GE07mbh_07_u:084.021b-010_0012: tasmin māyāmayaṃ ghoram astravarṣaṃ vavarṣa ha
GE07mbh_07_u:084.021b-010_0013: ghaṭotkaco 'pyāśu rathāt praskandya sa tam eva ca
GE07mbh_07_u:084.021b-010_0024: abhidudrāva vegena siṃhaḥ siṃham iva sthitam
GE07mbh_07_u:084.021b-010_0033: tayor gātreṣu patitāv asī bhinnau nipetatuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:084.021b-010_0035: tataḥ sainyāni dadṛśus tad yuddham atidāruṇam
GE07mbh_07_u:084.021b-010_0036: yuddhaṃ tayo rākṣasayor āmiṣe śyenayor iva
GE07mbh_07_u:084.021b-010_0040: ubhau nistriṃśahastau tau sapakṣāv iva pakṣiṇau
GE07mbh_07_u:084.021b-010_0041: tato bhrāmya tu taṃ khaḍgaṃ pāṇḍoḥ kirmīranandanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:084.021b-010_0042: cikṣepāsya śiro hartuṃ sa ca tasya ghaṭotkacaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:084.021b-010_0043: tāv asī yugapad dīptau sametya vipulau bhuvi
GE07mbh_07_u:084.021b-010_0044: patitau tau tu bāhubhyāṃ rākṣasau samasajjatām
GE07mbh_07_u:084.021b-010_0046: punar vimiśritau vīrau vyāyudhyete muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:084.021d-0571_01: rathād ratham abhidrutya kruddho haiḍimba ākṣipat
GE07mbh_07_u:084.021d-0571_02: udbabarha rathāc cāpi pannagaṃ garuḍo yathā
GE07mbh_07_u:084.022a: samutkṣipya ca bāhubhyām āvidhya ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:084.024d-0572_01: pāṇḍavānāṃ tataḥ senā taṃ dṛṣṭvā vinipātitam
GE07mbh_07_u:084.024d-0572_03: tatas tu nipapātāśu gatāsur bhuvi rākṣasaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:084.024d-0572_05: patatā tena mahatā rathināṃ dantināṃ daśa
GE07mbh_07_u:084.025a: tataḥ sumanasaḥ pārthā hate tasmin niśācare
GE07mbh_07_u:084.025c: cukruśuḥ siṃhanādāṃś ca vāsāṃsy ādudhuvuś ca ha
GE07mbh_07_u:084.026a: tāvakāś ca hataṃ dṛṣṭvā rākṣasendraṃ mahābalam
GE07mbh_07_u:084.027a: janāś ca tad dadṛśire rakṣaḥ kautūhalānvitāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:084.028a: ghaṭotkacas tu tad dhatvā rakṣo balavatāṃ varam
GE07mbh_07_u:084.028c: mumoca balavan nādaṃ balaṃ hatveva vāsavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:084.029a: sa pūjyamānaḥ pitṛbhiḥ sabāndhavair; ghaṭotkacaḥ karmaṇi duṣkare kṛte
GE07mbh_07_u:084.029b-0573_01: tato ghaṭotkaco hatvā tad rakṣo vṛtrasaṃnibham
GE07mbh_07_u:084.029b-0573_02: punaḥ svaratham āsthāya vijigīṣur nanāda ca
GE07mbh_07_u:084.029c: ripuṃ nihatyābhinananda vai tadā; alambusaṃ pakvam alambusaṃ yathā
GE07mbh_07_u:084.030c: niśamya taṃ pratyanadaṃs tu kauravās; tato dhvanir bhuvanam athāspṛśad bhṛśam
GE07mbh_07_u:084.030d-0574_03: mūrdhny upāghrāya taṃ jyeṣṭhaḥ pariṣvajya ca pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:084.030d-0574_06: babhūvur muditāḥ sarve hate tasmin niśācare
GE07mbh_07_u:085.001c: saṃjayācakṣva tattvena paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me
GE07mbh_07_u:085.006c: abhyagur dharaṇīṃ rājañ śvasanta iva pannagāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:085.009a: tataḥ kruddho maheṣvāso bhūya eva mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:085.010c: nābhyapadyata kartavyaṃ kiṃ cid eva viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:085.011c: bhāradvājaṃ raṇe dṛṣṭvā visṛjantaṃ śitāñ śarān
GE07mbh_07_u:085.012a: taṃ tu saṃprekṣya te putrāḥ sainikāś ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:085.013a: taṃ śrutvā ninadaṃ ghoraṃ pīḍyamānaṃ ca mādhavam
GE07mbh_07_u:085.014c: grasyate yudhi vīreṇa bhānumān iva rāhuṇā
GE07mbh_07_u:085.015a: dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ ca pāñcālyam idam āha janādhipa
GE07mbh_07_u:085.015b-0575_01: droṇaṃ vāraya sukṣipraṃ satyakaṃ mā vadhīd dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:085.015c: abhidrava drutaṃ droṇaṃ kiṃ nu tiṣṭhasi pārṣata
GE07mbh_07_u:085.015e: na paśyasi bhayaṃ ghoraṃ droṇān naḥ samupasthitam
GE07mbh_07_u:085.019a: evam uktvā tato rājā sarvasainyena pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:085.020a: tatrārāvo mahān āsīd droṇam ekaṃ yuyutsatām
GE07mbh_07_u:085.020c: pāṇḍavānāṃ ca bhadraṃ te sṛñjayānāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:085.022a: smayann eva tu tān vīrān droṇaḥ pratyagrahīt svayam
GE07mbh_07_u:085.023a: tarpitās te śarais tasya bhāradvājasya dhanvinaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:085.024a: bhāradvājaṃ ca te sarve na śekuḥ prativīkṣitum
GE07mbh_07_u:085.025a: tāṃs tu sarvān maheṣvāsān droṇaḥ śastrabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:085.026a: vadhyamānā raṇe rājan pāṇḍavāḥ sṛñjayās tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:085.029b-0576_01: pāñcāleṣv atha śūreṣu kekayeṣu ca mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:085.029c: droṇaṃ sma dadṛśuḥ śūraṃ vinighnantaṃ varān varān
GE07mbh_07_u:085.030a: kekayānāṃ śataṃ hatvā vidrāvya ca samantataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:085.031a: pāñcālān sṛñjayān matsyān kekayān pāṇḍavān api
GE07mbh_07_u:085.033a: tatra devāḥ sagandharvāḥ pitaraś cābruvan nṛpa
GE07mbh_07_u:085.033c: ete dravanti pāñcālāḥ pāṇḍavāś ca sasainikāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:085.034a: taṃ tathā samare droṇaṃ nighnantaṃ somakān raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:085.034c: na cāpy abhiyayuḥ ke cid apare naiva vivyadhuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:085.038a: na nūnaṃ svasti pārthasya yathā nadati śaṅkharāṭ
GE07mbh_07_u:085.038c: kauravāś ca yathā hṛṣṭā vinadanti muhur muhuḥ saṃjaya uvāca
GE07mbh_07_u:085.038d-0577_02: śrutvā tu ninadaṃ ghoraṃ pāñcajanyasya māriṣa
GE07mbh_07_u:085.041a: yaḥ sa dharmaḥ purā dṛṣṭaḥ sadbhiḥ śaineya śāśvataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:085.042a: sarveṣv api ca yodheṣu cintayañ śinipuṃgava
GE07mbh_07_u:085.042c: tvattaḥ suhṛttamaṃ kaṃ cin nābhijānāmi sātyake
GE07mbh_07_u:085.043a: yo hi prītamanā nityaṃ yaś ca nityam anuvrataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:085.043c: sa kārye sāṃparāye tu niyojya iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:085.044a: yathā ca keśavo nityaṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ parāyaṇam
GE07mbh_07_u:085.045a: so 'haṃ bhāraṃ samādhāsye tvayi taṃ voḍhum arhasi
GE07mbh_07_u:085.045c: abhiprāyaṃ ca me nityaṃ na vṛthā kartum arhasi
GE07mbh_07_u:085.046a: sa tvaṃ bhrātur vayasyasya guror api ca saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:085.047a: tvaṃ hi satyavrataḥ śūro mitrāṇām abhayaṃkaraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:085.047c: loke vikhyāyase vīra karmabhiḥ satyavāg iti
GE07mbh_07_u:085.048a: yo hi śaineya mitrārthe yudhyamānas tyajet tanum
GE07mbh_07_u:085.048c: pṛthivīṃ vā dvijātibhyo yo dadyāt samam eva tat
GE07mbh_07_u:085.049a: śrutāś ca bahavo 'smābhī rājāno ye divaṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:085.049d-0578_01: dīyamānā hi bahubhir dāsyate ca muhur mahī
GE07mbh_07_u:085.049d-0578_02: nanu kaś cid raṇe prāṇān mitrārthe tyaktavān iha
GE07mbh_07_u:085.050a: evaṃ tvām api dharmātman prayāce 'haṃ kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:085.050c: pṛthivīdānatulyaṃ syād adhikaṃ vā phalaṃ vibho
GE07mbh_07_u:085.051a: eka eva sadā kṛṣṇo mitrāṇām abhayaṃkaraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:085.051c: raṇe saṃtyajati prāṇān dvitīyas tvaṃ ca sātyake
GE07mbh_07_u:085.052a: vikrāntasya ca vīrasya yuddhe prārthayato yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:085.052c: śūra eva sahāyaḥ syān netaraḥ prākṛto janaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:085.053c: tvad anyo hi raṇe goptā vijayasya na vidyate
GE07mbh_07_u:085.054a: ślāghann eva hi karmāṇi śataśas tava pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:085.054c: mama saṃjanayan harṣaṃ punaḥ punar akīrtayat
GE07mbh_07_u:085.055c: prājñaḥ sarvāstravic chūro muhyate na ca saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:085.057a: śiṣyo mama sakhā caiva priyo 'syāhaṃ priyaś ca me
GE07mbh_07_u:085.058a: asmadarthaṃ ca rājendra saṃnahyed yadi keśavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:085.058c: rāmo vāpy aniruddho vā pradyumno vā mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:085.059a: gado vā sāraṇo vāpi sāmbo vā saha vṛṣṇibhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:085.060c: sāhāyye viniyokṣyāmi nāsti me 'nyo hi tatsamaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:085.061a: iti dvaitavane tāta mām uvāca dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:085.062a: tasya tvam evaṃ saṃkalpaṃ na vṛthā kartum arhasi
GE07mbh_07_u:085.063a: yac cāpi tīrthāni carann agacchaṃ dvārakāṃ prati
GE07mbh_07_u:085.063c: tatrāham api te bhaktim arjunaṃ prati dṛṣṭavān
GE07mbh_07_u:085.064a: na tat sauhṛdam anyeṣu mayā śaineya lakṣitam
GE07mbh_07_u:085.064c: yathā tvam asmān bhajase vartamānān upaplave
GE07mbh_07_u:085.065a: so 'bhijātyā ca bhaktyā ca sakhyasyācāryakasya ca
GE07mbh_07_u:085.066a: satyasya ca mahābāho anukampārtham eva ca
GE07mbh_07_u:085.066c: anurūpaṃ maheṣvāsa karma tvaṃ kartum arhasi
GE07mbh_07_u:085.067a: soyodhano hi sahasā gato droṇena daṃśitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:085.067c: pūrvam eva tu yātās te kauravāṇāṃ mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:085.068a: sumahān ninadaś caiva śrūyate vijayaṃ prati
GE07mbh_07_u:085.068c: sa śaineya javenātra gantum arhasi mādhava
GE07mbh_07_u:085.069c: droṇam āvārayiṣyāmo yadi tvāṃ prati yāsyati
GE07mbh_07_u:085.070c: mahāntaṃ ca raṇe śabdaṃ dīryamāṇāṃ ca bhāratīm
GE07mbh_07_u:085.072a: rathair viparidhāvadbhir manuṣyaiś ca hayaiś ca ha
GE07mbh_07_u:085.074a: naitad balam asaṃvārya śakyo hantuṃ jayadrathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:085.077a: nāgānāṃ śṛṇu śabdaṃ ca pattīnāṃ ca sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:085.077c: sādināṃ dravatāṃ caiva śṛṇu kampayatāṃ mahīm
GE07mbh_07_u:085.078c: bahutvād dhi naravyāghra devendram api pīḍayet
GE07mbh_07_u:085.079a: aparyante bale magno jahyād api ca jīvitam
GE07mbh_07_u:085.079c: tasmiṃś ca nihate yuddhe kathaṃ jīveta mādṛśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:085.080a: śyāmo yuvā guḍākeśo darśanīyaś ca pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:085.080c: laghvastraś citrayodhī ca praviṣṭas tāta bhāratīm
GE07mbh_07_u:085.081c: tanna jānāmi vārṣṇeya yadi jīvati vā na vā
GE07mbh_07_u:085.081e: kurūṇāṃ cāpi tat sainyaṃ sāgarapratimaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_07_u:085.082a: eka eva ca bībhatsuḥ praviṣṭas tāta bhāratīm
GE07mbh_07_u:085.083a: na ca me vartate buddhir adya yuddhe kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_07_u:085.083c: droṇo 'pi rabhaso yuddhe mama pīḍayate balam
GE07mbh_07_u:085.083e: pratyakṣaṃ te mahābāho yathāsau carati dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:085.084a: yugapac ca sametānāṃ kāryāṇāṃ tvaṃ vicakṣaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:085.085a: tasya me sarvakāryeṣu kāryam etan mataṃ sadā
GE07mbh_07_u:085.086a: nāhaṃ śocāmi dāśārhaṃ goptāraṃ jagataḥ prabhum
GE07mbh_07_u:085.086c: sa hi śakto raṇe tāta trīṃl lokān api saṃgatān
GE07mbh_07_u:085.087a: vijetuṃ puruṣavyāghra satyam etad bravīmi te
GE07mbh_07_u:085.087c: kiṃ punar dhārtarāṣṭrasya balam etat sudurbalam
GE07mbh_07_u:085.088a: arjunas tv eva vārṣṇeya pīḍito bahubhir yudhi
GE07mbh_07_u:085.088c: prajahyāt samare prāṇāṃs tasmād vindāmi kaśmalam
GE07mbh_07_u:085.089a: tasya tvaṃ padavīṃ gaccha gaccheyus tvādṛśā yathā
GE07mbh_07_u:085.089d-0579_01: tvādṛśās tādṛśaṃ gacches tādṛśaṃ gaccha satyaka
GE07mbh_07_u:085.089d-0580_01: suhṛdo vai suhṛtkṛtye param āsthāya vikramam
GE07mbh_07_u:085.089d-0580_02: suhṛdaḥ padam anvicchan na vyatheta kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_07_u:085.090c: pradyumnaś ca mahābāhus tvaṃ ca sātvata viśrutaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:085.092c: tvām adya puruṣavyāghraṃ loke santaḥ pracakṣate
GE07mbh_07_u:085.092d-0581_02: yodhayet sa jagat sarvaṃ vijayeta ripūn bahūn
GE07mbh_07_u:085.092d-0581_03: iti bruvanti lokeṣu janās tava guṇās tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:085.092d-0581_04: samāgameṣu jalpanti pṛthag eva ca sarvadā
GE07mbh_07_u:085.093a: nāsādhyaṃ vidyate loke sātyaker iti mādhava
GE07mbh_07_u:085.093c: tat tvāṃ yad abhivakṣyāmi tat kuruṣva mahābala
GE07mbh_07_u:085.094a: saṃbhāvanā hi lokasya tava pārthasya cobhayoḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:085.095a: parityajya priyān prāṇān raṇe vicara vīravat
GE07mbh_07_u:085.095c: na hi śaineya dāśārhā raṇe rakṣanti jīvitam
GE07mbh_07_u:085.097c: vāsudevo guruś cāpi tava pārthasya dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:085.098a: kāraṇadvayam etad dhi jānānas tvāham abruvam
GE07mbh_07_u:085.098c: māvamaṃsthā vaco mahyaṃ gurus tava guror hy aham
GE07mbh_07_u:085.099c: satyam etan mayoktaṃ te yāhi yatra dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:085.101a: praviśya ca yathānyāyaṃ saṃgamya ca mahārathaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:085.101c: yathārham ātmanaḥ karma raṇe sātvata darśaya
GE07mbh_07_u:086.001a: prītiyuktaṃ ca hṛdyaṃ ca madhurākṣaram eva ca
GE07mbh_07_u:086.001c: kālayuktaṃ ca citraṃ ca svatayā cābhibhāṣitam
GE07mbh_07_u:086.003a: śrutaṃ te gadato vākyaṃ sarvam etan mayācyuta
GE07mbh_07_u:086.003c: nyāyayuktaṃ ca citraṃ ca phalgunārthe yaśaskaram
GE07mbh_07_u:086.004a: evaṃvidhe tathā kāle madṛśaṃ prekṣya saṃmatam
GE07mbh_07_u:086.004c: vaktum arhasi rājendra yathā pārthaṃ tathaiva mām
GE07mbh_07_u:086.005a: na me dhanaṃjayasyārthe prāṇā rakṣyāḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_07_u:086.005c: tvatprayuktaḥ punar ahaṃ kiṃ na kuryāṃ mahāhave
GE07mbh_07_u:086.007c: vijeṣye ca raṇe rājan satyam etad bravīmi te
GE07mbh_07_u:086.008c: hate jayadrathe rājan punar eṣyāmi te 'ntikam
GE07mbh_07_u:086.009a: avaśyaṃ tu mayā sarvaṃ vijñāpyas tvaṃ narādhipa
GE07mbh_07_u:086.009c: vāsudevasya yad vākyaṃ phalgunasya ca dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:086.010a: dṛḍhaṃ tv abhiparīto 'ham arjunena punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:086.011c: āryāṃ yuddhe matiṃ kṛtvā yāvad dhanmi jayadratham
GE07mbh_07_u:086.012a: tvayi vāhaṃ mahābāho pradyumne vā mahārathe
GE07mbh_07_u:086.012d-0582_01: sa evaṃ vai vinikṣipto nikṣepaḥ savyasācinā
GE07mbh_07_u:086.013a: jānīṣe hi raṇe droṇaṃ rabhasaṃ śreṣṭhasaṃmatam
GE07mbh_07_u:086.013c: pratijñā cāpi te nityaṃ śrutā droṇasya mādhava
GE07mbh_07_u:086.014c: śaktaś cāpi raṇe droṇo nigṛhītuṃ yudhiṣṭhiram
GE07mbh_07_u:086.015c: aham adya gamiṣyāmi saindhavasya vadhāya hi
GE07mbh_07_u:086.015d-0583_01: sa tvam adya raṇe yatto rakṣa mādhava pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_07_u:086.015d-0583_02: rakṣaṇe dharmarājasya dhruvo hi vijayo mama
GE07mbh_07_u:086.016a: jayadratham ahaṃ hatvā dhruvam eṣyāmi mādhava
GE07mbh_07_u:086.016c: dharmarājaṃ yathā droṇo nigṛhṇīyād raṇe balāt
GE07mbh_07_u:086.017c: saindhavasya vadho na syān mamāprītis tathā bhavet
GE07mbh_07_u:086.018c: asmākaṃ gamanaṃ vyaktaṃ vanaṃ prati bhavet punaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:086.019a: so 'yaṃ mama jayo vyaktaṃ vyartha eva bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_07_u:086.019c: yadi droṇo raṇe kruddho nigṛhṇīyād yudhiṣṭhiram
GE07mbh_07_u:086.020a: sa tvam adya mahābāho priyārthaṃ mama mādhava
GE07mbh_07_u:086.020c: jayārthaṃ ca yaśorthaṃ ca rakṣa rājānam āhave
GE07mbh_07_u:086.021a: sa bhavān mayi nikṣepo nikṣiptaḥ savyasācinā
GE07mbh_07_u:086.021c: bhāradvājād bhayaṃ nityaṃ paśyamānena te prabho
GE07mbh_07_u:086.022a: tasyāpi ca mahābāho nityaṃ paśyati saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:086.022c: nānyaṃ hi pratiyoddhāraṃ raukmiṇeyād ṛte prabho
GE07mbh_07_u:086.022e: māṃ vāpi manyate yuddhe bhāradvājasya dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:086.023a: so 'haṃ saṃbhāvanāṃ caitām ācāryavacanaṃ ca tat
GE07mbh_07_u:086.023c: pṛṣṭhato notsahe kartuṃ tvāṃ vā tyaktuṃ mahīpate
GE07mbh_07_u:086.024c: upalabhya raṇe krīḍed yathā śakuninā śiśuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:086.025a: yadi kārṣṇir dhanuṣpāṇir iha syān makaradhvajaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:086.025c: tasmai tvāṃ visṛjeyaṃ vai sa tvāṃ rakṣed yathārjunaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:086.026a: kuru tvam ātmano guptiṃ kas te goptā gate mayi
GE07mbh_07_u:086.026c: yaḥ pratīyād raṇe droṇaṃ yāvad gacchāmi pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_07_u:086.027a: mā ca te bhayam adyāstu rājann arjunasaṃbhavam
GE07mbh_07_u:086.027c: na sa jātu mahābāhur bhāram udyamya sīdati
GE07mbh_07_u:086.028a: ye ca sauvīrakā yodhās tathā saindhavapauravāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:086.028c: udīcyā dākṣiṇātyāś ca ye cānye 'pi mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:086.029a: ye ca karṇamukhā rājan rathodārāḥ prakīrtitāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:086.031a: jaṅgamāḥ sthāvaraiḥ sārdhaṃ nālaṃ pārthasya saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:086.031c: evaṃ jñātvā mahārāja vyetu te bhīr dhanaṃjaye
GE07mbh_07_u:086.032c: na tatra karmaṇo vyāpat kathaṃ cid api vidyate
GE07mbh_07_u:086.033a: daivaṃ kṛtāstratāṃ yogam amarṣam api cāhave
GE07mbh_07_u:086.033c: kṛtajñatāṃ dayāṃ caiva bhrātus tvam anucintaya
GE07mbh_07_u:086.034a: mayi cāpy apayāte vai gacchamāne 'rjunaṃ prati
GE07mbh_07_u:086.034c: droṇe citrāstratāṃ saṃkhye rājaṃs tvam anucintaya
GE07mbh_07_u:086.035a: ācāryo hi bhṛśaṃ rājan nigrahe tava gṛdhyati
GE07mbh_07_u:086.035c: pratijñām ātmano rakṣan satyāṃ kartuṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:086.036a: kuruṣvādyātmano guptiṃ kas te goptā gate mayi
GE07mbh_07_u:086.036c: yasyāhaṃ pratyayāt pārtha gaccheyaṃ phalgunaṃ prati
GE07mbh_07_u:086.036d-0585_01: pratyayo na hi me pārtha yāvad gacchāmi pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_07_u:086.037a: na hy ahaṃ tvā mahārāja anikṣipya mahāhave
GE07mbh_07_u:086.037c: kva cid yāsyāmi kauravya satyam etad bravīmi te
GE07mbh_07_u:086.037d-0586_01: na paśyāmi rathaṃ kaṃ cid yas te goptā bhaved iha
GE07mbh_07_u:086.037d-0586_02: śaktaṃ yaṃ manyase rājan goptāraṃ prati pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_07_u:086.038a: etad vicārya bahuśo buddhyā buddhimatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_07_u:086.038c: dṛṣṭvā śreyaḥ paraṃ buddhyā tato rājan praśādhi mām
GE07mbh_07_u:086.039a: evam etan mahābāho yathā vadasi mādhava
GE07mbh_07_u:086.039c: na tu me śudhyate bhāvaḥ śvetāśvaṃ prati māriṣa
GE07mbh_07_u:086.040a: kariṣye paramaṃ yatnam ātmano rakṣaṇaṃ prati
GE07mbh_07_u:086.040c: gaccha tvaṃ samanujñāto yatra yāto dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:086.041c: vicāryaitad dvayaṃ buddhyā gamanaṃ tatra rocaye
GE07mbh_07_u:086.042a: sa tvam ātiṣṭha yānāya yatra yāto dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:086.043a: pārṣataś ca sasodaryaḥ pārthivāś ca mahābalāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:086.043c: draupadeyāś ca māṃ tāta rakṣiṣyanti na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:086.044a: kekayā bhrātaraḥ pañca rākṣasaś ca ghaṭotkacaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:086.044c: virāṭo drupadaś caiva śikhaṇḍī ca mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:086.045a: dhṛṣṭaketuś ca balavān kuntibhojaś ca māriṣa
GE07mbh_07_u:086.045c: nakulaḥ sahadevaś ca pāñcālāḥ sṛñjayās tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:086.045e: ete samāhitās tāta rakṣiṣyanti na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:086.046a: na droṇaḥ saha sainyena kṛtavarmā ca saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:086.046c: samāsādayituṃ śakto na ca māṃ dharṣayiṣyati
GE07mbh_07_u:086.047a: dhṛṣṭadyumnaś ca samare droṇaṃ kruddhaṃ paraṃtapaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:086.048c: na droṇasainyaṃ balavat krāmet tatra kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_07_u:086.049c: kavacī sa śarī khaḍgī dhanvī ca varabhūṣaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:086.049d-0588_01: eṣa droṇaṃ raṇe kruddhaṃ vārayeta sa vai prabho
GE07mbh_07_u:086.049d-0588_02: pāñcālaḥ sahitaḥ sarvaiḥ pāṇḍavānāṃ ca dhanvibhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:086.050a: viśrabdho gaccha śaineya mā kārṣīr mayi saṃbhramam
GE07mbh_07_u:087.001c: pārthāc ca bhayam āśaṅkan parityāgān mahīpateḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:087.002a: apavādaṃ hy ātmanaś ca lokād rakṣan viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:087.002c: na māṃ bhīta iti brūyur āyāntaṃ phalgunaṃ prati
GE07mbh_07_u:087.004a: kṛtāṃ cen manyase rakṣāṃ svasti te 'stu viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:087.005a: na hi me pāṇḍavāt kaś cit triṣu lokeṣu vidyate
GE07mbh_07_u:087.005c: yo vai priyataro rājan satyam etad bravīmi te
GE07mbh_07_u:087.006a: tasyāhaṃ padavīṃ yāsye saṃdeśāt tava mānada
GE07mbh_07_u:087.006c: tvatkṛte na ca me kiṃ cid akartavyaṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_07_u:087.007a: yathā hi me guror vākyaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ dvipadāṃ vara
GE07mbh_07_u:087.007c: tathā tavāpi vacanaṃ viśiṣṭataram eva me
GE07mbh_07_u:087.008a: priye hi tava vartete bhrātarau kṛṣṇapāṇḍavau
GE07mbh_07_u:087.008c: tayoḥ priye sthitaṃ caiva viddhi māṃ rājapuṃgava
GE07mbh_07_u:087.009a: tavājñāṃ śirasā gṛhya pāṇḍavārtham ahaṃ prabho
GE07mbh_07_u:087.010a: droṇānīkaṃ viśāmy eṣa kruddho jhaṣa ivārṇavam
GE07mbh_07_u:087.010c: tatra yāsyāmi yatrāsau rājan rājā jayadrathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:087.011a: yatra senāṃ samāśritya bhītas tiṣṭhati pāṇḍavāt
GE07mbh_07_u:087.012a: itas triyojanaṃ manye tam adhvānaṃ viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:087.014a: anādiṣṭas tu guruṇā ko nu yudhyeta mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:087.014c: ādiṣṭas tu tvayā rājan ko na yudhyeta mādṛśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:087.014e: abhijānāmi taṃ deśaṃ yatra yāsyāmy ahaṃ prabho
GE07mbh_07_u:087.014f-0591_02: sāgarapratimaṃ sainyaṃ garjantam iva sāgaram huḍaśaktigadāprāsakhaḍgacarmarṣṭitomaram
GE07mbh_07_u:087.017c: nāgā meghanibhā rājan kṣaranta iva toyadāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:087.018c: anyatra hi vadhād eṣāṃ nāsti rājan parājayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:087.019a: atha yān rathino rājan samantād anupaśyasi
GE07mbh_07_u:087.020a: ratheṣv astreṣu nipuṇā nāgeṣu ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:087.020c: dhanurvede gatāḥ pāraṃ muṣṭiyuddhe ca kovidāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:087.022a: śūrāś ca kṛtavidyāś ca spardhante ca parasparam
GE07mbh_07_u:087.022c: nityaṃ ca samare rājan vijigīṣanti mānavān
GE07mbh_07_u:087.024a: satataṃ priyakāmāś ca karṇasyaite vaśe sthitāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:087.025a: te na kṣatā na ca śrāntā dṛḍhāvaraṇakārmukāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:087.026a: etān pramathya saṃgrāme priyārthaṃ tava kaurava
GE07mbh_07_u:087.027a: yāṃs tv etān aparān rājan nāgān saptaśatāni ca
GE07mbh_07_u:087.028c: svalaṃkṛtāṃs tathā preṣyān icchañ jīvitam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:087.029a: āsann ete purā rājaṃs tava karmakarā dṛḍham
GE07mbh_07_u:087.029c: tvām evādya yuyutsante paśya kālasya paryayam
GE07mbh_07_u:087.032a: etān bhittvā śarai rājan kirātān yuddhadurmadān
GE07mbh_07_u:087.033a: ye tv ete sumahānāgā añjanasya kulodbhavāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:087.035a: uttarāt parvatād ete tīkṣṇair dasyubhir āsthitāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:087.038c: kṛpaṃ ca saumadattiṃ ca droṇaṃ ca rathināṃ varam
GE07mbh_07_u:087.039b-0593_01: bhīṣmaṃ droṇaṃ kṛpaṃ karṇam āvantyāv atha saindhavam
GE07mbh_07_u:087.039b-0593_02: drauṇiṃ ca saumadattiṃ ca pāṇḍavān atimanyate
GE07mbh_07_u:087.040c: na vimokṣyanti kaunteya yady api syur manojavāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:087.042a: ye tv ete rathino rājan dṛśyante kāñcanadhvajāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:087.042c: ete durvāraṇā nāma kāmbojā yadi te śrutāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:087.043a: śūrāś ca kṛtavidyāś ca dhanurvede ca niṣṭhitāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:087.043c: saṃhatāś ca bhṛśaṃ hy ete anyonyasya hitaiṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:087.045c: tāṃs tv ahaṃ pramathiṣyāmi tṛṇānīva hutāśanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:087.046c: rathe kurvantu me rājan yathāvad rathakalpakāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:087.047a: asmiṃs tu khalu saṃgrāme grāhyaṃ vividham āyudham
GE07mbh_07_u:087.051d-0594_02: yāsyāmi rathināṃ śreṣṭhaṃ pravaraṃ ca dhanuṣmatām
GE07mbh_07_u:087.051d-0594_04: apareṇa gate sūrye gamiṣyāmi na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:087.052a: tasmād vai vājino mukhyā viśrāntāḥ śubhalakṣaṇāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:087.052c: upāvṛttāś ca pītāś ca punar yujyantu me rathe
GE07mbh_07_u:087.053c: rathe prāsthāpayad rājā śastrāṇi vividhāni ca
GE07mbh_07_u:087.054a: tatas tān sarvato muktvā sadaśvāṃś caturo janāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:087.059a: dārukasyānujo bhrātā sūtas tasya priyaḥ sakhā
GE07mbh_07_u:087.061a: tataḥ sa madhuparkārhaḥ pītvā kailāvataṃ madhu
GE07mbh_07_u:087.062e: utsaṅge dhanur ādāya saśaraṃ rathināṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:087.063c: lājair gandhais tathā mālyaiḥ kanyābhiś cābhinanditaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:087.064d-0595_02: harṣeṇa mahatā yuktas tv āruroha rathottamam
GE07mbh_07_u:087.065a: tatas te vājino hṛṣṭāḥ supuṣṭā vātaraṃhasaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:087.065c: ajayyā jaitram ūhus taṃ vikurvantaḥ sma saindhavāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:087.065d-0596_01: yathā śakrarathaṃ rājann ūhus te harayaḥ purā
GE07mbh_07_u:087.065d-0596_04: tau dṛṣṭvā pravivikṣantau tava senām ariṃdamau
GE07mbh_07_u:087.065d-0596_06: saṃnaddham anugacchantaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhīmaṃ sa sātyakiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:087.066c: tvaṃ bhīma rakṣa rājānam etat kāryatamaṃ hi te
GE07mbh_07_u:087.067a: ahaṃ bhittvā pravekṣyāmi kālapakvam idaṃ balam
GE07mbh_07_u:087.067c: āyatyāṃ ca tadātve ca śreyo rājño 'bhirakṣaṇam
GE07mbh_07_u:087.068a: jānīṣe mama vīryaṃ tvaṃ tava cāham ariṃdama
GE07mbh_07_u:087.068c: tasmād bhīma nivartasva mama ced icchasi priyam
GE07mbh_07_u:087.069a: tathoktaḥ sātyakiṃ prāha vraja tvaṃ kāryasiddhaye
GE07mbh_07_u:087.070a: evam uktaḥ pratyuvāca bhīmasenaṃ sa mādhavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:087.070c: gaccha gaccha drutaṃ pārtha dhruvo 'dya vijayo mama
GE07mbh_07_u:087.071a: yan me snigdho 'nuraktaś ca tvam adya vaśagaḥ sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:087.071c: nimittāni ca dhanyāni yathā bhīma vadanti me
GE07mbh_07_u:087.072d-0597_01: apramādaś ca te kāryo droṇaṃ prati mahāratham
GE07mbh_07_u:087.073a: etāvad uktvā bhīmaṃ tu visṛjya ca mahāmanāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:087.073c: saṃpraikṣat tāvakaṃ sainyaṃ vyāghro mṛgagaṇān iva
GE07mbh_07_u:087.074a: taṃ dṛṣṭvā pravivikṣantaṃ sainyaṃ tava janādhipa
GE07mbh_07_u:087.074c: bhūya evābhavan mūḍhaṃ subhṛśaṃ cāpy akampata
GE07mbh_07_u:087.075a: tataḥ prayātaḥ sahasā sainyaṃ tava sa sātyakiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:088.001a: prayāte tava sainyaṃ tu yuyudhāne yuyutsayā
GE07mbh_07_u:088.002b-0598_01: prayāte mādhave rājann idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_07_u:088.004a: mahārathā hi bahavo yatiṣyanty asya nirjaye
GE07mbh_07_u:088.004b-0599_03: jahi prahara gṛhṇīhi vidhya vidrāva cādrava
GE07mbh_07_u:088.004c: iti bruvanto vegena samāpetur balaṃ tava
GE07mbh_07_u:088.005c: tataḥ śabdo mahān āsīd yuyudhānarathaṃ prati
GE07mbh_07_u:088.007d-0601_03: śatam ekena vivyādha śatenaikaṃ ca patriṇām
GE07mbh_07_u:088.007d-0601_04: dvipārohān dvipāṃś caiva hayārohān hayāṃs tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:088.007d-0601_05: rathinaḥ sāśvasūtāṃś ca jaghāneśaḥ paśūn iva
