GE07mbh_07_u:095.018e: keṣāṃ saṃyamanīm adya gantum utsahate manaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:095.019e: keṣāṃ vaivasvato rājā smarate 'dya mahābhuja sūta uvāca
GE07mbh_07_u:095.020a: muṇḍān etān haniṣyāmi dānavān iva vāsavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:095.020c: pratijñāṃ pārayiṣyāmi kāmbojān eva mā vaha
GE07mbh_07_u:095.020e: adyaiṣāṃ kadanaṃ kṛtvā kṣipraṃ yāsyāmi pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_07_u:095.021a: adya drakṣyanti me vīryaṃ kauravāḥ sasuyodhanāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:095.027a: adya me kruddharūpasya nighnataś ca varān varān
GE07mbh_07_u:095.027c: dvir arjunam imaṃ lokaṃ maṃsyate sa suyodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:095.029a: adya snehaṃ ca bhaktiṃ ca pāṇḍaveṣu mahātmasu
GE07mbh_07_u:095.029b-0670_01: balaṃ vīryaṃ kṛtajñatvaṃ mama jñāsyanti kauravāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:095.030a: evam uktas tadā sūtaḥ śikṣitān sādhuvāhinaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:095.030d-0672_01: saindhavāṃś coditā yantrā ūhus te satyakaṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:095.033c: acchinat sātyakī rājan nainaṃ te prāpnuvañ śarāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:095.034c: uccakarta śirāṃsy ugro yavanānāṃ bhujān api
GE07mbh_07_u:095.035c: bhittvā dehāṃs tathā teṣāṃ śarā jagmur mahītalam
GE07mbh_07_u:095.036a: te hanyamānā vīreṇa mlecchāḥ sātyakinā raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:095.037c: pañca ṣaṭ sapta cāṣṭau ca bibheda yavanāñ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:095.038a: kāmbojānāṃ sahasrais tu śakānāṃ ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:095.038d-0674_02: padātibhiś ca vīreṇa sātvatena hate raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:095.038d-0674_04: evaṃ tad yavanānīkaṃ hatvā chittvā ca mādhavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:095.039c: kṛtavāṃs tatra śaineyaḥ kṣapayaṃs tāvakaṃ balam
GE07mbh_07_u:095.040c: tatra tatra mahī kīrṇā vibarhair aṇḍajair iva
GE07mbh_07_u:095.041c: kabandhaiḥ saṃvṛtaṃ sarvaṃ tāmrābhraiḥ kham ivāvṛtam
GE07mbh_07_u:095.042d-0675_01: teṣām astrāṇi bāṇāṃś ca śaineyo nataparvabhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:095.042d-0675_04: bhittvā dehāṃs tathā teṣāṃ patanti sma mahītale
GE07mbh_07_u:095.042d-0675_05: te hanyamānā vīrās tu vṛṣṇivīreṇa saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:095.042d-0675_07: kāmbojānāṃ bhujaiś chinnaiḥ yavanānāṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:095.042d-0675_08: tatra tatra mahī bhāti pañcāsyair iva pannagaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:095.044a: pārṣṇibhiś ca kaśābhiś ca tāḍayantas turaṃgamān
GE07mbh_07_u:095.044c: javam uttamam āsthāya sarvataḥ prādravan bhayāt
GE07mbh_07_u:095.045c: yavanānāṃ ca tat sainyaṃ śakānāṃ ca mahad balam
GE07mbh_07_u:095.046c: prahṛṣṭas tāvakāñ jitvā sūtaṃ yāhīty acodayat
GE07mbh_07_u:095.046d-0676_01: tat tasya samare karma dṛṣṭvānyair akṛtaṃ purā
GE07mbh_07_u:095.046d-0676_02: cāraṇāḥ saha gandharvāḥ pūjayāṃ cakrire bhṛśam
GE07mbh_07_u:095.047a: taṃ yāntaṃ pṛṣṭhagoptāram arjunasya viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:095.047c: cāraṇāḥ prekṣya saṃhṛṣṭās tvadīyāś cāpy apūjayan
GE07mbh_07_u:095.047d-0677_01: na ke cid abhyavartanta tāvakā vṛṣṇinandanam
GE07mbh_07_u:096.001c: jagāma tava sainyasya madhyena rathināṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:096.002c: mṛgān vyāghra ivājighraṃs tava sainyam abhīṣayat
GE07mbh_07_u:096.003a: sa rathena caran mārgān dhanur abhrāmayad bhṛśam
GE07mbh_07_u:096.006c: tāvakānāṃ babhau madhye gavāṃ madhye yathā vṛṣaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:096.010c: śakunir duḥsahaś caiva yuvā durmarṣaṇaḥ krathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:096.011a: anye ca bahavaḥ śūrāḥ śastravanto durāsadāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:096.012a: atha śabdo mahān āsīt tava sainyasya māriṣa
GE07mbh_07_u:096.013c: śanair yāhīti yantāram abravīt prahasann iva
GE07mbh_07_u:096.014a: idam eti samuddhūtaṃ dhārtarāṣṭrasya yad balam
GE07mbh_07_u:096.015a: nādayan vai diśaḥ sarvā rathaghoṣeṇa sārathe
GE07mbh_07_u:096.015c: pṛthivīṃ cāntarikṣaṃ ca kampayan sāgarān api
GE07mbh_07_u:096.017a: paśya me sūta vikrāntam indrasyeva mahāmṛdhe
GE07mbh_07_u:096.017b-0679_02: udvṛttaḥ sāgaro yadvad velām āśrayate tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:096.017b-0679_03: mām āsādya hi tiṣṭhanti yaudhāḥ śatasahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:096.017c: eṣa sainyāni śatrūṇāṃ vidhamāmi śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:096.019a: ity evaṃ bruvatas tasya sātyaker amitaujasaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:096.019c: samīpaṃ sainikās te tu śīghram īyur yuyutsavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:096.019e: jahy ādravasva tiṣṭheti paśya paśyeti vādinaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:096.020a: tān evaṃ bruvato vīrān sātyakir niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:096.020c: jaghāna triśatān aśvān kuñjarāṃś ca catuḥśatān
GE07mbh_07_u:096.021a: sa saṃprahāras tumulas tasya teṣāṃ ca dhanvinām
GE07mbh_07_u:096.024a: āścaryaṃ tatra rājendra sumahad dṛṣṭavān aham
GE07mbh_07_u:096.024c: na moghaḥ sāyakaḥ kaś cit sātyaker abhavat prabho
GE07mbh_07_u:096.024d-0683_01: nāsīn moghaḥ śaraḥ kaś cid āsan sarve tanucchidaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:096.026c: tat sainyam iṣubhis tena vadhyamānaṃ samantataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:096.026d-0684_01: rathinaḥ pattināgāś ca sādinaś ca śarā hatāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:096.026e: babhrāma tatra tatraiva gāvaḥ śītārditā iva
GE07mbh_07_u:096.027a: padātinaṃ rathaṃ nāgaṃ sādinaṃ turagaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:096.028a: na tādṛk kadanaṃ rājan kṛtavāṃs tatra phalgunaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:096.028c: yādṛk kṣayam anīkānām akarot sātyakir nṛpa
GE07mbh_07_u:096.029a: tato duryodhano rājā sātvatasya tribhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:096.029c: vivyādha sūtaṃ niśitaiś caturbhiś caturo hayān
GE07mbh_07_u:096.030a: sātyakiṃ ca tribhir viddhvā punar vivyādha so 'ṣṭabhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:096.032c: tān avidhyan mahārāja sarvān eva tribhis tribhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:096.033d-0686_01: śyenavad vyacarat saṃkhye śaineyo laghu suṣṭhu ca
GE07mbh_07_u:096.034a: saubalasya dhanuś chittvā hastāvāpaṃ nikṛtya ca
GE07mbh_07_u:096.036a: athānyad dhanur ādāya syālas tava viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:096.036c: aṣṭabhiḥ sātyakiṃ viddhvā punar vivyādha pañcabhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:096.037a: duḥśāsanaś ca daśabhir duḥsahaś ca tribhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:096.037c: durmukhaś ca dvādaśabhī rājan vivyādha sātyakim
GE07mbh_07_u:096.038c: tato 'sya niśitair bāṇais tribhir vivyādha sārathim
GE07mbh_07_u:096.039a: tān sarvān sahitāñ śūrān yatamānān mahārathān
GE07mbh_07_u:096.039c: pañcabhiḥ pañcabhir bāṇaiḥ punar vivyādha sātyakiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:096.040a: tataḥ sa rathināṃ śreṣṭhas tava putrasya sārathim
GE07mbh_07_u:096.040c: ājaghānāśu bhallena sa hato nyapatad bhuvi
GE07mbh_07_u:096.041a: pātite sārathau tasmiṃs tava putrarathaḥ prabho
GE07mbh_07_u:096.042a: tatas tava sutā rājan sainikāś ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:096.043a: vidrutaṃ tatra tat sainyaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhārata sātyakiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:096.044c: prayayau sātyakī rājañ śvetāśvasya rathaṃ prati
GE07mbh_07_u:096.044d-0687_01: taṃ prayāntaṃ mahābāhuṃ tāvakāḥ prekṣya māriṣa
GE07mbh_07_u:096.044d-0687_02: dṛṣṭaṃ cādṛṣṭavat kṛtvā kriyām anyāṃ prayojayan
GE07mbh_07_u:096.045a: taṃ śarān ādadānaṃ ca rakṣamāṇaṃ ca sārathim
GE07mbh_07_u:097.001a: saṃpramṛdya mahat sainyaṃ yāntaṃ śaineyam arjunam
GE07mbh_07_u:097.001c: nirhrīkā mama te putrāḥ kim akurvata saṃjaya
GE07mbh_07_u:097.002a: kathaṃ caiṣāṃ tathā yuddhe dhṛtir āsīn mumūrṣatām
GE07mbh_07_u:097.003a: kiṃ nu vakṣyanti te kṣātraṃ sainyamadhye parājitāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:097.003c: kathaṃ ca sātyakir yuddhe vyatikrānto mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:097.004a: kathaṃ ca mama putrāṇāṃ jīvatāṃ tatra saṃjaya
GE07mbh_07_u:097.005a: atyadbhutam idaṃ tāta tvatsakāśāc chṛṇomy aham
GE07mbh_07_u:097.005c: ekasya bahubhir yuddhaṃ śatrubhir vai mahārathaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:097.006a: viparītam ahaṃ manye mandabhāgyān sutān prati
GE07mbh_07_u:097.007a: ekasya hi na paryāptaṃ matsainyaṃ tasya saṃjaya
GE07mbh_07_u:097.008c: yathā paśugaṇān siṃhas tadvad dhantā sutān mama
GE07mbh_07_u:097.009c: yuyudhāno na śakito hantuṃ yaḥ puruṣarṣabhaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:097.009d-0688_01: na śakyaḥ samare jetuṃ nihaniṣyati me sutān
GE07mbh_07_u:097.010a: naitad īdṛśakaṃ yuddhaṃ kṛtavāṃs tatra phalgunaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:097.010c: yādṛśaṃ kṛtavān yuddhaṃ śiner naptā mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:097.011c: śṛṇuṣvāvahito bhūtvā yat te vakṣyāmi bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:097.012a: te punaḥ saṃnyavartanta kṛtvā saṃśaptakān mithaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:097.012c: parāṃ yuddhe matiṃ kṛtvā putrasya tava śāsanāt
GE07mbh_07_u:097.018a: tāṃś ca saṃcodayan sarvān ghnatainam iti bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:097.019c: yad eko bahubhiḥ sārdham asaṃbhrāntam ayudhyata
GE07mbh_07_u:097.020a: avadhīc ca rathānīkaṃ dviradānāṃ ca tad balam
GE07mbh_07_u:097.020c: sādinaś caiva tān sarvān dasyūn api ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:097.020d-0691_01: saṃprādravan mahat sainyaṃ bhagnaṃ ca bahudhā śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:097.021a: tatra cakrair vimathitair bhagnaiś ca paramāyudhaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:097.022a: kūbarair mathitaiś cāpi dhvajaiś cāpi nipātitaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:097.023a: sragbhir ābharaṇair vastrair anukarṣaiś ca māriṣa
GE07mbh_07_u:097.023c: saṃchannā vasudhā tatra dyaur grahair iva bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:097.024b-0692_02: mṛgair mandaiś ca bhadraiś ca mṛgamandais tathāparaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:097.024b-0692_03: bhadrair mandamanobhiś ca mṛgabhadrais tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_07_u:097.024b-0692_04: mandair mandamadaiś caiva tathā mandamṛgair api
GE07mbh_07_u:097.024c: añjanasya kule jātā vāmanasya ca bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:097.025c: jātā dantivarā rājañ śerate bahavo hatāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:097.026c: tathā hayavarān rājan nijaghne tatra sātyakiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:097.028c: nivartadhvam adharmajñā yudhyadhvaṃ kiṃ sṛtena vaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:097.029a: tāṃś cāpi sarvān saṃprekṣya putro duḥśāsanas tava
GE07mbh_07_u:097.031c: abhidravata mā bhaiṣṭa na vaḥ prāpsyati sātyakiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:097.033d-0696_02: mlecchāḥ pipāsavaḥ prājñā rājānam iva mantriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:097.036a: tair aśmacūrṇair dīpyadbhiḥ khadyotānām iva vrajaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:097.037d-0697_02: sopalair bāhubhiś chinnaiḥ petur aprāpya sātyakim
GE07mbh_07_u:097.037d-0698_01: sātvatasya ca bhallena niṣpiṣṭais tais tathādribhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:097.037d-0698_02: nipatan nihatā mlecchās tatra tatra gatāsavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:097.040a: ambaṣṭhaiś ca kuṇindaiś ca kṣiptāṃ kṣiptāṃ sa sātyakiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:097.042a: aśmacūrṇaiḥ samākīrṇā manuṣyāś ca vayāṃsi ca
GE07mbh_07_u:097.043b-0699_01: vibhinnaśiraso rājan dantaiś chinnaiś ca dantinaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:097.043b-0699_02: nirdhūtaiś ca karair nāgā vyaṅgāś ca śataśaḥ kṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:097.043b-0699_03: hatvā pañcaśatān yodhān sa kṣaṇenaiva māriṣa
GE07mbh_07_u:097.044a: tataḥ śabdaḥ samabhavat tava sainyasya māriṣa
GE07mbh_07_u:097.045a: taṃ śabdaṃ tumulaṃ śrutvā droṇo yantāram abravīt
GE07mbh_07_u:097.045c: eṣa sūta raṇe kruddhaḥ sātvatānāṃ mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:097.046a: dārayan bahudhā sainyaṃ raṇe carati kālavat
GE07mbh_07_u:097.046c: yatraiṣa śabdas tumulas tatra sūta rathaṃ naya
GE07mbh_07_u:097.047c: tathā hi rathinaḥ sarve hriyante vidrutair hayaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:097.048a: viśastrakavacā rugṇās tatra tatra patanti ca
GE07mbh_07_u:097.048c: na śaknuvanti yantāraḥ saṃyantuṃ tumule hayān
GE07mbh_07_u:097.049a: ity evaṃ bruvato rājan bhāradvājasya dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:097.049c: pratyuvāca tato yantā droṇaṃ śastrabhṛtāṃ varam
GE07mbh_07_u:097.050b-0701_01: āyuṣman vidravaty eva kurūṇāṃ sainyam āturam
GE07mbh_07_u:097.050c: paśya yodhān raṇe bhinnān dhāvamānāṃs tatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:097.051a: ete ca sahitāḥ śūrāḥ pāñcālāḥ pāṇḍavaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_07_u:097.051c: tvām eva hi jighāṃsantaḥ prādravanti samantataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:097.052c: sthāne vā gamane vāpi dūraṃ yātaś ca sātyakiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:097.055a: yais tu duḥśāsanaḥ sārdhaṃ rathaiḥ pūrvaṃ nyavartata
GE07mbh_07_u:097.055c: te bhītās tv abhyadhāvanta sarve droṇarathaṃ prati
GE07mbh_07_u:098.002a: duḥśāsana rathāḥ sarve kasmād ete pravidrutāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:098.002c: kaccit kṣemaṃ tu nṛpateḥ kaccij jīvati saindhavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:098.003c: kimarthaṃ dravase yuddhe yauvarājyam avāpya hi
GE07mbh_07_u:098.003d-0702_01: dāsī jitāsi dyūte tvaṃ yathākāmacarī bhava
GE07mbh_07_u:098.003d-0702_02: vāsasāṃ vāhikā rājño bhrātur jyeṣṭhasya me bhava
GE07mbh_07_u:098.003d-0702_03: na santi patayaḥ sarve te 'dya ṣaṇḍhatilaiḥ samāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:098.003d-0702_04: duḥśāsanaivam uktvā tvaṃ pūrvaṃ kasmāt palāyase
GE07mbh_07_u:098.004a: svayaṃ vairaṃ mahat kṛtvā pāñcālaiḥ pāṇḍavaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_07_u:098.004c: ekaṃ sātyakim āsādya kathaṃ bhīto 'si saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:098.005a: na jānīṣe purā tvaṃ tu gṛhṇann akṣān durodare
GE07mbh_07_u:098.006c: draupadyāś ca parikleśas tvanmūlo hy abhavat purā
GE07mbh_07_u:098.007a: kva te mānaś ca darpaś ca kva ca tad vīra garjitam
GE07mbh_07_u:098.008a: śocyeyaṃ bhāratī senā rājā caiva suyodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:098.009a: nanu nāma tvayā vīra dīryamāṇā bhayārditā
GE07mbh_07_u:098.009e: sa tvam adya raṇaṃ tyaktvā bhīto harṣayase parān
GE07mbh_07_u:098.010c: ko 'nyaḥ sthāsyati saṃgrāme bhīto bhīte vyapāśraye
GE07mbh_07_u:098.011c: palāyane tava matiḥ saṃgrāmād dhi pravartate
GE07mbh_07_u:098.012c: yamau ca yudhi draṣṭāsi tadā tvaṃ kiṃ kariṣyasi
GE07mbh_07_u:098.013c: na tulyāḥ sātyakiśarā yeṣāṃ bhītaḥ palāyase
GE07mbh_07_u:098.013d-0703_01: tvarito vīra gaccha tvaṃ gāndhāry udaram āviśa
GE07mbh_07_u:098.013d-0703_02: pṛthivyāṃ dhāvamānasya na saṃpaśyāmi te śamam
GE07mbh_07_u:098.015c: nāviśanti śarīraṃ te tāvat saṃśāmya pāṇḍavaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:098.016a: yāvat te pṛthivīṃ pārthā hatvā bhrātṛśataṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:098.017a: yāvan na krudhyate rājā dharmaputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:098.017c: kṛṣṇaś ca samaraślāghī tāvat saṃśāmya pāṇḍavaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:098.018a: yāvad bhīmo mahābāhur vigāhya mahatīṃ camūm
GE07mbh_07_u:098.018c: sodarāṃs te na mṛdnāti tāvat saṃśāmya pāṇḍavaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:098.018d-0704_01: mayā śamavatā cokto rakṣa śeṣaṃ suyodhana
GE07mbh_07_u:098.018d-0704_02: saṃśāmya vīra pārthais tvaṃ rakṣa sarvān mahīkṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:098.019a: pūrvam uktaś ca te bhrātā bhīṣmeṇa sa suyodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:098.019c: ajeyāḥ pāṇḍavāḥ saṃkhye saumya saṃśāmya pāṇḍavaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:098.019e: na ca tat kṛtavān mandas tava bhrātā suyodhanaḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:116.030c: jñātavyaś ca hi me rājā rakṣitavyaś ca sātyakiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:116.031a: jayadrathaś ca hantavyo lambate ca divākaraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:116.031c: śrāntaś caiṣa mahābāhur alpaprāṇaś ca sāṃpratam
GE07mbh_07_u:116.032a: pariśrāntā hayāś cāsya hayayantā ca mādhava
GE07mbh_07_u:116.032c: na ca bhūriśravāḥ śrāntaḥ sasahāyaś ca keśava
GE07mbh_07_u:116.032d-0934_01: bhūriśravāḥ kṛtāstraś ca rakṣyo mādhava satyakaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:116.033a: apīdānīṃ bhaved asya kṣemam asmin samāgame
GE07mbh_07_u:116.033c: kaccin na sāgaraṃ tīrtvā sātyakiḥ satyavikramaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:116.035c: ācāryād bhayam utsṛjya yaḥ preṣayati sātyakim
GE07mbh_07_u:116.036c: nityam āśaṃsate droṇaḥ kaccit syāt kuśalī nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:116.036d-0935_01: āmiṣārthī yathā śyeno nityaṃ tiṣṭhati brāhmaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:116.036d-0935_02: grahaṇe dharmaputrasya kaś cit kṣemī bhaven nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:117.002c: adya prāpto 'si diṣṭyā me cakṣurviṣayam ity uta
GE07mbh_07_u:117.003c: na hi me mokṣyase jīvan yadi notsṛjase raṇam
GE07mbh_07_u:117.004a: adya tvāṃ samare hatvā nityaṃ śūrābhimāninam
GE07mbh_07_u:117.005c: drakṣyatas tvāṃ raṇe vīrau sahitau keśavārjunau
GE07mbh_07_u:117.006a: adya dharmasuto rājā śrutvā tvāṃ nihataṃ mayā
GE07mbh_07_u:117.007a: adya me vikramaṃ pārtho vijñāsyati dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:117.008a: cirābhilaṣito hy adya tvayā saha samāgamaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:117.008c: purā devāsure yuddhe śakrasya balinā yathā
GE07mbh_07_u:117.009a: adya yuddhaṃ mahāghoraṃ tava dāsyāmi sātvata
GE07mbh_07_u:117.010a: adya saṃyamanīṃ yātā mayā tvaṃ nihato raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:117.011a: adya kṛṣṇaś ca pārthaś ca dharmarājaś ca mādhava
GE07mbh_07_u:117.011c: hate tvayi nirutsāhā raṇaṃ tyakṣyanty asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_07_u:117.012a: adya te 'pacitiṃ kṛtvā śitair mādhava sāyakaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:117.012c: tatstriyo nandayiṣyāmi ye tvayā nihatā raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:117.013c: siṃhasya viṣayaṃ prāpto yathā kṣudramṛgas tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:117.014a: yuyudhānas tu taṃ rājan pratyuvāca hasann iva
GE07mbh_07_u:117.014c: kauraveya na saṃtrāso vidyate mama saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:117.014d-0936_01: nāhaṃ bhīṣayituṃ śakyo vāṅmātreṇa tu kevalam
GE07mbh_07_u:117.015a: sa māṃ nihanyāt saṃgrāme yo māṃ kuryān nirāyudham
GE07mbh_07_u:117.015c: samās tu śāśvatīr hanyād yo māṃ hanyād dhi saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:117.016a: kiṃ mṛṣoktena bahunā karmaṇā tu samācara
GE07mbh_07_u:117.016c: śāradasyeva meghasya garjitaṃ niṣphalaṃ hi te
GE07mbh_07_u:117.017a: śrutvaitad garjitaṃ vīra hāsyaṃ hi mama jāyate
GE07mbh_07_u:117.018a: tvarate me matis tāta tvayi yuddhābhikāṅkṣiṇi
GE07mbh_07_u:117.019a: anyonyaṃ tau tadā vāgbhis takṣantau narapuṃgavau
GE07mbh_07_u:117.020a: sametau tau naravyāghrau śuṣmiṇau spardhinau raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:117.024a: tān asya viśikhāṃs tīkṣṇān antarikṣe viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:117.026a: tau nakhair iva śārdūlau dantair iva mahādvipau
GE07mbh_07_u:117.027a: nirbhidantau hi gātrāṇi vikṣarantau ca śoṇitam
GE07mbh_07_u:117.030d-0939_01: vṛṣṭiṃ tām abhivarṣantau śarāṇāṃ mahatīṃ tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:117.031a: saṃpraikṣanta janās tatra yudhyamānau yudhāṃ patī
GE07mbh_07_u:117.031d-0940_01: bhūyo bhūyaḥ śarai rājaṃs takṣantau krodhamūrcchitau
GE07mbh_07_u:117.032a: anyonyasya hayān hatvā dhanuṣī vinikṛtya ca
GE07mbh_07_u:117.033a: ārṣabhe carmaṇī citre pragṛhya vipule śubhe
GE07mbh_07_u:117.033c: vikośau cāpy asī kṛtvā samare tau viceratuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:117.034a: carantau vividhān mārgān maṇḍalāni ca bhāgaśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:117.035b-0941_01: bhrāntam udbhrāntam āviddham āplutaṃ viplutaṃ drutam
GE07mbh_07_u:117.035b-0941_04: ubhau chidraiṣiṇau vīrāv ubhau citraṃ vavalgatuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:117.035b-0941_05: darśayantāv ubhau śikṣāṃ lāghavaṃ sauṣṭhavaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:117.037a: asibhyāṃ carmaṇī śubhre vipule ca śarāvare
GE07mbh_07_u:117.041a: dvipāv iva viṣāṇāgraiḥ śṛṅgair iva maharṣabhau
GE07mbh_07_u:117.041d-0943_01: dvātriṃśat karaṇāni syur yāni yuddhāni bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:117.042a: kṣīṇāyudhe sātvate yudhyamāne; tato 'bravīd arjunaṃ vāsudevaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:117.042c: paśyasvainaṃ virathaṃ yudhyamānaṃ; raṇe ketuṃ sarvadhanurdharāṇām saṃjaya uvāca
GE07mbh_07_u:117.042d-0944_02: sīdantaṃ sātyakiṃ paśya pārthainaṃ parirakṣa ca
GE07mbh_07_u:117.043a: praviṣṭo bhāratīṃ senāṃ tava pāṇḍava pṛṣṭhataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:117.043c: yodhitaś ca mahāvīryaiḥ sarvair bhārata bhārataiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:117.043d-0945_01: dhārtarāṣṭrāś ca ye mukhyā ye ca mukhyā mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:117.045c: udyamya nyahanad rājan matto mattam iva dvipam
GE07mbh_07_u:117.047b-0947_01: bahubhir yas tu senābhir durjayaḥ samare 'nagha
GE07mbh_07_u:117.048a: pariśrāntaṃ gataṃ bhūmau kṛtvā karma suduṣkaram
GE07mbh_07_u:117.049a: na vaśaṃ yajñaśīlasya gacched eṣa varārihan
GE07mbh_07_u:117.049c: tvatkṛte puruṣavyāghra tad āśu kriyatāṃ vibho
GE07mbh_07_u:117.050e: mahādvipeneva vane mattena hariyūthapam saṃjaya uvāca
GE07mbh_07_u:117.050f-0948_01: ity evaṃ bhāṣamāṇe tu pāṇḍave vai
GE07mbh_07_u:117.051c: yad udyamya mahābāhuḥ sātyakiṃ nyahanad bhuvi
GE07mbh_07_u:117.051d-0949_01: pātite tv atha śaineye kṛṣṇo 'rjunam abhāṣata
GE07mbh_07_u:117.052a: sa siṃha iva mātaṅgaṃ vikarṣan bhūridakṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:117.052c: vyarocata kuruśreṣṭhaḥ sātvatapravaraṃ yudhi arjuna uvāca
GE07mbh_07_u:117.052d-0950_01: mām eva ca mahābāho pariyānti mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:117.052d-0950_04: rakṣāmi sātyakiṃ caiva saumadattiṃ vaśaṃ gatam
GE07mbh_07_u:117.052d-0950_05: aprāpto na mayā kṛṣṇa hantuṃ bhūriśravā raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:117.052d-0950_06: anyena tu samāsaktaṃ mano notsahate mama
GE07mbh_07_u:117.052d-0950_07: avaśyaṃ ca mayā kṛṣṇa vṛṣṇivīrasya rakṣaṇam
GE07mbh_07_u:117.052d-0950_08: madarthaṃ yudhyamānasya kāryaṃ prāṇair api prabho
GE07mbh_07_u:117.052d-0950_09: adharmo vāstu dharmo vā mama mādhava mādhavaḥ saṃjaya uvāca
GE07mbh_07_u:117.052d-0950_10: pareṇa nihato mā sma prāṇān hāsīn
GE07mbh_07_u:117.052d-0950_11: evam uktvārjunaḥ kṛṣṇaṃ parān āśu śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:117.052d-0950_12: chādayām āsa saṃkruddhaḥ pare cāpi dhanaṃjayam
GE07mbh_07_u:117.052d-0950_13: evaṃ sma yudhyate vīraḥ sātyakiṃ ca muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:117.052d-0950_14: prekṣate sma naravyāghro bhūriśravasam eva ca
GE07mbh_07_u:117.053a: atha kośād viniṣkṛṣya khaḍgaṃ bhūriśravā raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:117.053d-0951_01: ākramya cāpy athodyamya sa sāsiṃ subhujo bhujam
GE07mbh_07_u:117.053d-0952_01: tato 'sya chettum ārabdhaḥ śiraḥ kāyāt sakuṃḍalam
GE07mbh_07_u:117.053d-0952_02: tāvat kṣaṇāt sātvato 'pi śiraḥ saṃbhramayaṃs tvaran
GE07mbh_07_u:117.053d-0952_03: yathā rathāṃgaṃ kaulālo daṇḍaviddhaṃ tu bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:117.053d-0954_01: hāhākṛtam abhūt sarvaṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ mahad balam
GE07mbh_07_u:117.053d-0954_02: tāvakāś ca mudā yuktāḥ siṃhanādaṃ vicukruśuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:117.054a: tathā tu parikṛṣyantaṃ dṛṣṭvā sātvatam āhave
GE07mbh_07_u:117.055c: tava śiṣyaṃ mahābāho dhanuṣy anavaraṃ tvayā
GE07mbh_07_u:117.056a: asatyo vikramaḥ pārtha yatra bhūriśravā raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:117.059a: pravaraṃ vṛṣṇivīrāṇāṃ yan na hanyād dhi sātyakim
GE07mbh_07_u:117.060a: evaṃ tu manasā rājan pārthaḥ saṃpūjya kauravam
GE07mbh_07_u:117.060b-0956_01: ayudhyatāribhir vīras taṃ sma saṃprekṣate muhuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:117.061c: eṣa tv asukaraṃ karma yādavārthe karomy aham
GE07mbh_07_u:117.061d-0957_01: mama śiṣyo mamārthāya yudhyate mama śatrubhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:117.061d-0957_02: taṃ kṛṣṇa mokṣayiṣyāmi dāvāt siṃhaśiśuṃ yathā
GE07mbh_07_u:117.062a: ity uktvā vacanaṃ kurvan vāsudevasya pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:118.001a: sa bāhur apatad bhūmau sakhaḍgaḥ saśubhāṅgadaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:118.003a: sa moghaṃ kṛtam ātmānaṃ dṛṣṭvā pārthena kauravaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:118.003c: utsṛjya sātyakiṃ krodhād garhayām āsa pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_07_u:118.003d-0960_02: ekacakro ratho yadvad dharaṇīm āsthito nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:118.004a: nṛśaṃsaṃ bata kaunteya karmedaṃ kṛtavān asi
GE07mbh_07_u:118.004c: apaśyato viṣaktasya yan me bāhum acicchidaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:118.005a: kiṃ nu vakṣyasi rājānaṃ dharmaputraṃ yudhiṣṭhiram
GE07mbh_07_u:118.005c: kiṃ kurvāṇo mayā saṃkhye hato bhūriśravā iti
GE07mbh_07_u:118.006a: idam indreṇa te sākṣād upadiṣṭaṃ mahātmanā
GE07mbh_07_u:118.006c: astraṃ rudreṇa vā pārtha droṇenātha kṛpeṇa vā
GE07mbh_07_u:118.007a: nanu nāma svadharmajñas tvaṃ loke 'bhyadhikaḥ paraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:118.009c: katham ācaritaṃ pārtha tvayā karma suduṣkaram
GE07mbh_07_u:118.010a: āryeṇa sukaraṃ hy āhur āryakarma dhanaṃjaya
GE07mbh_07_u:118.011a: yeṣu yeṣu naraḥ pārtha yatra yatra ca vartate
GE07mbh_07_u:118.011c: āśu tacchīlatām eti tad idaṃ tvayi dṛśyate
GE07mbh_07_u:118.012a: kathaṃ hi rājavaṃśyas tvaṃ kauraveyo viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:118.012d-0962_01: alpas tavāparādho 'tra na tvāṃ tāta vigarhaye
GE07mbh_07_u:118.012d-0963_01: vārṣṇeyāpasadaṃ prāpya kṣudraṃ kṛtam idaṃ tvayā
GE07mbh_07_u:118.013a: idaṃ tu yad atikṣudraṃ vārṣṇeyārthe kṛtaṃ tvayā
GE07mbh_07_u:118.014a: ko hi nāma pramattāya pareṇa saha yudhyate
GE07mbh_07_u:118.014c: īdṛśaṃ vyasanaṃ dadyād yo na kṛṣṇasakho bhavet
GE07mbh_07_u:118.015c: vṛṣṇyandhakāḥ kathaṃ pārtha pramāṇaṃ bhavatā kṛtāḥ saṃjaya uvāca
GE07mbh_07_u:118.015d-013_0002: vyaktam eva hi jīrṇaḥ san buddhiṃ rañjayase nṛpa
GE07mbh_07_u:118.015d-013_0003: anarthakam idaṃ sarvaṃ yat tvayā vyāhṛtaṃ prabho
GE07mbh_07_u:118.015d-013_0004: hṛṣīkeśena saṃbandhaṃ garhase māṃ ca mūḍhavat
GE07mbh_07_u:118.015d-013_0006: na cādharmam ahaṃ kuryāṃ jānaṃś caiva hi muhyase
GE07mbh_07_u:118.015d-013_0007: yudhyante kṣatriyāḥ śatrūn svaiḥ svaiḥ parivṛtā nṛpa
GE07mbh_07_u:118.015d-013_0009: vayasyair atha mitraiś ca svabāhubalam āśritāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:118.015d-013_0010: ahaṃ hi sātyakiṃ śiṣyaṃ sukhasaṃbandhim eva ca
GE07mbh_07_u:118.015d-013_0011: madarthe yudhyamānaṃ ca tyaktvā prāṇān sudustyajān
GE07mbh_07_u:118.015d-013_0012: mama bāhuṃ raṇe rājan dakṣiṇaṃ yuddhadurmadam
GE07mbh_07_u:118.015d-013_0013: nikṛtyamānaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā kathaṃ śatruvaśaṃ gatam
GE07mbh_07_u:118.015d-013_0014: tvayā nikṛṣyamāṇaṃ ca dṛṣṭavān asmi niṣkriyam
GE07mbh_07_u:118.015d-013_0015: na cātmā rakṣitavyo hi eko raṇagatena hi
GE07mbh_07_u:118.015d-013_0016: yo yasya yudhyate 'rthāya sa saṃrakṣyo narādhipa
GE07mbh_07_u:118.015d-013_0017: tai rakṣyamāṇaḥ sa nṛpo rakṣitavyo mahāmṛdhe
GE07mbh_07_u:118.015d-013_0018: yady ahaṃ sātyakiṃ dṛṣṭvā tūṣṇīm āsiṣya āhave
GE07mbh_07_u:118.015d-013_0019: tatas tena viyogaś ca prāpyaṃ narakam eva ca
GE07mbh_07_u:118.015d-013_0020: rakṣitaś ca mayā yasmāt tasmāl labdho mayā sa ca
GE07mbh_07_u:118.015d-013_0021: yaśaś caiva svapakṣebhyaḥ phalaṃ mitrasya rakṣaṇāt
GE07mbh_07_u:118.015d-013_0022: yac ca māṃ garhase rājann anyena saha saṃgatam
GE07mbh_07_u:118.015d-013_0023: kas tena saṃgamaṃ necchet tatra te buddhivibhramaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:118.015d-013_0024: kavacaṃ dhunvatas tubhyaṃ rathaṃ cārohataḥ svayam
GE07mbh_07_u:118.015d-013_0025: dhanurjyāṃ karṣataś caiva yudhyataḥ saha śatrubhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:118.015d-013_0028: svaiś cāpi samupetasya vikrāntasya tathā raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:118.015d-013_0029: satyakena kathaṃ yogyaḥ saṃgrāmas te bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_07_u:118.015d-013_0030: bahubhiḥ saha saṃgamya nirjitya ca mahārathān
GE07mbh_07_u:118.015d-013_0031: śrāntaś ca śrāntavāhaś ca kṣīṇasarvāyudhas tvayā
GE07mbh_07_u:118.015d-013_0032: īdṛśaṃ sātyakiṃ saṃkhye nirjitya ca mahāratham
GE07mbh_07_u:118.015d-013_0033: adhikaṃ tvaṃ vijānīṣe tathāpy anyamanā bhavān
GE07mbh_07_u:118.015d-013_0034: yad icchasi śiraś cāsya asinā hartum āhave
GE07mbh_07_u:118.015d-013_0035: tathā kṛcchragataṃ dṛṣṭvā sātyakiṃ kaḥ kṣamiṣyati
GE07mbh_07_u:118.015d-013_0036: tvaṃ tu garhaya cātmānam ātmānaṃ yo na rakṣasi
GE07mbh_07_u:118.015d-013_0037: kathaṃ kariṣyase vīra yo vā tvāṃ saṃśrayej janaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:118.015d-013_0039: chinnavān yad ahaṃ bāhuṃ naital lokavigarhitam
GE07mbh_07_u:118.015d-013_0041: abhimanyor vadhaṃ tāta dhārmikaḥ ko nu pūjayet
GE07mbh_07_u:118.018a: sūrye cakṣuḥ samādhāya prasannaṃ salile manaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:118.019c: garhayām āsa taṃ cāpi śaśaṃsa puruṣarṣabham
GE07mbh_07_u:118.019d-0965_01: garhayām āsur apy etau śaśaṃsur bhūridakṣiṇam
GE07mbh_07_u:118.020a: nindyamānau tathā kṛṣṇau nocatuḥ kiṃ cid apriyam
GE07mbh_07_u:118.021a: tāṃs tathā vādino rājan putrāṃs tava dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:118.021c: amṛṣyamāṇo manasā teṣāṃ tasya ca bhāṣitam
GE07mbh_07_u:118.023a: mama sarve 'pi rājāno jānanty etan mahāvratam
GE07mbh_07_u:118.023c: na śakyo māmako hantuṃ yo me syād bāṇagocare
GE07mbh_07_u:118.024a: yūpaketo samīkṣya tvaṃ na māṃ garhitum arhasi
GE07mbh_07_u:118.024c: na hi dharmam avijñāya yuktaṃ garhayituṃ param
GE07mbh_07_u:118.025c: yad ahaṃ bāhum acchaitsaṃ na sa dharmo vigarhitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:118.025d-0966_01: acchinaṃ yad ahaṃ bāhuṃ tatra garhyaṃ kim asti ca
GE07mbh_07_u:118.026c: abhimanyor vadhaṃ tāta dhārmikaḥ ko na pūjayet
GE07mbh_07_u:118.026d-0967_01: nābhimanyor vadhaṃ yūyaṃ garhayadhvaṃ kutas tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:118.026d-014_0001: duryodhanasya kṣudrasya na pramāṇe ca tiṣṭhataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:118.026d-014_0004: ye me pratyakṣato vīrā hanyerann iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:118.026d-014_0005: satyakaś ca vaśaṃ nītaḥ kauraveṇa mahātmanā saṃjaya uvāca
GE07mbh_07_u:118.026d-014_0007: punaś ca kṛpayāviṣṭo bahu tat tad vicintayan
GE07mbh_07_u:118.026d-014_0009: dhig astu kṣatradharmaṃ tu yatra tvaṃ puruṣeśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:118.026d-014_0012: yatra tvaṃ puruṣavyāghraḥ prāptaḥ pāpām imāṃ daśām
GE07mbh_07_u:118.026d-014_0014: yatra tvaṃ kuruśārdūla prāptaḥ pāpām imāṃ daśām
GE07mbh_07_u:118.026d-014_0016: yatkṛte naraśārdūlaḥ prāptaḥ pāpām imāṃ daśām
GE07mbh_07_u:118.026d-014_0017: ko hi nāma pumāṃl loke mādṛśaḥ puruṣottama
GE07mbh_07_u:118.026d-014_0018: praharet tvadvidhe tv adya pratijñā yadi no bhavet
GE07mbh_07_u:118.027a: evam uktas tu pārthena śirasā bhūmim aspṛśat
GE07mbh_07_u:118.027c: pāṇinā caiva savyena prāhiṇod asya dakṣiṇam
GE07mbh_07_u:118.028a: etat pārthasya tu vacas tataḥ śrutvā mahādyutiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:118.029a: yā prītir dharmarāje me bhīme ca vadatāṃ vare
GE07mbh_07_u:118.029c: nakule sahadeve ca sā me tvayi śalāgraja
GE07mbh_07_u:118.030a: mayā tu samanujñātaḥ kṛṣṇena ca mahātmanā
GE07mbh_07_u:118.030c: gaccha puṇyakṛtāṃl lokāñ śibir auśīnaro yathā vāsudeva uvāca
GE07mbh_07_u:118.030d-0969_02: avāṅmukhā babhūvuś ca sainikāḥ sarva eva te
GE07mbh_07_u:118.031c: khaḍgam ādāya cicchitsuḥ śiras tasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:118.034a: vāryamāṇaḥ sa kṛṣṇena pārthena ca mahātmanā
GE07mbh_07_u:118.035c: vikrośatāṃ ca sainyānām avadhīt taṃ yatavratam
GE07mbh_07_u:118.037c: arjunena hataṃ pūrvaṃ yaj jaghāna kurūdvaham
GE07mbh_07_u:118.039a: apūjayanta taṃ devā vismitās tasya karmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:118.039c: pakṣavādāṃś ca bahuśaḥ prāvadaṃs tasya sainikāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:118.040a: na vārṣṇeyasyāparādho bhavitavyaṃ hi tat tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:118.040c: tasmān manyur na vaḥ kāryaḥ krodho duḥkhakaro nṛṇām
GE07mbh_07_u:118.041a: hantavyaś caiṣa vīreṇa nātra kāryā vicāraṇā
GE07mbh_07_u:118.041c: vihito hy asya dhātraiva mṛtyuḥ sātyakir āhave
GE07mbh_07_u:118.041d-0972_01: martavyam eva sarveṇa caramaṃ pūrvam eva vā
GE07mbh_07_u:118.041d-0972_02: manyadhvaṃ mṛta ity eva mā bhūd vo buddhilāghavam
GE07mbh_07_u:118.041d-0972_04: dhig enam iti cākrandan kṣatriyāḥ krodhamūrcchitāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:118.041d-0972_05: anyena yuktam ity eva bhavitavyaṃ tatheti ca
GE07mbh_07_u:118.041d-0972_06: ke cid āsan vimanasaḥ ke cid duḥkhasamanvitāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:118.042a: na hantavyo na hantavya iti yan māṃ prabhāṣatha
GE07mbh_07_u:118.043c: yuṣmābhir nihato yuddhe tadā dharmaḥ kva vo gataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:118.044a: mayā tv etat pratijñātaṃ kṣepe kasmiṃś cid eva hi
GE07mbh_07_u:118.044b-0973_01: śrutvā tat sarvabhāvena garhayadhvaṃ na cārjunam
GE07mbh_07_u:118.044b-0974_01: śṛṇudhvaṃ sarvam eveha śrutvā garhatha mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:118.044c: yo māṃ niṣpiṣya saṃgrāme jīvan hanyāt padā ruṣā
GE07mbh_07_u:118.044e: sa me vadhyo bhavec chatrur yady api syān munivrataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:118.045c: manyadhvaṃ mṛtam ity evam etad vo buddhilāghavam
GE07mbh_07_u:118.045e: yukto hy asya pratīghātaḥ kṛto me kurupuṃgavāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:118.046a: yat tu pārthena matsnehāt svāṃ pratijñāṃ ca rakṣatā
GE07mbh_07_u:118.047a: bhavitavyaṃ ca yad bhāvi daivaṃ ceṣṭayatīva ca
GE07mbh_07_u:118.048a: api cāyaṃ purā gītaḥ śloko vālmīkinā bhuvi
GE07mbh_07_u:118.048b-0975_01: na hantavyāḥ striya iti yad bravīṣi plavaṃgama
GE07mbh_07_u:118.048c: pīḍākaram amitrāṇāṃ yat syāt kartavyam eva tat
GE07mbh_07_u:118.048d-0977_01: anuṣṭhitaṃ mayā tac ca tasmād garhatha mūḍhavat
GE07mbh_07_u:118.049c: na sma kiṃ cid abhāṣanta manasā samapūjayan
GE07mbh_07_u:118.050a: mantrair hi pūtasya mahādhvareṣu; yaśasvino bhūrisahasradasya
GE07mbh_07_u:118.050c: muner ivāraṇyagatasya tasya; na tatra kaś cid vadham abhyanandat
GE07mbh_07_u:118.051c: aśvasya medhyasya śiro nikṛttaṃ; nyastaṃ havirdhānam ivottareṇa
GE07mbh_07_u:118.052a: sa tejasā śastrahatena pūto; mahāhave dehavaraṃ visṛjya
GE07mbh_07_u:118.052c: ākrāmad ūrdhvaṃ varado varārho; vyāvṛtya dharmeṇa pareṇa rodasī dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
GE07mbh_07_u:119.001-0980_02: vistareṇa mamācakṣva sarvam eva tu saṃjaya
GE07mbh_07_u:119.001b-0981_01: ajito droṇabhīṣmābhyāṃ karṇena ca kṛpeṇa ca
GE07mbh_07_u:119.001b-0982_01: yaś caivotsahate jetuṃ samastaṃ māmakaṃ balam
GE07mbh_07_u:119.003a: śṛṇu rājann ihotpattiṃ śaineyasya yathā purā
GE07mbh_07_u:119.003c: yathā ca bhūriśravaso yatra te saṃśayo nṛpa
GE07mbh_07_u:119.003d-0983_01: brahyaṇas tv abhavat putro mānaso 'trir mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:119.004a: atreḥ putro 'bhavat somaḥ somasya tu budhaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:119.005a: purūravasa āyus tu āyuṣo nahuṣaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:119.006a: yayāter devayānyāṃ tu yadur jyeṣṭho 'bhavat sutaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:119.006c: yador abhūd anvavāye devamīḍha iti śrutaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:119.007a: yādavas tasya ca sutaḥ śūras trailokyasaṃmataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:119.008c: tadvīryaś cāpi tatraiva kule śinir abhūn nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:119.009a: etasminn eva kāle tu devakasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:119.010a: tatra vai devakīṃ devīṃ vasudevārtham āptavān
GE07mbh_07_u:119.010c: nirjitya pārthivān sarvān ratham āropayac chiniḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:119.011a: tāṃ dṛṣṭvā devakīṃ śaure rathasthāṃ puruṣarṣabhaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:119.011b-0985_01: tāṃ dṛṣṭvā nīyamānāṃ tu vasudevāya devakīm
GE07mbh_07_u:119.012a: tayor yuddham abhūd rājan dinārdhaṃ citram adbhutam
GE07mbh_07_u:119.013a: śininā somadattas tu prasahya bhuvi pātitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:119.013c: asim udyamya keśeṣu pragṛhya ca padā hataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:119.014c: kṛpayā ca punas tena jīveti sa visarjitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:119.016a: tasya tuṣṭo mahādevo varāṇāṃ varadaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:119.016c: vareṇa chandayām āsa sa tu vavre varaṃ nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:119.017a: putram icchāmi bhagavan yo nihanyāc chineḥ sutam
GE07mbh_07_u:119.017c: madhye rājasahasrāṇāṃ padā hanyāc ca saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:119.018a: tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā somadattasya pārthiva
GE07mbh_07_u:119.018b-0986_01: sa śiraḥkampam āhedaṃ naitad evaṃ bhaven nṛpa
GE07mbh_07_u:119.018b-0986_02: sa pūrvam eva tapasā mām ārādhya jagattraye
GE07mbh_07_u:119.018b-0986_03: kasyāpy ajayyas tan mattaḥ prāptavān varam uttamam
GE07mbh_07_u:119.018b-0986_04: tathāpy ayaṃ prayāsas tu niṣphalo na bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_07_u:119.018b-0986_05: tasya pautraṃ tu samare tvatputro mohayiṣyati
GE07mbh_07_u:119.018b-0986_06: na tu mārayituṃ śakyaḥ kṛṣṇasaṃrakṣito hy asau
GE07mbh_07_u:119.018b-0986_07: aham eva ca kṛṣṇo 'smi nāvayor antaraṃ kva cit
GE07mbh_07_u:119.018c: evam astv iti tatroktvā sa devo 'ntaradhīyata
GE07mbh_07_u:119.019c: nyapātayac ca samare saumadattiḥ śineḥ sutam
GE07mbh_07_u:119.020a: etat te kathitaṃ rājan yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi
GE07mbh_07_u:119.020c: na hi śakyā raṇe jetuṃ sātvatā manujarṣabha
GE07mbh_07_u:119.022a: na tulyaṃ vṛṣṇibhir iha dṛśyate kiṃ cana prabho
GE07mbh_07_u:119.022c: bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ bhaviṣyac ca balena bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_07_u:119.023a: na jñātim avamanyante vṛddhānāṃ śāsane ratāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:119.023e: jetāro vṛṣṇivīrāṇāṃ na punar mānuṣā raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:119.024c: eteṣāṃ rakṣitāraś ca ye syuḥ kasyāṃ cid āpadi
GE07mbh_07_u:119.027a: api meruṃ vahet kaś cit tared vā makarālayam
GE07mbh_07_u:119.027c: na tu vṛṣṇipravīrāṇāṃ sametyāntaṃ vrajen nṛpa
GE07mbh_07_u:119.027d-0989_01: śiner duhitṛsaṃbhūta eṣa vīraḥ sa sātyakiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:119.028a: etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ yatra te saṃśayo vibho
GE07mbh_07_u:119.028c: kururāja naraśreṣṭha tava hy apanayo mahān
GE07mbh_07_u:120.001c: yathā bhūyo 'bhavad yuddhaṃ tan mamācakṣva saṃjaya
GE07mbh_07_u:120.003a: codayāśvān bhṛśaṃ kṛṣṇa yato rājā jayadrathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:120.003b-0990_01: pratijñāṃ saphalāṃ cāpi kartum arhasi me 'nagha
GE07mbh_07_u:120.004a: etad dhi puruṣavyāghra mahad abhyudyataṃ mayā
GE07mbh_07_u:120.005a: nāstam eti yathā sūryo yathā satyaṃ bhaved vacaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:120.005c: codayāśvāṃs tathā kṛṣṇa yathā hanyāṃ jayadratham saṃjaya uvāca
GE07mbh_07_u:120.005d-0992_02: sasmitau samudekṣetāṃ prauḍhā bālā vadhūr iva
GE07mbh_07_u:120.008a: duryodhanaś ca karṇaś ca vṛṣaseno 'tha madrarāṭ
GE07mbh_07_u:120.008c: aśvatthāmā kṛpaś caiva svayam eva ca saindhavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:120.009a: samāsādya tu bībhatsuḥ saindhavaṃ pramukhe sthitam
GE07mbh_07_u:120.010b-0993_02: satyakaṃ bhīmasenaṃ ca yattau tau darśayann iva
GE07mbh_07_u:120.010d-0994_01: uvāca rājan putras te karṇaṃ rājā suyodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:120.011a: ayaṃ sa vaikartana yuddhakālo; vidarśayasvātmabalaṃ mahātman
GE07mbh_07_u:120.011c: yathā na vadhyeta raṇe 'rjunena; jayadrathaḥ karṇa tathā kuruṣva
GE07mbh_07_u:120.012a: alpāvaśiṣṭaṃ divasaṃ nṛvīra; vighātayasvādya ripuṃ śaraughaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:120.012c: dinakṣayaṃ prāpya narapravīra; dhruvaṃ hi naḥ karṇa jayo bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_07_u:120.014a: anarjunāyāṃ ca bhuvi muhūrtam api mānada
GE07mbh_07_u:120.016c: kāryākāryam ajānan vai pratijñāṃ kṛtavān raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:120.018a: kathaṃ jīvati durdharṣe tvayi rādheya phalgunaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:120.020a: drauṇinā rakṣyamāṇaṃ ca mayā duḥśāsanena ca
GE07mbh_07_u:120.021a: yudhyante bahavaḥ śūrā lambate ca divākaraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:120.021c: śaṅke jayadrathaṃ pārtho naiva prāpsyati mānada
GE07mbh_07_u:120.022a: sa tvaṃ karṇa mayā sārdhaṃ śūraiś cānyair mahārathaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:120.022b-0995_01: drauṇinā tvaṃ hi sahito madreśena kṛpeṇa ca
GE07mbh_07_u:120.022c: yudhyasva yatnam āsthāya paraṃ pārthena saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:120.023a: evam uktas tu rādheyas tava putreṇa māriṣa
GE07mbh_07_u:120.025a: sthātavyam iti tiṣṭhāmi raṇe saṃprati mānada
GE07mbh_07_u:120.025c: naivāṅgam iṅgati kiṃ cin me saṃtaptasya raṇeṣubhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:120.026a: yotsyāmi tu tathā rājañ śaktyāhaṃ parayā raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:120.026b-0996_01: tad yathā prayatiṣye 'haṃ paraṃ śaktyā suyodhana
GE07mbh_07_u:120.027a: na hi me yudhyamānasya sāyakāṃś cāsyataḥ śitān
GE07mbh_07_u:120.028a: yat tu śaktimatā kāryaṃ satataṃ hitakāriṇā
GE07mbh_07_u:120.028c: tat kariṣyāmi kauravya jayo daive pratiṣṭhitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:120.028d-0997_01: saindhavārthe paraṃ yatnaṃ kariṣyāmy adya saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:120.029a: adya yotsye 'rjunam ahaṃ pauruṣaṃ svaṃ vyapāśritaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:120.030a: adya yuddhaṃ kuruśreṣṭha mama pārthasya cobhayoḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:120.031c: arjuno niśitair bāṇair jaghāna tava vāhinīm
GE07mbh_07_u:120.033a: śirāṃsi ca mahābāhuś ciccheda niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:120.034c: kṣuraiś ciccheda bībhatsur dvidhaikaikaṃ tridhaiva ca
GE07mbh_07_u:120.035c: dhvajāś chatrāṇi cāpāni cāmarāṇi śirāṃsi ca
GE07mbh_07_u:120.036a: kakṣam agnim ivoddhūtaḥ pradahaṃs tava vāhinīm
GE07mbh_07_u:120.037a: hatabhūyiṣṭhayodhaṃ tat kṛtvā tava balaṃ balī
GE07mbh_07_u:120.038c: sa babhau bharataśreṣṭha jvalann iva hutāśanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:120.040a: duryodhanaś ca karṇaś ca vṛṣaseno 'tha madrarāṭ
GE07mbh_07_u:120.040c: aśvatthāmā kṛpaś caiva svayam eva ca saindhavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:120.044a: te bhujair bhogibhogābhair dhanūṃṣy āyamya sāyakān
GE07mbh_07_u:120.045a: tān astān asyamānāṃś ca kirīṭī yuddhadurmadaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:120.045c: dvidhā tridhāṣṭadhaikaikaṃ chittvā vivyādha tān raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:120.047a: sa viddhvā daśabhiḥ pārthaṃ vāsudevaṃ ca saptabhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:120.050a: tatra pārthasya śūrasya bāhvor balam adṛśyata
GE07mbh_07_u:120.050c: iṣūṇām akṣayatvaṃ ca dhanuṣo gāṇḍivasya ca
GE07mbh_07_u:120.051a: astrair astrāṇi saṃvārya drauṇeḥ śāradvatasya ca
GE07mbh_07_u:120.051c: ekaikaṃ navabhir bāṇaiḥ sarvān eva samarpayat
GE07mbh_07_u:120.052a: taṃ drauṇiḥ pañcaviṃśatyā vṛṣasenaś ca saptabhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:120.052c: duryodhanaś ca viṃśatyā karṇaśalyau tribhis tribhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:120.053a: ta enam abhigarjanto vidhyantaś ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:120.054a: śliṣṭaṃ tu sarvataś cakrū rathamaṇḍalam āśu te
GE07mbh_07_u:120.055a: ta enam abhinardanto vidhunvānā dhanūṃṣi ca
GE07mbh_07_u:120.055c: siṣicur mārgaṇair ghorair giriṃ meghā ivāmbubhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:120.056a: te mahāstrāṇi divyāni tatra rājan vyadarśayan
GE07mbh_07_u:120.056d-0998_01: nivārya tāñ śaravrātair divyāny astrāṇi darśayan
GE07mbh_07_u:120.057a: hatabhūyiṣṭhayodhaṃ tat kṛtvā tava balaṃ balī
GE07mbh_07_u:120.058a: taṃ karṇaḥ saṃyuge rājan pratyavārayad āśugaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:120.059a: taṃ pārtho daśabhir bāṇaiḥ pratyavidhyad raṇājire
GE07mbh_07_u:120.060a: sātvataś ca tribhir bāṇaiḥ karṇaṃ vivyādha māriṣa
GE07mbh_07_u:120.060c: bhīmasenas tribhiś caiva punaḥ pārthaś ca saptabhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:120.061a: tān karṇaḥ prativivyādha ṣaṣṭyā ṣaṣṭyā mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:120.061c: tad yuddham abhavad rājan karṇasya bahubhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_07_u:120.062c: yad ekaḥ samare kruddhas trīn rathān paryavārayat
GE07mbh_07_u:120.063a: phalgunas tu mahābāhuḥ karṇaṃ vaikartanaṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:120.064e: tasya tal lāghavaṃ dṛṣṭvā nāmṛṣyata raṇe 'rjunaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:120.065a: tataḥ pārtho dhanuś chittvā vivyādhainaṃ stanāntare
GE07mbh_07_u:120.067a: tam āpatantaṃ vegena drauṇiś ciccheda sāyakam
GE07mbh_07_u:120.067c: ardhacandreṇa tīkṣṇena sa chinnaḥ prāpatad bhuvi
GE07mbh_07_u:120.068b-0999_03: vyadhamat sāyakaiḥ pārthaḥ śalabhān iva mārutaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:120.068b-0999_04: chādayām āsa ca tadā sāyakair arjuno raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:120.068c: karṇo 'pi dviṣatāṃ hantā chādayām āsa phalgunam
GE07mbh_07_u:120.069a: tau vṛṣāv iva nardantau narasiṃhau mahārathau
GE07mbh_07_u:120.069e: adṛśyau ca śaraughais tau nighnatām itaretaram
GE07mbh_07_u:120.070a: pārtho 'ham asmi tiṣṭha tvaṃ karṇo 'haṃ tiṣṭha phalguna
GE07mbh_07_u:120.070c: ity evaṃ tarjayantau tau vākśalyais tudatāṃ tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:120.071a: yudhyetāṃ samare vīrau citraṃ laghu ca suṣṭhu ca
GE07mbh_07_u:120.073e: nivartiṣyati rādheya iti mām uktavān vṛṣaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:120.074a: etasminn antare rājan dṛṣṭvā karṇasya vikramam
GE07mbh_07_u:120.075c: chādayām āsa ca śarais tava putrasya paśyataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:120.077a: taṃ tathā virathaṃ dṛṣṭvā ratham āropya svaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:120.078a: madrarājas tu kaunteyam avidhyat triṃśatā śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:120.079a: caturbhiḥ sindhurājaś ca vṛṣasenaś ca saptabhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:120.081a: saindhavaṃ daśabhir bhallair vṛṣasenaṃ tribhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:120.081c: śāradvataṃ ca viṃśatyā viddhvā pārthaḥ samunnadat
GE07mbh_07_u:120.083a: athārjunaḥ sarvatodhāram astraṃ; prāduścakre trāsayan dhārtarāṣṭrān
GE07mbh_07_u:120.083c: taṃ pratyudīyuḥ kuravaḥ pāṇḍusūnuṃ; rathair mahārhaiḥ śaravarṣāṇy avarṣan
GE07mbh_07_u:120.084a: tatas tu tasmiṃs tumule samutthite; sudāruṇe bhārata mohanīye
GE07mbh_07_u:120.084c: nāmuhyata prāpya sa rājaputraḥ; kirīṭamālī visṛjan pṛṣatkān
GE07mbh_07_u:120.085a: rājyaprepsuḥ savyasācī kurūṇāṃ; smaran kleśān dvādaśavarṣavṛttān
GE07mbh_07_u:120.085c: gāṇḍīvamuktair iṣubhir mahātmā; sarvā diśo vyāvṛṇod aprameyaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:120.086a: pradīptolkam abhavac cāntarikṣaṃ; deheṣu bhūrīṇy apatan vayāṃsi
GE07mbh_07_u:120.086c: yat piṅgalajyena kirīṭamālī; kruddho ripūn ājagavena hanti
GE07mbh_07_u:120.087a: kirīṭamālī mahatā mahāyaśāḥ; śarāsanenāsya śarān anīkajit
GE07mbh_07_u:120.088a: gadāś ca gurvīḥ parighān ayasmayān; asīṃś ca śaktīś ca raṇe narādhipāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:120.088c: mahānti śastrāṇi ca bhīmadarśanāḥ; pragṛhya pārthaṃ sahasābhidudruvuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:120.089a: sa tān udīrṇān sarathāśvavāraṇān; padātisaṃghāṃś ca mahādhanurdharaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:120.089c: vipannasarvāyudhajīvitān raṇe; cakāra vīro yamarāṣṭravardhanān saṃjaya uvāca
GE07mbh_07_u:121.001-1003_05: trāsodvignaṃ bhayodbhrāntaṃ tvadīyaṃ tad balaṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_07_u:121.001a: sa raṇe vyacarat pārthaḥ prekṣaṇīyo dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:121.001c: yugapad dikṣu sarvāsu citrāṇy astrāṇi darśayan
GE07mbh_07_u:121.001d-015_0001: tataḥ kruddho mahābāhur aindram astraṃ durāsadam
GE07mbh_07_u:121.001d-015_0006: nabho 'bhavat tad duṣprekṣyam ulkābhir iva saṃvṛtam
GE07mbh_07_u:121.001d-015_0008: aśakyaṃ manasāpy anyaiḥ pāṇḍavaḥ saṃbhramann iva
GE07mbh_07_u:121.001d-015_0010: naiśaṃ tamo 'ṃśubhiḥ kṣipraṃ dinādāv iva bhāskaraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:121.001d-015_0011: tatas tu tāvakaṃ sainyaṃ dīptaiḥ śaragabhastibhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:121.001d-015_0017: ya enam īyuḥ samare tvadyodhāḥ śūramāninaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:121.001d-015_0018: śalabhā iva te dīptā agniṃ prāpya yayuḥ kṣayam
GE07mbh_07_u:121.001d-015_0019: evaṃ sa mṛdnañ śatrūṇāṃ jīvitāni yaśāṃsi ca
GE07mbh_07_u:121.001d-015_0020: pārthaś cacāra saṃgrāme mṛtyur vigrahavān iva
GE07mbh_07_u:121.001d-015_0022: sakuṇḍalayugān karṇān keṣāṃ cid aharac charaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:121.001d-015_0032: nirīkṣituṃ na śekus te yatnavanto 'pi pārthivāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:121.001d-015_0043: niśceṣṭair visphuradbhiś ca kūjadbhiś ca sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:121.001d-015_0048: kva cid babhau sragviṇīva vakrapadmaiḥ samācitā
GE07mbh_07_u:121.001d-015_0052: virarāja bhṛśaṃ citrā mahī navavadhūr iva
GE07mbh_07_u:121.001d-015_0067: taṃ dṛṣṭvā tasya vikrāntam antakasyeva rūpiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:121.001d-015_0069: tata ādāya vīrāṇām astrair astrāṇi pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:121.004a: vinivārya sa vīrāṇām astrair astrāṇi sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:121.004c: darśayan raudram ātmānam ugre karmaṇi dhiṣṭhitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:121.005a: sa tān rathavarān rājann abhyatikrāmad arjunaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:121.006c: sa raṇe vyacarat tūrṇaṃ prekṣaṇīyo dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:121.009a: tathā sarvā diśo rājan sarvāṃś ca rathino raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:121.009f-1006_02: nyavartanta raṇād vīrā nirāśās tasya jīvite
GE07mbh_07_u:121.009f-1006_03: yo yo 'bhyadhāvad ākrande tāvakaḥ pāṇḍavaṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:121.009f-1006_04: tasya tasyāntagā bāṇāḥ śarīre nyapatan prabho
GE07mbh_07_u:121.009f-1006_07: evaṃ tat tava rājendra caturaṅgabalaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:121.009f-1006_11: śalyaṃ ṣoḍaśabhir bāṇaiḥ karṇaṃ dvātriṃśatā śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:121.009f-1006_12: saindhavaṃ tu catuḥṣaṣṭyā viddhvā siṃha ivānadat
GE07mbh_07_u:121.010a: saindhavas tu tathā viddhaḥ śarair gāṇḍīvadhanvanā
GE07mbh_07_u:121.010c: na cakṣame susaṃkruddhas tottrārdita iva dvipaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:121.012a: tribhis tu viddhvā gāṇḍīvaṃ nārācaiḥ ṣaḍbhir arjunam
GE07mbh_07_u:121.012d-1007_02: punaḥ pārthaṃ dhvajaṃ pārthaṃ kirīṭaṃ vājino dhanuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:121.013c: yugapat tasya ciccheda śarābhyāṃ saindhavasya ha
GE07mbh_07_u:121.013e: sāratheś ca śiraḥ kāyād dhvajaṃ ca samalaṃkṛtam
GE07mbh_07_u:121.014d-1009_01: ādityaṃ prekṣamāṇas tu bībhatsuḥ sṛkkiṇī lihan
GE07mbh_07_u:121.014d-1009_02: apaśyan nāntaraṃ tasya rakṣibhiḥ saṃvṛtasya vai
GE07mbh_07_u:121.014d-1009_04: athābravīd vāsudevaḥ kuntīputraṃ dhanaṃjayam śrībhagavān uvāca
GE07mbh_07_u:121.014d-1009_07: tato 'staṃ gatam ādityaṃ maṃsyate sindhurāḍ iha
GE07mbh_07_u:121.014d-1009_08: tato 'sya vismayaḥ pārtha harṣaś caiva bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_07_u:121.014d-1009_11: na hi śakṣyaty athātmānaṃ rakṣituṃ harṣasaṃbhavāt
GE07mbh_07_u:121.014d-1009_12: etasminn eva kāle tu prahartavyaṃ dhanaṃjaya saṃjaya uvāca
GE07mbh_07_u:121.014d-1009_14: ity uktvā tu tataḥ pārthaṃ kṣipram evāharat prabhām
GE07mbh_07_u:121.014d-1009_15: pārthas tu balavāñ jñātvā tamo dṛṣṭvātiduḥkhitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:121.014d-1009_21: eṣa tiṣṭhati madhye vai syandanasya dhanaṃjaya
GE07mbh_07_u:121.014d-1009_22: unnamayya śirogrīvaṃ vīkṣate sūryamaṇḍalam saṃjaya uvāca
GE07mbh_07_u:121.014d-1009_25: udbabarha śaraṃ tīkṣṇam amarair api duḥsaham
GE07mbh_07_u:121.014d-1010_02: na śakyo hantum ity evaṃ manyamāno janārdanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:121.014d-1010_03: sasmāra cakraṃ daityārir hariś cakraṃ sudarśanam
GE07mbh_07_u:121.014d-1010_05: astaṃ gatam ivādityaṃ tamasā chādayeti vai
GE07mbh_07_u:121.014d-1010_06: tat tathoktaṃ bhagavatā tamo bhūtvā viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:121.015a: etasminn eva kāle tu drutaṃ gacchati bhāskare
GE07mbh_07_u:121.015d-016_0001: eṣa madhye kṛtaḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ pārtha vīrair mahārathaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:121.015d-016_0004: na śakyaḥ saindhavo hantuṃ tato nirvyājam arjuna
GE07mbh_07_u:121.015d-016_0006: astaṃ gata iti vyaktaṃ drakṣyaty ekaḥ sa sindhurāṭ
GE07mbh_07_u:121.015d-016_0008: na gopsyati durācāraḥ sa ātmānaṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_07_u:121.015d-016_0010: vyapekṣā naiva kartavyā gato 'stam iti bhāskaraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:121.015d-016_0011: evam astv iti bībhatsuḥ keśavaṃ pratyabhāṣata
GE07mbh_07_u:121.015d-016_0013: yogī yogena saṃyukto yoginām īśvaro hariḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:121.015d-016_0014: sṛṣṭe tamasi kṛṣṇena gato 'stam iti bhāskaraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:121.015d-016_0016: te prahṛṣṭā raṇe rājan nāpaśyan sainikā ravim
GE07mbh_07_u:121.015d-016_0017: unnāmya vaktrāṇi tadā sa ca rājā jayadrathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:121.015d-016_0019: punar evābravīt kṛṣṇo dhanaṃjayam idaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:121.015d-016_0023: chindhi mūrdhānam asyāśu kuru sāphalyam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:121.015d-016_0026: kṛpaṃ vivyādha viṃśatyā karṇaṃ pañcāśatā śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:121.015d-016_0027: śalyaṃ duryodhanaṃ caiva ṣaḍbhiḥ ṣaḍbhir atāḍayat
GE07mbh_07_u:121.015d-016_0028: vṛṣasenaṃ tathāṣṭābhiḥ ṣaṣṭyā saindhavam eva ca
GE07mbh_07_u:121.015d-016_0030: gāḍhaṃ viddhvā śarai rājañ jayadratham upādravat
GE07mbh_07_u:121.015d-016_0033: tataḥ sarve mahārāja tava yodhā jayaiṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:121.015d-016_0039: te hanyamānā vīreṇa yodhā rājan raṇe tava
GE07mbh_07_u:121.015d-016_0040: prajahuḥ saindhavaṃ bhītā dvau samaṃ nāpy adhāvatām
GE07mbh_07_u:121.015d-016_0042: tādṛṅ na bhāvī bhūto vā yac cakāra mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:121.015d-016_0043: dvipān dvipagatāṃś caiva hayān hayagatān api
GE07mbh_07_u:121.015d-016_0044: tathā sa rathinaś caiva nyahan rudraḥ paśūn iva
GE07mbh_07_u:121.015d-016_0045: na tatra samare kaś cin mayā dṛṣṭo narādhipa
GE07mbh_07_u:121.015d-016_0046: gajo vājī naro vāpi yo na pārthaśarāhataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:121.015d-016_0050: babhramuś caskhaluḥ petuḥ sedur mamluś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:121.015d-016_0054: aśāmyat tad rajo bhaumam asṛksikte dharātale
GE07mbh_07_u:121.015d-016_0059: hayāś ca patitārohāḥ pattayaś ca narādhipa
GE07mbh_07_u:121.015d-016_0063: ūrugrāhagṛhītāś ca ke cit tatrābhavan bhuvi
GE07mbh_07_u:121.015d-016_0065: evaṃ tava balaṃ rājan drāvayitvā dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:121.015d-016_0067: karṇaṃ drauṇiṃ kṛpaṃ śalyaṃ vṛṣasenaṃ suyodhanam
GE07mbh_07_u:121.015d-016_0069: na gṛhṇann akṣipan rājann amuñcan nāpi saṃdadhan
GE07mbh_07_u:121.015d-016_0073: karṇasya tu dhanuś chittvā vṛṣasenasya caiva ha
GE07mbh_07_u:121.015d-016_0085: abravīc ca punas tatra tvaramāṇo janārdanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:121.016e: śṛṇuṣvaiva ca me vākyaṃ jayadrathavadhaṃ prati
GE07mbh_07_u:121.016f-1011_01: pārtha pārtha śiro hy etat tvatkṛtena pated bhuvi
GE07mbh_07_u:121.016f-1011_02: astaṃ girim athāsādya tvarate vai divākaraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:121.016f-1011_03: śrūyatāṃ tad yathāvṛttaṃ karaṇaṃ saindhavaṃ prati
GE07mbh_07_u:121.017c: sa kāleneha mahatā saindhavaṃ prāptavān sutam
GE07mbh_07_u:121.018a: jayadratham amitraghnaṃ taṃ covāca tato nṛpam
GE07mbh_07_u:121.019c: guṇair bhaviṣyati vibho sadṛśo vaṃśayor dvayoḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:121.020a: śatrubhir yudhyamānasya saṃgrāme tv asya dhanvinaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:121.020c: śiraś chetsyati saṃkruddhaḥ śatrur nālakṣito bhuvi
GE07mbh_07_u:121.021a: etac chrutvā sindhurājo dhyātvā ciram ariṃdama
GE07mbh_07_u:121.022c: dharaṇyāṃ mama putrasya pātayiṣyati yaḥ śiraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:121.022e: tasyāpi śatadhā mūrdhā phaliṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:121.022f-1012_01: yadi ced asti me lābhas tapaso vā damasya vā
GE07mbh_07_u:121.023a: evam uktvā tato rājye sthāpayitvā jayadratham
GE07mbh_07_u:121.024a: so 'yaṃ tapyati tejasvī tapo ghoraṃ durāsadam
GE07mbh_07_u:121.025a: tasmāj jayadrathasya tvaṃ śiraś chittvā mahāmṛdhe
GE07mbh_07_u:121.027a: atha tvam asya mūrdhānaṃ pātayiṣyasi bhūtale
GE07mbh_07_u:121.027c: tavāpi śatadhā mūrdhā phaliṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:121.028a: yathā caitan na jānīyāt sa rājā pṛthivīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:121.028c: tathā kuru kuruśreṣṭha divyam astram upāśritaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:121.029a: na hy asādhyam akāryaṃ vā vidyate tava kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_07_u:121.029b-1013_03: vṛddhakṣatre pataty eva tathā nītir vidhīyatām
GE07mbh_07_u:121.030a: etac chrutvā tu vacanaṃ sṛkkiṇī parisaṃlihan
GE07mbh_07_u:121.030b-1014_01: arjunas tvarayā yuktas tad astraṃ samupāśritaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:121.031d-1017_01: tato dhanaṃjayaḥ śīghraṃ śaraṃ taṃ bhāskaratviṣam
GE07mbh_07_u:121.032a: sa tu gāṇḍīvanirmuktaḥ śaraḥ śyena ivāśugaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:121.032d-1019_02: pārtha pārtha śiro hy etad yathā neyān mahītalam saṃjaya uvāca
GE07mbh_07_u:121.032d-1019_03: tathā kuru kuruśreṣṭha vakṣye tasyāpi kāraṇam
GE07mbh_07_u:121.033a: aharat tat punaś caiva śarair ūrdhvaṃ dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:121.033d-1020_01: tiryag ūrdhvam adhaś caiva punar ūrdhvam athāpi ca
GE07mbh_07_u:121.033d-1020_03: tat sainyaṃ sarvato 'paśyan mahad āścaryam adbhutam
GE07mbh_07_u:121.033d-1020_04: prāpayat sa śiro yasmād yodhayann eva pārthivān
GE07mbh_07_u:121.034a: śaraiḥ kadambakīkṛtya kāle tasmiṃś ca pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:121.034b-1021_01: yodhayām āsa tāṃś caiva pāṇḍavaḥ ṣaṇmahārathān
GE07mbh_07_u:121.034c: samantapañcakād bāhyaṃ śiras tad vyaharat tataḥ jayadrathasyārjunabāṇanālaṃ
GE07mbh_07_u:121.034d-1022_12: kva ca prayātavyam idaṃ ca śaṃsa
GE07mbh_07_u:121.035a: etasminn eva kāle tu vṛddhakṣatro mahīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:121.035c: saṃdhyām upāste tejasvī saṃbandhī tava māriṣa
GE07mbh_07_u:121.039d-1023_01: tac chiraḥ śatadhā rājan papāta pṛthivītale
GE07mbh_07_u:121.040a: tataḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni vismayaṃ jagmur uttamam
GE07mbh_07_u:121.041b-1025_02: paścāj jñātaṃ mahīpāla tava putraiḥ sahānugaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:121.041b-1025_05: akṣauhiṇīr aṣṭa hatvā jāmātā tava saindhavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:121.041b-1025_06: hataṃ jayadrathaṃ dṛṣṭvā tava putrā narādhipa
GE07mbh_07_u:121.041b-1026_02: sarvathā samare yasya goptā nityaṃ janārdanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:121.041b-1026_03: kathaṃ tasya jayo na syād iti bhūtāni menire
GE07mbh_07_u:121.041b-1026_04: etadarthaṃ śiras tasya cyāvayām āsa pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:121.041b-1026_06: kṛtvā tac ca mahat karma nihatya ca jayadratham
GE07mbh_07_u:121.041b-1026_08: saṃharaty api kaunteye tad astraṃ tatra bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:121.041b-1026_09: vavau śītaḥ sugandhaś ca pavano hlādayann iva
GE07mbh_07_u:121.041b-1026_10: saṃhāraṃ ca pramokṣaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā tatra divaukasaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:121.041b-1026_11: vismayaṃ paramaṃ jagmuḥ praśaśaṃsuś ca pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_07_u:121.041b-1026_12: evam astreṇa tān vīro yodhayitvā dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:121.041b-1026_14: tac chiraś cyāvamānaṃ tu dadṛśus tāvakā yudhi
GE07mbh_07_u:121.041b-1026_18: dṛṣṭvā tu nihataṃ saṃkhe sindhurājaṃ mahāratham
GE07mbh_07_u:121.041c: putrāṇāṃ tava netrebhyo duḥkhād bahv apataj jalam
GE07mbh_07_u:121.041d-1027_01: duḥkhād aśrūṇi mumucur nirāśāś cābhavañ jaye
GE07mbh_07_u:121.041d-1028_01: tato jayadrathe rājan hate pārthena keśavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:121.041d-1028_02: dadhmau śaṅkhaṃ mahābāhur arjunaś ca paraṃtapaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:121.041d-1029_01: tasmiṃs tu nihate vīre saindhave lokaviśrute
GE07mbh_07_u:121.041d-1029_02: praharṣam atulaṃ lebhe kṛṣṇaḥ pārthaś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:121.042d-1030_01: bhīmaś ca vṛṣṇisiṃhaś ca yudhāmanyuś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:121.042d-1030_02: uttamaujāś ca vikrāntaḥ śaṅkhān dadhmuḥ pṛthak pṛthak
GE07mbh_07_u:121.043a: taṃ śrutvā tu mahānādaṃ dharmaputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:121.045a: tataḥ pravavṛte rājann astaṃ gacchati bhāskare
GE07mbh_07_u:121.047a: pāṇḍavās tu jayaṃ labdhvā saindhavaṃ vinihatya ca
GE07mbh_07_u:121.047c: ayodhayaṃs tato droṇaṃ jayonmattās tatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:121.049a: sa devaśatrūn iva devarājaḥ; kirīṭamālī vyadhamat samantāt

GE07mbh_07_u:130.027d-1120_02: punaḥ svaratham āsthāya dudrāva tava vāhinīm
GE07mbh_07_u:130.027d-1120_03: tam āyāntaṃ jighāṃsantaṃ bhīmaṃ kruddham ivāntakam
GE07mbh_07_u:130.027d-1120_04: nyavārayan mahābāhuṃ tava putrā viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:130.028a: tatas tava sutā rājan bhīmasya ratham āvrajan
GE07mbh_07_u:130.029a: durmadasya tato bhīmaḥ prahasann iva saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:130.029c: sārathiṃ ca hayāṃś caiva śarair ninye yamakṣayam
GE07mbh_07_u:130.031a: tatas tu durmadaś caiva duṣkarṇaś ca tavātmajau
GE07mbh_07_u:130.031c: ratham ekaṃ samāruhya bhīmaṃ bāṇair avidhyatām
GE07mbh_07_u:130.032a: tataḥ karṇasya miṣato drauṇer duryodhanasya ca
GE07mbh_07_u:130.033a: durmadasya ca vīrasya duṣkarṇasya ca taṃ ratham
GE07mbh_07_u:130.034a: tataḥ sutau te balinau śūrau duṣkarṇadurmadau
GE07mbh_07_u:130.035a: tato hāhākṛte sainye dṛṣṭvā bhīmaṃ nṛpābruvan
GE07mbh_07_u:130.036c: visaṃjñāvāhayan vāhān na ca dvau saha dhāvataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:130.037a: tato bale bhṛśalulite niśāmukhe; supūjito nṛpavṛṣabhair vṛkodaraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:130.037c: mahābalaḥ kamalavibuddhalocano; yudhiṣṭhiraṃ nṛpatim apūjayad balī
GE07mbh_07_u:130.038a: tato yamau drupadavirāṭakekayā; yudhiṣṭhiraś cāpi parāṃ mudaṃ yayuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:130.038c: vṛkodaraṃ bhṛśam abhipūjayaṃś ca te; yathāndhake pratinihate haraṃ surāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:130.039a: tataḥ sutās tava varuṇātmajopamā; ruṣānvitāḥ saha guruṇā mahātmanā
GE07mbh_07_u:130.040a: tato 'bhavat timiraghanair ivāvṛtaṃ; mahābhaye bhayadam atīva dāruṇam
GE07mbh_07_u:131.001a: prāyopaviṣṭe tu hate putre sātyakinā tataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:131.001c: somadatto bhṛśaṃ kruddhaḥ sātyakiṃ vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_07_u:131.002a: kṣatradharmaḥ purā dṛṣṭo yas tu devair mahātmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:131.002c: taṃ tvaṃ sātvata saṃtyajya dasyudharme kathaṃ rataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:131.003c: kṣatradharmarataḥ prājñaḥ kathaṃ nu prahared raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:131.004a: dvāv eva kila vṛṣṇīnāṃ tatra khyātau mahārathau
GE07mbh_07_u:131.004c: pradyumnaś ca mahābāhus tvaṃ caiva yudhi sātvata
GE07mbh_07_u:131.005c: nṛśaṃsaṃ patanīyaṃ ca tādṛśaṃ kṛtavān asi
GE07mbh_07_u:131.005d-1123_01: karmaṇas tasya durvṛtta phalaṃ prāpnuhi saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:131.005d-1123_02: adya chetsyāmi te mūḍha śiro vikramya patriṇā
GE07mbh_07_u:131.006a: śape sātvata putrābhyām iṣṭena sukṛtena ca
GE07mbh_07_u:131.006c: anatītām imāṃ rātriṃ yadi tvāṃ vīramāninam
GE07mbh_07_u:131.007c: na hanyāṃ niraye ghore pateyaṃ vṛṣṇipāṃsana
GE07mbh_07_u:131.008c: dadhmau śaṅkhaṃ ca tāreṇa siṃhanādaṃ nanāda ca
GE07mbh_07_u:131.009d-1124_01: kauraveya na me trāsaḥ kathaṃ cid api vidyate
GE07mbh_07_u:131.009d-1124_02: tvayā sārdham athānyaiś ca yudhyato hṛdi kaś cana
GE07mbh_07_u:131.009d-1124_03: yadi sarveṇa sainyena gupto māṃ yodhayiṣyasi
GE07mbh_07_u:131.009d-1124_04: tathāpi na vyathā kā cit tvayi syān mama kaurava
GE07mbh_07_u:131.009d-1124_06: nāhaṃ bhīṣayituṃ śakyaḥ kṣatravṛtte sthitas tvayā
GE07mbh_07_u:131.009d-1124_07: yadi te 'sti yuyutsādya mayā saha narādhipa
GE07mbh_07_u:131.009d-1124_08: nirdayo niśitair bāṇaiḥ prahara praharāmi te
GE07mbh_07_u:131.010a: hato bhūriśravā vīras tava putro mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:131.012a: yasmin dānaṃ damaḥ śaucam ahiṃsā hrīr dhṛtiḥ kṣamā
GE07mbh_07_u:131.013a: mṛdaṅgaketos tasya tvaṃ tejasā nihataḥ purā
GE07mbh_07_u:131.014c: yadi tvāṃ sasutaṃ pāpaṃ na hanyāṃ yudhi roṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:131.014e: apayāsyasi cet tyaktvā tato mukto bhaviṣyasi
GE07mbh_07_u:131.018a: sāgraṃ śatasahasraṃ tu hayānāṃ tasya dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:131.019a: rakṣyamāṇaś ca balibhiś chādayām āsa sātyakim
GE07mbh_07_u:131.021a: vivyādha somadattas tu sātvataṃ navabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:131.024b-020_0004: tataḥ pravavṛte yuddhaṃ droṇasya saha pāṇḍavaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:131.024b-020_0008: sātyakiṃ daśabhir bāṇair viṃśatyā pārṣataṃ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:131.024b-020_0009: bhīmasenaṃ ca navabhir nakulaṃ pañcabhis tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:131.024b-020_0012: virāṭaṃ matsyam aṣṭābhir drupadaṃ daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:131.024b-020_0014: anyāṃś ca sainikān viddhvā yudhiṣṭhiram upādravat
GE07mbh_07_u:131.024b-020_0016: prādravan vai bhayād rājan sārtanādā diśo daśa
GE07mbh_07_u:131.024b-020_0017: kālyamānaṃ tu tat sainyaṃ dṛṣṭvā droṇena phalgunaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:131.024b-020_0018: kiṃ cid āgatasaṃrambho guruṃ pārtho 'bhyayād drutam
GE07mbh_07_u:131.024b-020_0019: dṛṣṭvā droṇas tu bībhatsum abhidhāvantam āhave
GE07mbh_07_u:131.024b-020_0020: saṃnyavartata tat sainyaṃ punar yaudhiṣṭhiraṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_07_u:131.024b-020_0021: tato yuddham abhūd bhūyo bhāradvājasya pāṇḍavaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:131.024b-020_0022: droṇas tava sutai rājan sarvataḥ parivāritaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:131.024b-020_0025: rājann aniśam atyantaṃ dṛṣṭvā droṇaṃ śarārciṣam
GE07mbh_07_u:131.024b-020_0027: dahantam ahitān sainye nainaṃ kaś cid avārayat
GE07mbh_07_u:131.024b-020_0028: yo yo hi pramukhe tasya tasthau droṇasya pūruṣaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:131.024b-020_0029: tasya tasya śiraś chittvā yayau droṇaśaraḥ kṣitim
GE07mbh_07_u:131.024b-020_0030: evaṃ sā pāṇḍavī senā vadhyamānā mahātmanā
GE07mbh_07_u:131.024b-020_0032: saṃprabhagnaṃ balaṃ dṛṣṭvā droṇena niśi bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:131.024b-020_0033: govindam abravīj jiṣṇur gaccha droṇarathaṃ prati
GE07mbh_07_u:131.024b-020_0035: codayām āsa dāśārho hayān droṇarathaṃ prati
GE07mbh_07_u:131.024b-020_0036: bhīmaseno 'pi taṃ dṛṣṭvā yāntaṃ droṇāya phalgunam
GE07mbh_07_u:131.024b-020_0038: so 'pi tasya vacaḥ śrutvā viśoko vāhayad dhayān
GE07mbh_07_u:131.024b-020_0040: tau dṛṣṭvā bhrātarau yattau droṇānīkam abhidrutau
GE07mbh_07_u:131.024b-020_0043: tato rājann abhūd ghoraḥ saṃgrāmo lomaharṣaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:131.024b-020_0044: bībhatsur dakṣiṇaṃ pārśvam uttaraṃ ca vṛkodaraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:131.025a: tam āpatantaṃ saṃprekṣya śaineyasya rathaṃ prati
GE07mbh_07_u:131.026c: yuktaṃ gajanibhair vāhair na hayair nāpi vā gajaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:131.032c: prasusruvur gajā mūtraṃ vivyathuś ca narā bhṛśam
GE07mbh_07_u:131.034c: patanty aviralāḥ śūlāḥ śataghnyaḥ paṭṭiśās tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:131.035a: tad ugram atiraudraṃ ca dṛṣṭvā yuddhaṃ narādhipāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:131.035c: tanayās tava karṇaś ca vyathitāḥ prādravan diśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:131.037a: nihatāyāṃ tu māyāyām amarṣī sa ghaṭotkacaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:131.039d-1128_01: tato ghaṭotkacaḥ kruddhaś cakraṃ cikṣepa satvaram
GE07mbh_07_u:131.042a: vegena mahatā gacchad vikṣiptaṃ drauṇinā śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:131.042c: abhāgyasyeva saṃkalpas tan moghaṃ nyapatad bhuvi
GE07mbh_07_u:131.043a: ghaṭotkacas tatas tūrṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā cakraṃ nipātitam
GE07mbh_07_u:131.043c: drauṇiṃ prācchādayad bāṇaiḥ svarbhānur iva bhāskaram
GE07mbh_07_u:131.045c: babhau meghena dhārābhir girir merur ivārditaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:131.047a: dvābhyāṃ tu rathayantāraṃ tribhiś cāsya triveṇukam
GE07mbh_07_u:131.047c: dhanur ekena ciccheda caturbhiś caturo hayān
GE07mbh_07_u:131.054a: atha dṛṣṭvā hataṃ putram aśvatthāmnā mahābalam
GE07mbh_07_u:131.056a: tiṣṭha tiṣṭha na me jīvan droṇaputra gamiṣyasi
GE07mbh_07_u:131.056c: tvām adya nihaniṣyāmi krauñcam agnisuto yathā aśvatthāmovāca
GE07mbh_07_u:131.057c: na hi putreṇa haiḍimbe pitā nyāyyaṃ prabādhitum
GE07mbh_07_u:131.058a: kāmaṃ khalu na me roṣo haiḍimbe vidyate tvayi
GE07mbh_07_u:131.058c: kiṃ tu roṣānvito jantur hanyād ātmānam apy uta
GE07mbh_07_u:131.060a: kim ahaṃ kātaro drauṇe pṛthagjana ivāhave
GE07mbh_07_u:131.060b-1129_01: yan māṃ bhīṣayase vāgbhir asad etad vacas tava
GE07mbh_07_u:131.060c: bhīmāt khalv aham utpannaḥ kurūṇāṃ vipule kule
GE07mbh_07_u:131.062a: tiṣṭha tiṣṭha na me jīvan droṇaputra gamiṣyasi
GE07mbh_07_u:131.063c: drauṇim abhyadravat kruddho gajendram iva kesarī
GE07mbh_07_u:131.064c: rathinām ṛṣabhaṃ drauṇiṃ dhārābhir iva toyadaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:131.065a: śaravṛṣṭiṃ śarair drauṇir aprāptāṃ tāṃ vyaśātayat
GE07mbh_07_u:131.069c: prapatadbhiś ca bahubhiḥ śastrasaṃghair na cukṣubhe
GE07mbh_07_u:131.070a: tataḥ smayann iva drauṇir vajram astram udīrayat
GE07mbh_07_u:131.070c: sa tenāstreṇa śailendraḥ kṣiptaḥ kṣipram anaśyata
GE07mbh_07_u:131.071a: tataḥ sa toyado bhūtvā nīlaḥ sendrāyudho divi
GE07mbh_07_u:131.072a: atha saṃdhāya vāyavyam astram astravidāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:131.073a: sa mārgaṇagaṇair drauṇir diśaḥ pracchādya sarvataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:131.075c: gajasthaiś ca rathasthaiś ca vājipṛṣṭhagatair api
GE07mbh_07_u:131.078c: viṣaṇṇam abhisaṃprekṣya putraṃ te drauṇir abravīt
GE07mbh_07_u:131.079a: tiṣṭha duryodhanādya tvaṃ na kāryaḥ saṃbhramas tvayā
GE07mbh_07_u:131.080a: nihaniṣyāmy amitrāṃs te na tavāsti parājayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:131.081a: na tv etad adbhutaṃ manye yat te mahad idaṃ manaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:131.081c: asmāsu ca parā bhaktis tava gautaminandana
GE07mbh_07_u:131.083a: ṣaṣṭyā gajasahasraiś ca prayāhi tvaṃ dhanaṃjayam
GE07mbh_07_u:131.083c: karṇaś ca vṛṣasenaś ca kṛpo nīlas tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_07_u:131.086c: ete tvām anuyāsyanti pattīnām ayutāni ṣaṭ
GE07mbh_07_u:131.087a: jahi bhīmaṃ yamau cobhau dharmarājaṃ ca mātula
GE07mbh_07_u:131.087c: asurān iva devendro jayāśā me tvayi sthitā
GE07mbh_07_u:131.088c: jahi mātula kaunteyān asurān iva pāvakiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:131.089a: evam ukto yayau śīghraṃ putreṇa tava saubalaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:131.089c: piprīṣus te sutān rājan didhakṣuś caiva pāṇḍavān
GE07mbh_07_u:131.092a: sa tair abhyāhato gāḍhaṃ śarair bhīmasuteritaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:131.094a: tato 'nyad drauṇir ādāya dhanur bhārasahaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_07_u:131.096c: siṃhair iva babhau mattaṃ gajānām ākulaṃ kulam
GE07mbh_07_u:131.098a: sa dagdhvākṣauhiṇīṃ bāṇair nairṛtān ruruce bhṛśam
GE07mbh_07_u:131.098c: pureva tripuraṃ dagdhvā divi devo maheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:131.099d-020A_0002: drauṇiṃ hateti mahatīṃ codayām āsa tāṃ camūm
GE07mbh_07_u:131.099d-020A_0010: prāsānīṃs tomarāṃś ca kaṇapān kampanāñ śitān
GE07mbh_07_u:131.099d-020A_0017: droṇaputras tv asaṃbhrāntas tad varṣaṃ ghoram utthitam
GE07mbh_07_u:131.099d-020A_0021: tad bāṇair arditaṃ yūthaṃ rakṣasāṃ pīnavakṣasām
GE07mbh_07_u:131.099d-020A_0022: siṃhair iva babhau mattaṃ gajānām ākulaṃ kulam
GE07mbh_07_u:131.099d-020A_0024: kruddhāḥ sma prādravan drauṇiṃ jighāṃsanto mahābalāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:131.099d-020A_0025: tatrādbhutam imaṃ drauṇir darśayām āsa vikramam
GE07mbh_07_u:131.099d-020A_0027: yad eko rākṣasīṃ senāṃ kṣaṇād drauṇir mahāstravit
GE07mbh_07_u:131.099d-020A_0029: sa dahan rākṣasānīkaṃ rarāja drauṇir āhave
GE07mbh_07_u:131.100c: nainaṃ nirīkṣituṃ kaś cic chaknoti drauṇim āhave
GE07mbh_07_u:131.101e: svasūtam abravīt kruddho droṇaputrāya māṃ vaha
GE07mbh_07_u:131.103a: sa cikṣepa tataḥ kruddho droṇaputrāya rākṣasaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:131.104a: tām avaplutya jagrāha drauṇir nyasya rathe dhanuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:131.106a: drauṇes tat karma dṛṣṭvā tu sarvabhūtāny apūjayan
GE07mbh_07_u:131.107c: mumoca niśitān bāṇān punar drauṇer mahorasi
GE07mbh_07_u:131.109a: tato mumoca nārācān drauṇis tābhyāṃ sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:131.109c: tāv apy agniśikhāprakhyair jaghnatus tasya mārgaṇān
GE07mbh_07_u:131.111c: ṣaḍbhir vājisahasraiś ca bhīmas taṃ deśam āvrajat
GE07mbh_07_u:131.112a: tato bhīmātmajaṃ rakṣo dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ ca sānugam
GE07mbh_07_u:131.116c: nipetur dviradā bhūmau dviśṛṅgā iva parvatāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:131.117a: nikṛttair hastihastaiś ca vicaladbhir itas tataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:131.118a: kṣiptaiḥ kāñcanadaṇḍaiś ca nṛpacchatraiḥ kṣitir babhau
GE07mbh_07_u:131.124c: nihatya rākṣasān bāṇair drauṇir haiḍimbam ārdayat
GE07mbh_07_u:131.125c: sa nārācagaṇaiḥ pārthān drauṇir viddhvā mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:131.126a: jaghāna surathaṃ nāma drupadasya sutaṃ vibhuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:131.127b-1133_01: punaḥ śareṇa tīkṣṇena drauṇiḥ siṃha ivonnadan
GE07mbh_07_u:131.127c: śrutāhvayaṃ ca rājendra drauṇir ninye yamakṣayam
GE07mbh_07_u:131.128a: tribhiś cānyaiḥ śarais tīkṣṇaiḥ supuṅkhai rukmamālinam
GE07mbh_07_u:131.128c: śatruṃjayaṃ ca balinaṃ śakralokaṃ nināya ha
GE07mbh_07_u:131.129a: jaghāna sa pṛṣadhraṃ ca candradevaṃ ca māninam
GE07mbh_07_u:131.131a: sa bhittvā hṛdayaṃ tasya rākṣasasya mahāśaraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:131.132a: taṃ hataṃ patitaṃ jñātvā dhṛṣṭadyumno mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:131.133c: parājitya raṇe vīro droṇaputro nanāda ha
GE07mbh_07_u:131.133e: pūjitaḥ sarvabhūtaiś ca tava putraiś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:131.134c: nidhanam upagatair mahī kṛtābhūd; giriśikharair iva durgamātiraudrā
GE07mbh_07_u:131.135a: taṃ siddhagandharvapiśācasaṃghā; nāgāḥ suparṇāḥ pitaro vayāṃsi
GE07mbh_07_u:131.135c: rakṣogaṇā bhūtagaṇāś ca drauṇim; apūjayann apsarasaḥ surāś ca
GE07mbh_07_u:132.002c: yuyudhānaś ca saṃyattā yuddhāyaiva mano dadhuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:132.003a: somadattaḥ punaḥ kurddho dṛṣṭvā sātyakim āhave
GE07mbh_07_u:132.006c: vṛddham ṛddhaṃ guṇaiḥ sarvair yayātim iva nāhuṣam
GE07mbh_07_u:132.007c: śaktyā cainam athāhatya punar vivyādha saptabhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:132.008a: tatas tu sātyaker arthe bhīmaseno navaṃ dṛḍham
GE07mbh_07_u:132.013a: prātipīyas tu saṃkruddhaḥ śaktiṃ bhīmasya vakṣasi
GE07mbh_07_u:132.014a: sa tayābhihato bhīmaś cakampe ca mumoha ca
GE07mbh_07_u:132.014c: prāpya cetaś ca balavān gadām asmai sasarja ha
GE07mbh_07_u:132.015c: sa papāta hataḥ pṛthvyāṃ vajrāhata ivādrirāṭ
GE07mbh_07_u:132.016c: putrās te 'bhyardayan bhīmaṃ daśa dāśaratheḥ samāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:132.016d-1135_02: dṛḍhaḥ suhasto virajāḥ pramāthī cograyāyy api
GE07mbh_07_u:132.016d-1135_03: tān dṛṣṭvā cukrudhe bhīmo jagṛhe bhārasādhanān
GE07mbh_07_u:132.016d-1135_04: ekam ekaṃ samuddiśya pātayām āsa marmasu
GE07mbh_07_u:132.016d-1135_05: te viddhā vyasavaḥ petuḥ syandanebhyo hataujasaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:132.017a: nārācair daśabhir bhīmas tān nihatya tavātmajān

GE07mbh_07_u:132.020c: śakuner bhrātaro vīrā gajākṣaḥ śarabho vibhuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:132.020d-1136_01: subhago bhānudattaś ca śūrāḥ pañca mahārathāḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:133.001a: udīryamāṇaṃ tad dṛṣṭvā pāṇḍavānāṃ mahad balam

GE07mbh_07_u:133.010a: mayi jīvati kauravya viṣādaṃ mā kṛthāḥ kva cit
GE07mbh_07_u:133.011a: pāñcālān kekayāṃś caiva vṛṣṇīṃś cāpi samāgatān
GE07mbh_07_u:133.012a: evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ karṇaṃ tu kṛpaḥ śāradvato 'bravīt
GE07mbh_07_u:133.012c: smayann iva mahābāhuḥ sūtaputram idaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:133.013c: tvayā nāthena rādheya vacasā yadi sidhyati
GE07mbh_07_u:133.014c: na tu te vikramaḥ kaś cid dṛśyate balam eva vā
GE07mbh_07_u:133.015a: samāgamaḥ pāṇḍusutair dṛṣṭas te bahuśo yudhi
GE07mbh_07_u:133.016c: tadāyudhyanta sainyāni tvam ekas tu palāyathāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:133.017c: pārthena nirjitā yuddhe tvaṃ ca karṇa sahānujaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:133.019a: abruvan karṇa yudhyasva bahu katthasi sūtaja
GE07mbh_07_u:133.019c: anuktvā vikramed yas tu tad vai satpuruṣavratam
GE07mbh_07_u:133.020c: niṣphalo dṛśyase karṇa tac ca rājā na budhyate
GE07mbh_07_u:133.021a: tāvad garjasi rādheya yāvat pārthaṃ na paśyasi
GE07mbh_07_u:133.021c: purā pārthaṃ hi te dṛṣṭvā durlabhaṃ garjitaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_07_u:133.022a: tvam anāsādya tān bāṇān phalgunasya vigarjasi
GE07mbh_07_u:133.023a: bāhubhiḥ kṣatriyāḥ śūrā vāgbhiḥ śūrā dvijātayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:133.023c: dhanuṣā phalgunaḥ śūraḥ karṇaḥ śūro manorathaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:133.023d-1139_01: toṣito yena rudro 'pi kaḥ pārthaṃ pratighātayet
GE07mbh_07_u:133.024a: evaṃ paruṣitas tena tadā śāradvatena saḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:133.024c: karṇaḥ praharatāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ kṛpaṃ vākyam athābravīt
GE07mbh_07_u:133.025c: phalaṃ cāśu prayacchanti bījam uptam ṛtāv iva

GE07mbh_07_u:133.026c: tat tad vikatthamānānāṃ bhāraṃ codvahatāṃ mṛdhe
GE07mbh_07_u:133.027a: yaṃ bhāraṃ puruṣo voḍhuṃ manasā hi vyavasyati
GE07mbh_07_u:133.028c: garjāmi yady ahaṃ vipra tava kiṃ tatra naśyati
GE07mbh_07_u:133.029a: vṛthā śūrā na garjanti sajalā iva toyadāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:133.029c: sāmarthyam ātmano jñātvā tato garjanti paṇḍitāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:133.030a: so 'ham adya raṇe yattaḥ sahitau kṛṣṇapāṇḍavau
GE07mbh_07_u:133.030c: utsahe tarasā jetuṃ tato garjāmi gautama

GE07mbh_07_u:133.031e: duryodhanāya dāsyāmi pṛthivīṃ hatakaṇṭakām kṛpa uvāca
GE07mbh_07_u:133.032-1140_01: kiṃ no bahupralāpena phalam āpnuhi sūtaja
GE07mbh_07_u:133.032a: manorathapralāpo me na grāhyas tava sūtaja
GE07mbh_07_u:133.032c: yadā kṣipasi vai kṛṣṇau dharmarājaṃ ca pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_07_u:133.033a: dhruvas tatra jayaḥ karṇa yatra yuddhaviśāradau
GE07mbh_07_u:133.034c: nityaṃ dharmarataś caiva kṛtāstraś ca viśeṣataḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:133.038a: drupadasya tathā putrā drupadaś ca mahāstravit
GE07mbh_07_u:133.040c: yamau ca draupadeyāś ca rākṣasaś ca ghaṭotkacaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:133.040e: yeṣām arthāya yudhyante na teṣāṃ vidyate kṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:133.042c: aprameyabalaḥ śaurir yeṣām arthe ca daṃśitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:133.042e: kathaṃ tān saṃyuge karṇa jetum utsahase parān
GE07mbh_07_u:133.043a: mahān apanayas tv eṣa tava nityaṃ hi sūtaja
GE07mbh_07_u:133.043c: yas tvam utsahase yoddhuṃ samare śauriṇā saha
GE07mbh_07_u:133.044a: evam uktas tu rādheyaḥ prahasan bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_07_u:133.044c: abravīc ca tadā karṇo guruṃ śāradvataṃ kṛpam
GE07mbh_07_u:133.045a: satyam uktaṃ tvayā brahman pāṇḍavān prati yad vacaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:133.045c: ete cānye ca bahavo guṇāḥ pāṇḍusuteṣu vai
GE07mbh_07_u:133.046a: ajayyāś ca raṇe pārthā devair api savāsavaiḥ sadaityayakṣagandharvapiśācoragarākṣasaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:133.047a: mamāpy amoghā datteyaṃ śaktiḥ śakreṇa vai dvija
GE07mbh_07_u:133.048a: hate tu pāṇḍave kṛṣṇo bhrātaraś cāsya sodarāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:133.048c: anarjunā na śakṣyanti mahīṃ bhoktuṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_07_u:133.048d-1142_01: anarjunāyāṃ ca bhuvi vinaśyeyur na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:133.050a: sunītair iha sarvārthāḥ sidhyante nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:133.050c: etam artham ahaṃ jñātvā tato garjāmi gautama
GE07mbh_07_u:133.051a: tvaṃ tu vṛddhaś ca vipraś ca aśaktaś cāpi saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:133.051c: kṛtasnehaś ca pārtheṣu mohān mām avamanyase
GE07mbh_07_u:133.052a: yady evaṃ vakṣyase bhūyo mām apriyam iha dvija
GE07mbh_07_u:133.052c: tatas te khaḍgam udyamya jihvāṃ chetsyāmi durmate
GE07mbh_07_u:133.053a: yac cāpi pāṇḍavān vipra stotum icchasi saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:133.053e: atrāpi śṛṇu me vākyaṃ yathāvad gadato dvija
GE07mbh_07_u:133.054a: duryodhanaś ca droṇaś ca śakunir durmukho jayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:133.054c: duḥśāsano vṛṣaseno madrarājas tvam eva ca
GE07mbh_07_u:133.054e: somadattaś ca bhūriś ca tathā drauṇir viviṃśatiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:133.055c: jayed etān raṇe ko nu śakratulyabalo 'py ariḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:133.056a: śūrāś ca hi kṛtāstrāś ca balinaḥ svargalipsavaḥ
