GE07mbh_07_u:133.058a: daivāyattam ahaṃ manye jayaṃ subalinām api
GE07mbh_07_u:133.060a: śalaś ca rathināṃ śreṣṭho bhagadattaś ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_07_u:133.060c: ete cānye ca rājāno devair api sudurjayāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:133.062a: yāṃś ca tān stauṣi satataṃ duryodhanaripūn dvija
GE07mbh_07_u:133.062c: teṣām api hatāḥ śūrāḥ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:133.063c: prabhāvaṃ nātra paśyāmi pāṇḍavānāṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_07_u:133.064a: yāṃs tān balavato nityaṃ manyase tvaṃ dvijādhama
GE07mbh_07_u:133.064c: yatiṣye 'haṃ yathāśakti yoddhuṃ taiḥ saha saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:134.001c: khaḍgam udyamya vegena drauṇir abhyapatad drutam
GE07mbh_07_u:134.001d-1143_01: tataḥ paramasaṃkruddhaḥ siṃho mattam iva dvipam
GE07mbh_07_u:134.001d-1143_02: prekṣataḥ kururājasya samakṣaṃ cedam abravīt aśvatthāmovāca
GE07mbh_07_u:134.002-1144_04: darpotsekagṛhīto 'dya na kaṃ cid gaṇayan mṛdhe
GE07mbh_07_u:134.002-1144_05: kva te vīryaṃ kva cāstrāṇi yat tvāṃ nirjitya saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:134.002-1144_07: yena sākṣān mahādevo yodhitaḥ samare purā
GE07mbh_07_u:134.002-1144_08: tam icchasi vṛthā jetuṃ sūtādhama manorathaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:134.002-1144_09: yaṃ hi kṛṣṇena sahitaṃ sarvaśastrabhṛtāṃ varam
GE07mbh_07_u:134.002-1144_10: jetuṃ na śaktāḥ sahitāḥ sendrā api surāsurāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:134.002-1144_12: kiṃ punas tvaṃ sudurbuddhe sahaibhir vasudhādhipaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:134.002c: eṣa te 'dya śiraḥ kāyād uddharāmi sudurmate
GE07mbh_07_u:134.003a: tam utpatantaṃ vegena rājā duryodhanaḥ svayam
GE07mbh_07_u:134.003c: nyavārayan mahārāja kṛpaś ca dvipadāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:134.005c: darpam utsiktam etat te phalguno nāśayiṣyati
GE07mbh_07_u:134.006c: kopaḥ khalu na kartavyaḥ sūtaputre kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_07_u:134.007a: tvayi karṇe kṛpe droṇe madrarāje 'tha saubale
GE07mbh_07_u:134.008a: ete hy abhimukhāḥ sarve rādheyena yuyutsavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:134.008c: āyānti pāṇḍavā brahmann āhvayantaḥ samantataḥ saṃjaya uvāca
GE07mbh_07_u:134.009-1145_01: prasādyamānas tu tato rājñā drauṇir mahāmanāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:134.009-1146_01: tatas te pāṇḍavā rājan pāñcālāś ca yaśasvinaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:134.009-1146_02: ājagmuḥ sahitās tatra tarjayantaḥ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:134.009a: karṇo 'pi rathināṃ śreṣṭhaś cāpam udyamya vīryavān
GE07mbh_07_u:134.010a: tataḥ pravavṛte yuddhaṃ karṇasya saha pāṇḍavaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:134.011a: tatas te pāṇḍavā rājan pāñcālāś ca yaśasvinaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:134.011c: dṛṣṭvā karṇaṃ mahābāhum uccaiḥ śabdam athānadan
GE07mbh_07_u:134.012a: ayaṃ karṇaḥ kutaḥ karṇas tiṣṭha karṇa mahāraṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:134.015a: eṣa mūlaṃ hy anarthānāṃ duryodhanamate sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:134.017a: tāṃs tu sarvāṃs tathā dṛṣṭvā dhāvamānān mahārathān
GE07mbh_07_u:134.017c: na vivyathe sūtaputro na ca trāsam agacchata
GE07mbh_07_u:134.019c: vārayām āsa tat sainyaṃ samantād bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_07_u:134.020a: tatas tu śaravarṣeṇa pārthivās tam avārayan
GE07mbh_07_u:134.021a: śaravarṣaṃ tu tat karṇaḥ pārthivaiḥ samudīritam
GE07mbh_07_u:134.022c: yathā devāsure yuddhe śakrasya saha dānavaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:134.023c: yad enaṃ samare yattā nāpnuvanta pare yudhi
GE07mbh_07_u:134.024a: nivārya ca śaraughāṃs tān pārthivānāṃ mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:134.024c: yugeṣv īṣāsu chatreṣu dhvajeṣu ca hayeṣu ca
GE07mbh_07_u:134.025c: babhramus tatra tatraiva gāvaḥ śītārditā iva
GE07mbh_07_u:134.027a: śirobhiḥ patitai rājan bāhubhiś ca samantataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:134.028a: hataiś ca hanyamānaiś ca niṣṭanadbhiś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:134.029a: tato duryodhano rājā dṛṣṭvā karṇasya vikramam
GE07mbh_07_u:134.029c: aśvatthāmānam āsādya tadā vākyam uvāca ha
GE07mbh_07_u:134.031a: dṛṣṭvaitāṃ nirjitāṃ senāṃ raṇe karṇena dhīmatā
GE07mbh_07_u:134.032c: na hanyāt pāṇḍavaḥ saṃkhye tathā nītir vidhīyatām
GE07mbh_07_u:134.033a: tato drauṇiḥ kṛpaḥ śalyo hārdikyaś ca mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:134.034a: āyāntaṃ dṛśya kaunteyaṃ vṛtraṃ devacamūm iva
GE07mbh_07_u:134.034c: pratyudyayau tadā karṇo yathā śakraḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_07_u:134.035c: karṇo vaikartanaḥ sūta pratyapadyat kim uttaram
GE07mbh_07_u:134.036a: sa hy aspardhata pārthena nityam eva mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:134.036c: āśaṃsate ca bībhatsuṃ yuddhe jetuṃ sudāruṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:134.037a: sa tu taṃ sahasā prāptaṃ nityam atyantavairiṇam
GE07mbh_07_u:134.037c: karṇo vaikartanaḥ sūta kim uttaram apadyata
GE07mbh_07_u:134.038a: āyāntaṃ pāṇḍavaṃ dṛṣṭvā gajaḥ pratigajaṃ yathā
GE07mbh_07_u:134.040a: taṃ karṇaḥ śarajālena chādayām āsa māriṣa
GE07mbh_07_u:134.040c: vivyādha ca susaṃkruddhaḥ śarais tribhir ajihmagaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:134.041a: tasya tal lāghavaṃ pārtho nāmṛṣyata mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:134.041b-1150_01: tūrṇaṃ jyāṃ ca samāropya gāṇḍīve ca navāṃ dṛḍhām
GE07mbh_07_u:134.043a: savye bhujāgre balavān nārācena hasann iva
GE07mbh_07_u:134.043c: tasya viddhasya vegena karāc cāpaṃ papāta ha
GE07mbh_07_u:134.044a: punar ādāya tac cāpaṃ nimeṣārdhān mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:134.045a: śaravṛṣṭiṃ tu tāṃ muktāṃ sūtaputreṇa bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:134.047a: tad adbhutam abhūd yuddhaṃ karṇapāṇḍavayor mṛdhe
GE07mbh_07_u:134.048a: tataḥ pārtho maheṣvāso dṛṣṭvā karṇasya vikramam
GE07mbh_07_u:134.049a: aśvāṃś ca caturo bhallair anayad yamasādanam
GE07mbh_07_u:134.049c: sāratheś ca śiraḥ kāyād aharac chatrutāpanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:134.051a: hatāśvāt tu rathāt tūrṇam avaplutya nararṣabhaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:134.053a: dravatas tān samālokya rājā duryodhano nṛpa
GE07mbh_07_u:134.053c: nivartayām āsa tadā vākyaṃ cedam uvāca ha
GE07mbh_07_u:134.054a: alaṃ drutena vaḥ śūrās tiṣṭhadhvaṃ kṣatriyarṣabhāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:134.057a: adya bāṇamayaṃ varṣaṃ sṛjato mama dhanvinaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:134.058a: jeṣyāmy adya raṇe pārthaṃ sāyakair nataparvabhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:134.058c: tiṣṭhadhvaṃ samare śūrā bhayaṃ tyajata phalgunāt
GE07mbh_07_u:134.059a: na hi madvīryam āsādya phalgunaḥ prasahiṣyati
GE07mbh_07_u:134.060a: ity uktvā prayayau rājā sainyena mahatā vṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:134.061a: taṃ prayāntaṃ mahābāhuṃ dṛṣṭvā śāradvatas tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:134.061c: aśvatthāmānam āsādya vākyam etad uvāca ha
GE07mbh_07_u:134.063a: yāvan naḥ paśyamānānāṃ prāṇān pārthena saṃgataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:134.063c: na jahyāt puruṣavyāghras tāvad vāraya kauravam
GE07mbh_07_u:134.064c: kauravaḥ pārthivo vīras tāvad vāraya taṃ drutam
GE07mbh_07_u:134.065c: na bhasmīkriyate rājā tāvad yuddhān nivāryatām
GE07mbh_07_u:134.066a: ayuktam iva paśyāmi tiṣṭhatsv asmāsu mānada
GE07mbh_07_u:134.066c: svayaṃ yuddhāya yad rājā pārthaṃ yāty asahāyavān
GE07mbh_07_u:134.068a: mātulenaivam uktas tu drauṇiḥ śastrabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:134.069a: mayi jīvati gāndhāre na yuddhaṃ gantum arhasi
GE07mbh_07_u:134.069c: mām anādṛtya kauravya tava nityaṃ hitaiṣiṇam
GE07mbh_07_u:134.070a: na hi te saṃbhramaḥ kāryaḥ pārthasya vijayaṃ prati
GE07mbh_07_u:134.071c: tvam apy upekṣāṃ kuruṣe teṣu nityaṃ dvijottama
GE07mbh_07_u:134.072a: mama vā mandabhāgyatvān mandas te vikramo yudhi
GE07mbh_07_u:134.072c: dharmarājapriyārthaṃ vā draupadyā vā na vidma tat
GE07mbh_07_u:134.073a: dhig astu mama lubdhasya yatkṛte sarvabāndhavāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:134.074a: ko hi śastrabhṛtāṃ mukhyo maheśvarasamo yudhi
GE07mbh_07_u:134.074c: śatrūn na kṣapayec chakto yo na syād gautamīsutaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:134.076a: pāñcālān somakāṃś caiva jahi drauṇe sahānugān
GE07mbh_07_u:134.077a: ete hi somakā vipra pāñcālāś ca yaśasvinaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:134.078a: tān vāraya mahābāho kekayāṃś ca narottama
GE07mbh_07_u:134.079a: ādau vā yadi vā paścāt tavedaṃ karma māriṣa
GE07mbh_07_u:134.079c: tvam utpanno mahābāho pāñcālānāṃ vadhaṃ prati
GE07mbh_07_u:134.080c: evaṃ siddhābruvan vāco bhaviṣyati ca tat tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:134.080d-1153_01: tasmāt tvaṃ puruṣavyāghra pāñcālāñ jahi sānugān
GE07mbh_07_u:134.081a: na te 'stragocare śaktāḥ sthātuṃ devāḥ savāsavāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:134.081c: kim u pārthāḥ sapāñcālāḥ satyam etad vaco mama
GE07mbh_07_u:134.081d-1154_01: na tvāṃ samarthāḥ saṃgrāme pāṇḍavāḥ saha somakaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:134.081d-1154_02: balād yodhayituṃ vīra satyam etad bravīmi te
GE07mbh_07_u:134.081d-1154_03: gaccha gaccha mahābāho na naḥ kālātyayo bhavet
GE07mbh_07_u:134.081d-1154_05: śakto hy asi mahābāho divyena svena tejasā
GE07mbh_07_u:135.002a: priyā hi pāṇḍavā nityaṃ mama cāpi pituś ca me
GE07mbh_07_u:135.002c: tathaivāvāṃ priyau teṣāṃ na tu yuddhe kurūdvaha
GE07mbh_07_u:135.002e: śaktitas tāta yudhyāmas tyaktvā prāṇān abhītavat
GE07mbh_07_u:135.003a: ahaṃ karṇaś ca śalyaś ca kṛpo hārdikya eva ca
GE07mbh_07_u:135.004a: te cāpi kauravīṃ senāṃ nimeṣārdhāt kurūdvaha
GE07mbh_07_u:135.004c: kṣapayeyur mahābāho na syāma yadi saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:135.005a: yudhyatāṃ pāṇḍavāñ śaktyā teṣāṃ cāsmān yuyutsatām
GE07mbh_07_u:135.005c: tejas tu teja āsādya praśamaṃ yāti bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:135.006c: jīvatsu pāṇḍuputreṣu tad dhi satyaṃ bravīmi te
GE07mbh_07_u:135.007c: kimarthaṃ tava sainyāni na haniṣyanti bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:135.008a: tvaṃ hi lubdhatamo rājan nikṛtijñaś ca kaurava
GE07mbh_07_u:135.008d-1157_01: manye tvaṃ kutsito rājan pāpātmā pāpapūruṣaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:135.008d-1157_02: anyān api sa naḥ kṣudra śaṅkase pāpabhāvitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:135.009a: ahaṃ tu yatnam āsthāya tvadarthe tyaktajīvitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:135.010a: yotsye 'haṃ śatrubhiḥ sārdhaṃ jeṣyāmi ca varān varān
GE07mbh_07_u:135.010c: pāñcālaiḥ saha yotsyāmi somakaiḥ kekayais tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:135.012a: adya dharmasuto rājā dṛṣṭvā mama parākramam
GE07mbh_07_u:135.013c: dṛṣṭvā vinihatān saṃkhye pāñcālān somakaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_07_u:135.014a: ye māṃ yuddhe 'bhiyotsyanti tān haniṣyāmi bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:135.014c: na hi te vīra mucyeran madbāhvantaram āgatāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:135.015a: evam uktvā mahābāhuḥ putraṃ duryodhanaṃ tava
GE07mbh_07_u:135.015e: cikīrṣus tava putrāṇāṃ priyaṃ prāṇabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:135.016c: praharadhvam itaḥ sarve mama gātre mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:135.017a: evam uktās tu te sarve śastravṛṣṭim apātayan
GE07mbh_07_u:135.017c: drauṇiṃ prati mahārāja jalaṃ jaladharā iva
GE07mbh_07_u:135.018a: tān nihatya śarān drauṇir daśa vīrān apothayat
GE07mbh_07_u:135.019a: te hanyamānāḥ samare pāñcālāḥ sṛñjayās tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:135.019c: parityajya raṇe drauṇiṃ vyadravanta diśo daśa
GE07mbh_07_u:135.020a: tān dṛṣṭvā dravataḥ śūrān pāñcālān sahasomakān
GE07mbh_07_u:135.022c: drauṇim ity abravīd vākyaṃ dṛṣṭvā yodhān nipātitān
GE07mbh_07_u:135.023a: ācāryaputra durbuddhe kim anyair nihatais tava
GE07mbh_07_u:135.023c: samāgaccha mayā sārdhaṃ yadi śūro 'si saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:135.025a: te tu paṅktīkṛtā drauṇiṃ śarā viviśur āśugāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:135.027c: yāvat tvāṃ niśitair bāṇaiḥ preṣayāmi yamakṣayam
GE07mbh_07_u:135.030a: na jānīṣe pratijñāṃ me viprotpattiṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_07_u:135.030c: droṇaṃ hatvā kila mayā hantavyas tvaṃ sudurmate
GE07mbh_07_u:135.030e: tatas tvāhaṃ na hanmy adya droṇe jīvati saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:135.031a: imāṃ tu rajanīṃ prāptām aprabhātāṃ sudurmate
GE07mbh_07_u:135.031c: nihatya pitaraṃ te 'dya tatas tvām api saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:135.031e: neṣyāmi mṛtyulokāyety evaṃ me manasi sthitam
GE07mbh_07_u:135.032a: yas te pārtheṣu vidveṣo yā bhaktiḥ kauraveṣu ca
GE07mbh_07_u:135.032c: tāṃ darśaya sthiro bhūtvā na me jīvan vimokṣyase
GE07mbh_07_u:135.033a: yo hi brāhmaṇyam utsṛjya kṣatradharmarato dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:135.033c: sa vadhyaḥ sarvalokasya yathā tvaṃ puruṣādhama
GE07mbh_07_u:135.034a: ity uktaḥ paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ pārṣatena dvijottamaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:135.034c: krodham āhārayat tīvraṃ tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābravīt
GE07mbh_07_u:135.035c: chādayām āsa ca śarair niḥśvasan pannago yathā
GE07mbh_07_u:135.037c: sāyakāṃś caiva vividhān aśvatthāmni mumoca ha
GE07mbh_07_u:135.040a: śaraughaiḥ pūrayantau tāv ākāśaṃ pradiśas tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:135.040c: alakṣyau samayudhyetāṃ mahat kṛtvā śarais tamaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:135.042a: ayudhyetāṃ mahābāhū citraṃ laghu ca suṣṭhu ca
GE07mbh_07_u:135.043a: tau prayuddhau raṇe dṛṣṭvā vane vanyau gajāv iva
GE07mbh_07_u:135.044a: siṃhanādaravāś cāsan dadhmuḥ śaṅkhāṃś ca māriṣa
GE07mbh_07_u:135.045a: tasmiṃs tu tumule yuddhe bhīrūṇāṃ bhayavardhane
GE07mbh_07_u:135.045c: muhūrtam iva tad yuddhaṃ samarūpaṃ tadābhavat
GE07mbh_07_u:135.046c: dhvajaṃ dhanus tathā chatram ubhau ca pārṣṇisārathī
GE07mbh_07_u:135.046e: sūtam aśvāṃś ca caturo nihatyābhyadravad raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:135.047a: pāñcālāṃś caiva tān sarvān bāṇaiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:135.048c: dṛṣṭvā drauṇer mahat karma vāsavasyeva saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:135.049a: śatena ca śataṃ hatvā pāñcālānāṃ mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:135.049c: tribhiś ca niśitair bāṇair hatvā trīn vai mahārathān
GE07mbh_07_u:135.050c: nāśayām āsa pāñcālān bhūyiṣṭhaṃ ye vyavasthitāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:135.051a: te vadhyamānāḥ pāñcālāḥ samare saha sṛñjayaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:135.052a: sa jitvā samare śatrūn droṇaputro mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:135.053a: sa nihatya bahūñ śūrān aśvatthāmā vyarocata
GE07mbh_07_u:135.054a: saṃpūjyamāno yudhi kauraveyair; vijitya saṃkhye 'rigaṇān sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:135.054c: vyarocata droṇasutaḥ pratāpavān; yathā surendro 'rigaṇān nihatya
GE07mbh_07_u:136.001a: tato yudhiṣṭhiraś caiva bhīmasenaś ca pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:136.002c: abhyayāt pāṇḍavān saṃkhye tato yuddham avartata
GE07mbh_07_u:136.003a: ambaṣṭhān mālavān vaṅgāñ śibīṃs traigartakān api
GE07mbh_07_u:136.006c: nipetur dviradā bhūmau dviśṛṅgā iva parvatāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:136.007a: nikṛttair hastihastaiś ca luṭhamānais tatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:136.008a: kṣiptaiḥ kanakacitraiś ca nṛpacchatraiḥ kṣitir babhau
GE07mbh_07_u:136.009c: ity āsīt tumulaḥ śabdaḥ śoṇāśvasya rathaṃ prati
GE07mbh_07_u:136.010c: vyadhamat tān yathā vāyur meghān iva duratyayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:136.011a: te hanyamānā droṇena pāñcālāḥ prādravan bhayāt
GE07mbh_07_u:136.012a: tataḥ kirīṭī bhīmaś ca sahasā saṃnyavartatām
GE07mbh_07_u:136.013a: bībhatsur dakṣiṇaṃ pārśvam uttaraṃ tu vṛkodaraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:136.014a: tau tadā sṛñjayāś caiva pāñcālāś ca mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:136.014c: anvagacchan mahārāja matsyāś ca saha somakaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:136.015c: mahatyā senayā sārdhaṃ jagmur droṇarathaṃ prati
GE07mbh_07_u:136.016a: tataḥ sā bharatī senā vadhyamānā kirīṭinā
GE07mbh_07_u:136.016c: tamasā nidrayā caiva punar eva vyadīryata
GE07mbh_07_u:136.017a: droṇena vāryamāṇās te svayaṃ tava sutena ca
GE07mbh_07_u:136.017c: na śakyante mahārāja yodhā vārayituṃ tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:136.019a: utsṛjya śataśo vāhāṃs tatra ke cin narādhipāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:137.001a: somadattaṃ tu saṃprekṣya vidhunvānaṃ mahad dhanuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:137.001c: sātyakiḥ prāha yantāraṃ somadattāya māṃ vaha
GE07mbh_07_u:137.002a: na hy ahatvā raṇe śatruṃ bāhlīkaṃ kauravādhamam
GE07mbh_07_u:137.002c: nivartiṣye raṇāt sūta satyam etad vaco mama
GE07mbh_07_u:137.003a: tataḥ saṃpreṣayad yantā saindhavāṃs tān mahājavān
GE07mbh_07_u:137.005a: tam āpatantaṃ saṃprekṣya sātvataṃ rabhasaṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:137.006c: chādayām āsa śaineyaṃ jalado bhāskaraṃ yathā
GE07mbh_07_u:137.008a: somadattas tu taṃ ṣaṣṭyā vivyādhorasi mādhavam
GE07mbh_07_u:137.008c: sātyakiś cāpi taṃ rājann avidhyat sāyakaiḥ śitaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:137.009a: tāv anyonyaṃ śaraiḥ kṛttau vyarājetāṃ nararṣabhau
GE07mbh_07_u:137.011c: ghorarūpau hi tāv āstāṃ vṛṣṭimantāv ivāmbudau
GE07mbh_07_u:137.014c: adṛśyetāṃ raṇe kruddhāv ulkābhir iva kuñjarau
GE07mbh_07_u:137.016c: tvaramāṇas tvarākāle punaś ca daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:137.018c: bāhlīkasya raṇe rājan sātyakiḥ prahasann iva
GE07mbh_07_u:137.019a: somadattas tv asaṃbhrānto dṛṣṭvā ketuṃ nipātitam
GE07mbh_07_u:137.020c: dhanuś ciccheda samare kṣurapreṇa śitena ha
GE07mbh_07_u:137.021c: ācinod bahudhā rājan bhagnadaṃṣṭram iva dvipam
GE07mbh_07_u:137.023a: somadattaṃ tu saṃkruddho raṇe vivyādha sātyakiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:137.025a: tatas tu sātvatasyārthe bhaimasenir navaṃ dṛḍham
GE07mbh_07_u:137.026c: dvidhā ciccheda samare prahasann iva kauravaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:137.027a: sa papāta dvidhā chinna āyasaḥ parigho mahān
GE07mbh_07_u:137.028a: tatas tu sātyakī rājan somadattasya saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:137.028c: dhanuś ciccheda bhallena hastāvāpaṃ ca pañcabhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:137.029a: caturbhis tu śarais tūrṇaṃ caturas turagottamān
GE07mbh_07_u:137.030a: sāratheś ca śiraḥ kāyād bhallena nataparvaṇā
GE07mbh_07_u:137.031a: tataḥ śaraṃ mahāghoraṃ jvalantam iva pāvakam
GE07mbh_07_u:137.034a: taṃ dṛṣṭvā nihataṃ tatra somadattaṃ mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:137.034b-1159_01: pāṇḍavāś ca mahārāja saha madraiḥ prabhadrakaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:137.037a: sainyāni drāvayantaṃ tu droṇo dṛṣṭvā yudhiṣṭhiram
GE07mbh_07_u:137.038a: tataḥ suniśitair bāṇaiḥ pārthaṃ vivyādha saptabhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:137.038e: yudhiṣṭhirasya ciccheda dhvajaṃ kārmukam eva ca
GE07mbh_07_u:137.039c: anyad ādatta vegena kārmukaṃ samare dṛḍham
GE07mbh_07_u:137.043a: asaṃbhrāntas tataḥ pārtho dhanur ākṛṣya vīryavān
GE07mbh_07_u:137.043c: tad astram astreṇa raṇe stambhayām āsa bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:137.043d-1161_01: ciccheda ca dhanur dīrghaṃ brāhmaṇasya ca pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:137.043d-1161_03: tad apy asya śitair bhallaiś ciccheda kurupuṃgavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:137.044c: yudhiṣṭhira mahābāho yat tvā vakṣyāmi tac chṛṇu
GE07mbh_07_u:137.045c: gṛdhyate hi sadā droṇo grahaṇe tava saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:137.046a: nānurūpam ahaṃ manye yuddham asya tvayā saha
GE07mbh_07_u:137.046c: yo 'sya sṛṣṭo vināśāya sa enaṃ śvo haniṣyati
GE07mbh_07_u:137.047a: parivarjya guruṃ yāhi yatra rājā suyodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:137.047b-1162_01: rājā rājñā hi yoddhavyo nārājñā yuddham iṣyate
GE07mbh_07_u:137.047b-1162_03: yāvan mātreṇa ca mayā sahāyena dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:137.047c: bhīmaś ca rathaśārdūlo yudhyate kauravaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_07_u:137.048c: muhūrtaṃ cintayitvā tu tato dāruṇam āhavam
GE07mbh_07_u:137.049a: prāyād drutam amitraghno yatra bhīmo vyavasthitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:137.050c: parjanya iva gharmānte nādayan vai diśo daśa
GE07mbh_07_u:137.051a: bhīmasya nighnataḥ śatrūn pārṣṇiṃ jagrāha pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:138.001c: tamasā saṃvṛte loke rajasā ca mahīpate
GE07mbh_07_u:138.002a: anumānena saṃjñābhir yuddhaṃ tad vavṛte mahat
GE07mbh_07_u:138.006c: andhe tamasi mūḍhāni putrasya tava mantrite
GE07mbh_07_u:138.007a: tataḥ sarvāṇi sainyāni senāgopāś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:138.007c: vyamuhyanta raṇe tatra tamasā saṃvṛte sati
GE07mbh_07_u:138.008c: andhe tamasi magnānām āsīt kā vo matis tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:138.009a: kathaṃ prakāśas teṣāṃ vā mama sainyeṣu vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:138.009c: babhūva loke tamasā tathā saṃjaya saṃvṛte
GE07mbh_07_u:138.010a: tataḥ sarvāṇi sainyāni hataśiṣṭāni yāni vai
GE07mbh_07_u:138.011a: droṇaḥ purastāj jaghane tu śalyas; tathā drauṇiḥ pārśvataḥ saubalaś ca
GE07mbh_07_u:138.011c: svayaṃ tu sarvāṇi balāni rājan; rājābhyayād gopayan vai niśāyām
GE07mbh_07_u:138.012a: uvāca sarvāṃś ca padātisaṃghān; duryodhanaḥ pārthiva sāntvapūrvam
GE07mbh_07_u:138.012c: utsṛjya sarve paramāyudhāni; gṛhṇīta hastair jvalitān pradīpān
GE07mbh_07_u:138.013a: te coditāḥ pārthivasattamena; tataḥ prahṛṣṭā jagṛhuḥ pradīpān devarṣigandharvasurarṣisaṅghā
GE07mbh_07_u:138.013c: sā bhūya eva dhvajinī vibhaktā; vyarocatāgniprabhayā niśāyām
GE07mbh_07_u:138.014a: mahādhanair ābharaṇaiś ca divyaiḥ; śastraiḥ pradīptair abhisaṃpatadbhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:138.014c: kṣaṇena sarve vihitāḥ pradīpā; vyadīpayaṃś ca dhvajinīṃ tadāśu
GE07mbh_07_u:138.015a: sarvās tu senā vyatisevyamānāḥ; padātibhiḥ pāvakatailahastaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:138.015c: prakāśyamānā dadṛśur niśāyāṃ; yathāntarikṣe jaladās taḍidbhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:138.016a: prakāśitāyāṃ tu tathā dhvajinyāṃ; droṇo 'gnikalpaḥ pratapan samantāt
GE07mbh_07_u:138.016c: rarāja rājendra suvarṇavarmā; madhyaṃ gataḥ sūrya ivāṃśumālī
GE07mbh_07_u:138.017a: jāmbūnadeṣv ābharaṇeṣu caiva; niṣkeṣu śuddheṣu śarāvareṣu
GE07mbh_07_u:138.017c: pīteṣu śastreṣu ca pāvakasya; pratiprabhās tatra tato babhūvuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:138.018a: gadāś ca śaikyāḥ parighāś ca śubhrā; ratheṣu śaktyaś ca vivartamānāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:138.018c: pratiprabhā raśmibhir ājamīḍha; punaḥ punaḥ saṃjanayanti dīptāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:138.019a: chatrāṇi bālavyajanānuṣaṅgā; dīptā maholkāś ca tathaiva rājan
GE07mbh_07_u:138.019c: vyāghūrṇamānāś ca suvarṇamālā; vyāyacchatāṃ tatra tadā virejuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:138.020a: śastraprabhābhiś ca virājamānaṃ; dīpaprabhābhiś ca tadā balaṃ tat
GE07mbh_07_u:138.020c: prakāśitaṃ cābharaṇaprabhābhir; bhṛśaṃ prakāśaṃ nṛpate babhūva
GE07mbh_07_u:138.021c: dīptāṃ prabhāṃ prājanayanta tatra; tapātyaye vidyud ivāntarikṣe
GE07mbh_07_u:138.022c: vaktrāṇy aśobhanta tadā narāṇāṃ; vāyvīritānīva mahāmbujāni
GE07mbh_07_u:138.023a: mahāvane dāva iva pradīpte; yathā prabhā bhāskarasyāpi naśyet
GE07mbh_07_u:138.023c: tathā tavāsīd dhvajinī pradīptā; mahābhaye bhārata bhīmarūpā
GE07mbh_07_u:138.024a: tat saṃpradīptaṃ balam asmadīyaṃ; niśāmya pārthās tvaritās tathaiva
GE07mbh_07_u:138.024c: sarveṣu sainyeṣu padātisaṃghān; acodayaṃs te 'tha cakruḥ pradīpān
GE07mbh_07_u:138.025a: gaje gaje sapta kṛtāḥ pradīpā; rathe rathe caiva daśa pradīpāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:138.025c: dvāv aśvapṛṣṭhe paripārśvato 'nye; dhvajeṣu cānye jaghaneṣu cānye
GE07mbh_07_u:138.026a: senāsu sarvāsu ca pārśvato 'nye; paścāt purastāc ca samantataś ca
GE07mbh_07_u:138.026c: madhye tathānye jvalitāgnihastāḥ; senādvaye 'pi sma narā viceruḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:138.027c: madhye tathānye jvalitāgnihastā; vyadīpayan pāṇḍusutasya senām
GE07mbh_07_u:138.028a: tena pradīptena tathā pradīptaṃ; balaṃ tad āsīd balavad balena
GE07mbh_07_u:138.028c: bhāḥ kurvatā bhānumatā graheṇa; divākareṇāgnir ivābhitaptaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:138.029a: tayoḥ prabhāḥ pṛthivīm antarikṣaṃ; sarvā vyatikramya diśaś ca vṛddhāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:138.029c: tena prakāśena bhṛśaṃ prakāśaṃ; babhūva teṣāṃ tava caiva sainyam
GE07mbh_07_u:138.030a: tena prakāśena divaṃgamena; saṃbodhitā devagaṇāś ca rājan
GE07mbh_07_u:138.031a: tad devagandharvasamākulaṃ ca; yakṣāsurendrāpsarasāṃ gaṇaiś ca
GE07mbh_07_u:138.031c: hataiś ca vīrair divam āruhadbhir; āyodhanaṃ divyakalpaṃ babhūva
GE07mbh_07_u:138.034a: tasmin mahāgnipratimo mahātmā; saṃtāpayan pāṇḍavān vipramukhyaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:138.034c: gabhastibhir madhyagato yathārko; varṣātyaye tadvad abhūn narendra
GE07mbh_07_u:139.001a: prakāśite tathā loke rajasā ca tamovṛte
GE07mbh_07_u:139.003c: virarāja tadā bhūmir dyaur grahair iva bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:139.005a: prādīpyanta diśaḥ sarvāḥ pradīpais taiḥ samantataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:139.006a: asajjanta tato vīrā vīreṣv eva pṛthak pṛthak
GE07mbh_07_u:139.006c: nāgā nāgaiḥ samājagmus turagāḥ saha vājibhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:139.007c: tasmin rātrimukhe ghore putrasya tava śāsanāt
GE07mbh_07_u:139.007d-1169_01: caturaṅgasya sainyasya saṃpātaś ca mahān abhūt
GE07mbh_07_u:139.009a: tasmin praviṣṭe saṃrabdhe mama putrasya vāhinīm
GE07mbh_07_u:139.009c: amṛṣyamāṇe durdharṣe kiṃ va āsīn manas tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:139.010c: duryodhanaś ca kiṃ kṛtyaṃ prāptakālam amanyata
GE07mbh_07_u:139.011a: ke cainaṃ samare vīraṃ pratyudyayur ariṃdamam
GE07mbh_07_u:139.011b-1170_01: droṇaṃ ca ke vyarakṣanta praviṣṭe śvetavāhane
GE07mbh_07_u:139.011c: ke 'rakṣan dakṣiṇaṃ cakraṃ ke ca droṇasya savyataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:139.012a: ke pṛṣṭhato 'sya hy abhavan vīrā vīrasya yudhyataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:139.012c: ke purastād agacchanta nighnataḥ śātravān raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:139.014a: dadāha ca śarair droṇaḥ pāñcālānāṃ rathavrajān
GE07mbh_07_u:139.014c: dhūmaketur iva kruddhaḥ sa kathaṃ mṛtyum īyivān
GE07mbh_07_u:139.015a: avyagrān eva hi parān kathayasy aparājitān
GE07mbh_07_u:139.015b-1171_01: hṛṣṭānudīrṇān saṃgrāme na tu saṃjaya māmakān
GE07mbh_07_u:139.015c: hatāṃś caiva viṣaṇṇāṃś ca viprakīrṇāṃś ca śaṃsasi
GE07mbh_07_u:139.015e: rathino virathāṃś caiva kṛtān yuddheṣu māmakān
GE07mbh_07_u:139.016a: droṇasya matam ājñāya yoddhukāmasya tāṃ niśām
GE07mbh_07_u:139.017a: vikarṇaṃ citrasenaṃ ca mahābāhuṃ ca kauravam
GE07mbh_07_u:139.017c: durdharṣaṃ dīrghabāhuṃ ca ye ca teṣāṃ padānugāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:139.018a: droṇaṃ yattāḥ parākrāntāḥ sarve rakṣata pṛṣṭhataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:139.018c: hārdikyo dakṣiṇaṃ cakraṃ śalyaś caivottaraṃ tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:139.019a: trigartānāṃ ca ye śūrā hataśiṣṭā mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:139.019c: tāṃś caiva sarvān putras te samacodayad agrataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:139.020a: ācāryo hi susaṃyatto bhṛśaṃ yattāś ca pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:139.020c: taṃ rakṣata susaṃyattā nighnantaṃ śātravān raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:139.021a: droṇo hi balavān yuddhe kṣiprahastaḥ parākramī
GE07mbh_07_u:139.021c: nirjayet tridaśān yuddhe kim u pārthān sasomakān
GE07mbh_07_u:139.022a: te yūyaṃ sahitāḥ sarve bhṛśaṃ yattā mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:139.023a: pāṇḍaveyeṣu sainyeṣu yodhaṃ paśyāmy ahaṃ na tam
GE07mbh_07_u:139.023c: yo jayeta raṇe droṇaṃ dhṛṣṭadyumnād ṛte nṛpāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:139.024c: sa guptaḥ somakān hanyāt sṛñjayāṃś ca sarājakān
GE07mbh_07_u:139.026c: bhīmasenam ahaṃ cāpi yuddhe jeṣyāmi daṃśitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:139.026d-1172_01: śeṣāṃś ca pāṇḍavān yodhāḥ prasabhaṃ hīnatejasaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:139.027a: so 'yaṃ mama jayo vyaktaṃ dīrghakālaṃ bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_07_u:139.027c: tasmād rakṣata saṃgrāme droṇam eva mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:139.028a: ity uktvā bharataśreṣṭha putro duryodhanas tava
GE07mbh_07_u:139.028c: vyādideśa tataḥ sainyaṃ tasmiṃs tamasi dāruṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:139.029a: tataḥ pravavṛte yuddhaṃ rātrau tad bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_07_u:139.029c: ubhayoḥ senayor ghoraṃ vijayaṃ prati kāṅkṣiṇoḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:139.030a: arjunaḥ kauravaṃ sainyam arjunaṃ cāpi kauravāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:139.033a: naivāsmābhir na pūrvair no dṛṣṭaṃ pūrvaṃ tathāvidham
GE07mbh_07_u:139.033c: yuddhaṃ yādṛśam evāsīt tāṃ rātriṃ sumahābhayam
GE07mbh_07_u:140.001a: vartamāne tathā raudre rātriyuddhe viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:140.002a: abravīt pāṇḍavāṃś caiva pāñcālāṃś ca sasomakān
GE07mbh_07_u:140.003a: rājñas te vacanād rājan pāñcālāḥ somakās tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:140.004a: tān vayaṃ pratigarjantaḥ pratyudyātās tv amarṣitāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:140.005c: droṇaṃ prati jighāṃsantaṃ matto mattam iva dvipam
GE07mbh_07_u:140.007c: karṇo vaikartano rājan vārayām āsa pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_07_u:140.008c: svayaṃ duryodhano yuddhe pratīpaṃ mṛtyum āvrajat
GE07mbh_07_u:140.009c: śakuniḥ saubalo rājan vārayām āsa satvaraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:140.010c: kṛpo śāradvato rājan vārayām āsa saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:140.014a: virāṭaṃ drutam āyāntaṃ droṇasya nidhanaṃ prati
GE07mbh_07_u:140.016a: arjunaṃ ca yudhāṃ śreṣṭhaṃ prādravantaṃ mahāratham
GE07mbh_07_u:140.017a: tathā droṇaṃ maheṣvāsaṃ nighnantaṃ śātravān raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:140.018c: tāvakā rathino rājan vārayām āsur ojasā
GE07mbh_07_u:140.022a: narās tu bahavas tatra samājagmuḥ parasparam
GE07mbh_07_u:140.022c: gadābhir musalaiś caiva nānāśastraiś ca saṃghaśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:140.024a: yudhiṣṭhiras tu hārdikyaṃ viddhvā pañcabhir āśugaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:140.024c: punar vivyādha viṃśatyā tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābravīt
GE07mbh_07_u:140.025c: dhanuś ciccheda bhallena taṃ ca vivyādha saptabhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:140.026c: hārdikyaṃ daśabhir bāṇair bāhvor urasi cārpayat
GE07mbh_07_u:140.027a: mādhavas tu raṇe viddho dharmaputreṇa māriṣa
GE07mbh_07_u:140.027c: prākampata ca roṣeṇa saptabhiś cārdayac charaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:140.028a: tasya pārtho dhanuś chittvā hastāvāpaṃ nikṛtya ca
GE07mbh_07_u:140.028c: prāhiṇon niśitān bāṇān pañca rājañ śilāśitān
GE07mbh_07_u:140.029a: te tasya kavacaṃ bhittvā hemacitraṃ mahādhanam
GE07mbh_07_u:140.029c: prāviśan dharaṇīm ugrā valmīkam iva pannagāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:140.030c: vivyādha pāṇḍavaṃ ṣaṣṭyā sūtaṃ ca navabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:140.031c: cikṣepa bharataśreṣṭha rathe nyasya mahad dhanuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:140.033a: etasminn eva kāle tu gṛhya pārthaḥ punar dhanuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:140.034a: tatas tu samare śūro vṛṣṇīnāṃ pravaro rathī
GE07mbh_07_u:140.035a: tatas tu pāṇḍavo jyeṣṭhaḥ khaḍgacarma samādade
GE07mbh_07_u:140.035c: tad asya niśitair bāṇair vyadhaman mādhavo raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:140.036a: tomaraṃ tu tato gṛhya svarṇadaṇḍaṃ durāsadam
GE07mbh_07_u:140.037c: dvidhā ciccheda hārdikyaḥ kṛtahastaḥ smayann iva
GE07mbh_07_u:140.038c: kavacaṃ cāsya saṃkruddhaḥ śarais tīkṣṇair adārayat
GE07mbh_07_u:140.041c: punar droṇasya jugupe cakram eva mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:141.001a: bhūris tu samare rājañ śaineyaṃ rathināṃ varam
GE07mbh_07_u:141.002a: athainaṃ sātyakiḥ kruddhaḥ pañcabhir niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:141.002c: vivyādha hṛdaye tūrṇaṃ prāsravat tasya śoṇitam
GE07mbh_07_u:141.004a: tāv anyonyaṃ mahārāja tatakṣāte śarair bhṛśam
GE07mbh_07_u:141.006a: tāv anyonyaṃ śarai rājan pracchādya samare sthitau
GE07mbh_07_u:141.006c: muhūrtaṃ caiva tad yuddhaṃ samarūpam ivābhavat
GE07mbh_07_u:141.007a: tataḥ kruddho mahārāja śaineyaḥ prahasann iva
GE07mbh_07_u:141.008c: vivyādha hṛdaye tūrṇaṃ tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābravīt
GE07mbh_07_u:141.010a: sa viddhvā sātvataṃ bāṇais tribhir eva viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:141.010c: dhanuś ciccheda bhallena sutīkṣṇena hasann iva
GE07mbh_07_u:141.012a: sa tu śaktyā vibhinnāṅgo nipapāta rathottamāt
GE07mbh_07_u:141.013a: taṃ tu dṛṣṭvā hataṃ śūram aśvatthāmā mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:141.013d-1175_01: tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābhāṣya śaineyaṃ sa narādhipa
GE07mbh_07_u:141.014a: tam āpatantaṃ saṃrabdhaṃ śaineyasya rathaṃ prati
GE07mbh_07_u:141.015a: tiṣṭha tiṣṭha na me jīvan droṇaputra gamiṣyasi
GE07mbh_07_u:141.015c: eṣa tvādya haniṣyāmi mahiṣaṃ skandarāḍ iva
GE07mbh_07_u:141.016c: drauṇim abhyadravat kruddho gajendram iva kesarī
GE07mbh_07_u:141.017c: rathinām ṛṣabhaṃ drauṇiṃ dhārābhir iva toyadaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:141.018a: śaravṛṣṭiṃ tu tāṃ prāptāṃ śarair āśīviṣopamaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:141.018c: śātayām āsa samare tarasā drauṇir utsmayan
GE07mbh_07_u:141.020a: sa śarair ācitas tena rākṣaso raṇamūrdhani
GE07mbh_07_u:141.026c: babhau niśāmukhe vyoma khadyotair iva saṃvṛtam
GE07mbh_07_u:141.027a: sa mārgaṇagaṇair drauṇir diśaḥ pracchādya sarvataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:141.029a: tato ghaṭotkaco bāṇair daśabhir drauṇim āhave
GE07mbh_07_u:141.030a: sa tair abhyāyatair viddho rākṣasena mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:141.030c: cacāla samare drauṇir vātanunna iva drumaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:141.031a: tato hāhākṛtaṃ sainyaṃ tava sarvaṃ janādhipa
GE07mbh_07_u:141.031c: hataṃ sma menire sarve tāvakās taṃ viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:141.032a: taṃ tu dṛṣṭvā tathāvastham aśvatthāmānam āhave
GE07mbh_07_u:141.035a: sa bhittvā hṛdayaṃ tasya rākṣasasya śarottamaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:141.037a: dṛṣṭvā vimūḍhaṃ haiḍimbaṃ sārathis taṃ raṇājirāt
GE07mbh_07_u:141.037c: drauṇeḥ sakāśāt saṃbhrāntas tv apaninye tvarānvitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:141.038a: tathā tu samare viddhvā rākṣasendraṃ ghaṭotkacam
GE07mbh_07_u:141.039a: pūjitas tava putraiś ca sarvayodhaiś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:141.040c: svayaṃ duryodhano rājā pratyavidhyac chitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:141.041a: taṃ bhīmaseno navabhiḥ śarair vivyādha māriṣa
GE07mbh_07_u:141.043a: atha duryodhano rājā bhīmaṃ vivyādha patribhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:141.044a: tasya bhīmo dhanuś chittvā dhvajaṃ ca navabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:141.048c: vivyādha nṛpatiṃ tūrṇaṃ saptabhir niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:141.049a: tad apy asya dhanuḥ kṣipraṃ ciccheda laghuhastavat
GE07mbh_07_u:141.049c: dvitīyaṃ ca tṛtīyaṃ ca caturthaṃ pañcamaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:141.050a: āttam āttaṃ mahārāja bhīmasya dhanur ācchinat
GE07mbh_07_u:141.051a: sa tadā chidyamāneṣu kārmukeṣu punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:141.051d-1177_01: mṛtyor iva svasāraṃ hi dīptāṃ ketuśikhām iva
GE07mbh_07_u:141.052a: aprāptām eva tāṃ śaktiṃ tridhā ciccheda kauravaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:141.053a: tato bhīmo mahārāja gadāṃ gurvīṃ mahāprabhām
GE07mbh_07_u:141.054a: tataḥ sā sahasā vāhāṃs tava putrasya saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:141.054c: sārathiṃ ca gadā gurvī mamarda bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_07_u:141.055a: putras tu tava rājendra rathād dhemapariṣkṛtāt
GE07mbh_07_u:141.056a: tato bhīmo hataṃ matvā tava putraṃ mahāratham
GE07mbh_07_u:141.056c: siṃhanādaṃ mahac cakre tarjayann iva kauravān
GE07mbh_07_u:141.057a: tāvakāḥ sainikāś cāpi menire nihataṃ nṛpam
GE07mbh_07_u:141.057c: tato vicukruśuḥ sarve hā heti ca samantataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:141.058a: teṣāṃ tu ninadaṃ śrutvā trastānāṃ sarvayodhinām
GE07mbh_07_u:141.058c: bhīmasenasya nādaṃ ca śrutvā rājan mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:141.059a: tato yudhiṣṭhiro rājā hataṃ matvā suyodhanam
GE07mbh_07_u:141.060a: pāñcālāḥ kekayā matsyāḥ sṛñjayāś ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:141.061a: tatrāsīt sumahad yuddhaṃ droṇasyātha paraiḥ saha
GE07mbh_07_u:142.001c: karṇo vaikartano yuddhe vārayām āsa bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:142.002a: sahadevas tu rādheyaṃ viddhvā navabhir āśugaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:142.003c: sajyaṃ cāsya dhanuḥ śīghraṃ ciccheda laghuhastavat
GE07mbh_07_u:142.004c: karṇaṃ vivyādha viṃśatyā tad adbhutam ivābhavat
GE07mbh_07_u:142.005a: tasya karṇo hayān hatvā śaraiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:142.005c: sārathiṃ cāsya bhallena drutaṃ ninye yamakṣayam
GE07mbh_07_u:142.006a: virathaḥ sahadevas tu khaḍgaṃ carma samādade
GE07mbh_07_u:142.006c: tad apy asya śaraiḥ karṇo vyadhamat prahasann iva
GE07mbh_07_u:142.008c: vyaṣṭambhayac charaiḥ karṇo bhūmau cainām apātayat
GE07mbh_07_u:142.009c: śaktiṃ cikṣepa karṇāya tām apy asyācchinac charaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:142.012a: tasmiṃs tu vitathe cakre kṛte tena mahātmanā
GE07mbh_07_u:142.012b-1178_02: hastyaṅgāni tathāśvāṃś ca mṛtāṃś ca puruṣān bahūn
GE07mbh_07_u:142.012b-1178_03: cikṣepa karṇam uddiśya karṇas tān vyadhamac charaiḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:143.022a: pradīpair hi parityaktair jvaladbhis taiḥ samantataḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:144.012c: taṃ visaṃjñaṃ nipatitaṃ dṛṣṭvā syālaṃ tavānagha

GE07mbh_07_u:144.013c: nirjitya ca raṇe śatrūn nakulaḥ śatrutāpanaḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:144.014c: prāyāt tena raṇe rājan yena droṇo 'nvayudhyata
GE07mbh_07_u:144.015a: śikhaṇḍinaṃ tu samare droṇaprepsuṃ viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:144.016c: vivyādha navabhir bhallaiḥ śikhaṇḍī prahasann iva
GE07mbh_07_u:144.017a: tam ācāryo mahārāja viddhvā pañcabhir āśugaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:144.017c: punar vivyādha viṃśatyā putrāṇāṃ priyakṛt tava

GE07mbh_07_u:144.019c: prakṛtyā ghorarūpaṃ tad āsīd ghorataraṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:144.021a: śikhaṇḍī tu mahārāja gautamasya mahad dhanuḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:145.010a: vikṛṣya ca dhanuś citram ākarṇāt paravīrahā

GE07mbh_07_u:145.034a: kampayann iva ghoṣeṇa dhanuṣo vasudhāṃ balī
GE07mbh_07_u:145.036c: abhyavarṣac charaiḥ karṇaṃ tad yuddham abhavat samam
GE07mbh_07_u:145.037a: tāvakāś ca mahārāja karṇaputraś ca daṃśitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:145.037c: sātyakiṃ vivyadhus tūrṇaṃ samantān niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:145.038a: astrair astrāṇi saṃvārya teṣāṃ karṇasya cābhibho
GE07mbh_07_u:145.039a: tena bāṇena nirviddho vṛṣaseno viśāṃ pate

GE07mbh_07_u:145.040a: tataḥ karṇo hataṃ matvā vṛṣasenaṃ mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:145.041c: vivyādha bahubhiḥ karṇaṃ tvaramāṇaḥ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:145.042a: sa karṇaṃ daśabhir viddhvā vṛṣasenaṃ ca saptabhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:145.043a: tāv anye dhanuṣī sajye kṛtvā śatrubhayaṃkare

GE07mbh_07_u:145.046a: eṣa sarvāñ śibīn hatvā mukhyaśaś ca nararṣabhān

GE07mbh_07_u:145.052c: iha cel labhyate lakṣyaṃ kṛtsnāñ jeṣyāmahe parān
GE07mbh_07_u:145.054a: sātyakiṃ yadi hanyāmo dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ ca pārṣatam

GE07mbh_07_u:145.057c: yāvat pārtho na jānāti sātyakiṃ bahubhir vṛtam
GE07mbh_07_u:145.058a: te tvaradhvaṃ yathā śūrāḥ śarāṇāṃ mokṣaṇe bhṛśam
GE07mbh_07_u:145.058c: yathā tūrṇaṃ vrajaty eṣa paralokāya mādhavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:145.059a: karṇasya matam ājñāya putras te prāha saubalam

GE07mbh_07_u:152.024c: vinedus tumulān nādān dudruvuś ca diśo daśa
GE07mbh_07_u:152.025a: tāṃs trāsyamānān bhīmena dṛṣṭvā rakṣo mahābalam
GE07mbh_07_u:152.026a: taṃ bhīmasenaḥ samare tīkṣṇāgrair akṣiṇoc charaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:152.026c: alāyudhas tu tān astān bhīmena viśikhān raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:152.026e: ciccheda kāṃś cit samare tvarayā kāṃś cid agrahīt
GE07mbh_07_u:152.027a: sa taṃ dṛṣṭvā rākṣasendraṃ bhīmo bhīmaparākramaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:152.028a: tām āpatantīṃ vegena gadāṃ jvālākulāṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:152.028c: gadayā tāḍayām āsa sā gadā bhīmam āvrajat
GE07mbh_07_u:152.029c: tān apy asyākaron moghān rākṣaso niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:152.030a: te cāpi rākṣasāḥ sarve sainikā bhīmarūpiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:152.031c: na śāntiṃ lebhire tatra rakṣasair bhṛśapīḍitāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:152.032a: taṃ tu dṛṣṭvā mahāghoraṃ vartamānaṃ mahāhave
GE07mbh_07_u:152.033c: padavīm asya gaccha tvaṃ mā vicāraya pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_07_u:152.034c: sahitā draupadeyāś ca karṇaṃ yāntu mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:152.035a: nakulaḥ sahadevaś ca yuyudhānaś ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_07_u:152.035c: itarān rākṣasān ghnantu śāsanāt tava pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_07_u:152.036c: vārayasva naravyāghra mahad dhi bhayam āgatam
GE07mbh_07_u:152.037a: evam ukte tu kṛṣṇena yathoddiṣṭā mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:152.037c: jagmur vaikartanaṃ karṇaṃ rākṣasāṃś cetarān raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:152.039a: hayāṃś cāsya śitair bāṇaiḥ sārathiṃ ca mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:152.040c: tasmai gurvīṃ gadāṃ ghorāṃ sa vinadyotsasarja ha
GE07mbh_07_u:152.041c: gadayā rākṣaso ghoro nijaghāna nanāda ca
GE07mbh_07_u:152.042a: tad dṛṣṭvā rākṣasendrasya ghoraṃ karma bhayāvaham
GE07mbh_07_u:152.046c: mattāv iva mahānāgāv akṛṣyetāṃ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:152.047a: tam apaśyad dhṛṣīkeśaḥ pāṇḍavānāṃ hite rataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:153.001a: saṃprekṣya samare bhīmaṃ rakṣasā grastam antikāt
GE07mbh_07_u:153.002a: paśya bhīmaṃ mahābāho rakṣasā grastam antikāt
GE07mbh_07_u:153.003a: sa karṇaṃ tvaṃ samutsṛjya rākṣasendram alāyudham
GE07mbh_07_u:153.003c: jahi kṣipraṃ mahābāho paścāt karṇaṃ vadhiṣyasi
GE07mbh_07_u:153.004a: sa vārṣṇeyavacaḥ śrutvā karṇam utsṛjya vīryavān
GE07mbh_07_u:153.004e: tayoḥ sutumulaṃ yuddhaṃ babhūva niśi rakṣasoḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:153.006c: nakulaḥ sahadevaś ca cicchidur niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:153.007a: sarvāṃś ca samare rājan kirīṭī kṣatriyarṣabhān
GE07mbh_07_u:153.008a: karṇaś ca samare rājan vyadrāvayata pārthivān
GE07mbh_07_u:153.009a: tān vadhyamānān dṛṣṭvā tu bhīmo bhīmaparākramaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:153.009c: abhyayāt tvaritaḥ karṇaṃ viśikhān vikiran raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:153.010a: tatas te 'py āyayur hatvā rākṣasān yatra sūtajaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:153.010c: nakulaḥ sahadevaś ca sātyakiś ca mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:153.010e: te karṇaṃ yodhayām āsuḥ pāñcālā droṇam eva ca
GE07mbh_07_u:153.012a: sa tu tena prahāreṇa bhaimasenir mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:153.014a: sā hayān sārathiṃ caiva rathaṃ cāsya mahāsvanā
GE07mbh_07_u:153.015c: utpapāta rathāt tūrṇaṃ māyām āsthāya rākṣasīm
GE07mbh_07_u:153.016a: sa samāsthāya māyāṃ tu vavarṣa rudhiraṃ bahu
GE07mbh_07_u:153.018a: tāṃ prekṣya vihitāṃ māyāṃ rākṣaso rākṣasena tu
GE07mbh_07_u:153.018c: ūrdhvam utpatya haiḍimbas tāṃ māyāṃ māyayāvadhīt
GE07mbh_07_u:153.019a: so 'bhivīkṣya hatāṃ māyāṃ māyāvī māyayaiva hi
GE07mbh_07_u:153.020a: aśmavarṣaṃ sa tad ghoraṃ śaravarṣeṇa vīryavān
GE07mbh_07_u:153.020c: diśo vidhvaṃsayām āsa tad adbhutam ivābhavat
GE07mbh_07_u:153.022c: nārācair niśitair bhallaiḥ śaraiś cakraiḥ paraśvadhaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:153.024c: iṅgudair badarībhiś ca kovidāraiś ca puṣpitaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:153.026c: teṣāṃ śabdo mahān āsīd vajrāṇāṃ bhidyatām iva
GE07mbh_07_u:153.027a: yuddhaṃ tad abhavad ghoraṃ bhaimyalāyudhayor nṛpa
GE07mbh_07_u:153.028a: tau yuddhvā vividhair ghorair āyudhair viśikhais tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:153.035a: atīva sā niśā teṣāṃ babhūva vijayāvahā
GE07mbh_07_u:153.037a: atha duryodhano rājā dṛṣṭvā hatam alāyudham
GE07mbh_07_u:153.038a: tena hy asya pratijñātaṃ bhīmasenam ahaṃ yudhi
GE07mbh_07_u:153.038c: hanteti svayam āgamya smaratā vairam uttamam
GE07mbh_07_u:153.039a: dhruvaṃ sa tena hantavya ity amanyata pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:153.040a: sa taṃ dṛṣṭvā vinihataṃ bhīmasenātmajena vai
GE07mbh_07_u:154.001c: nanāda vividhān nādān vāhinyāḥ pramukhe sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:154.002a: tasya taṃ tumulaṃ śabdaṃ śrutvā kuñjarakampanam
GE07mbh_07_u:154.005c: sātyakiṃ ca rathodāraṃ kampayām āsa mārgaṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:154.007c: meghānām iva gharmānte babhūva tumulo niśi
GE07mbh_07_u:154.008c: śaraughavarṣākulavṛṣṭimāṃś ca; saṃgrāmameghaḥ sa babhūva rājan
GE07mbh_07_u:154.009a: tad uddhataṃ śaila ivāprakampyo; varṣaṃ mahac chailasamānasāraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:154.009c: vidhvaṃsayām āsa raṇe narendra; vaikartanaḥ śatrugaṇāvamardī
GE07mbh_07_u:154.010c: śatrūn vyapohat samare mahātmā; vaikartanaḥ putrahite ratas te
GE07mbh_07_u:154.011a: saṃchinnabhinnadhvajinaś ca ke cit; ke cic charair arditabhinnadehāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:154.011c: ke cid visūtā vihayāś ca ke cid; vaikartanenāśu kṛtā babhūvuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:154.012a: avindamānās tv atha śarma saṃkhye; yaudhiṣṭhiraṃ te balam anvapadyan
GE07mbh_07_u:154.012c: tān prekṣya bhagnān vimukhīkṛtāṃś ca; ghaṭotkaco roṣam atīva cakre
GE07mbh_07_u:154.013a: āsthāya taṃ kāñcanaratnacitraṃ; rathottamaṃ siṃha ivonnanāda
GE07mbh_07_u:154.013c: vaikartanaṃ karṇam upetya cāpi; vivyādha vajrapratimaiḥ pṛṣatkaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:154.014a: tau karṇinārācaśilīmukhaiś ca; nālīkadaṇḍaiś ca savatsadantaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:154.014c: varāhakarṇaiḥ saviṣāṇaśṛṅgaiḥ; kṣurapravarṣaiś ca vinedatuḥ kham
GE07mbh_07_u:154.015a: tad bāṇadhārāvṛtam antarikṣaṃ; tiryaggatābhiḥ samare rarāja
GE07mbh_07_u:154.016a: samaṃ hi tāv apratimaprabhāvāv; anyonyam ājaghnatur uttamāstraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:154.016c: tayor hi vīrottamayor na kaś cid; dadarśa tasmin samare viśeṣam
GE07mbh_07_u:154.017a: atīva tac citram atīva rūpaṃ; babhūva yuddhaṃ ravibhīmasūnvoḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:154.018a: ghaṭotkaco yadā karṇaṃ na viśeṣayate nṛpa
GE07mbh_07_u:154.019a: tenāstreṇa hayān pūrvaṃ hatvā karṇasya rākṣasaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:154.020a: tathā hy antarhite tasmin kūṭayodhini rākṣase
GE07mbh_07_u:154.020c: māmakaiḥ pratipannaṃ yat tan mamācakṣva saṃjaya
GE07mbh_07_u:154.021a: antarhitaṃ rākṣasaṃ taṃ viditvā; saṃprākrośan kuravaḥ eva
GE07mbh_07_u:154.021c: kathaṃ nāyaṃ rākṣasaḥ kūṭayodhī; hanyāt karṇaṃ samare 'dṛśyamānaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:154.022a: tataḥ karṇo laghucitrāstrayodhī; sarvā diśo vyāvṛṇod bāṇajālaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:154.022c: na vai kiṃ cid vyāpatat tatra bhūtaṃ; tamobhūte sāyakair antarikṣe
GE07mbh_07_u:154.023a: na cādadāno na ca saṃdadhāno; na ceṣudhī spṛśamānaḥ karāgraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:154.023c: adṛśyad vai lāghavāt sūtaputraḥ; sarvaṃ bāṇaiś chādayāno 'ntarikṣam
GE07mbh_07_u:154.024a: tato māyāṃ vihitām antarikṣe; ghorāṃ bhīmāṃ dāruṇāṃ rākṣasena
GE07mbh_07_u:154.025a: tatas tasyā vidyutaḥ prādurāsann; ulkāś cāpi jvalitāḥ kauravendra
GE07mbh_07_u:154.025c: ghoṣaś cānyaḥ prādurāsīt sughoraḥ; sahasraśo nadatāṃ dundubhīnām
GE07mbh_07_u:154.026a: tataḥ śarāḥ prāpatan rukmapuṅkhāḥ; śaktyaḥ prāsā musalāny āyudhāni
GE07mbh_07_u:154.026c: paraśvadhās tailadhautāś ca khaḍgāḥ; pradīptāgrāḥ paṭṭiśās tomarāś ca
GE07mbh_07_u:154.027a: mayūkhinaḥ parighā lohabaddhā; gadāś citrāḥ śitadhārāś ca śūlāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:154.027c: gurvyo gadā hemapaṭṭāvanaddhāḥ; śataghnyaś ca prādurāsan samantāt
GE07mbh_07_u:154.028a: mahāśilāś cāpataṃs tatra tatra; sahasraśaḥ sāśanayaḥ savajrāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:154.029c: vṛṣṭiṃ viśālāṃ jvalitāṃ patantīṃ; karṇaḥ śaraughair na śaśāka hantum
GE07mbh_07_u:154.030a: śarāhatānāṃ patatāṃ hayānāṃ; vajrāhatānāṃ patatāṃ gajānām
GE07mbh_07_u:154.030c: śilāhatānāṃ ca mahārathānāṃ; mahān ninādaḥ patatāṃ babhūva
GE07mbh_07_u:154.031c: dauryodhanaṃ tad balam ārtarūpam; āvartamānaṃ dadṛśe bhramantam
GE07mbh_07_u:154.032c: te tv āryabhāvāt puruṣapravīrāḥ; parāṅmukhā na babhūvus tadānīm
GE07mbh_07_u:154.033a: tāṃ rākṣasīṃ ghoratarāṃ subhīmāṃ; vṛṣṭiṃ mahāśastramayīṃ patantīm
GE07mbh_07_u:154.033c: dṛṣṭvā balaughāṃś ca nipātyamānān; mahad bhayaṃ tava putrān viveśa
GE07mbh_07_u:154.034a: śivāś ca vaiśvānaradīptajihvāḥ; subhīmanādāḥ śataśo nadantyaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:154.034c: rakṣogaṇān nardataś cābhivīkṣya; narendrayodhā vyathitā babhūvuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:154.035c: nabhogatāḥ śaktiviṣaktahastā; meghā vyamuñcann iva vṛṣṭimārgam
GE07mbh_07_u:154.036a: tair āhatās te śaraśaktiśūlair; gadābhir ugraiḥ parighaiś ca dīptaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:154.036c: vajraiḥ pinākair aśaniprahāraiś; cakraiḥ śataghnyunmathitāś ca petuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:154.037a: huḍā bhuśuṇḍyo 'śmaguḍāḥ śataghnyaḥ; sthūṇāś ca kārṣṇāyasapaṭṭanaddhāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:154.037c: avākiraṃs tava putrasya sainyaṃ; tathā raudraṃ kaśmalaṃ prādurāsīt
GE07mbh_07_u:154.038a: niṣkīrṇāntrā vihatair uttamāṅgaiḥ; saṃbhagnāṅgāḥ śerate tatra śūrāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:154.038c: bhinnā hayāḥ kuñjarāś cāvabhagnāḥ; saṃcūrṇitāś caiva rathāḥ śilābhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:154.039a: evaṃ mahac chastravarṣaṃ sṛjantas; te yātudhānā bhuvi ghorarūpāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:154.039c: māyāḥ sṛṣṭās tatra ghaṭotkacena; nāmuñcan vai yācamānaṃ na bhītam
GE07mbh_07_u:154.040a: tasmin ghore kuruvīrāvamarde; kālotsṛṣṭe kṣatriyāṇām abhāve
GE07mbh_07_u:154.040c: te vai bhagnāḥ sahasā vyadravanta; prākrośantaḥ kauravāḥ sarva eva
GE07mbh_07_u:154.041a: palāyadhvaṃ kuravo naitad asti; sendrā devā ghnanti naḥ pāṇḍavārthe
GE07mbh_07_u:154.041c: tathā teṣāṃ majjatāṃ bhāratānāṃ; na sma dvīpas tatra kaś cid babhūva
GE07mbh_07_u:154.042a: tasmin saṃkrande tumule vartamāne; sainye bhagne līyamāne kurūṇām
GE07mbh_07_u:154.042c: anīkānāṃ pravibhāge 'prakāśe; na jñāyante kuravo netare vā
GE07mbh_07_u:154.043a: nirmaryāde vidrave ghorarūpe; sarvā diśaḥ prekṣamāṇāḥ sma śūnyāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:154.043c: tāṃ śastravṛṣṭim urasā gāhamānaṃ; karṇaṃ caikaṃ tatra rājann apaśyam
GE07mbh_07_u:154.044a: tato bāṇair āvṛṇod antarikṣaṃ; divyāṃ māyāṃ yodhayan rākṣasasya
GE07mbh_07_u:154.044c: hrīmān kurvan duṣkaram āryakarma; naivāmuhyat saṃyuge sūtaputraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:154.045a: tato bhītāḥ samudaikṣanta karṇaṃ; rājan sarve saindhavā bāhlikāś ca
GE07mbh_07_u:154.045c: asaṃmohaṃ pūjayanto 'sya saṃkhye; saṃpaśyanto vijayaṃ rākṣasasya
GE07mbh_07_u:154.046a: tenotsṛṣṭā cakrayuktā śataghnī; samaṃ sarvāṃś caturo 'śvāñ jaghāna
GE07mbh_07_u:154.046c: te jānubhir jagatīm anvapadyan; gatāsavo nirdaśanākṣijihvāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:154.047a: tato hatāśvād avaruhya vāhād; antarmanāḥ kuruṣu prādravatsu
GE07mbh_07_u:154.047c: divye cāstre māyayā vadhyamāne; naivāmuhyac cintayan prāptakālam
GE07mbh_07_u:154.048a: tato 'bruvan kuravaḥ sarva eva; karṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā ghorarūpāṃ ca māyām
GE07mbh_07_u:154.048c: śaktyā rakṣo jahi karṇādya tūrṇaṃ; naśyanty ete kuravo dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:154.049a: kariṣyataḥ kiṃ ca no bhīmapārthau; tapantam enaṃ jahi rakṣo niśīthe
GE07mbh_07_u:154.049c: yo naḥ saṃgrāmād ghorarūpād vimucyet; sa naḥ pārthān samare yodhayeta
GE07mbh_07_u:154.050a: tasmād enaṃ rākṣasaṃ ghorarūpaṃ; jahi śaktyā dattayā vāsavena
GE07mbh_07_u:154.050c: mā kauravāḥ sarva evendrakalpā; rātrīmukhe karṇa neśuḥ sayodhāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:154.051a: sa vadhyamāno rakṣasā vai niśīthe; dṛṣṭvā rājan naśyamānaṃ balaṃ ca
GE07mbh_07_u:154.051c: mahac ca śrutvā ninadaṃ kauravāṇāṃ; matiṃ dadhre śaktimokṣāya karṇaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:154.051d-1239_02: rājan dṛṣṭvā vidrutaṃ te balaṃ ca
GE07mbh_07_u:154.052a: sa vai kruddhaḥ siṃha ivātyamarṣī; nāmarṣayat pratighātaṃ raṇe tam
GE07mbh_07_u:154.052c: śaktiṃ śreṣṭhāṃ vaijayantīm asahyāṃ; samādade tasya vadhaṃ cikīrṣan
GE07mbh_07_u:154.053a: yāsau rājan nihitā varṣapūgān; vadhāyājau satkṛtā phalgunasya
GE07mbh_07_u:154.053c: yāṃ vai prādāt sūtaputrāya śakraḥ; śaktiṃ śreṣṭhāṃ kuṇḍalābhyāṃ nimāya
GE07mbh_07_u:154.054a: tāṃ vai śaktiṃ lelihānāṃ pradīptāṃ; pāśair yuktām antakasyeva rātrim
GE07mbh_07_u:154.054c: mṛtyoḥ svasāraṃ jvalitām ivolkāṃ; vaikartanaḥ prāhiṇod rākṣasāya
GE07mbh_07_u:154.055a: tām uttamāṃ parakāyāpahantrīṃ; dṛṣṭvā sauter bāhusaṃsthāṃ jvalantīm
GE07mbh_07_u:154.055c: bhītaṃ rakṣo vipradudrāva rājan; kṛtvātmānaṃ vindhyapādapramāṇam
GE07mbh_07_u:154.056a: dṛṣṭvā śaktiṃ karṇabāhvantarasthāṃ; nedur bhūtāny antarikṣe narendra
GE07mbh_07_u:154.056c: vavur vātās tumulāś cāpi rājan; sanirghātā cāśānir gāṃ jagāma
GE07mbh_07_u:154.057a: sā tāṃ māyāṃ bhasma kṛtvā jvalantī; bhittvā gāḍhaṃ hṛdayaṃ rākṣasasya
GE07mbh_07_u:154.057c: ūrdhvaṃ yayau dīpyamānā niśāyāṃ; nakṣatrāṇām antarāṇy āviśantī
GE07mbh_07_u:154.058a: yuddhvā citrair vividhaiḥ śastrapūgair; divyair vīro mānuṣai rākṣasaiś ca
GE07mbh_07_u:154.058c: nadan nādān vividhān bhairavāṃś ca; prāṇān iṣṭāṃs tyājitaḥ śakraśaktyā
GE07mbh_07_u:154.059a: idaṃ cānyac citram āścaryarūpaṃ; cakārāsau karma śatrukṣayāya
GE07mbh_07_u:154.059c: tasmin kāle śaktinirbhinnamarmā; babhau rājan meghaśailaprakāśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:154.060a: tato 'ntarikṣād apatad gatāsuḥ; sa rākṣasendro bhuvi bhinnadehaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:154.060c: avākśirāḥ stabdhagātro vijihvo; ghaṭotkaco mahad āsthāya rūpam
GE07mbh_07_u:154.061a: sa tad rūpaṃ bhairavaṃ bhīmakarmā; bhīmaṃ kṛtvā bhaimaseniḥ papāta
GE07mbh_07_u:154.061c: hato 'py evaṃ tava sainyekadeśam; apothayat kauravān bhīṣayāṇaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:154.062a: tato miśrāḥ prāṇadan siṃhanādair; bheryaḥ śaṅkhā murajāś cānakāś ca
GE07mbh_07_u:154.062c: dagdhāṃ māyāṃ nihataṃ rākṣasaṃ ca; dṛṣṭvā hṛṣṭāḥ prāṇadan kauraveyāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:154.063a: tataḥ karṇaḥ kurubhiḥ pūjyamāno; yathā śakro vṛtravadhe marudbhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:154.063c: anvārūḍhas tava putraṃ rathasthaṃ; hṛṣṭaś cāpi prāviśat svaṃ sa sainyam dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:155.000-1242_06: saumadatter vadhād droṇam āyattaṃ saindhavasya ca
GE07mbh_07_u:155.000-1242_11: drauṇikarṇakṛpās tāta te hy akurvan kim āhave
GE07mbh_07_u:155.000-1242_13: ārchatāṃ māmakān yuddhe kathaṃ saṃjaya śaṃsa me
GE07mbh_07_u:155.000-1242_15: amarṣitāś ca saṃkruddhā raṇaṃ cakruḥ kathaṃ yudhi
GE07mbh_07_u:155.001a: haiḍimbaṃ nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā vikīrṇam iva parvatam

GE07mbh_07_u:155.004a: tato vinirbhrāmya punaḥ pārtham āsphoṭya cāsakṛt
GE07mbh_07_u:155.005c-1244_01: praharṣaṃ tasya taṃ jñātvā keśavasya dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:155.006c: śokasthāne pare prāpte haiḍimbasya vadhena vai
GE07mbh_07_u:155.007a: vimukhāni ca sainyāni hataṃ dṛṣṭvā ghaṭotkacam
GE07mbh_07_u:155.007c: vayaṃ ca bhṛśam āvignā haiḍimbasya nipātanāt
GE07mbh_07_u:155.008a: naitat kāraṇam alpaṃ hi bhaviṣyati janārdana
GE07mbh_07_u:155.008c: tad adya śaṃsa me pṛṣṭaḥ satyaṃ satyavatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_07_u:155.009a: yady etan na rahasyaṃ te vaktum arhasy ariṃdama
GE07mbh_07_u:155.009b-1245_01: vyasanasya sati sthāne na prahṛṣyanti mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:155.009b-1245_02: harṣasya saty api sthāne nolbaṇaṃ yānti paṇḍitāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:155.009c: dhairyasya vaikṛtaṃ brūhi tvam adya madhusūdana
GE07mbh_07_u:155.010c: tathaital lāghavaṃ manye tava karma janārdana
GE07mbh_07_u:155.011a: atiharṣam imaṃ prāptaṃ śṛṇu me tvaṃ dhanaṃjaya
GE07mbh_07_u:155.012c: karṇaṃ nihatam evājau viddhi sadyo dhanaṃjaya
GE07mbh_07_u:155.013a: śaktihastaṃ punaḥ karṇaṃ ko loke 'sti pumān iha
GE07mbh_07_u:155.013c: ya enam abhitas tiṣṭhet kārttikeyam ivāhave
GE07mbh_07_u:155.014c: diṣṭyā ca vyaṃsitā śaktir amoghāsya ghaṭotkace
GE07mbh_07_u:155.015a: yadi hi syāt sakavacas tathaiva ca sakuṇḍalaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:155.015c: sāmarān api lokāṃs trīn ekaḥ karṇo jayed balī
GE07mbh_07_u:155.016a: vāsavo vā kubero vā varuṇo vā jaleśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:155.016c: yamo vā notsahet karṇaṃ raṇe pratisamāsitum
GE07mbh_07_u:155.017a: gāṇḍīvam āyamya bhavāṃś cakraṃ vāhaṃ sudarśanam

GE07mbh_07_u:155.021a: yadā prabhṛti karṇāya śaktir dattā mahātmanā
GE07mbh_07_u:155.022c: tāṃ prāpyāmanyata vṛṣā satataṃ tvāṃ hataṃ raṇe

GE07mbh_07_u:155.024c: ripuṣv api dayāvāṃś ca tasmāt karṇo vṛṣā smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:155.026a: madhyaṃgata ivādityo yo na śakyo nirīkṣitum
GE07mbh_07_u:155.027a: tapānte toyado yadvac charadhārāḥ kṣaraty asau
GE07mbh_07_u:155.027d-1247_01: aśakyas tad ayaṃ jetuṃ sravadbhir māṃsaśoṇitam
GE07mbh_07_u:155.027d-1247_02: kavacena vihīnaś ca kuṇḍalābhyāṃ ca pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_07_u:155.027d-1248_01: tenādityaṃ nirudhyed yaḥ śaravarṣaiś ca vṛṣṭimān
GE07mbh_07_u:155.028a: eko hi yogo 'sya bhaved vadhāya; chidre hy enaṃ svapramattaḥ pramattam
GE07mbh_07_u:155.028c: kṛcchraprāptaṃ rathacakre nimagne; hanyāḥ pūrvaṃ tvaṃ tu saṃjñāṃ vicārya
GE07mbh_07_u:155.028d-1250_01: na hy udyatāstraṃ yudhi hanyād ajayyam
GE07mbh_07_u:155.029a: jarāsaṃdhaś cedirājo mahātmā; mahābalaś caikalavyo niṣādaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:155.029c: ekaikaśo nihatāḥ sarva eva; yogais tais tais tvaddhitārthaṃ mayaiva
GE07mbh_07_u:156.001a: katham asmaddhitārthaṃ te kaiś ca yogair janārdana

GE07mbh_07_u:156.004a: te hi vīrā mahātmānaḥ kṛtāstrā dṛḍhayodhinaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:156.004c: dhārtarāṣṭrīṃ camūṃ kṛtsnāṃ rakṣeyur amarā iva
GE07mbh_07_u:156.006a: yogair api hatā yais te tān me śṛṇu dhanaṃjaya
GE07mbh_07_u:156.006c: ajayyā hi vinā yogair mṛdhe te daivatair api
GE07mbh_07_u:156.007a: ekaiko hi pṛthak teṣāṃ samastāṃ suravāhinīm
GE07mbh_07_u:156.012a: tatra sma rākṣasī ghorā jarā nāmāśuvikramā
GE07mbh_07_u:156.012c: saṃdhayām āsa taṃ jātaṃ jarāsaṃdham ariṃdamam
GE07mbh_07_u:156.013a: dvābhyāṃ jāto hi mātṛbhyām ardhadehaḥ pṛthak pṛthak
GE07mbh_07_u:156.013c: tayā sa saṃdhito yasmāj jarāsaṃdhas tataḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:156.014a: sā tu bhūmigatā pārtha hatā sasutabāndhavā
GE07mbh_07_u:156.016a: yadi hi syād gadāpāṇir jarāsaṃdhaḥ pratāpavān

GE07mbh_07_u:156.018c: asyann eko vanacaro babhau rāma ivāparaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:156.019c: sarākṣasoragāḥ pārtha vijetuṃ yudhi karhi cit
GE07mbh_07_u:156.020a: kim u mānuṣamātreṇa śakyaḥ syāt prativīkṣitum

GE07mbh_07_u:156.021c: cedirājaś ca vikrāntaḥ pratyakṣaṃ nihatas tava

GE07mbh_07_u:156.022c: vadhārthaṃ tasya jāto 'ham anyeṣāṃ ca suradviṣām
GE07mbh_07_u:156.024c: haiḍimbaś cāpy upāyena śaktyā karṇena ghātitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:156.025a: yadi hy enaṃ nāhaniṣyat karṇaḥ śaktyā mahāmṛdhe
GE07mbh_07_u:156.026a: mayā na nihataḥ pūrvam eṣa yuṣmatpriyepsayā

GE07mbh_07_u:156.027a: dharmasya loptā pāpātmā tasmād eṣa nipātitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:156.028a: ye hi dharmasya loptāro vadhyās te mama pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_07_u:156.029a: brahma satyaṃ damaḥ śaucaṃ dharmo hrīḥ śrīr dhṛtiḥ kṣamā
GE07mbh_07_u:156.029c: yatra tatra rame nityam ahaṃ satyena te śape
GE07mbh_07_u:156.030a: na viṣādas tvayā kāryaḥ karṇaṃ vaikartanaṃ prati
GE07mbh_07_u:156.030c: upadekṣyāmy upāyaṃ te yena taṃ prasahiṣyasi
GE07mbh_07_u:156.031c: tasya cāpi vadhopāyaṃ vakṣyāmi tava pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_07_u:156.032a: vardhate tumulas tv eṣa śabdaḥ paracamūṃ prati
GE07mbh_07_u:156.032c: vidravanti ca sainyāni tvadīyāni diśo daśa
GE07mbh_07_u:156.033a: labdhalakṣyā hi kauravyā vidhamanti camūṃ tava
GE07mbh_07_u:156.033c: dahaty eṣa ca vaḥ sainyaṃ droṇaḥ praharatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:157.001c: kasmāt sarvān samutsṛjya sa tāṃ pārthe na muktavān
GE07mbh_07_u:157.002a: tasmin hate hatā hi syuḥ sarve pāṇḍavasṛñjayāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:157.002c: ekavīravadhe kasmān na yuddhe jayam ādadhat
GE07mbh_07_u:157.003a: āhūto na nivarteyam iti tasya mahāvratam
GE07mbh_07_u:157.004c: na jaghāna vṛṣā kasmāt tan mamācakṣva saṃjaya
GE07mbh_07_u:157.005a: nūnaṃ buddhivihīnaś cāpy asahāyaś ca me sutaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:157.005c: śatrubhir vyaṃsitopāyaḥ kathaṃ nu sa jayed arīn
GE07mbh_07_u:157.006a: yā hy asya paramā śaktir jayasya ca parāyaṇam
GE07mbh_07_u:157.007a: kuṇer yathā hastagataṃ hriyed bilvaṃ balīyasā
GE07mbh_07_u:157.007c: tathā śaktir amoghā sā moghībhūtā ghaṭotkace
GE07mbh_07_u:157.008a: yathā varāhasya śunaś ca yudhyatos; tayor abhāve śvapacasya lābhaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:157.008c: manye vidvan vāsudevasya tadvad; yuddhe lābhaḥ karṇahaiḍimbayor vai
GE07mbh_07_u:157.009a: ghaṭotkaco yadi hanyād dhi karṇaṃ; paro lābhaḥ sa bhavet pāṇḍavānām
GE07mbh_07_u:157.009c: vaikartano vā yadi taṃ nihanyāt; tathāpi kṛtyaṃ śaktināśāt kṛtaṃ syāt
GE07mbh_07_u:157.010a: iti prājñaḥ prajñayaitad vicārya; ghaṭotkacaṃ sūtaputreṇa yuddhe
GE07mbh_07_u:157.010c: ayodhayad vāsudevo nṛsiṃhaḥ; priyaṃ kurvan pāṇḍavānāṃ hitaṃ ca
GE07mbh_07_u:157.011a: etac cikīrṣitaṃ jñātvā karṇe madhunihā nṛpa
GE07mbh_07_u:157.013a: tadaiva kṛtakāryā hi vayaṃ syāma kurūdvaha
GE07mbh_07_u:157.013c: na rakṣed yadi kṛṣṇas taṃ pārthaṃ karṇān mahārathāt

GE07mbh_07_u:157.015c: jayaty abhimukhaḥ śatrūn pārthaḥ kṛṣṇena pālitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:157.016c: hanyāt kṣiptā hi kaunteyaṃ śaktir vṛkṣam ivāśaniḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:157.017a: virodhī ca kumantrī ca prājñamānī mamātmajaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:157.017d-1252_01: sa vā karṇo mahābuddhiḥ sarvaśastrabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:157.017d-1252_02: na muktavān kathaṃ sūta tām amoghāṃ dhanaṃjaye

GE07mbh_07_u:157.021a: atha vā nihate pārthe pāṇḍuṣv anyatamaṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:157.021c: sthāpayed yudhi vārṣṇeyas tasmāt kṛṣṇo nipātyatām
GE07mbh_07_u:157.022a: kṛṣṇo hi mūlaṃ pāṇḍūnāṃ pārthaḥ skandha ivodgataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:157.023c: kṛṣṇaḥ parāyaṇaṃ caiṣāṃ jyotiṣām iva candramāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:157.024a: tasmāt parṇāni śākhāś ca skandhaṃ cotsṛjya sūtaja
GE07mbh_07_u:157.024c: kṛṣṇaṃ nikṛndhi pāṇḍūnāṃ mūlaṃ sarvatra sarvadā
GE07mbh_07_u:157.025a: hanyād yadi hi dāśārhaṃ karṇo yādavanandanam
GE07mbh_07_u:157.025c: kṛtsnā vasumatī rājan vaśe te syān na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:157.025d-1253_01: sā tu buddhiḥ kṛtā rājan kṛṣṇaṃ prati nareśvara
GE07mbh_07_u:157.026a: yadi hi sa nihataḥ śayīta bhūmau; yadukulapāṇḍavanandano mahātmā
GE07mbh_07_u:157.026c: nanu tava vasudhā narendra sarvā; sagirisamudravanā vaśaṃ vrajeta
GE07mbh_07_u:157.027a: sā tu buddhiḥ kṛtāpy evaṃ jāgrati tridaśeśvare
GE07mbh_07_u:157.028a: arjunaṃ cāpi kaunteyaṃ sadā rakṣati keśavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:157.028c: na hy enam aicchat pramukhe sauteḥ sthāpayituṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:157.029c: amoghāṃ tāṃ kathaṃ śaktiṃ moghāṃ kuryām iti prabho
GE07mbh_07_u:157.029d-1254_01: yaś caivaṃ rakṣate pārthaṃ karṇāt kṛṣṇo mahāmanāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:157.029d-1254_02: ātmānaṃ sa kathaṃ rājan na rakṣet puruṣottamaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:157.029d-1254_04: na so 'sti triṣu lokeṣu yo jayeta janārdanam
GE07mbh_07_u:157.031a: ayaṃ ca pratyayaḥ karṇe śaktyā cāmitavikrama

GE07mbh_07_u:157.034c: sa hi teṣām atiyaśā devānām iva vāsavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:157.035a: tasmin vinihate sarve pāṇḍavāḥ sṛñjayaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_07_u:157.035d-1255_01: ṛte mahātmanaḥ pārthāt karṇena nihatā dhruvam
GE07mbh_07_u:157.036c: hṛdi nityaṃ tu karṇasya vadho gāṇḍīvadhanvanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:157.037a: aham eva tu rādheyaṃ mohayāmi yudhāṃ vara
GE07mbh_07_u:157.038a: phalgunasya hi tāṃ mṛtyum avagamya yuyutsataḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:157.039a: ghaṭotkace vyaṃsitāṃ tu dṛṣṭvā tāṃ śinipuṃgava
GE07mbh_07_u:157.039c: mṛtyor āsyāntarān muktaṃ paśyāmy adya dhanaṃjayam
GE07mbh_07_u:157.040a: na pitā na ca me mātā na yūyaṃ bhrātaras tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:157.040c: na ca prāṇās tathā rakṣyā yathā bībhatsur āhave
GE07mbh_07_u:157.041a: trailokyarājyād yat kiṃ cid bhaved anyat sudurlabham
GE07mbh_07_u:157.041c: neccheyaṃ sātvatāhaṃ tad vinā pārthaṃ dhanaṃjayam
GE07mbh_07_u:157.042c: mṛtaṃ pratyāgatam iva dṛṣṭvā pārthaṃ dhanaṃjayam
GE07mbh_07_u:157.043a: ataś ca prahito yuddhe mayā karṇāya rākṣasaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:157.043c: na hy anyaḥ samare rātrau śaktaḥ karṇaṃ prabādhitum sātyakir uvāca
GE07mbh_07_u:157.043d-1256_01: dhruvas tasya jayo nityaṃ dīrgham āyuḥ pravartate
GE07mbh_07_u:157.043d-1256_02: yasya tvaṃ puruṣavyāghra śivāya satataṃ sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:158.001c: apanītaṃ mahat tāta tava caiva viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:158.002a: yad ājānīta tāṃ śaktim ekaghnīṃ satataṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:158.002c: anivāryām asahyāṃ ca devair api savāsavaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:158.003a: sā kimarthaṃ na karṇena pravṛtte samare purā
GE07mbh_07_u:158.003c: na devakīsute muktā phalgune vāpi saṃjaya
GE07mbh_07_u:158.004a: saṃgrāmād vinivṛttānāṃ sarveṣāṃ no viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:158.005c: śaktir eṣā vimoktavyā karṇa karṇeti nityaśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:158.006c: anyeṣāṃ caiva yodhānāṃ sā buddhir naśyate punaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:158.007a: daivam eva paraṃ manye yat karṇo hastasaṃsthayā
GE07mbh_07_u:158.007c: na jaghāna raṇe pārthaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ vā devakīsutam
GE07mbh_07_u:158.009c: pārthe vā śakrakalpe vai vadhārthaṃ vāsavīṃ prabho
GE07mbh_07_u:158.010a: daivenaiva hatā yūyaṃ svabuddhyā keśavasya ca
GE07mbh_07_u:158.010c: gatā hi vāsavī hatvā tṛṇabhūtaṃ ghaṭotkacam
GE07mbh_07_u:158.011a: karṇaś ca mama putrāś ca sarve cānye ca pārthivāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:158.012a: bhūya eva tu me śaṃsa yathā yuddham avartata
GE07mbh_07_u:158.012c: kurūṇāṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ ca haiḍimbe nihate tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:158.013a: ye ca te 'bhyadravan droṇaṃ vyūḍhānīkāḥ prahāriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:158.013c: sṛñjayāḥ saha pāñcālais te 'py akurvan kathaṃ raṇam
GE07mbh_07_u:158.014a: saumadatter vadhād droṇam āyastaṃ saindhavasya ca
GE07mbh_07_u:158.016c: drauṇikarṇakṛpās tāta te 'py akurvan kim āhave
GE07mbh_07_u:158.017c: samārchan māmakā yuddhe kathaṃ saṃjaya śaṃsa me
GE07mbh_07_u:158.018c: amarṣitāḥ susaṃkruddhā raṇaṃ cakruḥ kathaṃ niśi
GE07mbh_07_u:158.019a: hate ghaṭotkace rājan karṇena niśi rākṣase
GE07mbh_07_u:158.020a: āpatatsu ca vegena vadhyamāne bale 'pi ca
GE07mbh_07_u:158.020c: vigāḍhāyāṃ rajanyāṃ ca rājā dainyaṃ paraṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:158.022c: aśrupūrṇamukho rājā niḥśvasaṃś ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:158.022e: kaśmalaṃ prāviśad ghoraṃ dṛṣṭvā karṇasya vikramam
GE07mbh_07_u:158.023a: taṃ tathā vyathitaṃ dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇo vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_07_u:158.023c: mā vyathāṃ kuru kaunteya naitat tvayy upapadyate
GE07mbh_07_u:158.024a: uttiṣṭha rājan yudhyasva vaha gurvīṃ dhuraṃ vibho
GE07mbh_07_u:158.024c: tvayi vaiklavyam āpanne saṃśayo vijaye bhavet
GE07mbh_07_u:158.025c: vimṛjya netre pāṇibhyāṃ kṛṣṇaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_07_u:158.026a: viditā te mahābāho dharmāṇāṃ paramā gatiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:158.027c: bālenāpi satā tena kṛtaṃ sāhyaṃ janārdana
GE07mbh_07_u:158.028b-1257_01: āgamya sa sahāyena kṛtā rakṣā mahātmanā
GE07mbh_07_u:158.028b-1257_03: asya pāpasya mokṣaṃ hi kathaṃ yāsyāmi mādhava
GE07mbh_07_u:158.028c: asau kṛṣṇa maheṣvāsaḥ kāmyake mām upasthitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:158.028e: uṣitaś ca sahāsmābhir yāvan nāsīd dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:158.029d-1258_01: diśāṃ hi vijaye kṛṣṇa sahadevasya cājñayā
GE07mbh_07_u:158.029d-1258_02: laṅkāṃ tu gatvā paulastyaḥ karaṃ vai dāpito balāt
GE07mbh_07_u:158.030a: ārambhāc caiva yuddhānāṃ yad eṣa kṛtavān prabho
GE07mbh_07_u:158.030c: madarthaṃ duṣkaraṃ karma kṛtaṃ tena mahātmanā
GE07mbh_07_u:158.031a: svabhāvād yā ca me prītiḥ sahadeve janārdana
GE07mbh_07_u:158.031c: saiva me dviguṇā prītī rākṣasendre ghaṭotkace
GE07mbh_07_u:158.032a: bhaktaś ca me mahābāhuḥ priyo 'syāhaṃ priyaś ca me
GE07mbh_07_u:158.033c: droṇakarṇau ca saṃyattau paśya yuddhe mahārathau
GE07mbh_07_u:158.034a: niśīthe pāṇḍavaṃ sainyam ābhyāṃ paśya pramarditam
GE07mbh_07_u:158.034c: gajābhyām iva mattābhyāṃ yathā naḍavanaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_07_u:158.035c: citrāstratāṃ ca pārthasya vikramante sma kauravāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:158.036a: eṣa droṇaś ca karṇaś ca rājā caiva suyodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:158.036c: nihatya rākṣasaṃ yuddhe hṛṣṭā nardanti saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:158.037a: katham asmāsu jīvatsu tvayi caiva janārdana
GE07mbh_07_u:158.039c: nāsīt tatra raṇe kṛṣṇa savyasācī mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:158.040a: niruddhāś ca vayaṃ sarve saindhavena durātmanā
GE07mbh_07_u:158.040c: nimittam abhavad droṇaḥ saputras tatra karmaṇi
GE07mbh_07_u:158.041c: vyāyacchataś ca khaḍgena dvidhā khaḍgaṃ cakāra ha
GE07mbh_07_u:158.043a: alpe ca kāraṇe kṛṣṇa hato gāṇḍīvadhanvanā
GE07mbh_07_u:158.043c: saindhavo yādavaśreṣṭha tac ca nātipriyaṃ mama
GE07mbh_07_u:158.044a: yadi śatruvadhe nyāyyo bhavet kartuṃ ca pāṇḍavaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:158.044c: droṇakarṇau raṇe pūrvaṃ hantavyāv iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:158.045a: etau mūlaṃ hi duḥkhānām asmākaṃ puruṣarṣabha
GE07mbh_07_u:158.046a: yatra vadhyo bhaved droṇaḥ sūtaputraś ca sānugaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:158.047a: avaśyaṃ tu mayā kāryaḥ sūtaputrasya nigrahaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:158.047c: tato yāsyāmy ahaṃ vīra svayaṃ karṇajighāṃsayā
GE07mbh_07_u:158.048a: evam uktvā yayau tūrṇaṃ tvaramāṇo yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:158.048c: sa visphārya mahac cāpaṃ śaṅkhaṃ pradhmāpya bhairavam
GE07mbh_07_u:158.049a: tato rathasahasreṇa gajānāṃ ca śatais tribhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:158.050a: tato bherīḥ samājaghnuḥ śaṅkhān dadhmuś ca daṃśitāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:158.052a: evam uktvā hṛṣīkeśaḥ śīghram aśvān acodayat
GE07mbh_07_u:158.052c: dūraṃ ca yātaṃ rājānam anvagacchaj janārdanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:158.054a: karṇam āsādya saṃgrāme diṣṭyā jīvati phalgunaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:158.055a: na cāgād dvairathaṃ jiṣṇur diṣṭyā taṃ bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_07_u:158.055c: sṛjetāṃ spardhināv etau divyāny astrāṇi sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:158.056c: vāsavīṃ samare śaktiṃ dhruvaṃ muñced yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_07_u:158.057a: tato bhavet te vyasanaṃ ghoraṃ bharatasattama
GE07mbh_07_u:158.057c: diṣṭyā rakṣo hataṃ yuddhe sūtaputreṇa mānada
GE07mbh_07_u:158.058a: vāsavīṃ kāraṇaṃ kṛtvā kālenāpahato hy asau
GE07mbh_07_u:158.058c: tavaiva kāraṇād rakṣo nihataṃ tāta saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:158.059a: mā krudho bharataśreṣṭha mā ca śoke manaḥ kṛthāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:158.059c: prāṇinām iha sarveṣām eṣā niṣṭhā yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_07_u:158.060a: bhrātṛbhiḥ sahitaḥ sarvaiḥ pārthivaiś ca mahātmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:158.060e: pañcame divase caiva pṛthivī te bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_07_u:158.061a: nityaṃ ca puruṣavyāghra dharmam eva vicintaya
GE07mbh_07_u:158.061c: ānṛśaṃsyaṃ tapo dānaṃ kṣamāṃ satyaṃ ca pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_07_u:158.062a: sevethāḥ paramaprīto yato dharmas tato jayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:158.062c: ity uktvā pāṇḍavaṃ vyāsas tatraivāntaradhīyata saṃjaya uvāca
GE07mbh_07_u:159.001a: ghaṭotkace tu nihate sūtaputreṇa tāṃ niśām
GE07mbh_07_u:159.002a: dṛṣṭva bhīmena mahatīṃ vāryamāṇāṃ camūṃ tava
GE07mbh_07_u:159.003c: saśaraḥ kavacī khaḍgī dhanvī ca paratāpanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:159.003e: abhidrava raṇe hṛṣṭo na ca te bhīḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_07_u:159.004a: janamejayaḥ śikhaṇḍī ca daurmukhiś ca yaśodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:159.006a: sātyakiḥ kekayāś caiva pāṇḍavaś ca dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:159.007a: tathaiva rathinaḥ sarve hastyaśvaṃ yac ca kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_07_u:159.007c: pādātāś ca raṇe droṇaṃ prāpayantu mahāratham
GE07mbh_07_u:159.008a: tathājñaptās tu te sarve pāṇḍavena mahātmanā
GE07mbh_07_u:159.012a: nidrāndhās te mahārāja pariśrāntāś ca saṃyuge
GE07mbh_07_u:159.012c: nābhyapadyanta samare kāṃ cic ceṣṭāṃ mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:159.013e: vadhyatāṃ ca tathā teṣāṃ kṣatānāṃ ca viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:159.014c: sarve hy āsan nirutsāhāḥ kṣatriyā dīnacetasaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:159.014e: tava caiva pareṣāṃ ca gatāstrā vigateṣavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:159.015a: te tathā pārayantaś ca hrīmantaś ca viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:159.015c: svadharmam anupaśyanto na jahuḥ svām anīkinīm
GE07mbh_07_u:159.016a: śastrāṇy anye samutsṛjya nidrāndhāḥ śerate janāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:159.016c: gajeṣv anye ratheṣv anye hayeṣv anye ca bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:159.017a: nidrāndhā no bubudhire kāṃ cic ceṣṭāṃ narādhipāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:159.018a: svapnāyamānās tv apare parān iti vicetasaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:159.018c: ātmānaṃ samare jaghnuḥ svān eva ca parān api
GE07mbh_07_u:159.019b-1261_01: asmākaṃ ca mahārāja parebhyo bahavo janāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:159.020a: saṃmardyānye raṇe ke cin nidrāndhāś ca parasparam
GE07mbh_07_u:159.020c: jaghnuḥ śūrā raṇe rājaṃs tasmiṃs tamasi dāruṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:159.022c: uvāca vākyaṃ bībhatsur uccaiḥ saṃnādayan diśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:159.023a: śrāntā bhavanto nidrāndhāḥ sarva eva savāhanāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:159.023c: tamasā cāvṛte sainye rajasā bahulena ca
GE07mbh_07_u:159.024a: te yūyaṃ yadi manyadhvam upāramata sainikāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:159.025a: tato vinidrā viśrāntāś candramasy udite punaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:159.026a: tad vacaḥ sarvadharmajñā dhārmikasya niśamya te
GE07mbh_07_u:159.027a: cukruśuḥ karṇa karṇeti rājan duryodhaneti ca
GE07mbh_07_u:159.028c: upāramata pāṇḍūnāṃ senā tava ca bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:159.029a: tām asya vācaṃ devāś ca ṛṣayaś ca mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:159.031a: sā tu saṃprāpya viśrāmaṃ dhvajinī tava bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:159.032c: dharmas tvayi mahābāho dayā bhūteṣu cānagha
GE07mbh_07_u:159.033a: yac cāśvastās tavecchāmaḥ śarma pārtha tad astu te
GE07mbh_07_u:159.033c: manasaś ca priyān arthān vīra kṣipram avāpnuhi
GE07mbh_07_u:159.034a: iti te taṃ naravyāghraṃ praśaṃsanto mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:159.034c: nidrayā samavākṣiptās tūṣṇīm āsan viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:159.036c: saprāsakavacāś cānye narāḥ suptāḥ pṛthak pṛthak
GE07mbh_07_u:159.039a: samāṃ ca viṣamāṃ cakruḥ khurāgrair vikṣatāṃ mahīm
GE07mbh_07_u:159.039e: suṣupus tatra rājendra yuktā vāheṣu sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:159.039f-1262_01: evaṃ hayāś ca nāgāś ca yodhāś ca bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_07_u:159.040a: tat tathā nidrayā bhagnam avācam asvapad balam
GE07mbh_07_u:159.040c: kuśalair iva vinyastaṃ paṭe citram ivādbhutam
GE07mbh_07_u:159.041a: te kṣatriyāḥ kuṇḍalino yuvānaḥ; parasparaṃ sāyakavikṣatāṅgāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:159.041c: kumbheṣu līnāḥ suṣupur gajānāṃ; kuceṣu lagnā iva kāminīnām
GE07mbh_07_u:159.042c: netrānandena candreṇa māhendrī dig alaṃkṛtā daśaśatākṣakakubdariniḥsṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:159.043c: aruṇaṃ darśayām āsa grasañ jyotiḥprabhaṃ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:159.044c: raśmijālaṃ mahac candro mandaṃ mandam avāsṛjat
GE07mbh_07_u:159.045c: paryagacchañ śanaiḥ sarvā diśaḥ khaṃ ca kṣitiṃ tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:159.046c: aprakhyam aprakāśaṃ ca jagāmāśu tamas tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:159.047c: vicerur na viceruś ca rājan naktaṃcarās tataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:159.048a: bodhyamānaṃ tu tat sainyaṃ rājaṃś candrasya raśmibhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:159.050a: tataḥ pravavṛte yuddhaṃ punar eva viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:160.003a: tat tu marṣitam asmābhir bhavataḥ priyakāmyayā
GE07mbh_07_u:160.004a: sarvathā parihīnāḥ sma tejasā ca balena ca
GE07mbh_07_u:160.004c: bhavatā pālyamānās te vivardhante punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:160.005a: divyāny astrāṇi sarvāṇi brahmāstrādīni yāny api
GE07mbh_07_u:160.005c: tāni sarvāṇi tiṣṭhanti bhavaty eva viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:160.006a: na pāṇḍaveyā na vayaṃ nānye loke dhanurdharāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:160.006c: yudhyamānasya te tulyāḥ satyam etad bravīmi te
GE07mbh_07_u:160.007c: sarvāstravid bhavān hanyād divyair astrair na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:160.008a: sa bhavān marṣayaty enāṃs tvatto bhītān viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:160.008c: śiṣyatvaṃ vā puraskṛtya mama vā mandabhāgyatām
GE07mbh_07_u:160.009a: evam uddharṣito droṇaḥ kopitaś cātmajena te
GE07mbh_07_u:160.009c: samanyur abravīd rājan duryodhanam idaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:160.010a: sthaviraḥ san paraṃ śaktyā ghaṭe duryodhanāhave
GE07mbh_07_u:160.010c: ataḥ paraṃ mayā kāryaṃ kṣudraṃ vijayagṛddhinā
GE07mbh_07_u:160.011a: yad bhavān manyate cāpi śubhaṃ vā yadi vāśubham
GE07mbh_07_u:160.011c: tad vai kartāsmi kauravya vacanāt tava nānyathā
GE07mbh_07_u:160.013a: manyase yac ca kaunteyam arjunaṃ śrāntam āhave
GE07mbh_07_u:160.013c: tasya vīryaṃ mahābāho śṛṇu satyena kaurava
GE07mbh_07_u:160.014a: taṃ na devā na gandharvā na yakṣā na ca rākṣasāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:160.016a: yakṣā nāgās tathā daityā ye cānye balagarvitāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:160.016c: nihatāḥ puruṣendreṇa tac cāpi viditaṃ tava
GE07mbh_07_u:160.017c: yūyaṃ tair hriyamāṇāś ca mokṣitā dṛḍhadhanvanā
GE07mbh_07_u:160.018c: surair avadhyāḥ saṃgrāme tena vīreṇa nirjitāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:160.019c: vijigye puruṣavyāghraḥ sa śakyo mānuṣaiḥ katham
GE07mbh_07_u:160.020a: pratyakṣaṃ caiva te sarvaṃ yathā balam idaṃ tava
GE07mbh_07_u:160.020c: kṣapitaṃ pāṇḍuputreṇa ceṣṭatāṃ no viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:160.021c: droṇaṃ tava suto rājan punar evedam abravīt
GE07mbh_07_u:160.022a: ahaṃ duḥśāsanaḥ karṇaḥ śakunir mātulaś ca me
GE07mbh_07_u:160.022d-1266_01: tiṣṭha sa tvaṃ mahābāho nityaṃ śiṣyaḥ priyas tava
GE07mbh_07_u:160.023a: tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā bhāradvājo hasann iva
GE07mbh_07_u:160.023c: anvavartata rājānaṃ svasti te 'stv iti cābravīt
GE07mbh_07_u:160.024a: ko hi gāṇḍīvadhanvānaṃ jvalantam iva tejasā
GE07mbh_07_u:160.024c: akṣayaṃ kṣapayet kaś cit kṣatriyaḥ kṣatriyarṣabham
GE07mbh_07_u:160.025a: taṃ na vittapatir nendro na yamo na jaleśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:160.026a: mūḍhās tv etāni bhāṣante yānīmāny āttha bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:160.026c: yuddhe hy arjunam āsādya svastimān ko vrajed gṛhān
GE07mbh_07_u:160.027c: śreyasas tvaddhite yuktāṃs tat tad vaktum ihecchasi
GE07mbh_07_u:160.028a: gaccha tvam api kaunteyam ātmārthebhyo hi māciram
GE07mbh_07_u:160.028c: tvam apy āśaṃsase yoddhuṃ kulajaḥ kṣatriyo hy asi
GE07mbh_07_u:160.029a: imān kiṃ pārthivān sarvān ghātayiṣyasy anāgasaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:160.029c: tvam asya mūlaṃ vairasya tasmād āsādayārjunam
GE07mbh_07_u:160.030a: eṣa te mātulaḥ prājñaḥ kṣatradharmam anuvrataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:160.032a: tvayā kathitam atyantaṃ karṇena saha hṛṣṭavat
GE07mbh_07_u:160.033a: ahaṃ ca tāta karṇaś ca bhrātā duḥśāsanaś ca me
GE07mbh_07_u:160.034a: iti te katthamānasya śrutaṃ saṃsadi saṃsadi
GE07mbh_07_u:160.034c: anutiṣṭha pratijñāṃ tāṃ satyavāg bhava taiḥ saha
GE07mbh_07_u:160.035a: eṣa te pāṇḍavaḥ śatrur aviṣahyo 'grataḥ sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:160.035c: kṣatradharmam avekṣasva ślāghyas tava vadho jayāt
GE07mbh_07_u:160.036a: dattaṃ bhuktam adhītaṃ ca prāptam aiśvaryam īpsitam
GE07mbh_07_u:160.036c: kṛtakṛtyo 'nṛṇaś cāsi mā bhair yudhyasva pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_07_u:160.037a: ity uktvā samare droṇo nyavartata yataḥ pare
GE07mbh_07_u:160.037c: dvaidhīkṛtya tataḥ senāṃ yuddhaṃ samabhavat tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:161.001c: kurūṇāṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ ca saṃhṛṣṭānāṃ viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:161.002d-1267_01: prakāśam akarod vyoma jagat saṃrañjayann iva
GE07mbh_07_u:161.004c: sapatnān savyataḥ kurmi savyasācinn imān kurūn
GE07mbh_07_u:161.007a: arjunārjuna bībhatso śṛṇu me tattvato vacaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:161.007c: yadarthaṃ kṣatriyā sūte tasya kālo 'yam āgataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:161.008a: asmiṃś ced āgate kāle śreyo na pratipatsyase
GE07mbh_07_u:161.009c: bhindhy anīkaṃ yudhāṃ śreṣṭha savyasācinn imān kuru
GE07mbh_07_u:161.010a: sa savyasācī bhīmena coditaḥ keśavena ca
GE07mbh_07_u:161.012a: atha duryodhanaḥ karṇaḥ śakuniś cāpi saubalaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:161.014c: sarvān avidhyan niśitair daśabhir daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:161.015a: uddhūtā rajaso vṛṣṭiḥ śaravṛṣṭis tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_07_u:161.015c: tamaś ca ghoraṃ śabdaś ca tadā samabhavan mahān
