GE07mbh_07_u:166.005c: icchanti putraṃ puruṣā loke nānyaṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_07_u:166.006c: tāni putrāya vā dadyuḥ śiṣyāyānugatāya vā
GE07mbh_07_u:166.007a: sa śilpaṃ prāpya tat sarvaṃ saviśeṣaṃ ca saṃjaya
GE07mbh_07_u:166.010a: sa rathī prathamo loke dṛḍhadhanvā jitaklamaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:166.011c: yo na vyathati saṃgrāme vīraḥ satyaparākramaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:166.013c: śrutvā nihatam ācāryam aśvatthāmā kim abravīt
GE07mbh_07_u:166.014a: dhṛṣṭadyumnasya yo mṛtyuḥ sṛṣṭas tena mahātmanā
GE07mbh_07_u:166.015c: śrutvā nihatam ācāryam aśvatthāmā kim abravīt
GE07mbh_07_u:166.017a: tasya kruddhasya rājendra vapur divyam adṛśyata
GE07mbh_07_u:166.018a: aśrupūrṇe tato netre apamṛjya punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:166.018c: uvāca kopān niḥśvasya duryodhanam idaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:166.019a: pitā mama yathā kṣudrair nyastaśastro nipātitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:166.019c: dharmadhvajavatā pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ tad viditaṃ mama
GE07mbh_07_u:166.019f-1359_01: asatyavākyaṃ yat tena lobhād uktaṃ durātmanā
GE07mbh_07_u:166.019f-1359_02: rājyahetor nṛśaṃsena tac cāpi viditaṃ mayā
GE07mbh_07_u:166.020c: dvayam etad bhaved rājan vadhas tatra praśasyate
GE07mbh_07_u:166.021a: nyāyavṛtto vadho yas tu saṃgrāme yudhyato bhavet
GE07mbh_07_u:166.021c: na sa duḥkhāya bhavati tathā dṛṣṭo hi sa dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:166.022a: gataḥ sa vīralokāya pitā mama na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:166.022c: na śocyaḥ puruṣavyāghras tathā sa nidhanaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:166.023a: yat tu dharmapravṛttaḥ san keśagrahaṇam āptavān
GE07mbh_07_u:166.023c: paśyatāṃ sarvasainyānāṃ tan me marmāṇi kṛntati
GE07mbh_07_u:166.023d-1360_01: mayi jīvati yat tātaḥ keśagraham avāptavān
GE07mbh_07_u:166.023d-1360_02: katham anye kariṣyanti putrebhyaḥ putriṇaḥ spṛhām
GE07mbh_07_u:166.024a: kāmāt krodhād avajñānād darpād bālyena vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:166.025a: tad idaṃ pārṣateneha mahad ādharmikaṃ kṛtam
GE07mbh_07_u:166.025c: avajñāya ca māṃ nūnaṃ nṛśaṃsena durātmanā
GE07mbh_07_u:166.026c: anāryaṃ paramaṃ kṛtvā mithyāvādī ca pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:166.027a: yo hy asau chadmanācāryaṃ śastraṃ saṃnyāsayat tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:166.027d-1361_02: ahatvā sarvapāñcālāñ jīveyaṃ na kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_07_u:166.029a: karmaṇā yena teneha mṛdunā dāruṇena vā
GE07mbh_07_u:166.029c: pāñcālānāṃ vadhaṃ kṛtvā śāntiṃ labdhāsmi kaurava
GE07mbh_07_u:166.030c: pretya ceha ca saṃprāptaṃ trāṇāya mahato bhayāt
GE07mbh_07_u:166.031a: pitrā tu mama sāvasthā prāptā nirbandhunā yathā
GE07mbh_07_u:166.031c: mayi śailapratīkāśe putre śiṣye ca jīvati
GE07mbh_07_u:166.032a: dhiṅ mamāstrāṇi divyāni dhig bāhū dhik parākramam
GE07mbh_07_u:166.032c: yan māṃ droṇaḥ sutaṃ prāpya keśagrahaṇam āptavān
GE07mbh_07_u:166.034a: āryeṇa tu na vaktavyā kadā cit stutir ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:166.034c: pitur vadham amṛṣyaṃs tu vakṣyāmy adyeha pauruṣam
GE07mbh_07_u:166.035a: adya paśyantu me vīryaṃ pāṇḍavāḥ sajanārdanāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:166.036a: na hi devā na gandharvā nāsurā na ca rākṣasāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:166.036c: adya śaktā raṇe jetuṃ rathasthaṃ māṃ nararṣabha
GE07mbh_07_u:166.037a: mad anyo nāsti loke 'sminn arjunād vāstravittamaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:166.037c: ahaṃ hi jvalatāṃ madhye mayūkhānām ivāṃśumān
GE07mbh_07_u:166.039a: adya sarvā diśo rājan dhārābhir iva saṃkulāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:166.039c: āvṛtāḥ patribhis tīkṣṇair draṣṭāro māmakair iha
GE07mbh_07_u:166.041a: na ca jānāti bībhatsus tad astraṃ na janārdanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:166.041c: na bhīmaseno na yamau na ca rājā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:166.042a: na pārṣato durātmāsau na śikhaṇḍī na sātyakiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:166.042c: yad idaṃ mayi kauravya sakalyaṃ sanivartanam
GE07mbh_07_u:166.044a: taṃ svayaṃ pratigṛhyātha bhagavān sa varaṃ dadau
GE07mbh_07_u:166.044c: vavre pitā me paramam astraṃ nārāyaṇaṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:166.045c: bhavitā tvatsamo nānyaḥ kaś cid yudhi naraḥ kva cit
GE07mbh_07_u:166.046a: na tv idaṃ sahasā brahman prayoktavyaṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_07_u:166.046c: na hy etad astram anyatra vadhāc chatror nivartate
GE07mbh_07_u:166.047a: na caitac chakyate jñātuṃ ko na vadhyed iti prabho
GE07mbh_07_u:166.047c: avadhyam api hanyād dhi tasmān naitat prayojayet
GE07mbh_07_u:166.048a: vadhaḥ saṃkhye dravaś caiva śastrāṇāṃ ca visarjanam
GE07mbh_07_u:166.048c: prayācanaṃ ca śatrūṇāṃ gamanaṃ śaraṇasya ca
GE07mbh_07_u:166.049c: sarvathā pīḍito hi syād avadhyān pīḍayan raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:166.050a: taj jagrāha pitā mahyam abravīc caiva sa prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:166.051a: evam uktvā sa bhagavān divam ācakrame prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:166.051c: etan nārāyaṇād astraṃ tat prāptaṃ mama bandhunā
GE07mbh_07_u:166.051d-1364_01: tatprasādān mayā prāptaṃ mahāstram idam uttamam
GE07mbh_07_u:166.053a: yathā yathāham iccheyaṃ tathā bhūtvā śarā mama
GE07mbh_07_u:166.053d-1365_01: iccheyaṃ yadi dūrasthān nihaniṣyanti me śarāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:166.056c: pāñcālāpasadaś cādya na me jīvan vimokṣyate
GE07mbh_07_u:166.056d-1366_01: evam uktvā tato drauṇiḥ śaṅkhaṃ dadhmau sa māriṣa
GE07mbh_07_u:166.056d-1366_03: tasya śaṅkhasvanaṃ śrutvā tava sainyāni māriṣa
GE07mbh_07_u:166.058a: bherīś cābhyahanan hṛṣṭā ḍiṇḍimāṃś ca sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:166.058e: sa śabdas tumulaḥ khaṃ dyāṃ pṛthivīṃ ca vyanādayat
GE07mbh_07_u:166.060c: prāduścakāra tad divyam astraṃ nārāyaṇaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:167.001a: prādurbhūte tatas tasminn astre nārāyaṇe tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:167.002a: cacāla pṛthivī cāpi cukṣubhe ca mahodadhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:167.002c: pratisrotaḥ pravṛttāś ca gantuṃ tatra samudragāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:167.005c: kathaṃ kathābhavat tīvrā dṛṣṭvā tad vyākulaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_07_u:167.006a: vyathitāḥ sarvarājānas tadā hy āsan vicetasaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:167.006c: tad dṛṣṭvā ghorarūpaṃ tu drauṇer astraṃ bhayāvaham
GE07mbh_07_u:167.006d-1367_01: petur ākāśagās tatra vimanaskā viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:167.006d-1367_02: rodasī ca viyac caiva sarvaṃ jvālāsamāvṛtam
GE07mbh_07_u:167.008c: ko mantraḥ pāṇḍaveṣv āsīt tan mamācakṣva saṃjaya
GE07mbh_07_u:167.009a: prāg eva vidrutān dṛṣṭvā dhārtarāṣṭrān yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:167.009c: punaś ca tumulaṃ śabdaṃ śrutvārjunam abhāṣata
GE07mbh_07_u:167.011c: ātmatrāṇe matiṃ kṛtvā prādravan kuravo yathā
GE07mbh_07_u:167.012a: ke cid bhrāntai rathais tūrṇaṃ nihatapārṣṇiyantṛbhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:167.013c: bhītāḥ pādair hayān ke cit tvarayantaḥ svayaṃ rathaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:167.013e: yugacakrākṣabhagnaiś ca drutāḥ ke cid bhayāturāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:167.013f-1368_01: rathān viśīrṇān utsṛjya padbhiḥ ke cic ca vidrutāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:167.014c: śarārtair vidrutair nāgair hṛtāḥ ke cid diśo daśa
GE07mbh_07_u:167.015c: saṃchinnā nemiṣu gatā mṛditāś ca hayadvipaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:167.017a: putrān pitṝn sakhīn bhrātṝn samāropya dṛḍhakṣatān
GE07mbh_07_u:167.017c: jalena kledayanty anye vimucya kavacāny api
GE07mbh_07_u:167.017d-1370_02: avasthitaṃ punar dṛṣṭvā tava putrasya tad balam
GE07mbh_07_u:167.018a: avasthāṃ tādṛśīṃ prāpya hate droṇe drutaṃ balam
GE07mbh_07_u:167.018b-1371_01: evam etad drutaṃ bhagnaṃ droṇe yudhi nipātite
GE07mbh_07_u:167.018c: punarāvartitaṃ kena yadi jānāsi śaṃsa me
GE07mbh_07_u:167.019a: hayānāṃ heṣatāṃ śabdaḥ kuñjarāṇāṃ ca bṛṃhatām
GE07mbh_07_u:167.020a: ete śabdā bhṛśaṃ tīvrāḥ pravṛttāḥ kurusāgare
GE07mbh_07_u:167.020c: muhur muhur udīryantaḥ kampayanti hi māmakān
GE07mbh_07_u:167.021a: ya eṣa tumulaḥ śabdaḥ śrūyate lomaharṣaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:167.021c: sendrān apy eṣa lokāṃs trīn bhañjyād iti matir mama
GE07mbh_07_u:167.022c: droṇe hate kauravārthaṃ vyaktam abhyeti vāsavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:167.023c: dhanaṃjaya guruṃ śrutvā tatra nādaṃ subhīṣaṇam
GE07mbh_07_u:167.024a: ka eṣa kauravān dīrṇān avasthāpya mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:167.025c: dhamanti kauravāḥ śaṅkhān yasya vīryam upāśritāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:167.026a: yatra te saṃśayo rājan nyastaśastre gurau hate
GE07mbh_07_u:167.026c: dhārtarāṣṭrān avasthāpya ka eṣa nadatīti ha
GE07mbh_07_u:167.028a: yasmiñ jāte dadau droṇo gavāṃ daśaśataṃ dhanam
GE07mbh_07_u:167.028b-1373_01: sa eṣa nardati drauṇir gharmānte jalado yathā
GE07mbh_07_u:167.029c: heṣatā kampitā bhūmir lokāś ca sakalās trayaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:167.030a: tac chrutvāntarhitaṃ bhūtaṃ nāma cāsyākarot tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:167.032a: guruṃ me yatra pāñcālyaḥ keśapakṣe parāmṛśat
GE07mbh_07_u:167.032c: tan na jātu kṣamed drauṇir jānan pauruṣam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:167.032d-1374_01: sa hi tenaiva naḥ sarvān kṣapayed iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:167.033c: dharmajñena satā nāma so 'dharmaḥ sumahān kṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:167.033d-1375_02: rāme vālivadhād yadvad evaṃ droṇe nipātite
GE07mbh_07_u:167.034c: nāyaṃ vakṣyati mithyeti pratyayaṃ kṛtavāṃs tvayi
GE07mbh_07_u:167.035c: ācārya ukto bhavatā hataḥ kuñjara ity uta
GE07mbh_07_u:167.036c: āsīt sa vihvalo rājan yathā dṛṣṭas tvayā vibhuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:167.037a: sa tu śokena cāviṣṭo vimukhaḥ putravatsalaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:167.037c: śāśvataṃ dharmam utsṛjya guruḥ śiṣyeṇa ghātitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:167.038c: rakṣatv idānīṃ sāmātyo yadi śaknoṣi pārṣatam
GE07mbh_07_u:167.039c: sarve vayaṃ paritrātuṃ na śakṣyāmo 'dya pārṣatam
GE07mbh_07_u:167.040c: so 'dya keśagrahaṃ śrutvā pitur dhakṣyati no raṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:167.041c: avakīrya svadharmaṃ hi śiṣyeṇa nihato guruḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:167.042a: yadā gataṃ vayo bhūyaḥ śiṣṭam alpataraṃ ca naḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:167.043a: piteva nityaṃ sauhārdāt piteva sa hi dharmataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:167.044a: dhṛtarāṣṭreṇa bhīṣmāya droṇāya ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:167.044c: visṛṣṭā pṛthivī sarvā saha putraiś ca tatparaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:167.045a: sa prāpya tādṛśīṃ vṛttiṃ satkṛtaḥ satataṃ paraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:167.045c: avṛṇīta sadā putrān mām evābhyadhikaṃ guruḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:167.046c: na tv enaṃ yudhyamānaṃ vai hanyād api śatakratuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:167.047c: kṛto hy anāryair asmābhī rājyārthe laghubuddhibhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:167.047d-1376_01: aho bata mahat pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ karma sudāruṇaṃ
GE07mbh_07_u:167.048a: putrān bhrātṝn pitṝn dārāñ jīvitaṃ caiva vāsaviḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:167.048c: tyajet sarvaṃ mama premṇā jānāty etad dhi me guruḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:167.049c: tasmād avākśirā rājan prāpto 'smi narakaṃ vibho
GE07mbh_07_u:167.050a: brāhmaṇaṃ vṛddham ācāryaṃ nyastaśastraṃ yathā munim
GE07mbh_07_u:167.050c: ghātayitvādya rājyārthe mṛtaṃ śreyo na jīvitam
GE07mbh_07_u:168.001a: arjunasya vacaḥ śrutvā nocus tatra mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:168.001c: apriyaṃ vā priyaṃ vāpi mahārāja dhanaṃjayam
GE07mbh_07_u:168.004a: kṣatāt trātā kṣatāj jīvan kṣāntas triṣv api sādhuṣu
GE07mbh_07_u:168.004c: kṣatriyaḥ kṣitim āpnoti kṣipraṃ dharmaṃ yaśaḥ śriyam
GE07mbh_07_u:168.005a: sa bhavān kṣatriyaguṇair yuktaḥ sarvaiḥ kulodvahaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:168.005c: avipaścid yathā vākyaṃ vyāharan nādya śobhase
GE07mbh_07_u:168.006c: na cātivartase dharmaṃ velām iva mahodadhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:168.007a: na pūjayet tvā ko 'nvadya yat trayodaśavārṣikam
GE07mbh_07_u:168.007d-1378_02: tvayā vinā yadi mahīṃ dharmaputrāya dhīmate
GE07mbh_07_u:168.007d-1378_03: na dadyāṃ pañcame prāpte divase nāsmi kṣatriyaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:168.008a: diṣṭyā tāta manas te 'dya svadharmam anuvartate
GE07mbh_07_u:168.008c: ānṛśaṃsye ca te diṣṭyā buddhiḥ satatam acyuta
GE07mbh_07_u:168.009a: yat tu dharmapravṛttasya hṛtaṃ rājyam adharmataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:168.009c: draupadī ca parāmṛṣṭā sabhām ānīya śatrubhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:168.009d-1379_01: kathaṃ vṛddheṣu tiṣṭhatsu dhārmikeṣu mahatsu ca
GE07mbh_07_u:168.009d-1379_02: draupadī prāpnuyāt kleśaṃ veśyā yoṣeva bhārata
GE07mbh_07_u:168.009d-1379_03: kim u teṣāṃ bilvaphalaṃ mukhe hy āsīn mahātmanām
GE07mbh_07_u:168.009d-1379_04: utāho badhirā hy āsan mūkā vāpi dhanaṃjaya
GE07mbh_07_u:168.009d-1379_05: andhā vasaṃs tadā te tu yaiś ca noktaṃ hitaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:168.009d-1379_06: atha tatra bhaved dharmo na caivātrāsty anāryakam
GE07mbh_07_u:168.009d-1379_08: putraiḥ śiṣyaiś ca yat sārdhaṃ saṃnaddhā yoddhum āhave
GE07mbh_07_u:168.010c: anarhamāṇās taṃ bhāvaṃ trayodaśa samāḥ paraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:168.010d-1380_02: tathā tan marṣayitvā tu yathā te utpathasthitāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:168.012a: tam adharmam apākraṣṭum ārabdhaḥ sahitas tvayā
GE07mbh_07_u:168.013a: tvayā tu kathitaṃ pūrvaṃ yuddhāyābhyāgatā vayam
GE07mbh_07_u:168.013c: ghaṭāmaś ca yathāśakti tvaṃ tu no 'dya jugupsase
GE07mbh_07_u:168.014a: svadharmaṃ necchase jñātuṃ mithyā vacanam eva te
GE07mbh_07_u:168.015a: vapan vraṇe kṣāram iva kṣatānāṃ śatrukarśana
GE07mbh_07_u:168.016a: adharmam etad vipulaṃ dhārmikaḥ san na budhyase
GE07mbh_07_u:168.016c: yat tvam ātmānam asmāṃś ca praśaṃsyān na praśaṃsasi
GE07mbh_07_u:168.016e: yaḥ kalāṃ ṣoḍaśīṃ tvatto nārhate taṃ praśaṃsasi
GE07mbh_07_u:168.017a: svayam evātmano vaktuṃ na yuktaṃ guṇasaṃstavam
GE07mbh_07_u:168.017b-1382_01: mama nāgāyutaṃ pārtha balaṃ bāhvor vidhīyate
GE07mbh_07_u:168.017b-1382_02: prapātayeyaṃ ca śaraiḥ sendrān devān samāgatān
GE07mbh_07_u:168.017c: dārayeyaṃ mahīṃ krodhād vikireyaṃ ca parvatān
GE07mbh_07_u:168.018a: āvidhya ca gadāṃ gurvīṃ bhīmāṃ kāñcanamālinīm
GE07mbh_07_u:168.019a: sa tvam evaṃvidhaṃ jānan bhrātaraṃ māṃ nararṣabha
GE07mbh_07_u:168.020a: atha vā tiṣṭha bībhatso saha sarvair nararṣabhaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:168.020c: aham enaṃ gadāpāṇir jeṣyāmy eko mahāhave
GE07mbh_07_u:168.023a: ṣaṣṭham adhyayanaṃ nāma teṣāṃ kasmin pratiṣṭhitaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:168.023c: hato droṇo mayā yat tat kiṃ māṃ pārtha vigarhase
GE07mbh_07_u:168.025c: māyayaiva nihanyād yo na yuktaṃ pārtha tatra kim
GE07mbh_07_u:168.026a: tasmiṃs tathā mayā śaste yadi drauṇāyanī ruṣā
GE07mbh_07_u:168.026c: kurute bhairavaṃ nādaṃ tatra kiṃ mama hīyate

GE07mbh_07_u:170.051d-1403_01: arjunārjuna bībhatso na nyasyaṃ gāṇḍivaṃ tvayā arjuna uvāca

GE07mbh_07_u:171.007d-1408_01: tad astraṃ bhīmahuṃkārād apayāti punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:171.007d-1408_02: punaḥ punas tam āyāti huṃkārāt taṃ vimuñcati

GE07mbh_07_u:171.020a: tasmin praśānte vidhinā tadā tejasi duḥsahe
GE07mbh_07_u:171.020c: babhūvur vimalāḥ sarvā diśaḥ pradiśa eva ca

GE07mbh_07_u:171.028c: anyathā vihitaḥ saṃkhye vadhaḥ śatror janādhipa

GE07mbh_07_u:171.031a: tvayi hy astrāṇi divyāni yathā syus tryambake tathā

GE07mbh_07_u:171.043c: tasya cānucarān sarvān kruddhaḥ prācchādayac charaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:171.044a: pradrudrāva tataḥ sainyaṃ pāñcālānāṃ viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_07_u:171.045a: dṛṣṭvā ca vimukhān yodhān dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ ca pīḍitam

GE07mbh_07_u:171.046f-023_0004: evaṃ sa pīḍito rājann aśvatthāmā mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:171.046f-023_0006: evaṃ gate guroḥ putre tava putro mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:171.046f-023_0008: duryodhanas tu viṃśatyā kṛpaḥ śāradvatas tribhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:171.046f-023_0011: sātyakiṃ vivyadhus tūrṇaṃ samantān niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:171.046f-023_0015: cintayām āsa duḥkhārto niḥśvasaṃś ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:171.046f-023_0017: sātyakiṃ vārayām āsa kirañ śaraśatān bahūn
GE07mbh_07_u:171.046f-023_0019: virathaṃ vimukhaṃ caiva punaś cakre mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:171.046f-023_0020: tatas te pāṇḍavā rājan dṛṣṭvā sātyakivikramam
GE07mbh_07_u:171.046f-023_0021: śaṅkhaśabdān bhṛśaṃ cakruḥ siṃhanādāṃś ca nedire
GE07mbh_07_u:171.046f-023_0022: evaṃ taṃ virathaṃ kṛtvā sātyakiḥ satyavikramaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:171.046f-023_0024: ayutaṃ dantināṃ sārdhaṃ kṛpasya nijaghāna saḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:171.046f-023_0026: tato drauṇir mahārāja ratham āruhya vīryavān
GE07mbh_07_u:171.046f-023_0028: punas tam āgataṃ dṛṣṭvā śaineyo niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:171.047c: yuyudhānena vai drauṇiḥ prahasan vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_07_u:171.048c: na tv enaṃ trāsyasi mayā grastam ātmānam eva ca
GE07mbh_07_u:171.048d-1412_03: yad balaṃ pāṇḍaveyānāṃ vṛṣṇīnām api yad balam
GE07mbh_07_u:171.049c: vyasṛjat sātvate drauṇir vajraṃ vṛtre yathā hariḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:171.051a: sa bhinnakavacaḥ śūras tottrārdita iva dvipaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:171.054a: sa pūrvam atividdhaś ca bhṛśaṃ paścāc ca pīḍitaḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:171.056a: kirīṭī bhīmasenaś ca vṛddhakṣatraś ca pauravaḥ

GE07mbh_07_u:171.060b-1414_01: tatas tān ardayan sarvān drauṇir yugapad eva hi
GE07mbh_07_u:171.060c: pārthaś ca punar aṣṭābhis tathā sarve tribhis tribhiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:171.061a: tato 'rjunaṃ ṣaḍbhir athājaghāna; drauṇāyanir daśabhir vāsudevam

GE07mbh_07_u:171.061e: punaḥ pārthaṃ śaravarṣeṇa viddhvā; drauṇir ghoraṃ siṃhanādaṃ nanāda
GE07mbh_07_u:171.062a: tasyāsyataḥ suniśitān pītadhārān; drauṇeḥ śarān pṛṣṭhataś cāgrataś ca
GE07mbh_07_u:171.062c: dharā viyad dyauḥ pradiśo diśaś ca; channā bāṇair abhavan ghorarūpaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:171.063c: bhujau śiraś cendrasamānavīryas; tribhiḥ śarair yugapat saṃcakarta
GE07mbh_07_u:171.064a: sa pauravaṃ rathaśaktyā nihatya; chittvā rathaṃ tilaśaś cāpi bāṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:171.064c: chittvāsya bāhū varacandanāktau; bhallena kāyāc chira uccakarta
GE07mbh_07_u:171.065c: bāṇais tvarāvāñ jvalitāgnikalpair; viddhvā prādān mṛtyave sāśvasūtam
GE07mbh_07_u:171.065d-024_0001: mālavaṃ pauravaṃ caiva yuvarājaṃ ca cedipam

GE07mbh_07_u:172.089d-1442_04: matsyaḥ kūrmo varāhaś ca nṛsiṃho vāmano hariḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:172.089d-1442_06: rāmo rāmaś ca rāmaś ca vāsudevaś ca yādavaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:172.089d-1442_07: kalkī bhaviṣyate vipro yuge kṣīṇe punar hariḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:172.089d-1442_08: ekenaivātmanā viśvaṃ sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ ca yat
GE07mbh_07_u:172.089d-1442_09: tat sarvaṃ viṣṇunā sṛṣṭam anantena mahātmanā
GE07mbh_07_u:172.089d-1442_12: ato nimittaṃ hi haris tapaś carati nityaśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:172.089d-1442_13: varāṃś ca prārthayaty asmāt pradhānād devasattamāt
GE07mbh_07_u:172.089d-1442_15: tapaś cīrṇaṃ viśālāyām etat te kathitaṃ mayā
GE07mbh_07_u:172.091a: tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā droṇaputro mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:172.091c: namaścakāra rudrāya bahu mene ca keśavam
GE07mbh_07_u:172.093c: kauravāṇāṃ ca dīnānāṃ droṇe yudhi nipātite
GE07mbh_07_u:172.094a: yuddhaṃ kṛtvā dinān pañca droṇo hatvā varūthinīm
GE07mbh_07_u:173.001a: tasminn atirathe droṇe nihate tatra saṃjaya
GE07mbh_07_u:173.001c: māmakāḥ pāṇḍavāś caiva kim akurvann ataḥ param
GE07mbh_07_u:173.002a: tasminn atirathe droṇe nihate pārṣatena vai
GE07mbh_07_u:173.004a: saṃgrāme nighnataḥ śatrūñ śaraughair vimalair aham
GE07mbh_07_u:173.005a: jvalantaṃ śūlam udyamya yāṃ diśaṃ pratipadyate
GE07mbh_07_u:173.005c: tasyāṃ diśi viśīryante śatravo me mahāmune
GE07mbh_07_u:173.006a: na padbhyāṃ spṛśate bhūmiṃ na ca śūlaṃ vimuñcati
GE07mbh_07_u:173.007a: tena bhagnān arīn sarvān madbhagnān manyate janaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:173.008a: bhagavaṃs tan mamācakṣva ko vai sa puruṣottamaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:173.009c: bhuvanaṃ bhūr bhuvaṃ devaṃ sarvalokeśvaraṃ prabhum
GE07mbh_07_u:173.010a: īśānaṃ varadaṃ pārtha dṛṣṭavān asi śaṃkaram
GE07mbh_07_u:173.010c: taṃ gaccha śaraṇaṃ devaṃ sarvādiṃ bhuvaneśvaram
GE07mbh_07_u:173.012a: tasya te pārṣadā divyā rūpair nānāvidhaiḥ vibhoḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:173.013c: ānanair vikṛtaiḥ pādaiḥ pārtha veṣaiś ca vaikṛtaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:173.014c: sa śivas tāta tejasvī prasādād yāti te 'grataḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:173.014e: tasmin ghore tadā pārtha saṃgrāme lomaharṣaṇe
GE07mbh_07_u:173.015c: kas tāṃ senāṃ tadā pārtha manasāpi pradharṣayet
GE07mbh_07_u:173.016a: sthātum utsahate kaś cin na tasminn agrataḥ sthite
GE07mbh_07_u:173.016c: na hi bhūtaṃ samaṃ tena triṣu lokeṣu vidyate
GE07mbh_07_u:173.017a: gandhenāpi hi saṃgrāme tasya kruddhasya śatravaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:173.017c: visaṃjñā hatabhūyiṣṭhā vepanti ca patanti ca
GE07mbh_07_u:173.018a: tasmai namas tu kurvanto devās tiṣṭhanti vai divi
GE07mbh_07_u:173.018c: ye cānye mānavā loke ye ca svargajito narāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:173.019a: ye bhaktā varadaṃ devaṃ śivaṃ rudram umāpatim
GE07mbh_07_u:173.019b-1447_01: saṃgrāmeṣu jayaṃ prāpya pālayanti mahīm imām
GE07mbh_07_u:173.019c: iha loke sukhaṃ prāpya te yānti paramāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_07_u:173.020a: namaskuruṣva kaunteya tasmai śāntāya vai sadā
GE07mbh_07_u:173.024b-1448_01: namo vṛkṣāya senānye madhyamāya namo namaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:173.026a: vṛkṣāṇāṃ pataye caiva apāṃ ca pataye tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:173.029e: prajānāṃ patim avyagraṃ bhūtānāṃ patim avyayam
GE07mbh_07_u:173.034a: namas tasmai sureśāya yasya vaiśravaṇaḥ sakhā
GE07mbh_07_u:173.037c: namo 'stu tripuraghnāya bhagaghnāya ca vai namaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:173.038b-1453_01: mātṝṇāṃ pataye caiva gaṇānāṃ pataye namaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:173.038c: apāṃ ca pataye nityaṃ yajñānāṃ pataye namaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:173.041a: na surā nāsurā loke na gandharvā na rākṣasāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:173.041c: sukham edhanti kupite tasminn api guhāgatāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:173.042a: vivyādha kupito yajñaṃ nirbhayas tu bhavas tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:173.042c: dhanuṣā bāṇam utsṛjya saghoṣaṃ vinanāda ca
GE07mbh_07_u:173.043a: te na śarma kutaḥ śāntiṃ lebhire sma surās tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:173.043c: vidrute sahasā yajñe kupite ca maheśvare
GE07mbh_07_u:173.044c: babhūvur vaśagāḥ pārtha nipetuś ca surāsurāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:173.045a: āpaś cukṣubhire sarvāś cakampe ca vasuṃdharā
GE07mbh_07_u:173.045c: parvatāś ca vyaśīryanta diśo nāgāś ca mohitāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:173.046a: andhāś ca tamasā lokā na prakāśanta saṃvṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:173.046c: jaghnivān saha sūryeṇa sarveṣāṃ jyotiṣāṃ prabhāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:173.047a: cukruśur bhayabhītāś ca śāntiṃ cakrus tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_07_u:173.049a: tato niścakramur devā vepamānā natāḥ sma tam
GE07mbh_07_u:173.049c: punaś ca saṃdadhe dīptaṃ devānāṃ niśitaṃ śaram
GE07mbh_07_u:173.049d-1455_02: taṃ dṛṣṭvā tu surāḥ sarve praṇipatya maheśvaram
GE07mbh_07_u:173.050a: rudrasya yajñabhāgaṃ ca viśiṣṭaṃ te nv akalpayan
GE07mbh_07_u:173.050c: bhayena tridaśā rājañ śaraṇaṃ ca prapedire
GE07mbh_07_u:173.051a: tena caivātikopena sa yajñaḥ saṃdhitas tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:173.051c: yattāś cāpi surā āsan yattāś cādyāpi taṃ prati
GE07mbh_07_u:173.052a: asurāṇāṃ purāṇy āsaṃs trīṇi vīryavatāṃ divi
GE07mbh_07_u:173.052c: āyasaṃ rājataṃ caiva sauvarṇam aparaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_07_u:173.053c: sauvarṇaṃ paramaṃ hy āsīd vidyunmālina eva ca
GE07mbh_07_u:173.054a: na śaktas tāni maghavān bhettuṃ sarvāyudhair api
GE07mbh_07_u:173.054c: atha sarve 'marā rudraṃ jagmuḥ śaraṇam arditāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:173.055a: te tam ūcur mahātmānaṃ sarve devāḥ savāsavāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:173.055b-1456_02: pīḍayanty adhikaṃ lokaṃ yasmāt te varadarpitāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:173.055b-1456_03: tvad ṛte devadeveśa nānyaḥ śaktaḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_07_u:173.055b-1456_04: hantuṃ daityān mahādeva tvaṃ hantā ca suradviṣām
GE07mbh_07_u:173.056a: sa tathoktas tathety uktvā devānāṃ hitakāmyayā
GE07mbh_07_u:173.056b-1457_01: śalyam agniṃ ca vai kṛtvā puṅkhe somam apāṃ patim
GE07mbh_07_u:173.056b-1457_02: sa kṛtvā dhanur oṃkāraṃ sāvitrīṃ jyāṃ maheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:173.056b-1457_03: hayāṃś ca caturo vedān sarvavedamayaṃ ratham
GE07mbh_07_u:173.056b-025_0002: pṛthvīṃ sasāgaravanāṃ rathaṃ kṛtvā tu śaṃkaraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:173.056b-025_0003: akṣaṃ kṛtvā tu nāgendraṃ śeṣaṃ nāgaṃ trilocanaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:173.056b-025_0004: cakraṃ kṛtvā tu candrārkau devadevaḥ pinākadhṛk
GE07mbh_07_u:173.056b-025_0005: aṇī kṛtvailapatraṃ ca puṣpadantaṃ ca tryambakaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:173.056b-025_0006: yūpaṃ kṛtvā ca malayam avanāhaṃ ca takṣakam
GE07mbh_07_u:173.056b-025_0007: yoktrāṅgāni ca catvāri kṛtvā śarvaḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_07_u:173.056b-025_0010: gāyatrīṃ pragrahaṃ kṛtvā sāvitrīṃ ca maheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:173.056b-025_0011: kṛtvoṃkāraṃ pratodaṃ ca brahmāṇaṃ caiva sārathim
GE07mbh_07_u:173.056b-025_0012: gāṇḍīvaṃ mandaraṃ kṛtvā guṇaṃ kṛtvā ca vāsukim
GE07mbh_07_u:173.056b-025_0013: viṣṇuṃ śarottamaṃ kṛtvā śalyam agniṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_07_u:173.056b-025_0014: vāyuṃ kṛtvātha vājābhyāṃ puṅkhe vaivasvataṃ yamam
GE07mbh_07_u:173.056b-025_0015: vidyut kṛtvātha niśrāṇaṃ meruṃ kṛtvātha vai dhvajam
GE07mbh_07_u:173.056b-025_0016: āruhya sa rathaṃ divyaṃ sarvadevamayaṃ śivaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:173.056b-025_0019: stūyamānaḥ suraiḥ pārtha ṛṣibhiś ca tapodhanaiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:173.056b-025_0020: sthānaṃ māheśvaraṃ kṛtvā divyam apratimaṃ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:173.057a: yadā trīṇi sametāni antarikṣe purāṇi vai
GE07mbh_07_u:173.057c: triparvaṇā triśalyena tena tāni bibheda saḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:173.058a: purāṇi na ca taṃ śekur dānavāḥ prativīkṣitum
GE07mbh_07_u:173.058d-1458_01: purāṇi dagdhavantaṃ taṃ devī yātā pravīkṣitum
GE07mbh_07_u:173.058d-1459_01: mumoca bhagavāñ śaṃbhuḥ purāṇy ādiśya vīryavān
GE07mbh_07_u:173.058d-1459_03: bhasmībhūtā durātmāno bhinnāś ca tripure purā
GE07mbh_07_u:173.058d-1459_05: ṛṣibhiḥ saṃstutaś caiva parāṃ mudam upāgamat
GE07mbh_07_u:173.059a: bālam aṅkagataṃ kṛtvā svayaṃ pañcaśikhaṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:173.059c: umā jijñāsamānā vai ko 'yam ity abravīt surān
GE07mbh_07_u:173.060b-1462_03: jagāma śaraṇaṃ tūrṇaṃ brahmāṇaṃ prabhum avyayam
GE07mbh_07_u:173.060b-1462_04: te taṃ praṇamya śirasā procuḥ prāñjalayas tadā
GE07mbh_07_u:173.060b-1462_05: kim apy aṅkagataṃ brahman pārvatyā bhūtam adbhutam
GE07mbh_07_u:173.060b-1462_06: bālarūpadharaṃ dṛṣṭvā nāsmābhis tac ca lakṣitam
GE07mbh_07_u:173.060b-1462_07: tasmāt tvāṃ praṣṭum icchāmo nirjitā yena vai vayam
GE07mbh_07_u:173.060b-1462_09: teṣāṃ tad vacanaṃ śrutvā brahmā brahmavidāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:173.060b-1462_10: dhyātvā sa śaṃbhuṃ bhagavān bālaṃ cāmitatejasam
GE07mbh_07_u:173.060b-1462_11: uvāca bhagavān brahmā śakrādīṃś ca surottamān
GE07mbh_07_u:173.060b-1462_12: carācarasya jagataḥ prabhuḥ sa bhagavān haraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:173.060b-1462_13: tasmāt parataraṃ nānyat kiṃ cid asti maheśvarāt
GE07mbh_07_u:173.060b-1462_14: yo dṛṣṭo hy umayā sārdhaṃ yuṣmābhir amitadyutiḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:173.060b-1462_15: sa pārvatyāḥ kṛte devaḥ kṛtavān bālarūpatām
GE07mbh_07_u:173.060b-1462_16: te mayā sahitā yūyaṃ prapadyadhvaṃ tam eva hi
GE07mbh_07_u:173.060c: sa eṣa bhagavān devaḥ sarvalokeśvaraḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:173.060d-1463_01: evam uktā gatā devā yatra devo maheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:173.060d-1464_01: athānyena svarūpeṇa brahmā dṛṣṭvā tam avyayam
GE07mbh_07_u:173.061a: na saṃbubudhire cainaṃ devās taṃ bhuvaneśvaram
GE07mbh_07_u:173.062a: athābhyetya tato brahmā dṛṣṭvā ca sa maheśvaram
GE07mbh_07_u:173.062c: ayaṃ śreṣṭha iti jñātvā vavande taṃ pitāmahaḥ brahmovāca
GE07mbh_07_u:173.062d-1465_01: tvaṃ yajño bhuvanasyāsya tvaṃ gatis tvaṃ parāyaṇam
GE07mbh_07_u:173.062d-1465_02: tvaṃ bhavas tvaṃ mahādevas tvaṃ dhāma paramaṃ padam
GE07mbh_07_u:173.062d-1465_03: tvayā sarvam idaṃ vyāptaṃ jagat sthāvarajaṅgamam
GE07mbh_07_u:173.062d-1465_05: prasādaṃ kuru śakrasya tvayā krodhārditasya vai vyāsa uvāca
GE07mbh_07_u:173.063a: tataḥ prasādayām āsur umāṃ rudraṃ ca te surāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:173.063c: abhavac ca punar bāhur yathāprakṛti vajriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:173.065a: sa vai rudraḥ sa ca śivaḥ so 'gniḥ śarvaḥ sa sarvavit
GE07mbh_07_u:173.065c: sa cendraś caiva vāyuś ca so 'śvinau sa ca vidyutaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:173.066a: sa bhavaḥ sa ca parjanyo mahādevaḥ sa cānaghaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:173.066c: sa candramāḥ sa ceśānaḥ sa sūryo varuṇaś ca saḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:173.067a: sa kālaḥ so 'ntako mṛtyuḥ sa yamo rātryahāni ca
GE07mbh_07_u:173.067c: māsārdhamāsā ṛtavaḥ saṃdhye saṃvatsaraś ca saḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:173.068a: sa ca dhātā vidhātā ca viśvātmā viśvakarmakṛt
GE07mbh_07_u:173.068c: sarvāsāṃ devatānāṃ ca dhārayaty avapur vapuḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:173.069a: sarvair devaiḥ stuto devaḥ saikadhā bahudhā ca saḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:173.069d-1466_01: dve tanū tasya devasya vedajñā brāhmaṇā viduḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:173.069d-1466_02: ghorā cānyā śivā cānyā te tanū bahudhā punaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:173.069d-1466_03: ghorā tu yā tanus tasya so 'gnir vidyut sa bhāskaraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:173.069d-1466_04: somārdhaṃ punar evāsya āpo jyotīṃṣi candramāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:173.069d-1466_06: yad atra paramaṃ guhyaṃ sa vai devo maheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:173.070a: īdṛśaḥ sa mahādevo bhūyaś ca bhagavān ajaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:173.070c: na hi sarve mayā śakyā vaktuṃ bhagavato guṇāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:173.072a: āyur ārogyam aiśvaryaṃ vittaṃ kāmāṃś ca puṣkalān
GE07mbh_07_u:173.072c: sa dadāti manuṣyebhyaḥ sa caivākṣipate punaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:173.073a: sendrādiṣu ca deveṣu tasya caiśvaryam ucyate
GE07mbh_07_u:173.073c: sa caiva vyāhṛte loke manuṣyāṇāṃ śubhāśubhe
GE07mbh_07_u:173.074a: aiśvaryāc caiva kāmānām īśvaraḥ punar ucyate
GE07mbh_07_u:173.074c: maheśvaraś ca bhūtānāṃ mahatām īśvaraś ca saḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:173.075a: bahubhir bahudhā rūpair viśvaṃ vyāpnoti vai jagat
GE07mbh_07_u:173.075c: asya devasya yad vaktraṃ samudre tad atiṣṭhata
GE07mbh_07_u:173.076a: eṣa caiva śmaśāneṣu devo vasati nityaśaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:173.076c: yajanty enaṃ janās tatra vīrasthāna itīśvaram
GE07mbh_07_u:173.077a: asya dīptāni rūpāṇi ghorāṇi ca bahūni ca
GE07mbh_07_u:173.077c: loke yāny asya kurvanti manuṣyāḥ pravadanti ca
GE07mbh_07_u:173.078c: nirucyante mahattvāc ca vibhutvāt karmabhis tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:173.080a: sa kāmānāṃ prabhur devo ye divyā ye ca mānuṣāḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:173.080c: sa vibhuḥ sa prabhur devo viśvaṃ vyāpnuvate mahat
GE07mbh_07_u:173.081a: jyeṣṭhaṃ bhūtaṃ vadanty enaṃ brāhmaṇā munayas tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:173.081c: prathamo hy eṣa devānāṃ mukhād asyānalo 'bhavat
GE07mbh_07_u:173.082a: sarvathā yat paśūn pāti taiś ca yad ramate punaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:173.082c: teṣām adhipatir yac ca tasmāt paśupatiḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:173.083a: nityena brahmacaryeṇa liṅgam asya yadā sthitam
GE07mbh_07_u:173.083c: mahayanti ca lokāś ca maheśvara iti smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:173.084a: ṛṣayaś caiva devāś ca gandharvāpsarasas tathā
GE07mbh_07_u:173.084c: liṅgam asyārcayanti sma tac cāpy ūrdhvaṃ samāsthitam
GE07mbh_07_u:173.084d-1469_01: urdhvaliṅgas tataś cokto bhagavān brāhmaṇaiḥ sadā
GE07mbh_07_u:173.085a: pūjyamāne tatas tasmin modate sa maheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:173.085c: sukhī prītaś ca bhavati prahṛṣṭaś caiva śaṃkaraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:173.086c: sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ caiva bahurūpas tataḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:173.087c: krodhād yaś cāviśal lokāṃs tasmāc charva iti smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:173.088a: dhūmraṃ rūpaṃ ca yat tasya dhūrjaṭis tena ucyate
GE07mbh_07_u:173.088c: viśve devāś ca yat tasmin viśvarūpas tataḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:173.089a: tisro devīr yadā caiva bhajate bhuvaneśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:173.089c: dyām apaḥ pṛthivīṃ caiva tryambakaś ca tataḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:173.090c: śivam icchan manuṣyāṇāṃ tasmād eśa śivaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:173.091c: yac ca viśvaṃ mahat pāti mahādevas tataḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:173.092a: dahaty ūrdhvaṃ sthito yac ca prāṇotpattisthitaś ca yat
GE07mbh_07_u:173.092c: sthitaliṅgaś ca yan nityaṃ tasmāt sthāṇur iti smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:173.092d-1470_01: sūryācandramasor loke prakāśanty aṃśavaś ca ye
GE07mbh_07_u:173.092d-1470_02: te keśāḥ saṃjñitās tasya vyomakeśas tataḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_07_u:173.092d-1470_03: kapiḥ śreṣṭha iti prokto dharmaś ca vṛṣa ucyate
